original: yatkṛpāleśamātreṇa puruṣārthacatuṣṭayam prāpyate tam ahaṃ vande govindaṃ bhaktavatsalam /
analyzed: yad kṛpā leśa mātreṇa puruṣa artha catuṣṭayam prāpyate tam aham vande govindam bhakta vatsalam

original: anantaguṇasaṃpannam anantabhajanapṛiyam anantarūpiṇaṃ vande gurum ānandarūpiṇam /
analyzed: ananta guṇa saṃpannam ananta bhajana pṛiyam ananta rūpiṇam vande gurum ānanda rūpiṇam

original: iha khalu paramakāruṇikena bhagavatā jaiminyṛṣiṇā / athā 'to dharmajijñāsā,' ityādinā dvādaśasv adhyāyeṣu dharmo vicāritaḥ /
analyzed: iha khalu parama kāruṇikena bhagavatā jaiminī ṛṣiṇā atha taḥ dharma jijñāsā ityādinā dvādaśasu adhyāyeṣu dharmaḥ vicāritaḥ

original: tatra vedena prayojanam uddiśya vidhīyamāno 'rtho dharmaḥ; yathā yāgādiḥ /
analyzed: tatra vedena prayojanam uddiśya vidhīyamānaḥ rthaḥ dharmaḥ yathā yāga ādiḥ

original: sa hi yajeta svargakāma ityādivākyena svargam uddiśya vidhīyate /
analyzed: sa hi yajeta svarga kāmaḥ ityādi vākyena svargam uddiśya vidhīyate

original: tathā hi /
analyzed: tathā hi

original: yajete 'ty atrā 'sty aṃśadvayam / vidhyaṃśaḥ pratyayaś ca /
analyzed: yajeta iti atra sti aṃśa dvayam vidhi aṃśaḥ pratyayaḥ ca

original: tatra pratyaye 'py asty aṃśadvayam / ākhyātatvaṃ liṅtvaṃ ca /
analyzed: tatra pratyaye pi asti aṃśa dvayam ākhyāta tvam liṅ tvam ca

original: ākhyātatvaṃ ca daśasu lakāreṣu vidyate; liṅtvaṃ punaḥ kevalaṃ liṅy eva /
analyzed: ākhyāta tvam ca daśasu lakāreṣu vidyate liṅ tvam punar kevalam liṅi eva

original: tatrā 'khyātatvaliṅtvābhyāṃ bhāvanai 'vo 'cyate /
analyzed: tatra khyāta tva liṅ tvābhyām

original: bhāvanā nāma bhavitṛ bhāvanānukūlo bhāvakavyāpāraviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: bhāvanā nāma bhavitṛ bhāvanā anukūlaḥ bhāvaka vyāpāra viśeṣaḥ

original: sā ca dvividhā / śābdī bhāvanā / ārthī bhāvanā ce 'ti /
analyzed: sā ca dvividhā śābdī bhāvanā  ārthī bhāvanā ca iti

original: tatra puruṣapravṛttyanukūlabhāvakavyāpāraviśeṣaḥ śābdī bhāvanā /
analyzed: tatra puruṣa pravṛtti anukūla bhāvaka vyāpāra viśeṣaḥ śābdī bhāvanā

original: sā ca liṅtvāṃśeno 'cyate; liṅśravaṇe / ayaṃ māṃ pravartayati,matpravṛttyanukūlavyāpāravān ayam / iti niyamena pratīyamānatvāt /
analyzed: sā ca liṅ tva aṃśena u cyate liṅ śravaṇe ayam mām pravartayatimat pravṛtti anukūla vyāpāravān ayam iti niyamena pratīyamāna tvāt

original: yac ca yasmāt pratīyate tat tasya vācyam / yathā gośabdasya gotvam /
analyzed: yat ca yasmāt pratīyate tat tasya vācyam yathā go śabdasya go tvam

original: sa ca pravṛttyanukūlavyāpāraviśeṣoloke puruṣaniṣṭho 'bhiprāyaviśeṣaḥ / vede tu puruṣābhāvāl liṅādiśabdaniṣṭha eva /
analyzed: sa ca pravṛtti anukūla vyāpāra viśeṣaḥ loke puruṣa niṣṭhaḥ bhiprāya viśeṣaḥ vede tu puruṣa abhāvāt liṅ ādi śabda niṣṭhaḥ eva

original: na hi vedāḥ puruṣanirmitāḥ,
analyzed: na hi vedāḥ puruṣa nirmitāḥ

original: vedādhyayanasāmānyād adhunā 'dhyayanāṁ yathā /
analyzed: veda adhyayana sāmānyāt adhunā yathā

original: ityādinā vedāpauruṣeyatvasya sādhitatvāt; yaḥ kalpaḥ sa kalpapūrvaḥ / iti nyāyena saṁsārasyā 'nāditvād īśvarasya ca sarvajñatvād īśvaro gatakalplyāṁ vedam asmin kalpe smṛtvo 'padiśati 'ty etāvatai 'vo 'papattau pramāṇāntareṇā 'rtham upalabhya racitatvakalpanānupapatteś ca /
analyzed: ityādinā veda apauruṣeya tvasya sādhita tvāt yaḥ kalpaḥ sa kalpa pūrvaḥ iti nyāyena sa sārasyāḥ nādi tvāt īśvarasya ca sarvajña tvāt īśvaraḥ vedam asmin kalpe smṛtvā u padiśati ti rtham upalabhya racita tva kalpanā anupapatteḥ ca

original: tataś ca puruṣābhāvāc chabdaniṣṭhai 'va sā /
analyzed: tatas ca puruṣa abhāvāt śabda niṣṭhā sā

original: ata eva śābdī bhāvane 'ti vyapadiśanti /
analyzed: atas eva śābdī bhāvane ti vyapadiśanti

original: sā ca śābdī bhāvanā 'ṁśatrayam apekṣate /
analyzed: sā ca śābdī bhāvanā śa trayam apekṣate

original: sādhyaṁ sādhanam itikartavyatāṁ ce 'ti /
analyzed: sādhya sādhanam itikartavyatā ca ti

original: tatra sādhyākāṅkṣāyāṁ vakṣyamāṇāṁśatrayopetā 'rthī bhāvanā sādhyatvena saṁbadhyate / ekapratyayagamyatvena samānābhidhānaśruteḥ /
analyzed: tatra sādhya ākāṅkṣāyāḥ vakṣyamāṇa āśā traya upetā rthī bhāvanā sādhya tvena sabadhyate eka pratyaya gamya tvena samāna abhidhāna śruteḥ

original: yady api sāṁkhyādīnām apy ekapratyayagamyatvaṁ samānaṁ tathā 'py ayogyatvān na teṣāṁ bhāvyatvena 'nvayaḥ /
analyzed: yadi api sākhya ādīnām api eka pratyaya gamya tva samāna tathā pi ayogya tvāt na teṣām bhāvya tvena nvayaḥ

original: karaṇākāṅkṣāyāṁ liṅādijñānaṁ karaṇatvena saṁbadhyate /
analyzed: karaṇa ākāṅkṣāyāḥ liṅ ādi jñāna karaṇa tvena sabadhyate

original: tasya ca karaṇatvaṁ na bhāvanotpādakatvena / saṁnikarṣasye 'va rūpādijñāne / saṁnikarṣāt prāg rūpajñānasye 'va liṅādijñānāt prāk śabdadharmabhāvanāyā abhāvaprasaṅgāt; kiṁ tu bhāvanābhāvyanivartakatvena i 'va /
analyzed: tasya ca karaṇa tva na bhāvanā utpādaka tvena rūpa ādi jñāne sanikarṣāt prāk liṅ ādi jñānāt prāk śabda dharma bhāvanāyāḥ abhāva prasaṅgāt tu bhāvanā bhāvya nivartaka tvena

original: liṅādijñānaṁ hi śabdabhāvanābhāvyārthibhāvanāṁ nivartayati / kuṭhāra iva chedanam /
analyzed: hi śabda bhāvanā bhāvya arthi bhāvanāḥ nivartayati kuṭhāraḥ iva chedanam

original: ato liṅādijñānasya karaṇatvena 'nvayaḥ /
analyzed: atas liṅ ādi jñānasya karaṇa tvena nvayaḥ

original: itikartavyatākāṅkṣāyāṁ prāśastyajñānam itikartavyatātvena saṁbadhyate /
analyzed: itikartavya tā ākāṅkṣāyā prāśastya jñānam itikartavya tā tvena sabadhyate

original: tac ca prāśastyajñānaṁ vāyur vai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā / ityādyarthavādair janyate /
analyzed: tat ca vāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhāḥ devatāḥ ityādi arthavādaiḥ janyate

original: te hy arthavādāḥ svārthapratipādane prayojanam anupalabhamānā lakṣaṇayā kratoḥ prāśastyaṁ pratipādayanti / svārthamātraparatva ānarthakyanirāsaṁ ca / na ce 'ṣṭāpattiḥ /
analyzed: te hi arthavādāḥ sva artha pratipādane prayojanam an upalabhamānāḥ lakṣaṇayā kratoḥ pratipādayanti sva artha mātra para tve ānarthakya nirāsa ca

original: adhyayanavidhyupādānatvena tarthakyanupapatter /
analyzed: adhyayana vidhi upādāna tvena tarthakī anupapatteḥ

original: tathā hi / svādhyāyo 'dhyetavyaḥ / ity adhyayanavidhiḥ sakalasya vedasya 'dhyayanakartavyatāṁ bodhayan sarvo vedaḥ prayojanavadarthaparyavasāyī 'ti sūcayati / nirarthakasyā 'dhyayanānupapatteḥ /sa ca vedo vidhimantrānāmadheyaniṣedhārthatvādātmakaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi svādhyāyaḥ dhyetavyaḥ iti adhyayana vidhiḥ sakalasya vedasya dhyayana kartavyatā bodhayan sarvaḥ vedaḥ prayojanavat artha paryavasāyī ti sūcayati nirarthakasyāḥ dhyayana anupapatteḥ sa ca vedaḥ vidhi mantra a nāmadheya niṣedha artha tvāt ātmakaḥ

original: tatra vidhiḥ prayojanavadarthavidhānena 'rthavān /
analyzed: tatra vidhiḥ prayojanavat artha vidhānena rthavān

original: sa cā 'prāptam arthaṁ vidhatte /
analyzed: sa ca ā prāptam artha vidhatte

original: yathā / agnihotraṁ juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ / iti vidhir aprāptaṁ prayojanavaddhomam vidhatte; agnihotrahomena svargaṁ bhāvayed iti /
analyzed: yathā agnihotra juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti vidhiḥ aprāpta prayojanavat homam vidhatte agnihotra homena svarga bhāvayet iti

original: yatra tu karma prakārāntareṇa prāptaṁ tatra taduddéśena guṇapravidhānam /
analyzed: yatra tu karma prakāra antareṇa tatra tad uddśena guṇa pravidhānam

original: yathā dadhna juhuyād ity atra homasya 'gnihotraṁ juhuyād ity anena prāptatvād dhomoddéśena dadhimātravidhānam; dadhnā homaṁ bhāvayed iti /
analyzed: yathā dadhnā juhuyāt iti atra homasya gnihotra juhuyāt iti anena prāpta tvāt dadhi mātra vidhānam dadhnā homa bhāvayet iti

original: yatra tū 'bhayam aprāptaṁ tatra viśiṣṭaṁ vidhatte /
analyzed: yatra tu bhayam aprāpta tatra viśiṣṭa vidhatte

original: tad uktam /
analyzed: tat uktam

original: na ced anyena śiṣṭā iti; śiṣṭā upadiṣṭā ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: na ced anyena śiṣṭāḥ iti śiṣṭāḥ upadiṣṭāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: yathā / somena yajeta / ity atra somayāgayor aprāptatvāt somaviśiṣṭayāgavidhānam / somavatā yāgene 'ṣṭaṁ bhāvayed iti /
analyzed: yathā somena yajeta iti atra soma yāgayoḥ aprāpta tvāt soma viśiṣṭa yāga vidhānam somavatā bhāvayet iti

original: na co 'bhayavidhāne vākyabhedaḥ / viśiṣṭasyai 'katvāt /
analyzed: na caḥ u bhaya vidhāne vākya bhedaḥ viśiṣṭasyai ka tvāt

original: viśiṣṭavidhau ca matvarthalakṣaṇā; yathā / somapadena matvartho lakṣyate / somavate 'ti /
analyzed: viśiṣṭa vidhau ca matu artha lakṣaṇā yathā soma padena matu arthaḥ lakṣyate somavate ti

original: na hi matvarthalakṣaṇāṁ vinā somasya 'nvayaḥ saṁbhavati /
analyzed: na hi matu artha lakṣaṇā vinā somasya nvayaḥ sabhavati

original: yadi tāvat somayāgayor aikyarūpeṇa bhāvanāyāṁ karaṇatvena 'vā 'nvayaḥ / somena yāgene 'ṣṭaṁ bhāvayed iti / tata ubhayavidhāne vākyabhedaḥ / somasya yāgavat phalabhāvanākaraṇatvena prādhānyāpātaś ca / yāgārthatvānupapattiś ca / yāge dravyānupapattiś ca / pratyayavācyaphalabhāvanāyāḥ samānapadopāttena yāgena karaṇakāṅkṣānivṛttatvena bhinnapadopāttasya somasya karaṇatvenā 'nvayānupapattiś ca syāt /
analyzed: yadi tāvat soma yāgayoḥ aikya rūpeṇa bhāvanāyāḥ karaṇa tvena vā nvayaḥ somena bhāvayet iti tatas ubhaya vidhāne vākya bhedaḥ somasya yāga vat phala bhāvanā karaṇa tvena prādhānya āpātaḥ ca yāga artha tva anupapattiḥ ca yāge dravya anupapattiḥ ca pratyaya vācya phala bhāvanāyāḥ samāna pada upāttena yāgena karaṇa kāṅkṣā nivṛtta tvena bhinna pada upāttasya somasya karaṇa tvena anvaya anupapattiḥ ca syāt

original: yadi ca vaiyadhikaraṇyena 'nvayaḥ / tatra na tāvadyāgena somam ity anvayaḥ / samānapadopāttatvāt pratyayavācyaphalabhāvanāyāṁ karaṇatvena 'nvitasya yāgasya somakarmakabhāvanānyanūpapatteḥ / yāgasya somārthatvopāpatteś ca /
analyzed: yadi ca vaiyadhikaraṇyena nvayaḥ tatra na tāvat yāgena somam iti anvayaḥ samāna pada upātta tvāt pratyaya vācya phala bhāvanāyā karaṇa tvena nvitasya yāgasya yāgasya soma artha tva upāpatteḥ ca

original: na ce 'ṣṭāpattiḥ / adṛṣṭadvayāpapatteḥ /
analyzed: na ced iṣṭa āpattiḥ adṛṣṭa dvaya apapatteḥ

original: na hi yāgasya somārthatvaṁ dṛṣṭadvāreṇa saṁbhavati / vṛihiṣv avaghatene 'va yāgena some kasyacid dṛṣṭasyā 'jananāt /
analyzed: na hi yāgasya soma artha tva dṛṣṭa dvāreṇa sabhavati yāgena some kasyacid dṛṣṭasya ā jananāt

original: atas tena tāvat some kiṁcid adṛṣṭaṁ jananīyam / prokṣaṇene 'va vṛihiṣu /
analyzed: atas tena tāvat some kicid adṛṣṭa jananīyam

original: tathā yāgasya somārthatve phalabhāvanāyāṁ somasya karaṇatvena 'nvayo vaktavyaḥ /
analyzed: tathā yāgasya soma artha tve phala bhāvanāyā somasya karaṇa tvena nvayaḥ vaktavyaḥ

original: bhāvanākaraṇatvaṁ ca bhāvanābhāvyanirvaratakatvene 'ty uktam /
analyzed: ca

original: na ca somo 'dṛṣṭam antareṇa phalaṁ janayituṁ samarthaḥ / grahair juhoti 'tivākyavihitahomena tasya bhasmībhāvāt /
analyzed: na ca somaḥ dṛṣṭam antareṇa samarthaḥ grahaiḥ juhoti ti vākya vihita homena tasya bhasmībhāvāt

original: ato 'dṛṣṭadvayāpattān na yāgasya somārthatvam iti na yāgena somaṁ bhāvayet ity anvayaḥ saṁbhavati; karaṇatveno 'pasthitasya somasya sādhyatvena 'nvayānupapatteś ca /
analyzed: atas dṛṣṭa dvaya āpattāt na yāgasya soma artha tvam iti na yāgena soma bhāvayet iti anvayaḥ sabhavati karaṇa tvena u pasthitasya somasya sādhya tvena nvaya anupapatteḥ ca

original: atha / somena yāgaṁ bhāvayet / ity anvayaḥ; tatra yady api somasya karaṇatvena yāgārthatvād yāganirv̥ttir dṛṣṭam eva prayojanaṁ labhyate / iti nā 'dṛṣṭadvayāpattiḥ / nā 'pi karaṇatveno 'pasthitasya somasya sādhyatvānvayānupapattiḥ / karaṇatvenai 'vā 'nvayāt; tathā 'py aprāptatvād bhāvanākaraṇatvenā 'nvitasya yāgasya sādhyatvena 'nvayānupapattiś tadavasthāi 'va /
analyzed: atha somena yāga bhāvayet iti anvayaḥ tatra yadi api somasya karaṇa tvena yāga artha tvāt yāga nirvttiḥ dṛṣṭam eva prayojana labhyate iti nā dṛṣṭa dvaya āpattiḥ nā pi karaṇa tvena u pasthitasya somasya sādhya tva anvaya anupapattiḥ karaṇa tvena vā nvayāt tathā pi aprāpta tvāt bhāvanā karaṇa tvena anvitasya yāgasya sādhya tvena nvaya anupapattiḥ tad avasthā vā aprāpta tvāt bhāvanā karaṇa tvena anvitasya yāgasya sādhya tvena nvaya anupapattiḥ tad av

original: nanu yajete 'ty atra yāgasya na karaṇatvena nā 'pi sādhyatveno 'pasthitiḥ / tadvākakatṛtīyāyābhāvāt; kiṁ tu bhāvanāyāṁ yāgasaṁbandhamātraṁ pratīyate /
analyzed: nanu yajeta iti atra yāgasya na karaṇa tvena nā api sādhya tvena upasthitiḥ tad vākaka tṛtīyāyāḥ abhāvāt tu bhāvanāyāḥ yāga sabandha mātra pratīyate

original: yāgasya ca bhāvanāsaṁbandhaḥ karaṇatvena sādhyatvena ca saṁbhavati /
analyzed: yāgasya ca bhāvanā sabandhaḥ karaṇa tvena sādhya tvena ca sabhavati

original: tatra karaṇatvāṁśam ādāya phalasaṁbandhaḥ / sādhyatvāṁśam ādāya guṇasaṁbandhaś ca syāt / iti cet,—
analyzed: tatra karaṇa tva āśam ādāya phala sabandhaḥ sādhya tva āśam ādāya guṇa sabandhaḥ ca syāt iti ced

original: mai 'vam /
analyzed: mai vam

original: yady api bhāvanayā yāgasya saṁbandhamātraṁ pratīyate / tathā 'pi karaṇatveno 'pasthitidaśāyāṁ na sādhyatveno 'pasthitiḥ saṁbhavati / virodhād viruddhottikadvayāpatteś ca /
analyzed: yadi api bhāvanayā yāgasya sabandha mātra pratīyate tathā pi karaṇa tvena upasthiti daśāyāḥ na sādhya tvena upasthitiḥ sabhavati virodhāt viruddha uttika dvaya āpatteḥ ca

original: tad avaśyaṁ yāgena svargaṁ bhāvayed iti karaṇatvena 'nvaye sati paścāt somena yāgaṁ bhāvayed iti sādhyatvena 'nvayo vaktavyaḥ /
analyzed: tat avaśya yāgena svarga bhāvayet iti karaṇa tvena nvaye sati paścāt somena yāga bhāvayet iti sādhya tvena nvayaḥ vaktavyaḥ

original: tataś ca vākyabhedaḥ /
analyzed: tatas ca vākya bhedaḥ

original: na ca pratyayābhihitabhāvanāsvarūpe yāgasvarūpamātram anveti 'ti vaktuṁ yuktam / kārakāṇāṁ eva kriyānvayāt /
analyzed: na ca pratyaya abhihita bhāvanā sva rūpe yāga sva rūpa mātram anveti yuktam kārakāṇām eva kriyā anvayāt

original: tat siddhaṁ somasya na yāge sāmānādhikaraṇyena vaiyadhikaraṇyena vā 'nvayaḥ saṁbhavati 'ti /nanu yajete 'ty atra pratyayābhihitabhāvanāyāḥ karaṇākāṅkṣāyāṁ yathā yāgaḥ karaṇatvena 'nveti tathe 'tikartavyatākāṅkṣāyāṁ somasya 'tikartavyatātvena bhāvanāyām evā 'nvayo 'stu / kṛtaṁ matvarthalakṣaṇayā / iti cet—
analyzed: tat siddha somasya na yāge sāmānādhikaraṇyena vaiyadhikaraṇyena vā nvayaḥ sabhavati ti nanu yajeta iti atra pratyaya abhihita bhāvanāyāḥ karaṇa ākāṅkṣāyāḥ yathā yāgaḥ karaṇa tvena nveti tathā iti kartavya tā ākāṅkṣāyā somasya tikartavya tā tvena bhāvanāyām eva astu kṛta matu artha lakṣaṇayā iti ced

original: na / somene 'ti tṛtīyayā karaṇatvavācinyā somasye 'tikartavyatātvānabhidhānāt /
analyzed: na somena iti tṛtīyayā karaṇatva vācinyā somasya iti kartavyatā tva anabhidhānāt

original: katra yadi 'tikartavyatātvaṁ lakṣaṇayo 'cyate / tato varaṁ somapada eva prakṛtibhūte matvarthalakṣaṇā / guṇe tv anyāyyakalpane 'ti nyāyāt /
analyzed: katra yadi tikartavya tā tva lakṣaṇayo cyate tatas soma pade eva prakṛti bhūte matu artha lakṣaṇā guṇe tu anyāyya kalpane ti nyāyāt

original: atha vedo vā prāyadarśanād ityādhikaraṇoktasaṁjātavirodhatvanyāyena 'ntye pratyaya eva lakṣaṇe 'ti cet / tathā 'pi somasye 'tikartavyatātvena 'nvayānupapattiḥ; siddhasya vastuna itikartavyatātvābhāvāt / kriyāyā eve 'tikartavyatātvāt / dravyasya kevalam āṅgatvāt / ata eve 'tikartavyatātvābhāvād dravyasya prakaraṇād agrahaṇam /
analyzed: atha vedaḥ vā prāya darśanāt ityādhikaraṇa ukta sajāta virodha tva nyāyena ntye pratyaye eva lakṣaṇe ced tathā nvaya anupapattiḥ siddhasya vastunaḥ itikartavya tā tva abhāvāt kriyāyāḥ eva itikartavya tā tvāt dravyasya kevalam ā aṅga tvāt atas eva itikartavya tā tva abhāvāt dravyasya prakaraṇāt agrahaṇam

original: yathā 'huḥ /
analyzed: yathā huḥ

original: nā 'vāntarakriyāyogād ṛte vākyopakalpitāt guṇadravye kathaṁbhāvair gṛhṇanti prakṛtāḥ kriyāḥ / iti /
analyzed: nā vā antara kriyā yogāt ṛte vākya upakalpitāt guṇa dravye katha bhāvaiḥ gṛhṇanti prakṛtāḥ kriyāḥ iti

original: tad etad agre vakṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: tat etat agre vakṣyāmaḥ

original: kiṁ ca somena yajete 'ti hi yāgasyo 'tpattivākyaṁ nā 'dhikāravākyam; jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta / ity asyā 'dhikāravākyatvāt /
analyzed: ki ca somena yajeta iti hi yāgasya u tpatti vākya na adhikāra vākyam jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti asya adhikāra vākya tvāt

original: utpattivākye ca ne 'tikartavyatākāṅkṣā / iṣṭaviśeṣakāṅkṣākaluṣitatvene 'tikartavyatākāṅkṣāyā vispasṭam anutthānāt /
analyzed: utpatti vākye ca na itikartavya tā ākāṅkṣā iṣṭa viśeṣa kāṅkṣā kaluṣita tvena itikartavya tā ākāṅkṣāyāḥ vispasṭam anutthānāt

original: tat siddhaṁ somasya ne 'tikartavyatātvena bhāvanāyām anvayaḥ /
analyzed: tat siddha somasya na itikartavyatā tvena bhāvanāyām anvayaḥ

original: tasmād viśiṣṭavidhāv anvayānupapattyā 'vaśyaṁ matvarthalakṣaṇā śrūcye 'ti /
analyzed: tasmāt viśiṣṭa vidhau anvaya anupapattyā matu artha lakṣaṇā śrūcyā iti

original: nanv evam api somena yajete 'ty atra na viśiṣṭavidhānam / gauravāt / matvarthalakṣaṇāpāte ca /
analyzed: nanu evam api somena yajeta iti atra na viśiṣṭa vidhānam gauravāt matu artha lakṣaṇā pāte ca

original: kiṁ tu dadhnā juhoti 'tivad guṇamātravidhānam astu / vidhiśakter guṇe saṁkramāt /
analyzed: ki tu dadhnā juhoti ti vat guṇa mātra vidhānam astu vidhi śakteḥ guṇe sa kramāt

original: yathā 'huḥ /
analyzed: yathā huḥ

original: sarvatrā 'khyātasaṁbaddhe śrūyamāṇe padāntare vidhiśaktyupasaṁkrānteḥ syād dhātor anuvādatā /
analyzed: sarvatra ā khyāta sabaddhe śrūyamāṇe pada antare vidhi śakti upasakrānteḥ syāt dhātoḥ anuvāda tā

original: iti /na ca yāgasya 'prāptatvān na taduddeśena somavidhānam iti vācyam; jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta / ity anena yāgasya prāptatvāt /
analyzed: iti na ca yāgasya prāpta tvāt na tad uddeśena soma vidhānam iti vācyam jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti anena yāgasya prāpta tvāt

original: na cā 'syā 'dhikāravidhitvena no 'tpattividhitvam iti vācyam; udbhidā yajeta paśukāmaḥ / itivad ekasyai 'vo 'bhayavidhitvopapatteḥ /
analyzed: na ca syāḥ dhikāra vidhi tvena na u tpatti vidhi tvam iti vācyam udbhidā yajeta paśu kāmaḥ iti vat ekasyai vaḥ bhaya vidhi tva upapatteḥ

original: evaṁ ca somena yajete 'ty atra na matvarthalakṣaṇā /
analyzed: eva ca somena yajeta iti atra na matu artha lakṣaṇā

original: yadi hy atra viśiṣṭavidhānaṁ syāt tadā 'nvayānupapattyā matvarthalakṣaṇā syāt /
analyzed: yadi hi atra syāt tadā nvaya anupapattyā matu artha lakṣaṇā syāt

original: jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta / ity atra tu yāgavidhāne kvacin na matvarthalakṣaṇā /
analyzed: jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti atra tu yāga vidhāne kvacid na matu artha lakṣaṇā

original: na tāvad etasmin vākye / jyotiṣṭomena yāgena svargaṁ bhāvayed iti sāmānādhikaraṇyenai 'va nāmapadasyā 'nvayāt;
analyzed: na tāvat etasmin vākye jyotiṣṭomena yāgena svarga bhāvayet iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena e va nāma padasya a nvayāt

original: nā 'pi somena yajete 'ty atra / yāgoddeśena somavidhānāt / somena yāgaṁ bhāvayed iti /
analyzed: na a pi somena yajeta iti atra yāga uddeśena soma vidhānāt somena yāga bhāvayet iti

original: nanv anuvāde 'py asti matvarthalakṣaṇā /
analyzed: nanu anuvāde pi asti matu artha lakṣaṇā

original: ata evo 'ktam /
analyzed: atas eva u ktam

original: vidhāne vā 'nuvāde vā yāgaḥ karaṇam iṣyate tatsamīpe tṛtīyāntas tadvācitvaṁ na muñcati /
analyzed: vidhāne vā anuvāde vā yāgaḥ karaṇam iṣyate tad samīpe tṛtīyā antaḥ na muñcati

original: ataś ca viśiṣṭavidhāv iva guṇavidhāv apy asty eva matvarthalakṣaṇe 'ti cet—
analyzed: atas ca viśiṣṭa vidhau iva guṇa vidhau api asti eva matu artha lakṣaṇe ced

original: mai 'vam /
analyzed: mai vam

original: guṇānvayānupapattyā hi matvarthalakṣaṇā 'ṅgīkriyate /
analyzed: guṇa anvaya anupapattyā hi matu artha lakṣaṇā ṅgīkriyate

original: yadā tu bhāvyavākyam dhātvartha​sya karaṇatvena 'nvayaḥ tadā 'nvayānupattyā sā 'ṅgīkartavyā /
analyzed: yadā tu bhāvya vākyam dhātvarthasya karaṇa tvena nvayaḥ tadā nvaya anupattyā sā ṅgīkartavyā

original: guṇavidhau ca na dhātvarthasya karaṇatvena 'nvayo mānābhāvāt /
analyzed: guṇa vidhau ca na dhātvarthasya karaṇa tvena nvayaḥ māna abhāvāt

original: na hi dadhnā juhoti 'ty atra homasya karaṇatvaṁ śrūyate / tadvācakatṛtīyādyabhāvāt /
analyzed: na hi dadhnā juhoti atra homasya karaṇa tva śrūyate tad vācaka tṛtīyā ādi abhāvāt

original: kalpyata iti cet / na; guṇasya tatra vidhitsitatvena sādhyākāṅkṣāyāṁ sādhyatvakalpanāyā evo 'citatvāt / dadhnā homaṁ bhāvayed iti /
analyzed: kalpyate iti ced na guṇasya tatra vidhitsita tvena sādhya ākāṅkṣāyā sādhya tva kalpanāyāḥ eva u cita tvāt dadhnā homa bhāvayet iti

original: na cā 'yam asti niyamo bhāvanāyāṁ dhātvarthasya karaṇatvenai 'vā 'nvayo na prakārāntareṇa 'ti / ṣaṣṭhādyapūrvapakṣānutthānapatteḥ /
analyzed: na ca asti niyamaḥ bhāvanāyāḥ dhātvarthasya vā nvayaḥ na prakāra antareṇa ṣaṣṭha ādya pūrvapakṣa anutthāna patteḥ

original: ṣaṣṭhādye hi yajeta svargakāma ityādau pratyayavācyāyāṁ yakṣyamāṇārthabhāvanāyāṁ samānapadaśrutyā yāgasya bhāvyatvam āśaṅkya 'puruṣārthtvena parihr̥tam /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭha ādye hi yajeta svarga kāmaḥ ityādau pratyaya vācyāyāḥ yakṣyamāṇa artha bhāvanāyā samāna pada śrutyā yāgasya bhāvya tvam āśaṅkya puruṣa artha tvena parihrtam

original: yadi ca dhātvarthasya karaṇatvenai 'va bhāvanāyām anvayaḥ tadā bhāvyatvaśaṅkai 'va no 'deti 'ti vyarthaṁ ṣaṣṭhādyam adhikaraṇam apadyeta /
analyzed: yadi ca dhātvarthasya karaṇa tvena va bhāvanāyām anvayaḥ tadā bhāvya tva śaṅkā vyartha ṣaṣṭha ādyam adhikaraṇam apadyeta

original: kiṁ ca vājapeyādhikaraṇe tantrasaṁbandha āśaṅkyaparihṛtaḥ /
analyzed: ki ca vājapeya adhikaraṇe tantra sabandhaḥ āśaṅkya parihṛtaḥ

original: dhāttvarthasya karaṇatvenai 'vā 'nvaye tantrasaṁbandhașaṅkai 'va na syāt /
analyzed: dhāttvarthasya karaṇa tvena vā nvaye tantra sabandha aṅkaiḥ va na syāt

original: tantrasaṁbandhașaṅkāparihārau ca vyākhyātau /
analyzed: tantra sabandha aṅka aparihārau ca vyākhyātau

original: kiṁ ca dhātvarthasya na karaṇatvenai 'vā 'nvayaḥ / guṇakāmādhikaraṇa āśrayatvena dhātvarthānvayasyo 'ktatvāt /
analyzed: ki ca dhātvarthasya na karaṇa tvena e vā anvayaḥ guṇa kāma adhikaraṇe āśraya tvena dhātvartha anvayasya u kta tvāt

original: tathā hi /
analyzed: tathā hi

original: dadhne 'ndriyakāmasya juhuyād ity atra na tāvad dhomo vidhīyate / tasya vacanāntareṇa vihitatvāt /
analyzed: dadhne indriya kāmasya juhuyāt iti atra na tāvat homaḥ vidhīyate tasya vacana antareṇa vihita tvāt

original: nā 'pi homasya phalasaṁbandhaḥ / guṇapadānarthākyāpatteḥ /
analyzed: nā pi homasya phala sabandhaḥ guṇa pada anartha ākya āpatteḥ

original: nā 'pi guṇasaṁbandhaṁ vidhatte / phalapadānarthākyāpatāt /
analyzed: nā pi guṇa sabandha vidhatte

original: nā 'py ubhayasaṁbandhaṁ vidhatte / prāpte karmaṇy anekavidhāne vākyabhedāpatteḥ /
analyzed: na api vidhatte prāpte karmaṇi aneka vidhāne vākya bheda āpatteḥ

original: yathā 'huḥ /
analyzed: yathā huḥ

original: prāpte karmaṇi nā 'neko vidhātuṁ śakyate guṇaḥ aprāpte tu vidhīyante bahavo 'py ekayāmataḥ /
analyzed: prāpte karmaṇi nā na ekaḥ vidhātu śakyate guṇaḥ aprāpte tu vidhīyante bahavaḥ pi eka yāmataḥ

original: atra ca karmapadavad guṇe'tyupalakṣaṇam; ekoddeśenā 'nekavidhāne vākyabhedāt /
analyzed: atra ca karma pada vat guṇa iti upalakṣaṇam eka uddeśena aneka vidhāne vākya bhedāt

original: ata eva grahaika̮tvādhikaraṇe grahaṁ saṁmā̆rṣṭi 'ty atra grahod̮deśenai 'katvasaṁmārgavidhau vākyabhedād grahaikatvam avivakṣitam ity uktam /
analyzed: atas eva graha ekatva adhikaraṇe graha samārṣṭi ti atra graha uddeśena e katva samārga vidhau vākya bhedāt graha ekatvam avivakṣitam iti uktam

original: revatyadhikaraṇe ca / etasyai 'va revatīṣu vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma kṛtvā paśukāmo hy etena yajeta / ity atra vāravantīyasya revatīsaṁbandhe 'gniṣṭomasāmasaṁbandhe phalasaṁbandhe ca vidhīyamāne vākyabhedād bhāvanopasarjanataṁ bhāvanāntaraṁ vidhīyate / ity uktam /
analyzed: revatī adhikaraṇe ca etasyai vai revatīṣu vāravantīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kṛtvā paśu kāmaḥ hi etena yajeta iti atra vāravantīyasya revatī sabandhe gniṣṭoma sāma sabandhe phala sabandhe ca vidhīyamāne vākya bhedāt bhāvanā upasarjanata bhāvanā antara vidhīyate iti uktam

original: tasmāt prāpte home no 'bhayavidhānaṁ saṁbhavati; nā 'pi homāntaraṁ vidhīyate / gauravāt / prakṛtahānāprakṛtakal̮panāprasaṅgāt / matvarthalakṣaṇāprasaṅgāc ca /
analyzed: tasmāt prāpte home na u bhaya vidhāna sabhavati na api homa antara vidhīyate gauravāt prakṛta hāna aprakṛta kalpanā prasaṅgāt matu artha lakṣaṇā prasaṅgāt ca

original: nā 'pi dadhy eva kevalaṁ karaṇatvena vidhīyata iti yuktam; kevalasya vyāpārānāviṣṭasya karaṇatvānupapatteḥ / kartṛvyāpāravyāpyatvaniyamāt karaṇatvasya /
analyzed: na api dadhi eva karaṇa tvena vidhīyate iti yuktam kevalasya vyāpāra anāviṣṭasya karaṇa tva anupapatteḥ kartṛ vyāpāra vyāpya tva niyamāt karaṇa tvasya

original: kiṁ tarhi vidhīyata iti cet / dadhne 'ti tṛtīyayo 'pāttaṁ dadhikaraṇakaṁ phalabhāvanāyāṁ karaṇatvena vidhīyate / pratyayārthatvena dadhno 'pi tasya prādhānyāt /
analyzed: ki tarhi vidhīyate iti ced dadhne ti tṛtīyayā upātta dadhi karaṇaka phala bhāvanāyā karaṇa tvena vidhīyate pratyaya artha tvena dadhnaḥ api tasya prādhānyāt

original: evaṁ ca dadhikaraṇatvene 'ndriyaṁ bhāvayed iti vākyārthaḥ /
analyzed: eva ca bhāvayet iti vākya arthaḥ

original: karaṇatvaṁ ca kiṁpratiyogikaṁ ity apekṣāyāṁ saṁnidhiprāpto homa āśraya
analyzed: karaṇa tva ca ki pratiyogikaḥ iti apekṣāyām sanidhi prāptaḥ homaḥ āśraya

original: tvena saṁbadhyate /
analyzed: tvena sabadhyate

original: tataś ca siddho dhāttvarthasya 'śrayatvena 'nvayaḥ /
analyzed: tatas ca siddhaḥ dhāttvarthasya śraya tvena nvayaḥ

original: prakṛtaṁ anusarāmaḥ /
analyzed: prakṛta anusarāmaḥ

original: tat siddhaṁ dhātvarthasya na karaṇatvenai 'vā 'nvaya iti /
analyzed: tat siddha dhātvarthasya na karaṇa tvena e vā nvayaḥ iti

original: kiṁ tarhi kvacit karaṇatvena kvacit sādhyatvena kvacid āśrayatvene 'ti /
analyzed: ki tarhi kvacid karaṇa tvena kvacid sādhya tvena kvacid āśraya tvena iti

original: guṇavidhau sā
analyzed: guṇa vidhau sā

original: dhyatvenai 'vā 'nvayaḥ saṁbhavati 'ti na matvarthalakṣaṇāyāḥ prayojanam /
analyzed: vā nvayaḥ sabhavati ti na matu artha lakṣaṇāyāḥ prayojanam

original: kiṁ ca / guṇavidhau matvarthalakṣaṇāyāṁ guṇasya dhā
analyzed: ki ca guṇa vidhau matu artha lakṣaṇāyāḥ guṇasya dhā

original: tvarth āṅgatve kiṁ mānaṁ iti vaktavyam /
analyzed: tu arth ā aṅga tve kim iti vaktavyam

original: na tāvac chrutiḥ; matvarthalakṣaṇāyāṁ kṛtvyāśrutiṁ matvarthasyai 'vā 'ṅgatve mānaṁ syāt / na guṇasyā 'ṅgatve 'pi /
analyzed: na tāvat śrutiḥ matu artha lakṣaṇāyā vā ṅga tve syāt na guṇasya ṅga tve

original: samabhivyāhāramātraṁ vākyaṁ iti cet / tat kiṁ svatantraṁ eva mānam / uta liṅgaśruti kalpayitvā /
analyzed: samabhivyāhāra mātra vākye iti ced tat ki svatantre eva mānam uta liṅga śruti kalpayitvā

original: nā 'dyaḥ / balābalādhikaraṇavirodhāt; tatra hi vākyaṁ liṅgaśrutī kalpayitvā 'ṅgatve mānam ity uktam /
analyzed: na ā dyaḥ bala abala adhikaraṇa virodhāt tatra hi vākya liṅga śrutī kalpayitvā ṅga tve mānam iti uktam

original: dvitīye pratyakṣāṁ śrutiṁ utsṛjya śrutyantarakalpane tasyā eva vā 'vṛttikalpane vyarthaḥ prayāsaḥ samāśritaḥ syāt /
analyzed: dvitīye pratyakṣā śruti utsṛjya śruti antara kalpane tasyāḥ eva vā vṛtti kalpane vyarthaḥ prayāsaḥ samāśritaḥ syāt

original: viśiṣṭavidhau cā 'gatyā tadāśrayaṇam /
analyzed: viśiṣṭa vidhau ca ā gatyā tad āśrayaṇam

original: kiṁ ca bhavatu śrutyantarakalpanam /
analyzed: ki ca bhavatu śruti antara kalpanam

original: tathā 'pi tatsa
analyzed: tathā pi tat sa

original: hakṛtaḥ pratyakṣa eva vidhir dhātvarth āṅgatvena guṇaṁ vidhatte / uta kalpitaṁ vidhyantaram /
analyzed: ha kṛtaḥ pratyakṣaḥ eva vidhiḥ dhātvarth āṅgatvena guṇa vidhatte uta kalpita vidhi antaram

original: kalpitam iti cen na / śrutavidher vyarthatāpatteḥ /
analyzed: kalpitam iti ced na śruta vidheḥ vyartha tā āpatteḥ

original: na hi tena tadā guṇo vidhīyate / kalpitavidhyantarāṅgīkārāt; nā 'pi dhāttvarthaḥ / tasya vacanān
analyzed: na hi tena tadā guṇaḥ vidhīyate kalpita vidhi antara aṅgīkārāt na pi dhāttvarthaḥ tasya vacanān

original: tareṇa vihitatvāt /
analyzed: tareṇa vihita tvāt

original: atha śrūyamāṇa eva vidhiḥ kalpitaśrutisahakṛto dhāt
analyzed: atha śrūyamāṇaḥ eva vidhiḥ kalpita śruti sahakṛtaḥ dhāt

original: varth āṅgatvena guṇaṁ vidhatta iti cet / tarhi tatra kathaṁ dhāttvarthasya 'nvayaḥ /
analyzed: āṅgatvena guṇa vidhatte iti ced tarhi tatra katha dhāttvarthasya nvayaḥ

original: karaṇatvene 'ti cen na / anvayānu
analyzed: karaṇa tvena i ti ced na anvaya anu

original: papatteḥ; na hi saṁbhavati / dadhnā homene 'ti cā 'nvayaḥ /
analyzed: papatteḥ na hi sabhavati dadhnā homena i ti ca anvayaḥ

original: sādhyatvenai 'vā 'nvayaḥ / dadhnā homaṁ bhāvayed iti cen na / tathā saty anuvāde 'pi dhāttvarthaḥ karaṇatvenai 'vā 'nveti 'ty etad upekṣitaṁ syāt; vivakṣitavākyārthaś ca vinai 'va matvarthalakṣaṇayā 'ṅgīkṛtaḥ syāt /
analyzed: vā nvayaḥ dadhnā homa bhāvayet iti ced na tathā sati anuvāde pi dhāttvarthaḥ karaṇa tvenai vā eti etat syāt vivakṣita vākya arthaḥ ca matvartha lakṣaṇayā ṅgīkṛtaḥ syāt

original: tasmān na guṇavidhau matvarthalakṣaṇā /
analyzed: tasmāt na guṇa vidhau matu artha lakṣaṇā

original: yat tu vidhāne vā 'nuvāde vā / iti vārtikam / tat pratītiṁ avalambya / na vastugatiṁ /
analyzed: yat tu vidhāne vā anuvāde vā iti vārtikam tat pratīti avalambya na vastugati

original: tathā hi /
analyzed: tathā hi

original: yāvad dhy agnihotraṁ juhuyād iti vākyaṁ nā 'locyate / kevalaṁ dadhnā juhoti 'tivākyam ālocyate / tadā ṣaṣṭhādhyanyāyena homasya 'bhāvyatāṃ jānatāṃ pratipadadhikaraṇabhāvārthādhikaraṇavāsanāvāsitāntaḥkaraṇānāṃ bhavaty etādṛśī matih; yad / dadhimatā homene 'staṃ bhāvayed iti /
analyzed: yāvat hi agnihotra juhuyāt iti vākya nā locyate kevala dadhnā juhoti ti vākyam ālocyate tadā ṣaṣṭha ādhya nyāyena homasya bhāvyatām jānatām pratipad adhikaraṇa bhāva artha adhikaraṇa vāsanā vāsita antaḥkaraṇānām bhavati etādṛśī matiḥ yat dadhimatā homena ā astam bhāvayet iti

original: pratipadadhikaraṇe hi somena yajete 'tyādiṣu kiṃ guṇadhātvarthayor phalabhāvanākaraṇatvena 'nvayaḥ / utai 'kasyai 've 'ti saṃdihya / pradhānasaṃbandhalābhād vinigamanāvirahāc ca sarveṣāṃ phalabhāvanākaraṇatvena 'nvayam āśaṅkya / lāghavād ekasyai 'va phalabhāvanākaraṇatvam ity uktam; bhāvanākaraṇatvaṃ hi bhāvanābhāvyanivartakatayā / bhāvyaṃ ca svargādi nā 'dṛṣṭam antareṇa 'ty anekeṣāṃ karaṇatve 'nekādṛṣṭakalpanaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: pratipad adhikaraṇe hi somena yajeta ityādiṣu kim guṇa dhātvarthayoḥ phala bhāvanā karaṇa tvena nvayaḥ kasyai vā iti saṃdihya pradhāna saṃbandha lābhāt vinigamana avirahāt ca sarveṣām phala bhāvanā karaṇa tvena nvayam āśaṅkya lāghavāt ekasyai phala bhāvanā karaṇa tvam iti uktam bhāvanā karaṇa tvam hi bhāvanā bhāvya nivartaka tayā bhāvyam ca svarga ādi nā dṛṣṭam antareṇa anekeṣām karaṇa tve neka adṛṣṭa kalpana prasaṅgāt

original: tasmād ekasyai 'va karaṇatvam /
analyzed: tasmāt ekasyai vai karaṇa tvam

original: yadā 'py ekasya tadā 'pi kiṃ dravyaguṇayoḥ phalabhāvanākaraṇatvam / uta dhātvarthasye 'ti bhāvārthādhikaraṇe saṃdihya / dravyaguṇayor eva bhāvanākaraṇatvaṃ bhūtaṃ bhavyāyo 'padiśyata iti nyāyād ity āśaṅkya / dhātvarthasyai 'va bhāvanākaraṇatvaṃ padaśruter balīyastvād ity uktam /
analyzed: yadā pi ekasya tadā pi kim dravya guṇayoḥ phala bhāvanā karaṇa tvam uta dhātvarthasya iti bhāva artha adhikaraṇe saṃdihya dravya guṇayoḥ eva bhāvanā karaṇa tvam bhūtam bhavyāya upadiśyate iti nyāyāt iti āśaṅkya bhāvanā karaṇa tvam pada śruteḥ balīyaḥ tvāt iti uktam

original: ataś ca siddham etadvākyāntarānālocanadaśāyāṃ guṇavidhāv api dhātvarthasya karaṇatvāśaṅkāyāṃ guṇapade matvarthalakṣaṇe 'ti /
analyzed: atas ca siddham etad vākya antara anālocana daśāyām guṇa vidhau api dhātvarthasya karaṇa tva āśaṅkāyām guṇa pade matu artha lakṣaṇe

original: yadā tv agnihotraṃ juhoti 'ti homavidhāyakaṃ vākyāntaram ālocyate tadā homasya vākyāntareṇai 'va vihitatvāt taduddeśena guṇamātraṃ vidhīyata ity ālocanān na matvarthalakṣaṇe 'ti /
analyzed: yadā tu agnihotram juhoti ti homa vidhāyakam vākya antaram ālocyate tadā homasya vākya antareṇa e vihita tvāt tad uddeśena guṇa mātram vidhīyate iti ālocanāt na matu artha lakṣaṇe ti

original: ata evo 'ktaṃ pārthesārathimiśrair āghārāgnihotrādhikaraṇe / phalato guṇavidhir ayaṃ na pratitīti 'ti /
analyzed: atas eva u ktam pārthesārathi miśraiḥ āghāra agnihotra adhikaraṇe phalataḥ guṇa vidhiḥ ayam na

original: yad vā / etad vārtikam adhikāravidhyabhiprāyam; udbhidā yajete 'tyādīnām adhikārāt /
analyzed: yat vā etat vārtikam adhikāra vidhi abhiprāyam udbhidā yajeta ityādīnām adhikārāt

original: tatra hi yāgo vidhīyatām / utpattivākyasiddho vā 'nūdyatām / ubhayathā 'pi dhātvarthasya karaṇatvena 'nvayāt tṛtīyāntasya tadvācitvaṃ; anyathā 'nvayānupapatter iti /
analyzed: tatra hi yāgaḥ vidhīyatām utpatti vākya siddhaḥ vā nūdyatām ubhayathā pi dhātvarthasya karaṇa tvena nvayāt tṛtīyā antasya tad vāci tvam anyathā nvaya anupapatteḥ iti

original: tasmād guṇavidhau vinā 'pi lakṣaṇāṃ anvayopapatteḥ na matvarthalakṣaṇe 'ti /
analyzed: tasmāt guṇa vidhau vinā lakṣaṇām anvaya upapatteḥ na

original: ataś ca somena yajete 'ty atra na viśiṣṭavidhānam / kiṃ tu guṇamātravidhānam / yāgas tu jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta 'ty asmin vākye vidhīyata ity eva yuktam; anyathā matvarthalakṣaṇāpatter iti /atro 'cyate /
analyzed: atas ca somena yajeta iti atra na viśiṣṭa vidhānam kim tu guṇa mātra vidhānam yāgaḥ tu jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta ti asmin vākye vidhīyate iti eva yuktam anyathā matu artha lakṣaṇa āpatteḥ iti atra u cyate

original: yady api yāgoddeśena somavidhau na matvarthalakṣaṇā / tathā 'pi yāgasya 'prāptatvāt somena yajete 'ty atra na yāgoddeśena somavidhānaṁ saṁbhavati /
analyzed: yadi api yāga uddeśena soma vidhau na matu artha lakṣaṇā tathā yāgasya prāpta tvāt somena yajeta iti atra na yāga uddeśena soma vidhāna sabhavati

original: na ca jyotiṣṭomene 'tyādinā yāgasya prāptatvāt taduddeśena guṇamātraṁ vidhīyata iti vācyam; tasya 'dhikāravidhitveno 'tpattividhitvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: na ca jyotiṣṭomena ityādinā yāgasya prāpta tvāt tad uddeśena guṇa mātra vidhīyate iti vācyam tasya dhikāra vidhi tvena utpatti vidhi tva anupapatteḥ

original: karmasvarūpamātrābodhako vidhir utpattividhiḥ; tena ca vihitasya karmaṇaḥ phalaviśeṣasaṁbandhamātram adhikāravidhinā kriyate; phalaviśeṣasaṁbandhabodhakatvasya 'dhikāravidhitvāt / yathā / yad āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo bhavati 'ty etadvihitasya karmaṇaḥ phalaviśeṣasaṁbandhamātraṁ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṁ svargakāmo yajeta 'ti vākyaṁ vidhatta iti tasya 'dhikāravidhitvam / no 'tpattividhitvam /
analyzed: karma sva rūpa mātrā bodhakaḥ vidhiḥ utpatti vidhiḥ tena ca vihitasya karmaṇaḥ phala viśeṣa sabandha mātram adhikāra vidhinā kriyate phala viśeṣa sabandha bodhaka tvasya dhikāra vidhi tvāt yathā yat āgneyaḥ u ṣṭākapālaḥ bhavati etad vihitasya karmaṇaḥ phala viśeṣa sabandha mātra darśa pūrṇamāsābhyā svarga kāmaḥ yajeta ti vākya vidhatte iti tasya dhikāra vidhi tvam na u tpatti vidhi tvam

original: na svād etat; darśapūrṇamāsābhyām ity etasya no 'tpattividhitvaṁ saṁbhavati / āgneyo 'ṣṭākapāla ityādivākyārthakyāpatteḥ; na hi tadā tena karma vidhīyate / tasya darśapūrṇamāsābhyām ity anena vihitatvāt; nā 'pi guṇavidhānaṁ saṁbhavati / prāpte karmany anekaguṇavidhāne vākyabhedāpatteḥ /
analyzed: na svāt etat darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iti etasya na u tpatti vidhi tva sabhavati āgneyaḥ ṣṭākapālaḥ ityādi vākya ārthakya āpatteḥ na hi tadā tena karma vidhīyate tasya darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iti anena vihita tvāt na a pi guṇa vidhāna sabhavati prāpte karmani aneka guṇa vidhāne vākya bheda āpatteḥ

original: ata āgneyo 'ṣṭākapāla ity asyo 'tpattividhitvaṁ darśapūrṇamāsābhyām ity asya ca 'dhikāravidhitvaṁ yuktam /
analyzed: atas āgneyaḥ ṣṭākapālaḥ iti asya u tpatti vidhi tva darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iti asya ca dhikāra vidhi tva yuktam

original: jyotiṣṭomene 'ty asya tv adhikāravidher udbhidā yajeta paśukāma ityādivad utpattividhitve 'pi svīkriyamāṇe na kasyacid ānarthakyam / somena yajete 'ty asya guṇavidhitvād yāgoddeśena somamātravidhānāc ca na vākyabhedā iti cet—
analyzed: jyotiṣṭomena iti asya tu adhikāra vidheḥ udbhidā yajeta paśu kāmaḥ ityādi vat utpatti vidhi tve pi svīkriyamāṇe na kasyacid ānarthakyam somena yajeta iti asya guṇa vidhi tvāt yāga uddeśena soma mātra vidhānāt ca na vākya bhedāḥ iti ced

original: mai 'vam /
analyzed: mai vam

original: yady api somena yajete 'ty atra na vākyabhedaḥ / tathā 'pi jyotiṣṭomene 'ty asmin vākye karmasvarūpe tasya ca phalasaṁbandhe vidhīyamāne gauravālakṣaṇo vākyabhedo 'sty eva; somena yajete 'ty etadvākyavihitakarmaṇaḥ phalasaṁbandhamātravidhāne tadabhāvāt /
analyzed: yadi api somena yajeta iti atra na vākya bhedaḥ tathā pi jyotiṣṭomena iti asmin vākye karma svarūpe tasya ca phala sabandhe vidhīyamāne gauravā lakṣaṇaḥ vākya bhedaḥ u sti eva somena yajeta iti etad vākya vihita karmaṇaḥ phala sabandha mātra vidhāne tad abhāvāt

original: udbhidā yajete 'ty atra tu vacanāntarābhāvena 'gatyā tadāśrayaṇam /
analyzed: udbhidā yajeta iti atra tu vacana antara abhāvena gatyā tad āśrayaṇam

original: na ca somena yajete 'ty atrā 'pi karmaṇaḥ svarūpe guṇe ca vidhīyamāne vākyabhedaḥ syād iti vācyam; śrūyamāṇena vidhinā guṇasya 'vidhegatvād viśeṣaṇavidher ārthikatvāt /
analyzed: na ca somena yajeta iti atra a pi karmaṇaḥ svarūpe guṇe ca vidhīyamāne vākya bhedaḥ syāt iti vācyam śrūyamāṇena vidhinā guṇasya vidhe ga tvāt viśeṣaṇa vidheḥ ārthika tvāt

original: sarvatra hi viśiṣṭavidhau viśeṣaṇavidhir ārthikaḥ /
analyzed: sarvatra hi viśiṣṭa vidhau viśeṣaṇa vidhiḥ ārthikaḥ

original: jyotiṣṭomene'ty asya tū 'tpattividhitve karmasvarūpaṁ phalasambandhaś ce
analyzed: jyotiṣṭomena iti asya tu tpatti vidhi tve karma svarūpa phala sambandhaḥ ced

original: 'ty ubhayaṁ śrūyamāṇenai 'va vidhinā vidhātavyam iti dṛḍho gauravālakṣaṇo vākyabhedaḥ /
analyzed: śrūyamāṇena e vidhinā vidhātavyam iti dṛḍhaḥ gaurava alakṣaṇaḥ vākya bhedaḥ

original: yathā 'huḥ /
analyzed: yathā huḥ

original: śrautayāgopamānitve śabdānām atigauravam
analyzed: śrauta yāga upamāni tve śabdānām ati gauravam

original: ekoktya vasitānāṁ tu nā 'rthākṣepo virudhyate /
analyzed: eka uktyā tu na artha ākṣepaḥ virudhyate

original: na ca somena yajeta 'ty asyo 'tpattividhitve yady api na vākyabhedas tathā 'pi matvaṁthalakṣaṇā syād eve 'ti vācyam;
analyzed: na ca somena yajeta ti asya u tpatti vidhi tve yadi api na vākya bhedaḥ tathā syāt eva iti vācyam

original: tasyāḥ svīkriyamāṇatvāt; lakṣaṇāto vākyabhedasya jaghanyatvāt /
analyzed: tasyāḥ svīkriyamāṇa tvāt lakṣaṇātaḥ vākya bhedasya jaghanya tvāt

original: lakṣaṇā hi padadoṣo vākyabhedas tu vākyadoṣaḥ;
analyzed: lakṣaṇā hi pada doṣaḥ vākya bhedaḥ tu vākya doṣaḥ

original: padavākyayor madhye pada eva doṣakalpanāyā ucitatvāt /
analyzed: pada vākyayoḥ madhye pade eva doṣa kalpanāyāḥ ucita tvāt

original: guṇe tv anyāyyakalpanā / iti nyāyāt /
analyzed: guṇe tu anyāyya kalpanā iti nyāyāt

original: ata eva jātaputraḥ kṛṣṇakeśo 'gnīn ādadhīta / ity atra 'dhānānuvādena jātaputratvakṛṣṇakeśatvadhāne vākyabhedāt padadvayenā 'vasthāviśeṣo lakṣyata ity uktam; tasmād vākyabhedaprasaktau lakṣaṇai 'va svīkāryā /
analyzed: atas eva jāta putraḥ kṛṣṇa keśaḥ gnīn ādadhīta iti atra dhānā anuvādena jāta putra tva kṛṣṇa keśa tva dhāne vākya bhedāt pada dvayena avasthā viśeṣaḥ lakṣyate iti uktam tasmāt vākya bheda prasaktau svīkāryā

original: tasmāt somena yajete 'ty ayam evo 'tpattividhir na jyotiṣṭomene 'ty ayam / gauravālakṣaṇavākyabhedāpatteḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt somena yajeta iti ayam eva u tpatti vidhiḥ na jyotiṣṭomena iti ayam gaurava alakṣaṇa vākya bheda āpatteḥ

original: kiṁ ca somena yajete 'ty atra yāgavidhāne śrutyarthavidhānaṁ guṇavidhāne tu vākyārthavidhānam; tac ca śrutyarthavidhānasambhave 'yuktam /
analyzed: ki ca somena yajeta iti atra yāga vidhāne guṇa vidhāne tu vākya artha vidhānam tat ca śruti artha vidhāna sambhave yuktam

original: yathā 'huḥ /
analyzed: yathā huḥ

original: vākyārthavipulaṁ vākyaṁ śrutyarthāvidhisambhave /
analyzed: vākya artha vipula

original: vākyārthaḥ padāntarārtha ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: vākya arthaḥ pada antara arthaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: jyotiṣṭomene 'ty atrā 'pi phaloddeśena yāgasyai 'va vidhānān na vākyārthavidhānam / tadutpattividhitvasvādīnā 'pi tadaṅgīkārāc ca /
analyzed: jyotiṣṭomena iti atra api phala uddeśena vidhānāt na vākya artha vidhānam tad utpatti vidhi tva sva ādīnām tad aṅgīkārāt ca

original: tasmāj jyotiṣṭomene 'ty ayam adhikāravidhir eva /
analyzed: tasmāt jyotiṣṭomena iti ayam adhikāra vidhiḥ eva

original: api ca / karmasvarūpavidhis tatra svīkāryo yatra karmaṇo rūpam upalabhyate /
analyzed: api ca karma svarūpa vidhiḥ tatra svīkāryaḥ yatra karmaṇaḥ rūpam upalabhyate

original: yāgasya ca dve rūpe / dravyaṁ devatā ce 'ti /
analyzed: yāgasya ca dve rūpe dravya devatā ca ti

original: somena yajete 'ty atra yady api devatā no 'palabhyate / somayāgasyā 'vyaktatvāt,—avyaktatvaṁ ca svārthaccoditadevatārāhityam / ata eva tu devatārāhityadevātānāṁ sattvāvāyavam ṛṇmātaḥ 'tyādivākyavihitagrahaṇadevatānāṁ sattvāt / grahaṇārthābhir api devatābhiḥ prasaṅgato yāgapakārasya kriyamāṇatvāt,—tathā 'pi dravyam upalabhyata eva; tenā 'pi yāgasvarūpaṁ jñātuṁ śakyam eva /
analyzed: somena yajeta iti atra yadi api devatā na upalabhyate ca ca atas eva tu atas eva tu devatā rāhitya sattva avāyavam ṛṇmātar tyādi vākya vihita grahaṇa devatānā sattvāt grahaṇa arthābhiḥ api devatābhiḥ prasaṅgataḥ yāga pakārasya kriyamāṇa tvāt tathā pi dravyam upalabhyate eva tena pi yāga svarūpa jñātu śakyam eva

original: jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajete 'ty atra na dravyaṁ devata vā śrūyate / atas tasyo 'tpattividhitve yāgaviśeṣajñānaṁ yāgasāmānyasya 'vidheyatvād viśeṣasya 'va vidheyatvād ityādikaśeṣaṁ syād ato nā 'yaṁ karmotpattividhiḥ /
analyzed: jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti atra na dravya devata vā śrūyate atas tasya u tpatti vidhi tve yāga viśeṣa jñāna yāga sāmānyasya vidheya tvāt viśeṣasya vidheya tvāt iti ādika śeṣa syāt atas na karma utpatti vidhiḥ

original: nanv evam apy agnihotraṁ juhoti 'ty ayam api homotpattividhir na syād rūpāśravaṇāt; tacchiravaṇāc ca dadhnā juhoti 'ty ayam evo 'tpattividhiḥ syāt /
analyzed: nanu evam api juhoti ti ayam api homa utpatti vidhiḥ na syāt rūpa a śravaṇāt tad śiravaṇāt ca dadhnā juhoti ti ayam eva u tpatti vidhiḥ syāt

original: tathā cā 'ghāragnihotrādhikaraṇavirodhaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca ā ghāra agnihotra adhikaraṇa virodhaḥ

original: tatra hy agnihotraṁ juhoti 'ty asyo 'tpattividhitvaṁ dadhnā juhoti 'tyādīnāṁ ca gunavidhitvam uktam iti cet,—
analyzed: tatra hi agnihotra juhoti ti asya u tpatti vidhi tva dadhnā juhoti tyādīnā ca uktam iti ced

original: satyam / agnihotraṁ juhoti 'ty atra yady api rūpaṁ no 'palabhyate / agnihotraśabdasya tatprakhyānyāyena nāmadheyatvāt / tad etad agre vakṣyāmaḥ / tathā 'pi tasyo 'tpattividhitvaṁ svīkriyate / anyathā 'narthākyāpatteḥ /
analyzed: satyam agnihotra juhoti atra yadi api na upalabhyate agnihotra śabdasya tad prakhyā nyāyena nāmadheya tvāt tat etat agre vakṣyāmaḥ tathā svīkriyate anyathā

original: dadhnā juhoti 'ty asya ca nā 'narthakyaṁ guṇavidhitvāt /
analyzed: dadhnā juhoti ti asya ca na ā narthakya guṇa vidhi tvāt

original: ato 'gnihotraṁ juhoti 'ty ayaṁ karmotpattividhir iti yuktam /
analyzed: atas juhoti ti aya karma utpatti vidhiḥ iti yuktam

original: jyotiṣṭomene 'ty asya ca nā 'narthakyam adhikāravidhitvopāpatteḥ /
analyzed: jyotiṣṭomena iti asya ca nā ānarthakyam adhikāra vidhi tva upāpatteḥ

original: ataḥ kimarthaṁ saṁbhavati rūpavati vākye karmavidhāne tadrahite tat svīkāryam /
analyzed: atas kimartha sabhavati rūpavati vākye karma vidhāne tad rahite tat svīkāryam

original: kiṁ ca dadhnā juhoti 'ty asya karmotpattividhitve payasā juhoti 'ty anenai 'tatkarmāntarayādena na payo vidhātuṁ śakyate / utpattiśiṣṭadadhyavarodhāt /
analyzed: ki ca dadhnā juhoti ti asya karma utpatti vidhi tve payasā juhoti ti na payaḥ vidhātu śakyate utpatti śiṣṭa dadhi avarodhāt

original: utpattiśiṣṭaguṇāvaruddhe hi na guṇāntaraṁ vidhīyate / ākāṅkṣāyā utpattiśiṣṭenai 'va nivṛttatvāt /
analyzed: utpatti śiṣṭa guṇa avaruddhe hi na vidhīyate ākāṅkṣāyāḥ nivṛtta tvāt

original: atas tenā 'pi viśiṣṭaṁ karmāntaraṁ vidheyam /
analyzed: atas tenā pi viśiṣṭa karmāntara vidheyam

original: tathā cā 'nekādṛṣṭakalpanāgauravam /
analyzed: tathā ca aneka adṛṣṭa kalpanā gauravam

original: agnihotraṁ juhoti 'ty asya tu 'tpattividhitva etadvākyavihitasya karmano dravyākāṅkṣāyāṁ yugapad eva khalekapotanyāyena dadhnā juhoti / payasā juhoti 'tyādivākyair guṇā vidhīyanta iti nā 'nekādṛṣṭakalpanāgauravam /
analyzed: agnihotra juhoti ti asya tu tpatti vidhi tve etad vākya vihitasya karmanaḥ dravya ākāṅkṣāyāḥ yugapad eva khalekapota nyāyena dadhnā juhoti payasā juhoti tyādi vākyaiḥ guṇāḥ vidhīyante iti nā aneka adṛṣṭa kalpanā gauravam

original: ato 'gnihotraṁ juhoti 'ty ayam utpattividhiḥ / payasā juhoti 'tyādayas tu guṇavidhaya iti yuktam /
analyzed: atas juhoti ayam utpatti vidhiḥ payasā juhoti tyādayaḥ tu guṇa vidhayaḥ iti yuktam

original: somena yajete 'ty atra tu rūpavati vākye karmotpattividhāne svīkriyamāṇe nakiñcid dūṣaṇam / pakṣadvaye 'py ekasyā 'dṛṣṭasya tulyatvāt /
analyzed: somena yajeta iti atra tu rūpavati vākye karma utpatti vidhāne svīkriyamāṇe na kiñcid dūṣaṇam pakṣa dvaye pi ekasyāḥ dṛṣṭasya tulya tvāt

original: tasmād yuktaṃ somena yajete 'ty ayam evo 'tpattividhir ity alam anayā vidhinirupanaṃgataprapañcanirūpaṇacintayā /
analyzed: tasmāt yuktam somena yajeta iti ayam eva u tpatti vidhiḥ iti alam anayā

original: prakṛtam anusarāmaḥ /
analyzed: prakṛtam anusarāmaḥ

original: tat siddhaṃ vidhiḥ prayojanāvantam aprāptam arthaṃ vidhatta iti /
analyzed: tat siddham vidhiḥ prayojanāvantam aprāptam artham vidhatte iti

original: sa ca vidhiś caturvidhaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca vidhiḥ caturvidhaḥ

original: utpattividhir viniyogavidhiḥ prayogavidhir adhikāravidhiś ce 'ti /
analyzed: utpatti vidhiḥ viniyoga vidhiḥ prayoga vidhiḥ adhikāra vidhiḥ ca ti

original: tatra karmasvarūpamātrabodhako vidhir utpattividhiḥ; yathā 'gnihotraṃ juhoti' 'ti /
analyzed: tatra karma svarūpa mātra bodhakaḥ vidhiḥ utpatti vidhiḥ yathā gnihotram juhoti

original: utpattividhau ca karmaṇaḥ karaṇatvena 'va 'nvayaḥ /
analyzed: utpatti vidhau ca karmaṇaḥ karaṇa tvena nvayaḥ

original: homene 'ṣṭaṃ bhāvayed iti / na tu homaṃ kuryād iti sādhyatvena /
analyzed: homena iṣṭam bhāvayet iti na tu homam kuryāt iti sādhya tvena

original: tathā sati sādhyasya sādhyāntarāvyāyogenā 'dhikārāvākyāvagataphalasaṃbandho na syāt /
analyzed: tathā sati sādhyasya sādhya antara avyāyogena adhikāra a vākya avagata phala saṃbandhaḥ na syāt

original: karaṇatvena tv anvaye homene 'ṣṭaṃ bhāvayet / kiṃ tad iṣṭam ity ākāṅkṣāyāṃ phalaviśeṣasaṃbandho ghaṭate /
analyzed: karaṇa tvena tu anvaye bhāvayet kim tat iṣṭam iti ākāṅkṣāyām phala viśeṣa saṃbandhaḥ ghaṭate

original: na co 'tpattividhāv iṣṭavācakapadābhāvena karmaṇe 'ṣṭaṃ bhāvayed iti kathaṃ vākyārtha iti vācyam; vidhiśruter eve 'ṣṭabodhakatvāt /
analyzed: na ca u tpatti vidhau iṣṭa vācaka pada abhāvena karmaṇe ṣṭam bhāvayet iti katham vākya arthaḥ iti vācyam vidhi śruteḥ

original: sā hi puruṣārthe puruṣaṃ pravartayantī karmaṇaḥ phalasaṃbandhamātraṃ bodhayati /
analyzed: sā hi puruṣa arthe puruṣam pravartayantī karmaṇaḥ phala saṃbandha mātram bodhayati

original: tasmād yuktam utpattividhau karma karaṇatvena 'nveti 'ti /
analyzed: tasmāt yuktam utpatti vidhau karma karaṇa tvena nveti ti

original: ata evo 'dbhidā yajeta 'tyādau tṛtīyānta udbhichabda upapadyate / udbhidā yāgene 'ṣṭaṃ bhāvayed ity anvayopapatteḥ /
analyzed: atas eva udbhidā yajeta tyādau tṛtīyā ante udbhid śabdaḥ upapadyate udbhidā yāgena iṣṭam bhāvayet iti anvaya upapatteḥ

original: yeṣām api 'ṣṭasādhanatvam līnārthas teṣām api tṛtīyāntānāṃ karmaṇāmadhyānām anvayo 'nupapanna eva /
analyzed: yeṣām api ṣṭa sādhana tvam līna arthaḥ teṣām api tṛtīya antānām karmaṇām adhyānām anvayaḥ eva

original: na hi saṃbhavati yāga iṣṭasādhanam udbhide 'ti; tṛtīyopāttasya kārakasya liṅgasaṃkhyānvayāyogyasya kriyayai 'vā 'nvayāt /
analyzed: na hi saṃbhavati yāgaḥ iṣṭa sādhanam udbhide ti tṛtīya upāttasya kārakasya liṅga saṃkhyā anvaya ayogyasya kriyayai vā nvayāt

original: nanu tavā 'py agnihotraṃ juhoti 'tyādiṣu karmotpattividhiṣu dvitīyāntānāṃ karmaṇāmadhyānām anvayo 'nupapannaḥ; na hi saṃbhavati homena bhāvayed agnihotraṃ iti /
analyzed: nanu tava api agnihotram juhoti tya ādiṣu karma utpatti vidhiṣu dvitīya antānām karmaṇām adhyānām anvayaḥ nupapannaḥ na hi saṃbhavati homena bhāvayet agnihotram iti

original: satyam; śrūyamāṇā tāvad dvitīyā 'rthākṣiptasādhyatvānuvādaḥ; homasya hi karaṇatvenā 'nvayād asādhitasya ca karaṇatvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: satyam śrūyamāṇā tāvat dvitīyā rtha ākṣipta sādhyatva anuvādaḥ homasya hi karaṇa tvena a nvayāt asādhitasya ca karaṇa tva anupapatteḥ

original: tasyāś cā 'nanvayopasthitau sā śaktuṃ juhoti iti 'vatṛtīyārthaṃ lakṣayati /
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca nanvaya upasthitau sā śaktum juhoti iti va tṛtīyā artham lakṣayati

original: agnihotreṇa homene 'ṣṭaṃ bhāvayediti 'ty uktaṁ pārthasārathimiśraiḥ /
analyzed: agnihotreṇa homena iṣṭam bhāvayet iti ti ukta pārthasārathi miśraiḥ

original: ataś ca dvitīyāntānāṁ karmaṇāmadheyānām anvayo nū 'nupapannaḥ /
analyzed: atas ca dvitīyā antānām karma nāmadheyānām anvayaḥ nu n upapannaḥ

original: tat siddham utpattividhau karma karaṇatvena 'nveti 'ti /
analyzed: tat siddham utpatti vidhau karma karaṇa tvena nveti ti

original: aṅgapradhānasaṁbandhabodhako vidhir viniyogavidhiḥ /
yathā dadhnā juhoti 'ti /
analyzed: yathā dadhnā juhoti ti

original: sa hi tṛtīyāpratipannāṅgabhāvasya dadhno homasaṁbandhaṁ vidhatte / dadhnā homaṁ bhāvayed iti /
analyzed: sa hi tṛtīyā pratipanna aṅga bhāvasya dadhnaḥ homa sabandha vidhatte dadhnā homa bhāvayet iti

original: etasya ca vidheḥ sahakāribhūtāni ṣaṭ pramāṇāni / śrutilingavākyaprakaraṇasthānasamākhyārūpāṇi /
analyzed: etasya ca vidheḥ sahakāri bhūtāni ṣaḍ pramāṇāni śruti linga vākya prakaraṇa sthāna samākhyā rūpāṇi

original: etatsahakṛtena vidhinā 'ṅgatvaṁ paroddeśapravṛttakṛtivyāpyatvarūpaṁ pārārthyāparaparyāyaṁ jñāpyate /
analyzed: etad sahakṛtena vidhinā ṅga tva para uddeśa pravṛtta kṛti vyāpya tva rūpa jñāpyate

original: tatra nirapekṣo ravaḥ śrutiḥ /
analyzed: tatra nirapekṣaḥ ravaḥ śrutiḥ

original: sā ca trividhā / vidhātṛ / abhidhātṛ / viniyoktṛ ce 'ti /
analyzed: sā ca trividhā vidhātṛ abhidhātṛ viniyoktṛ ca ti

original: tatra vidhātṛ līnādyātmikā /
analyzed: tatra vidhātṛ līna ādi ātmikā

original: abhidhātṛ vrihyādiśrutiḥ /
analyzed: abhidhātṛ vrihi ādi śrutiḥ

original: yasya ca śabdasya śravaṇād eva saṁbandhaḥ pratīyate / sā viniyoktrī /
analyzed: yasya ca śabdasya śravaṇāt eva sabandhaḥ pratīyate sā viniyoktrī

original: sā ca tridhā /
analyzed: sā ca tridhā

original: vibhaktirūpā / samānābhidhānarūpā / ekapadarūpā ce 'ti /
analyzed: vibhakti rūpā samāna abhidhāna rūpā eka pada rūpā ca iti

original: tatra vibhaktiśrutyā 'ṅgatvam / yathā vrīhibhir yajeta 'ti tṛtīyāśrutyā vrīhīṇāṁ yāgāṅgatvam /
analyzed: tatra vibhakti śrutyā ṅga tvam yathā vrīhibhiḥ yajeta ti tṛtīyā śrutyā vrīhīṇā yāga aṅga tvam

original: na co 'tpattiśiṣṭapuroḍāśapuruddhe yāge kartuṁ vrīhīṇām aṅgatvam iti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca u tpatti śiṣṭa puroḍāśa puruddhe yāge kartu vrīhīṇām aṅga tvam iti vācyam

original: puroḍāśaprakṛtitayo 'papatteḥ / paśor iva hṛdayādīnāṁ havīṣprakṛtitayā yāgāṅgatvam /
analyzed: puroḍāśa prakṛtitayā upapatteḥ paśoḥ iva hṛdaya ādīnām havīṣprakṛtitayā yāga aṅga tvam

original: na ca sākṣāt paśor evā 'ṅgatvaṁ kiṁ na syād iti vācyam / tasya viśasanāt / avadīyamānatvāc ca hṛdayādīnām /
analyzed: na ca sākṣāt paśoḥ na syāt iti vācyam tasya viśasanāt avadīyamāna tvāt ca hṛdaya ādīnām

original: avadīyamānaṁ hi haviḥ / yathā puroḍāśādiḥ /
analyzed: avadīyamāna hi haviḥ yathā puroḍāśādiḥ

original: madhyāt pūrvārdhāc cā 'vadyati 'ti vākyāt /
analyzed: madhyāt pūrva ardhāt ca ā vadyati ti vākyāt

original: hṛdayādīni cā 'vadīyamānāni na paśuḥ / hṛdayasya 'gre 'vadyati 'ti vākyāt /
analyzed: hṛdaya ādīni ca ā vadīyamānāni na paśuḥ hṛdayasya gre vadyati ti vākyāt

original: ato hṛdayādīny eva havīṁṣi / paśus tu prakṛtidravyam /
analyzed: atas hṛdaya ādīni eva havīṣi paśuḥ tu prakṛti dravyam

original: pātnīvatayāge tu sākṣāt paśur evā 'ṅgam / tasya jīvata eva paryagnikṛtaṁ pātnīvatam utsṛjati 'ty utsargavidhānāt /
analyzed: pātnīvata yāge tu sākṣāt paśuḥ eva a ṅgam tasya jīvataḥ eva paryagnikṛta pātnīvatam utsṛjati ti utsarga vidhānāt

original: yatra tuviśasanaṁ tatra paśuḥ prakṛtidravyam ity eva siddham /
analyzed: tatra paśuḥ prakṛti dravyam iti eva siddham

original: evaṁ vrīhayo 'pi prakṛtidravyatayā yāgāṅgaṁ tṛtīyāśrutye 'ti /
analyzed: eva vrīhayaḥ pi prakṛti dravya tayā yāga aṅga tṛtīyā śrutyā iti

original: śrunyasyāpy 'pi krayāṅgatvaṁ tṛtīyāśrutyā /
analyzed: śrunyasya api tṛtīyā śrutyā

original: na cā 'mūrtasya tasya kathaṁ krayāṅgatvam iti vācyam; ekahayanīrūpadravyaparichedadvārā tadupapatteh /
analyzed: na ca ā mūrtasya tasya katha kraya aṅga tvam iti vācyam eka haya nī rūpa dravya paricheda dvārā tad upapattā ih

original: vrīhīn prokṣati 'ty atra prokṣaṇasya vrīhyaṅgatvaṁ dvitīyāśrutyā /
analyzed: vrīhīn prokṣati ti atra prokṣaṇasya dvitīyā śrutyā

original: tac ca prokṣaṇaṁ na vrīhisvarūpārtham / svarūpa ānarthakyāt / vrīhisvarūpasya prokṣaṇaṁ vinā 'nupapattyabhāvāt / kiṁ tv apūrvasādhanatvaprayuktam / yadi vrīhiṣu prokṣaṇaṁ kriyate tadā tair yāge 'nuṣṭhite 'pūrvaṁ bhavati nā 'nyathe 'ti /
analyzed: tat ca prokṣaṇa na vrīhi svarūpa artham svarūpe ānarthakyāt vrīhi svarūpasya prokṣaṇa vinā nupapatti abhāvāt ki tu apūrva sādhanatva prayuktam yadi vrīhiṣu prokṣaṇa kriyate tadā taiḥ yāge nuṣṭhite pūrva bhavati na nyathā iti

original: ataḥ prakaraṇasahakṛtayā dvitīyāśrutyā taṇḍulanirvṛttiprāṇādyā yad apūrvasādhanaṁ tad aṅgatvaṁ prokṣaṇasyo 'cyata iti /
analyzed: atas prakaraṇa sahakṛtayā dvitīyā śrutyā taṇḍula nirvṛtti prāṇa ādyā yat apūrva sādhana tat aṅga tva prokṣaṇasya u cyate iti

original: evaṁ sarveṣv apy aṅgeṣv apūrvaprayuktatvaṁ veditavyam /
analyzed: eva sarveṣu api aṅgeṣu veditavyam

original: evam imām agṛbhṇan raśanāṁ ṛtasye 'ty aśvābhidhānīm ādatta ity atra 'pi dvitīyāśrutyā mantrasyā 'śvābhidhānyaṅgatvam /
analyzed: evam imām agṛbhṇan raśanāḥ ṛtasya ti aśva abhidhānīm ādatte iti atra dvitīyā śrutyā mantrasya ā śva abhidhānī aṅga tvam

original: yat tu vākyīyo 'yaṁ viniyoga iti / tan na /
analyzed: yat tu vākyīyaḥ viniyogaḥ iti tat na

original: tathā sati vākyāl liṅgasya balīyastvena yāvad vākyād aśvābhidhānyaṅgaṁ bhavati / tāval liṅgād raśanāmātrāṅgatvam eva syāt / syonaṁ te sadanaṁ kṛṇomi 'ty asye 'va sadanāṅgatvam /
analyzed: tathā sati vākyāt liṅgasya balīyaḥ tvena yāvat vākyāt aśvābhidhānī aṅga bhavati tāvat liṅgāt raśanā mātra aṅga tvam eva syāt syona te sadana kṛṇomi ti asye sadana aṅga tvam

original: śrautaviniyogapakṣe tu yāvad liṅgād raśanāmātrāṅgatvaṁ saṁbhavati / tāvac chrutyā / aindrya gārhapatyam upatisthata ity atra tṛtīyāśrutyai 'ndryā ṛco gārhapatyopasthānāṅgatvavat / aśvābhidhānyāṁ viniyogaḥ kriyata iti yuktaṁ mantrasyā 'śvābhidhānyaṅgatvam /
analyzed: śrauta viniyoga pakṣe tu yāvat liṅgāt raśanā mātra aṅga tva sabhavati tāvat śrutyā aindryā gārhapatyam upatisthate iti atra tṛtīyā śrutyai indryāḥ ṛcaḥ gārhapatya upasthāna aṅga tva vat aśva abhidhānyāḥ viniyogaḥ kriyate iti yukta mantrasya śva abhidhānī aṅga tvam

original: tasmāc chrauta evā 'yaṁ viniyogaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt śrautaḥ eva viniyogaḥ

original: yad āhavanīye juhoti 'ty āhavanīyasya homāṅgatvaṁ saptamīśrutyā /
analyzed: yat āhavanīye juhoti āhavanīyasya homa aṅga tva saptamī śrutyā

original: evam anyo 'pi vibhaktiśrutyā viniyogo jñeyaḥ /
analyzed: evam vibhakti śrutyā viniyogaḥ jñeyaḥ

original: paśunā yajete 'ty atrai 'katvapuṁstvayoḥ samānābhidhānaśrutyā kārakāṅgatvam; yajete 'ty ākhyātābhihitasaṁkhyāyā bhāvanāṅgatvaṁ samānābhidhānaśruter ekapadaśrutyā ca yāgāṅgatvam /na cā 'mūrtāyās tasyāḥ kathaṁ yāgāṅgatvam iti vācyam; kartṛparichedadvārā tadupapatteḥ /
analyzed: paśunā yajeta iti atra ka tva pus tvayoḥ samāna abhidhāna śrutyā kāraka aṅga tvam yajeta iti ākhyāta abhihita sakhyāyāḥ bhāvanā aṅga tva samāna abhidhāna śruteḥ eka pada śrutyā ca yāga aṅga tvam na ca ā mūrtāyāḥ tasyāḥ yāga aṅga tvam iti vācyam kartṛ paricheda dvārā tad upapatteḥ

original: kartā cā 'kṣepalabhyaḥ /
analyzed: kartā ca ā kṣepa labhyaḥ

original: ākhyātena hi bhāvano 'cyate; sā ca kartāraṁ vinā 'nupapannā tam ākṣipati /
analyzed: ākhyātena hi bhāvanā cyate sā ca kartāra vinā nupapannā tam ākṣipati

original: nanu kim ity evaṁ varṇyate / ākṣepalabhyaḥ karte 'ti /
analyzed: nanu kim iti eva varṇyate ākṣepa labhyaḥ kartā ti

original: ākhyātavācya eva kiṁ na syāt; ākhyātaśravaṇe bhāvanāyā iva kartur api pratīpatteḥ /
analyzed: ākhyāta vācyaḥ eva ki na syāt ākhyāta śravaṇe bhāvanāyāḥ iva kartuḥ api pratīpatteḥ

original: na ca bhāvanāyai 'vā 'kṣepasaṁbhave kim iti tadvācakatvaṁ kalpanīyam iti sāṁpratam; tathā saty ākhyātavācyakartrai 'va bhāvanākṣepasaṁbhave tadvācakatvam api na syāt /
analyzed: na ca bhāvanāyai vā kṣepa sabhave kim iti tad vācaka tva kalpanīyam iti sāpratam tathā sati ākhyāta vācya kartrai bhāvanā ākṣepa sabhave tad vācaka tvam api na syāt

original: kiṁ ca bhāvanāyā na kevalaṁ kartrai 'va saṁbandhaḥ / kārakāntareṇa 'pi saṁbandhāt /
analyzed: ki ca bhāvanāyāḥ na kevala kartrai sabandhaḥ kāraka antareṇa sabandhāt

original: ataḥ sā na jhaṭiti kartāram evā 'kṣiped viśeṣābhāvāt /
analyzed: atas sā na jhaṭiti kartāram kṣipet viśeṣa abhāvāt

original: kartā tu bhāvanāyai 'va saṁbaddho na kārakāntareṇa / guṇānāṁ ca parārthatvād asaṁbandhaḥ samatvāt syāt / iti nyāyāt /
analyzed: kartā tu bhāvanāyai sabaddhaḥ na kāraka antareṇa guṇānā ca parārtha tvāt a sabandhaḥ sama tvāt syāt iti nyāyāt

original: ataḥ sa jhaṭiti tām ākṣiped iti sa evā 'khyātavācyaḥ /
analyzed: atas sa jhaṭiti tām ākṣipet iti saḥ evā khyāta vācyaḥ

original: bhāvanā tv akṣepalabhyai 'va kiṁ na syāt /
analyzed: bhāvanā tu a kṣepa labhyai na syāt

original: kiṁ cai 'vaṁ tṛtīyādivibhaktīnām api karaṇādivācakatvaṁ na syāt / teṣām api kartṛvad ākṣepalābhasaṁbhavāt /
analyzed: tṛtīyā ādi vibhaktīnām api karaṇa ādi vācaka tva na syāt teṣām api kartṛ vat ākṣepa lābha sabhavāt

original: kiṁ ca yadi kartā na vācyaḥ syāt katham ekatvaṁ tena 'nviyāt /
analyzed: ki ca yadi kartā na vācyaḥ syāt katham ekatva tena nu iyāt

original: na hi śabdam aśabdena 'nveti 'ti yuktam; anyatho 'hādilopa prasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: na hi śabdam aśabdena yuktam anyathā u ha ādi lopa prasaṅgaḥ

original: kiṁ ca devadattaḥ pacati 'ti sāmānādhikaraṇyaṁ na syāt /
analyzed: ki ca devadattaḥ pacati ti sāmānādhikaraṇya na syāt

original: na hi kevalaṁ bhāvanāvācakasya 'khyātasya devadattapadena sāmānādhikaraṇyam upapadyate / ekārthaviṣṭhatvābhāvāt /
analyzed: na hi kevala bhāvanā vācakasya khyātasya devadatta padena sāmānādhikaraṇyam upapadyate eka artha viṣṭha tva abhāvāt

original: kartṛvācakatve tū 'papadyata eva /
analyzed: kartṛ vācaka tve tu upapadyate eva

original: laḥ kartari 'ti vyākaraṇasmṛtivirodhas tu kartur anabhidheyatve spaṣṭa eva /
analyzed: laḥ kartari ti vyākaraṇa smṛti virodhaḥ tu kartuḥ anabhidheya tve spaṣṭaḥ eva

original: kiṁ ca kartur anabhidheyatve devadattena pacati 'ti prayogaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: ki ca kartuḥ anabhidheya tve devadattena pacati prayoga prasaṅgaḥ

original: tṛtīyā hy anabhihitayoḥ kartṛkaraṇayor vihitā / ākhyātena kartā nā 'bhihita iti kartṛvācinī tṛtīyā syād eva /
analyzed: tṛtīyā hi anabhihitayoḥ kartṛ karaṇayoḥ vihitā ākhyātena kartā na abhihitaḥ iti kartṛ vācinī tṛtīyā syāt eva

original: kartur abhidhāne tv abhihitatvād eva tṛtīyā na prāpnoti / tasyā anabhihitādhikārasthatvāt /
analyzed: kartuḥ abhidhāne tu abhihita tvāt eva tṛtīyā na prāpnoti tasyāḥ anabhihita adhikāra stha tvāt

original: devadattaḥ pacati 'ti prathama tu prāpnoty eva / prathamāyā abhihitakārakavibhaktitvāt / prātipadikārthamātrāvācitāt vā /
analyzed: devadattaḥ pacati tu prāpnoti eva prathamāyāḥ abhihita kāraka vibhakti tvāt prātipadika artha mātrā vācitāt vā

original: na ca tadā prātipadikatvai 'vā 'rthasyo 'ktatvāt prathamāvaiyarthyam; liṅgasaṁkhyāpratipattyarthaṁ tasyāvaśyakatvāt / kevalaprātipadikasya prayogāsādhutvāc ca /
analyzed: na ca tadā vā rthasya u kta tvāt prathamā vaiyarthyam liṅga sakhya pratipatti artha tasya āvaśyaka tvāt kevala prātipadikasya prayoga asādhu tvāt ca

original: tataś ca yadi kartā na vācyaḥ syād devadattena pacatī 'ti prayogaḥ syāt /
analyzed: tatas ca yadi kartā na vācyaḥ syāt devadattena pacati iti prayogaḥ syāt

original: tasmād ākhyātavācyaḥ kartā 'ti siddham iti pūrvapakṣasaṁkṣepaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt ākhyāta vācyaḥ kartā siddham iti pūrvapakṣa sakṣepaḥ

original: atrā 'huḥ /
analyzed: atra huḥ

original: sa eva hi śabdasyā 'rtho yaḥ prakārāntareṇa na labhyate / ananyalabhyaḥ śabdārtha iti nyāyāt /
analyzed: saḥ eva hi śabdasya a rthaḥ yaḥ prakāra antareṇa na labhyate ananya labhyaḥ śabda arthaḥ iti nyāyāt

original: ata eva na gaṅgāpadasya tīram arthaḥ / lakṣaṇayai 'va pratipattisambhavāt /
analyzed: atas eva na gaṅgā padasya tīram arthaḥ lakṣaṇayai pratipatti sambhavāt

original: ata eva ca na vākyārthe śaktiḥ /
analyzed: atas eva ca na vākya arthe śaktiḥ

original: evaṁ cā 'khyātavācyabhāvanā kartāraṁ vinā 'nupapannā tam ākṣipati 'ty ākṣepād eva kartuḥ pratipattisambhave kim iti tadvācakatvam ākhyātasya kalpanīyam /
analyzed: eva ca ā khyāta vācya bhāvanā kartāra vinā nupapannā tam ākṣipati ākṣepāt eva kartuḥ pratipatti sambhave kim iti tad vācaka tvam ākhyātasya kalpanīyam

original: na ca vinigamanāvahaḥ /
analyzed: na ca vinigamana āvahaḥ

original: kṛtimān hi kartā; evaṁ ca kṛter eva bhāvanāparaparyāyāyā ākṛtyadhikaraṇanyāyenā 'khyātavācyatvasambhave na tadvataḥ kartur vācyatvaṁ kalpanīyam / gauravaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: kṛtimān hi kartā eva ca kṛteḥ eva bhāvanā para paryāyāyāḥ ākṛti adhikaraṇa nyāyena ā khyāta vācya tva sambhave na tadvataḥ kartuḥ kalpanīyam gaurava prasaṅgāt

original: na ca bhāvanā kārakāntareṇā 'pi sambaddhā tad ujjhitvā na jhatiti kartāram ākṣipati 'ti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca bhāvanā kāraka antareṇa sambaddhā tat ujjhitvā na kartāram ākṣipati vācyam

original: sā hi yathā niyamena kartrā sambaddhā / na tathā karaṇādikārakāntareṇa / tiṣṭhati 'tyādiṣu tayā tadanākṣepāt /
analyzed: sā hi yathā niyamena kartrā sambaddhā na tathā karaṇa ādi kāraka antareṇa tiṣṭhati tya ādiṣu tayā tad anākṣepāt

original: ataḥ prathamaṁ sā kartāram evā 'kṣipati / na kārakāntaram /
analyzed: atas prathama sā kartāram evā kṣipati na kāraka antaram

original: ata eva cā 'khyātābhihitā saṁkhyā na kārakāntareṇa sambaddhyate / tasya prathamam anupasthiteḥ /
analyzed: atas eva ca ā khyātā abhihitā sakhyā na kāraka antareṇa sambaddhyate tasya prathamam anupasthiteḥ

original: ata eva tṛtīyādivibhaktīnāṁ karaṇādivācityam / bhāvanāyās taiḥ saha niyatasambandābhāvena tayā teṣāṁ niyamena 'nākṣepāt; ākhyātaśravaṇāt prāg api tṛtīyādivibhaktiśravaṇe karaṇādipratīter jāyamānatvāc ca /
analyzed: atas eva tṛtīyā ādi vibhaktīnām bhāvanāyāḥ taiḥ saha niyata sambanda abhāvena tayā teṣām niyamena na ākṣepāt ākhyāta śravaṇāt prāk api tṛtīyā ādi vibhakti śravaṇe karaṇa ādi pratīteḥ jāyamāna tvāt ca

original: na ca śabdi saṁkhyā katham aśabdena kartrā 'nveti 'ti vācyam; kartur lakṣaṇāṅgīkārāt /
analyzed: na ca śabdi sakhyā katham a śabdena kartrā vācyam kartuḥ lakṣaṇa aṅgīkārāt

original: yathā ca lakṣitaṁ tīraṁ śabdena ghoṣeṇā 'nveti / evaṁ lakṣitaḥ kartai 'katvena 'nveṣyati /
analyzed: yathā ca lakṣita tīra śabdena ghoṣeṇa a nveti eva lakṣitaḥ kartai katvena nveṣyati

original: ata eva devadattaḥ pacati 'ti sāmānādhikaraṇyam upapadyate / kartur lakṣaṇāt /
analyzed: atas eva devadattaḥ pacati ti sāmānādhikaraṇyam upapadyate kartuḥ lakṣaṇāt

original: na ca mukhye sambhavati kim iti lakṣaṇikatvam svīkāryam iti vācyam; ananyalabhyaśabdārthatvasyā vyavasthāpitatvāt /
analyzed: na ca mukhye sambhavati kim iti lakṣaṇika tvam svīkāryam iti vācyam ananya labhya śabda artha tvasya vyavasthāpita tvāt

original: anyathā siṁho devadatta ity api sāmānādhikaraṇyaṁ mukhyaṁ syāt /
analyzed: anyathā sihaḥ devadattaḥ iti api sāmānādhikaraṇya mukhya syāt

original: kiṁ cā 'khyātavācyaḥ karte 'ti vādino 'pi mate devadattaḥ pacati 'ti sāmānādhikaraṇyaṁ na mukhyam; tanmata ākhyātena tṛtīyāvan niṣkṛṣṭaśaktimātrarūpakartṛkārakābhidhānāt / śaktimaddravyasya 'krtyadhikarananyayena 'nabhidhanat / devadattasabdena ca dravyamatrabhidhanat /
analyzed: ki ca ākhyāta vācyaḥ kartā ti vādinaḥ pi mate devadattaḥ pacati ti sāmānādhikaraṇya na mukhyam tad mate ākhyātena tṛtīyā vat niṣkṛṣṭa śakti mātra rūpa kartṛ kāraka abhidhānāt śaktimat dravyasya devadatta sabdena ca

original: atas ca bhinnarthanisthatvat karmate 'pi na mukhyam samanadhi karanyam / kim tu laksanikam eve 'ti na kascid visesah /
analyzed: atas ca na mukhyam kim tu laksanikam eva ti na kascid

original: na ca lah kartari 'ti vyakaranasmrtibalad akhyatavacyah karte 'ti vacyam /
analyzed: na ca lah kartari ti a khyata vacyah karte ti vacyam

original: na hi vacyavacakabhavo vyakaranasmrtyadhinah / tasya nyayasahitanvayavyatirekagamyatvat /
analyzed: na hi tasya nyaya sahita nvaya vyatireka gamya tvat

original: bhavatu va smritigamyah /
analyzed: bhavatu va smriti gamyah

original: tatha 'pi ne 'yam smrtih kartur akhyatavacyatve pramanam / kim tu kartur ekatva ekavacanaatmako lakarah / dvitve dvivacanatmakah / bahutve bahuvacanaatmaka ity asmin arthe pramanam / dvyekayor dvivacanaikavacane bahusu bahuvacanaatmake ity anena 'syah smrter ekavakyatvat /
analyzed: tatha pi ne yam smrtiḥ kartuḥ a khyata vacya tve pramanam  kim tu kartuḥ eka tve ekavacana atmakaḥ lakarah dvi tve dvivacana atmakaḥ bahu tve bahuvacana atmakaḥ iti asmin arthe pramanam dvi ekayoḥ dvivacana ekavacane bahusu bahuvacana atmake iti anena syah smrteḥ ekavakya tvat

original: yat tu 'ktam / kartur anabhidhane devadattena pacati 'ti trtiyaprasanga iti / tan na /
analyzed: yat tu ktam kartuḥ an abhidhane devadattena pacati ti trtiya prasange iti tat na

original: trtiya hi kartuh pratipattartham tadgatasamkhyapratipattartham va /
analyzed: hi pratipad tartham tad gata samkhya pratipad tartham

original: tatra karta tu bhavanaksepat eva labhyata iti na tatra trtiyapeksa; tatsamkhya tv akhyatanai 'va pratiyata iti na tatra 'py apeksa /
analyzed: tatra tu eva labhyate iti na tatra tad samkhya tu va pratiyate iti na tatra

original: yatha 'huh /
analyzed: yatha huh

original: samkhyayam karake va dhir vibhaktya hi pravartate ubhayam ca 'tra tat siddham bhavanatanvibhaktitah /
analyzed: karake va dhiḥ vibhaktya hi pravartate ubhayam ca tra tat siddham

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: yatra tu na 'khyatena tadgata samkhyo 'eyate tatra bhavaty eva trtiya /
analyzed: yatra tu na tadgata samkhyaḥ eyate tatra bhavati eva

original: yatha devadattenau 'danah pacyata iti /
analyzed: yathā devadattena au danaḥ pacyate iti

original: tasmin na kartur anabhidhane kincid dusanam ity alam ativistare na /
analyzed: tasmin na kartuḥ an abhidhane kincid iti alam ati vistare na

original: prakrtam anusaramah /
analyzed: prakrtam anusaramah

original: tat siddhas trividhah srutiviniyogah /
analyzed: tat siddhaḥ trividhaḥ sruti viniyogah

original: se 'yam srutir lingadibhyah prabalam pramanam /
analyzed: se yam srutiḥ linga dibhyah prabalam pramanam

original: lingadisu hi na pratyakso viniyojakah sabdo 'sti / kim tu kalpyah /
analyzed: hi na viniyojakah sabdaḥ sti kim tu kalpyah

original: yavac ca tair viniyojakah sabdah kalpyate / tavat pratyaksaya srutya viniyogasya krtatvat tesam kalpakatvasaktir vihanyata iti sruteh prabalyam /
analyzed: yavat ca taiḥ viniyojakah sabdah kalpyate  tavat kalpaka tva saktiḥ vihanyate iti

original: ata evai 'ndrya garhapatyam upatisthata ity atra yavat lingad aindrya indropasthanaangatvam kalpyate / tavat pratyaksaya srutya garhapatyopasthanangatvam kriyata ity aindri garhapatyopasthanaangam /sāmarthyaṁ liṅgam /
analyzed: atas eva aindrya garhapatyam upatisthate iti atra yavat lingat aindrya indra upasthana anga tvam kalpyate  tavat pratyaksaya srutya garhapatya upasthana tvam kriyate iti aindri garhapatya upasthana angam sāmarthya liṅgam

original: yad āhuḥ /
analyzed: yat āhuḥ

original: sāmarthyaṁ sarvabhāvānāṁ liṅgam ity abhidhīyate /
analyzed: sāmarthya sarva bhāvānām liṅgam iti abhidhīyate

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: tena 'ṅgatvam; yathā barhir devaśadanaṁ dāmi 'ty asya lavanāṅgatvam /
analyzed: tena ṅga tvam yathā barhiḥ deva śadana dāmi ti asya lavana aṅga tvam

original: sa hi lavanaṁ prakāśayituṁ samarthaḥ /
analyzed: sa hi lavana prakāśayitu samarthaḥ

original: ata iyac ca liṅgaṁ dvividham / sāmānyasaṁbandhakabodhakapramāṇāntarānapekṣaṁ tadapekṣaṁ ca /
analyzed: atas iyat ca liṅga dvividham sāmānya sabandhaka bodhaka pramāṇa antara anapekṣa tad apekṣa ca

original: tatra yadantareṇa yan na saṁbhavaty eva / tasya tadaṅgatvaṁ tadanapekṣaṁ kevalalāṅgād eva /
analyzed: tatra yad antareṇa yat na sabhavati eva tasya eva

original: yathā 'rthajñānasya karmānuṣṭhānāṅgatvam /
analyzed: yathā rtha jñānasya karma anuṣṭhāna aṅga tvam

original: na hy arthajñānam antareṇa 'nuṣṭhānaṁ saṁbhavati /
analyzed: na hi artha jñānam antareṇa sabhavati

original: yadantareṇa yat saṁbhavati / tasya tadarthatvaṁ tadapekṣam / yatho 'ktasya mantrasya lavanāṅgatvam /
analyzed: yad antareṇa yat sabhavati tasya tad artha tva tad apekṣam

original: lavanaṁ hi mantraṁ vinā 'py upāyāntareṇa smṛtvā kartuṁ śakyam /
analyzed: hi vinā pi upāya antareṇa smṛtvā kartu śakyam

original: ato na mantro lavanasvārūpārthaḥ saṁbhavati / kiṁ tv apūrvasādhanabhūtalavanoprakāśanārthaḥ /
analyzed: atas na mantraḥ lavana svārūpa arthaḥ sabhavati ki tu apūrva sādhana bhūta lavana uprakāśana arthaḥ

original: tattvañ ca na sāmarthyamātrād avagamyate / lavanaprakāśanamātra sāmarthyāt /
analyzed: tattvam ca na sāmarthya mātrāt avagamyate lavana prakāśana mātra sāmarthyāt

original: ato 'vaśyaṁ prakaraṇādi sāmānyasaṁbandhabodhakam svīkāryam /
analyzed: atas vaśya prakaraṇa ādi sāmānya sabandha bodhakam svīkāryam

original: darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇe hi mantrasya pāṭhād evam avagamyate /
analyzed: darśa pūrṇamāsa prakaraṇe hi mantrasya pāṭhāt evam avagamyate

original: anena mantreṇa darśapūrṇamāsāpūrvasaṁbandhi kiṁcit prakāśyata iti; anyathā prakaraṇapāṭhavaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: anena mantreṇa darśa pūrṇamāsa apūrva sabandhi kicid prakāśyate iti anyathā prakaraṇa pāṭha vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt

original: kiṁ tad apūrvasaṁbandhi prakāśyam ity apekṣāyāṁ sāmarthyād barhirlavanaṁ ity avagamyate /
analyzed: ki tat apūrva sabandhi prakāśyam iti apekṣāyā sāmarthyāt barhiḥ lavane iti avagamyate

original: tad dhi barhiḥsaṁskāradvārā 'pūrvasaṁbandhi 'ti mantrasya sāmarthyāt tadarthatve sati nā 'narthakya prasajyate /
analyzed: tat hi barhiḥ saskāra dvārā pūrva sabandhi ti mantrasya sāmarthyāt tad artha tve sati na ānarthakya prasajyate

original: tasmād barhir devaśadanaṁ dāmi 'ty asya prakaraṇād darśapūrṇamāsasaṁbandhitayā 'vagatasya sāmarthyāl lavanāṅgatvam iti siddham /
analyzed: tasmāt barhiḥ deva śadana dāmi ti asya prakaraṇāt darśa pūrṇamāsa sabandhi tayā vagatasya sāmarthyāt lavana aṅga tvam iti siddham

original: pūṣānumantaṇamantrāṇāṁ tu yāgānumantaṇasamākhyayā yāgasāmānyasaṁbandhe 'vagate sāmarthyāt pūṣayāgasaṁbandho 'vagamyate /
analyzed: pūṣa anumantaṇa mantrāṇā tu yāga anumantaṇa samākhyayā yāga sāmānya sabandhe vagate sāmarthyāt pūṣa yāga sabandhaḥ vagamyate

original: nanu teṣāṁ yāvat samākhyayā pūṣayāgena sāmānyasaṁbandho 'vagamyate / tāvat prakaraṇād darśapūrṇamāsābhyām eva sāmānyasaṁbandho 'vagataḥ / samākhyātas tasya baliyastvāt /
analyzed: nanu teṣām yāvat samākhyayā pūṣa yāgena sāmānya sabandhaḥ vagamyate tāvat prakaraṇāt darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām eva sāmānya sabandhaḥ vagataḥ samākhyātaḥ tasya baliyaḥ tvāt

original: ata eva mantropadeśākaṁ iti samākhyāte brāhmaṇeāmnātānām api prayājānām prakaraṇāt sāmnāyyopāṃśuyājān̐gatvam api 'ty uktam /
analyzed: atas eva iti samākhyāte brāhmaṇe āmnātānām api prayājānām prakaraṇāt sāmnāyya upāṃśuyāja anga tvam api ti uktam

original: kiṃ ca yāgānumantranasāmākhyayā 'pi na pūṣayāgena sāmānyasambandho 'vagamyate / kiṃ tu yāgamātrena / prakaraṇena tu darśapūrṇamāsābhyām eva viśeṣasambandho 'vagamyate /
analyzed: kim ca yāga anumantrana sāmākhyayā na pūṣa yāgena sāmānya sambandhaḥ vagamyate kim tu yāga mātrena prakaraṇena tu darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām eva viśeṣa sambandhaḥ vagamyate

original: ataḥ prakaraṇāj jhaṭiti tatsambandhasya 'vā 'vagatatvāt tadarthatvam eva teṣāṃ yuktam; pūṣe 'tiśabdasya puṣṇāti 'ti vyutpattyā kathaṃcid agnyādyabhidhāyitvāt /
analyzed: atas prakaraṇāt jhaṭiti tad sambandhasya vā vagata tvāt tad artha tvam eva teṣām yuktam pūṣe ti śabdasya puṣṇāti ti vyutpattyā kathaṃcid agni ādi abhidhāyi tvāt

original: mai 'vam /
analyzed: mai vam

original: pūṣānumantranamamantre hi śrūyamāna evam avagamyate /
analyzed: pūṣa anumantranama mantre hi śrūyamāne evam avagamyate

original: pūṣābhidhānasamarthatvād ayaṃ mantras tatprakāśanārtha iti / lavaṇamantra iva lavaṇaprakāśanārthaḥ /
analyzed: pūṣā abhidhāna samartha tvāt ayam mantraḥ tad prakāśana arthaḥ iti lavaṇa mantraḥ iva lavaṇa prakāśana arthaḥ

original: na tatra prakaraṇādyapekṣā / yena teṣām upajivatena prābalyaṃ syāt /
analyzed: na tatra prakaraṇa ādi apekṣā yena teṣām prābalyam syāt

original: prakaraṇāt tu darśapūrṇamāsāśritatve tasya vākyalin̐gaśrutikalpanena viniyojakatvāl lin̐gasya 'pajīvyatvena prābalyam /
analyzed: prakaraṇāt tu darśa pūrṇamāsa āśrita tve tasya vākya linga śruti kalpanena viniyojaka tvāt lingasya pajīvya tvena prābalyam

original: ato lin̐gāt pūṣaprakāśanārthatve 'vagate tanmātraprakāśanam anarthakam ity apūrvasādhanapūṣaprakāśanārthatvaṃ vaktavyam /
analyzed: atas lingāt pūṣa prakāśana artha tve vagate tad mātra prakāśanam anarthakam iti apūrva sādhana pūṣa prakāśana artha tvam vaktavyam

original: kiṃ tad apūrvam ity apekṣāyāṃ yāgānumantraṇasāmākhyānugṛhītāl lin̐gāt pūṣayāgāpūrvasambandhidevatāprakāśanārtho 'yam ity avagamyate /
analyzed: kim tat apūrvam iti apekṣāyām yāga anumantraṇa sāma ākhyā anugṛhītāt lingāt pūṣa yāga apūrva sambandhi devatā prakāśana arthaḥ yam iti avagamyate

original: ato yady api sāmākhyātaḥ prakaraṇam balīyas tathā 'pi tasya lin̐gena bādhitatvāt sāmākhyāto durbalāyā api prabalal̇ingāśritatvena prābalyāt sai 'va sāmānyasambandhe pramāṇam saṃbhavati / durbalasyā 'pi prabalāśritasya prābalyāt /
analyzed: atas yadi api sāmākhyātaḥ prakaraṇam balīyaḥ tathā pi tasya lingena bādhita tvāt sāmākhyātaḥ durbalāyāḥ api prabala linga āśrita tvena prābalyāt sā e va sāmānya sambandhe pramāṇam saṃbhavati durbalasya pi prabala āśritasya prābalyāt

original: ata eva śrutyapekṣayā durbalāyā api smṛter ācamanarūpaprabalapādārthāśritatvena prābalyāt padārthadharmaguṇabhūtaśrautakramatyāgena vedakaraṇānantaram iṣṭutā ācamanam eva kāryam ity uktam /
analyzed: atas eva śruti apekṣayā durbalāyāḥ api smṛteḥ ācamana rūpa prabala pādārtha āśrita tvena prābalyāt padārtha dharma guṇa bhūta śrauta krama tyāgena veda karaṇa anantaram iṣṭutā ācamanam eva kāryam iti uktam

original: yathā 'huḥ /
analyzed: yathā huḥ

original: atyantabalavanto 'pi paurajānapadā janāḥ durbalair api bādhyante puruṣaiḥ pārthivāśritaiḥ /
analyzed: atyanta balavantaḥ pi paura jānapadāḥ janāḥ durbalaiḥ api bādhyante puruṣaiḥ pārthiva āśritaiḥ

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: yat tu pūṣe 'tiśabdaḥ kathamcid agnyādyabhidhāyī 'ti / tan na; tasyā 'dantako hi sa ityādivākyaśeṣena vaidika prasiddhyā ca 'rthāvāśeṣe rūḍhatvāt; rūḍheś ca 'vayavārthālocanasavyapekṣād yogād balīyastvāt /
analyzed: yat tu pūṣe tiśabdaḥ kathamcid agni ādi abhidhāyī ti tat na tasyāḥ dantakaḥ hi saḥ ityādi vākya śeṣena vaidika prasiddhyā ca rthau āśeṣe rūḍha tvāt rūḍheḥ ca vayava artha ālocana sa vyapekṣāt yogāt balīyaḥ tvāt

original: ata eva varṣāsu rathakāro 'gnim ādadhītety atra rathakāraśabdena saudhanvanāparaparyāyo varṇaviśeṣa ucyate / rūḍheḥ prābalyāt / na tu rathaṃ karoti 'ti vyutpattyā dvijātīyaḥ / yogasya daurbalyād ity uktaṃ ṣaṣṭhe /
analyzed: atas eva varṣāsu rathakāraḥ gnim ādadhīta iti atra rathakāra śabdena saudhanvana apara paryāyaḥ varṇa viśeṣaḥ ucyate rūḍheḥ prābalyāt na tu ratham karoti vyutpattyā dvijātīyaḥ yogasya daurbalyāt iti uktam ṣaṣṭhe

original: tasmād yuktaṃ samākhyayā sāmānyasaṃbandhe 'vagate sāmarthyāt pūṣayāgasaṃbandhaḥ pūṣānumantṛṇamantṛāṇām iti /
analyzed: tasmāt yuktam samākhyayā sāmānya saṃbandhe vagate sāmarthyāt pūṣa yāga saṃbandhaḥ pūṣa anumantṛṇa mantṛāṇām iti

original: yathā 'huḥ /
analyzed: yathā huḥ

original: yāgānumantṛṇānī 'ti samākhyā kratuyojikā tasmāc chaktyanurodheṇa prāptis taddevate kratau /
analyzed: yāga anumantṛṇāni ti samākhyā kratu yojikā tasmāt śakti anurodheṇa prāptiḥ tad devate kratau

original: tat siddhaṃ pramāṇāntarasiddhasāmānyasaṃbandhasya padārthasya viniyojakaṃ liṅgam iti /
analyzed: tat siddham pramāṇa antara siddha sāmānya saṃbandhasya padārthasya viniyojakam liṅgam iti

original: tatra mantraviniryojakaṃ liṅgaṃ mukhyaṃ evā 'rthe viniyojakaṃ / na gauṇe; mukhyārthasya prathamaṃ upasthitatvena tatrai 'va viniyogabuddhau paryavasannāyāṃ punar gauṇe 'rthe viniyogakalpanāyāṃ gauravaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: tatra mantra viniryojakam liṅgam mukhyam evā rthe viniyojakam na gauṇe mukhya arthasya prathamam upasthita tvena tatra viniyoga buddhau paryavasannāyām punar gauṇe rthe viniyoga kalpanāyām gaurava prasaṅgāt

original: ata eva barhir devasadanaṃ dāmī 'ti mantraḥ sāmarthyāt kuśalavanāṅgam / teṣāṃ mukhyatvāt / no 'laparājīlavanāṅgam ity uktam /
analyzed: atas eva barhiḥ deva sadanam dāmi iti mantraḥ sāmarthyāt kuśalavana aṅgam teṣām mukhya tvāt no lapa rājīlavana aṅgam iti uktam

original: tad idaṃ liṅgaṃ vākyādibhyo balavat /
analyzed: tat idam liṅgam vākya ādibhyaḥ balavat

original: teṣāṃ hi na sākṣād viniyojakatvaṃ kiṃ tu liṅgaṃ śrutiṃ ca kalpayitvā; na cā 'sāmarthyasya śrutiṃ kalpayitvā viniyogakalpanā saṃbhavati 'ti sāmarthyasyā 'pi kalpyatveno 'pajīvyatvāt /
analyzed: teṣām hi na sākṣāt viniyojaka tvam kim tu liṅgam śrutim ca kalpayitvā na sāmarthyasya śrutim kalpayitvā viniyoga kalpanā saṃbhavati sāmarthyasya api kalpya tvena u pajīvya tvāt

original: atas tair iṣyat sāmarthyaṃ kalpayitvā śrutiḥ kalpyate / tāvad eva klptena sāmarthyena śrutiṃ kalpayitvā viniyogaḥ kriyata iti tasya prābalyam /
analyzed: atas taiḥ iṣyat sāmarthyam kalpayitvā śrutiḥ kalpyate  tāvat eva klptena sāmarthyena śrutim kalpayitvā viniyogaḥ kriyate iti tasya prābalyam

original: ata eva syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi ghṛtasya dhārayā suśevaṃ kalpayāmi 'ty asya sadanāṅgatvaṃ liṅgāt / na tu vākyāt sādanāṅgatvam / tasya daurbalyād iti /
analyzed: atas eva syonam te sadanam kṛṇomi ghṛtasya dhārayā su śevam kalpayāmi ti asya sadana aṅga tvam liṅgāt na tu vākyāt sādana aṅga tvam tasya daurbalyāt iti

original: samabhivyāhāro vākyam /
analyzed: samabhivyāhāraḥ vākyam

original: samabhivyāhāro nāma sādhyatvādivācakadvitīyādyabhāve vastutas śeṣaśeṣinos sahoecūrṇanam /
analyzed: samabhivyāhāraḥ nāma sādhya tva ādi vācaka dvitīya ādi abhāve vastutas śeṣa śeṣinoḥ

original: yathā / yasya parṇamayī juhūr bhavati na sa pāpaṁ ślokaṁ śṛṇoti iti /
analyzed: yathā yasya parṇa mayī juhūḥ bhavati na sa pāpa śloka śṛṇoti iti

original: atra hi na dvitīyādivibhaktiḥ śrūyate / parṇatāṁ parṇatājuhvoḥ samabhivyāhāramātram /
analyzed: atra hi na dvitīyā ādi vibhaktiḥ śrūyate parṇa tā parṇa tā juhvoḥ samabhivyāhāra mātram

original: tasmād eva ca parṇatāyā juhvaṅgatvam /
analyzed: tasmāt eva ca parṇa tāyāḥ juhū aṅga tvam

original: na cā 'narthakhyam / juhūśabdena 'pūrvalalakṣaṇāt /
analyzed: na ca a nartha khyam juhū śabdena pūrva la lakṣaṇāt

original: tad ayaṁ vākyārthaḥ /
analyzed: tat vākya arthaḥ

original: parṇatayā 'vattahavirdharaṇadvārā yad apūrvasādhanaṁ tad bhāvayed iti /
analyzed: parṇa tayā vatta haviḥ dharaṇa dvārā yat apūrva sādhana tat bhāvayet iti

original: evaṁ ca parṇatayā yadi juhuḥ kriyate tadai 'va tatsādhyam apūrvaṁ bhavati / nā 'nyathe 'ti gamyate / iti na parṇatāyā vaiyarthyam /
analyzed: eva ca parṇa tayā yadi juhuḥ kriyate bhavati gamyate iti na parṇa tāyāḥ vaiyarthyam

original: avattahavirdharaṇadvāre 'ti cā 'vaśyaṁ vaktavyam / anyathā sruvādiṣv api parṇatāpatteḥ /
analyzed: avatta haviḥ dharaṇa dvāre vaktavyam anyathā sruva ādiṣu api parṇa tā āpatteḥ

original: sā ce 'yaṁ parṇatā 'nārabhyādhītā na sarvakratuṣu gacchati / vikṛtiṣu codakena 'pi prāptisaṁbhavena dviruktatvāpatteḥ; kiṁ tu prakṛtiṣu /
analyzed: na ārabhya adhītā na sarva kratuṣu gacchati vikṛtiṣu ca udakena prāpti sabhavena dvis ukta tva āpatteḥ tu prakṛtiṣu

original: tad uktam /
analyzed: tat uktam

original: prakṛtau vā 'dviruktatvāt /
analyzed: prakṛtau vā dvis ukta tvāt

original: iti /
analyzed: iti
