original: atra vikṛtir yato 'ṅgāni gṛhṇāti sā prakṛtir iti na prakṛtiśabdena vivakṣitam / gṛhamedhtye parṇatāyā aprāptiprasaṅgāt; na hi gṛhamedhtiyāt kācana vikṛtir aṅgāni gṛhṇāti mānābhāvāt; kiṁ tu codakād yatra 'ṅgaprāptis tat karma prakṛtiśabdena vivakṣitam; yathā darśapūrṇamāsau /
analyzed: atra vikṛtiḥ yatas ṅgāni gṛhṇāti sā prakṛtiḥ iti na prakṛti śabdena vivakṣitam gṛhamedhtye parṇa tāyāḥ aprāpti prasaṅgāt na hi gṛhamedhtiyāt kācana vikṛtiḥ aṅgāni gṛhṇāti māna abhāvāt ki tu codakāt yatra ṅga prāptiḥ tat karma prakṛti śabdena vivakṣitam yathā darśa pūrṇamāsau

original: tatra hi na codakād aṅgaprāptiḥ / prakaraṇapathitair evā 'ṅgair nairākāṅkṣyāt /
analyzed: tatra hi na ca udakāt aṅga prāptiḥ prakaraṇa pathitaiḥ eva a ṅgaiḥ nairākāṅkṣyāt

original: gṛhamedhīyādiṣv api na codakād aṅgaprāptiḥ / kḷptopakārair evā 'jyabhāgādibhir nairākāṅkṣyāt /
analyzed: gṛhamedhīya ādiṣu api na ca udakāt aṅga prāptiḥ kḷpta upakāraiḥ eva ā jyabhāga ādibhiḥ nairākāṅkṣyāt

original: ato yatra codakāpravṛttis tatrā 'nārabhyādhītānāṁ saṁniveśaḥ /
analyzed: atas yatra ca udaka apravṛttiḥ sa niveśaḥ

original: sāptadaśyāṁ tv anārabhyādhītam api na prakṛtau gacchati / prakṛteḥ pāñcadaśyāvarodhāt; kiṁ tu vikṛtiṣu gacchati /
analyzed: sāptadaśyā tu an ārabhya adhītam api na prakṛtau gacchati prakṛteḥ pāñcadaśya avarodhāt ki tu vikṛtiṣu gacchati

original: tatra 'pi na sarvāsu gacchati / codakaprāptapāñcadaśyabādhaprasaṅgāt; kiṁ tu pratyakṣaśrutasāptadaśyāsu mitravindādiṣu gacchati /
analyzed: tatra na sarvāsu gacchati ca udaka prāpta pāñcadaśya bādha prasaṅgāt tu pratyakṣa śruta sāptadaśyāsu mitravinda ādiṣu gacchati

original: yathā 'huḥ /
analyzed: yathā huḥ

original: evaṁ ca prakṛtāv etat pāñcadaśyāṁ pratiṣṭhitam vikṛtau ca na yatrā 'sti sāptadaśyapunarhṛtiḥ /
analyzed: eva ca prakṛtau etat pāñcadaśyā pratiṣṭhitam vikṛtau ca na yatra sti sāptadaśya punarhṛtiḥ

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: na ca vākyavaiyarthyam; anārabhyādhītasyai 'va sāptadaśyasya mitravindādiprakaraṇasthena vākyeno 'pasaṁhārāt /
analyzed: na ca vākya vaiyarthyam an ārabhya adhītasyai sāptadaśyasya mitravinda ādi prakaraṇa sthena vākyena upasahārāt

original: upasaṁhāro nāma sāmānyaprāptasya viśeṣe niyamanam /
analyzed: upasahāraḥ nāma sāmānya prāptasya viśeṣe niyamanam

original: yathā 'huḥ /sāmānyavidhir aspaṣṭaḥ saṃhriyeta viśeṣataḥ iti /
analyzed: yathā huḥ sāmānya vidhiḥ aspaṣṭaḥ saṃhriyeta viśeṣataḥ iti

original: tatrā 'nārabhyavidhiḥ sāmānyavidhiḥ; mitravinddādiprakaraṇasthaś ca viśeṣavidhir ity āstāṃ tāvat; prakṛtam anusarāmaḥ /
analyzed: tatra na ārabhya vidhiḥ sāmānya vidhiḥ mitravinddha ādi prakaraṇa sthaḥ ca viśeṣa vidhiḥ iti āstām tāvat prakṛtam anusarāmaḥ

original: tat siddhaṃ vākyād aṅgatvam /
analyzed: tat siddham vākyāt aṅga tvam

original: tad idaṃ vākyaṃ prakaraṇād balīyaḥ /
analyzed: tat idam vākyam prakaraṇāt balīyaḥ

original: prakaraṇaṃ hi na sākṣād viniyojakam; tad dhy ākāṅkṣārūpam /
analyzed: prakaraṇam hi na sākṣāt viniyojakam tat hi ākāṅkṣā rūpam

original: na cā 'kāṅkṣā svayaṃ pramāṇaṃ kiṃ tu sākāṅkṣaṃ vākyaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhavaty etādṛśī matiḥ /
analyzed: na ca ā kāṅkṣā svayam pramāṇam kim tu sākāṅkṣam vākyam dṛṣṭvā bhavati etādṛśī matiḥ

original: nūnam idaṃ vākyaṃ kenacid vākyenai 'kavākyabhūtam iti /
analyzed: nūnam idam vākyam kenacid vākyena e kavākya bhūtam iti

original: tataś cā 'kāṅkṣārūpaṃ prakaraṇaṃ vākyasya vākyāntaraikavākyatve pramāṇam /
analyzed: tatas ca ā kāṅkṣā rūpam prakaraṇam vākyasya vākya antara eka vākya tve pramāṇam

original: evaṃ ca yāvat prakaraṇaṃ vākyaṃ kalpayitvā viniyojakaṃ bhavati / tāvad vākyaṃ liṅgaśruti kalpayitvā viniyojakaṃ bhavati 'ti prakaraṇād vākyam balīyaḥ /
analyzed: evam ca yāvat prakaraṇam vākyam kalpayitvā viniyojakam bhavati tāvat vākyam liṅga śruti kalpayitvā viniyojakam bhavati prakaraṇāt vākyam balīyaḥ

original: ata eve 'ndrāgnī idaṃ havir ajuṣetāṃ avīvṛdhetāṃ maho jyāyo 'krātām ity atre 'ndrāgnīpadasya liṅgād darśāṅgatve siddha idaṃ havir ityāder api tadekavākyatvād darśāṅgatvam / na tu prakaraṇād darśapūrṇamāsāṅgatvam / prakaraṇād vākyasya balīyastvād iti /
analyzed: atas eva indra agnī idam haviḥ ajuṣetām avīvṛdhetām mahaḥ jyāyaḥ krātām iti atre indra agnī padasya liṅgāt darśa aṅga tve siddhe idam haviḥ ityādeḥ api tad ekavākyatvāt darśa aṅga tvam na tu prakaraṇāt darśa pūrṇamāsa aṅga tvam prakaraṇāt vākyasya balīyaḥ tvāt iti

original: ubhayākāṅkṣā prakaraṇam; yathā prayājādiṣu /
analyzed: ubhaya ākāṅkṣā prakaraṇam yathā prayāja ādiṣu

original: samidho yajati ty atra hi 'staviśeṣasyā 'nirdeśāt samidyāgena bhāvyayet kim ity asty upakāryākāṅkṣā /
analyzed: samidhaḥ yajati atra hi sta viśeṣasya a nirdeśāt samidh yāgena kim iti asti upakārya ākāṅkṣā

original: darśapūrṇamāsavākye 'pi darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargaṃ bhāvayet katham ity asty upakārakākāṅkṣā /
analyzed: darśa pūrṇamāsa vākye pi darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām svargam bhāvayet katham iti asti upakāraka ākāṅkṣā

original: ata ubhayākāṅkṣayā prayājādīnāṃ darśapūrṇamāsāṅgatvaṃ sidhyati /
analyzed: atas ubhaya ākāṅkṣayā prayāja ādīnām darśa pūrṇamāsa aṅga tvam sidhyati

original: nanu yadi prayājādivākya iṣṭaviśeṣo na śrūyate / tarhi viśvajinnyāyena svargaḥ phalaṃ kalpyatām /
analyzed: nanu yadi prayāja ādi vākye iṣṭa viśeṣaḥ na śrūyate tarhi viśvajit nyāyena svargaḥ phalam kalpyatām

original: viśvajidadhikaraṇe hi viśvajitā yajete ty atra phalasyā 'śravaṇāt / phalam antareṇa ca vidhiśruter anupapattor avaśyaṃ phale kalpayitavye / sarvābhilāṣitatvena svargaḥ phalam ity uktam /
analyzed: viśvajit adhikaraṇe hi viśvajitā yajeta iti atra phalasya ā śravaṇāt phalam antareṇa ca vidhi śruteḥ anupapattoḥ avaśyam phale kalpayitavye sarva abhilāṣita tvena svargaḥ phalam iti uktam

original: tad uktam /
analyzed: tat uktam

original: sa svargaḥ syāt sarvān praty aviśiṣṭatvād iti /
analyzed: sa svargaḥ syāt sarvān prati a viśiṣṭa tvāt iti

original: rātrisattrayāyena vā 'rthavādikam phalaṃ kalpyatām /rātrisattrādhikaraṇe hi / pratitiṣṭhanti ha vai ya etā rātrīr upayanti 'ty atra vidhyuddeśe / phalāśravaṇāt phalam antareṇa ca vidhiśruter anupapatter avaśyaṃ phale kalpayitavye / ārthatvād uktaṃ pratiṣṭhākhyaṃ phalam ity uktam; viśvajidadhikaraṇanyāyena 'nupasthitasvargakalpane tasya prakṛtasaṃbandhakalpane gauravād arthavādopasthitasyai 'va prakṛtaphalatvakalpaṇe lāghavāt /
analyzed: rātrisattra yāyena vā rthavādikam phalam kalpyatām rātrisattra adhikaraṇe hi pratitiṣṭhanti ha vai ye etāḥ rātrīḥ upayanti ti atra vidhi uddeśe phala aśravaṇāt phalam antareṇa ca vidhi śruteḥ anupapatteḥ avaśyam phale kalpayitavye ārtha tvāt uktam pratiṣṭhā ākhyam phalam iti uktam viśvajit adhikaraṇa nyāyena nupasthita svarga kalpane tasya prakṛta saṃbandha kalpane gauravāt arthavāda upasthita syai prakṛta phala tva kalpaṇe lāghavāt

original: tad uktam /
analyzed: tat uktam

original: phalam ātreyo nirdeśād aśrutau hy anumānaṃ syād iti /
analyzed: phalam ātreyaḥ nirdeśāt aśrutau hi anumānam syāt iti

original: tasmād viśvajinnyāyena rātrisattranyāyena vā svatantraphalārthatve saṃbhavati kim iti darśapūrṇamāsāṅgatvaṃ svīkriyata iti /
analyzed: tasmāt viśvajit nyāyena rātrisattra nyāyena vā svatantra phala artha tve saṃbhavati kim iti darśa pūrṇamāsa aṅga tvam svīkriyate iti

original: nai 'vam /
analyzed: nai vam

original: svatantraphalārthatve 'nyatarākāṅkṣayā saṃbandhaḥ syāt /
analyzed: svatantra phala artha tve nyatara ākāṅkṣayā saṃbandhaḥ syāt

original: na hy atra phalasya sādhanākāṅkṣā 'sti /
analyzed: na hi atra phalasya sādhana ākāṅkṣā sti

original: śrūyamāṇaṃ hi phalaṃ sādhanam ākāṅkṣati; na cā 'tra tac chrūyate /
analyzed: śrūyamāṇam hi phalam sādhanam ākāṅkṣati na ca tra tat śrūyate

original: evaṃ ca phalasyā 'kāṅkṣābhāvāt kevalaṃ kiṃ bhāvayed iti prayājānāṃ bhāvyākāṅkṣāyai 'va svatantraphalārthatvaṃ syāt /
analyzed: evam ca phalasya ā kāṅkṣā bhāvāt kevalam kim bhāvayet iti prayājānām bhāvya ākāṅkṣāyai svatantra phala artha tvam syāt

original: darśapūrṇamāsārthatve tū 'bhayākāṅkṣā pramāṇam; prayājānāṃ bhāvyākāṅkṣāyā itaratra ca kathaṃbhāvākāṅkṣāyāḥ sattvāt /
analyzed: darśa pūrṇamāsa artha tve tu ubhaya ākāṅkṣā pramāṇam prayājānām bhāvya ākāṅkṣāyāḥ itaratra ca kathaṃbhāva ākāṅkṣāyāḥ sattvāt

original: anyatarākāṅkṣātaś co 'bhayākāṅkṣā balīyasī 'ti vakṣyate /
analyzed: anyatara ākāṅkṣātaḥ caḥ u bhaya ākāṅkṣā balīyasī ti vakṣyate

original: tataś ca darśapūrṇamāsārthatvam eva yuktam / na svatantraphalārthatvam iti /
analyzed: tatas ca darśa pūrṇamāsa artha tvam eva yuktam na svatantra phala artha tvam iti

original: tad uktam /
analyzed: tat uktam

original: dravyasaṃskārakarmaṇasu parārthatvāt phalaśrutir arthavādaḥ syād iti /
analyzed: dravya saṃskāra karmaṇasu para artha tvāt phala śrutiḥ arthavādaḥ syāt iti

original: atra dravye phalaśrutir yasya parṇamayī juhūr bhavati na sa pāpaṃ ślokaṃ śṛṇoti 'ty evamādyā /
analyzed: atra dravye phala śrutiḥ yasya parṇa mayī juhūḥ bhavati na sa pāpam ślokam śṛṇoti evamādyā

original: saṃskāre phalaśrutir yad āṅkte cakṣur eva bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkta ity evamādyā /
analyzed: saṃskāre phala śrutiḥ yat āṅkte cakṣuḥ eva bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte iti evamādyā

original: karmaṇi phalaśrutir varma vā etad yajñasya kriyate yat prayājānuyājā ijyanta ityādyā /
analyzed: karmaṇi phala śrutiḥ varma vai etat yajñasya kriyate yat prayāja anuyājāḥ ijyante ityādyā

original: karmapadaṃ cā 'rādupakārakakarmaparam draṣṭavyam / saṃskārakarmaṇaḥ pṛthaksaṃkīrtanād ity āstāṃ tāvat /tad idaṁ prakaraṇaṁ kriyāyā eva viniyojakam / na dravyaguṇayoḥ; tayos tu kriyāyogād viniyojakam /
analyzed: karma padam ca ā rāt upakāraka karma param draṣṭavyam saṃskāra karmaṇaḥ pṛthak saṃkīrtanāt iti āstām tāvat tat kriyāyāḥ eva viniyojakam na dravya guṇayoḥ tayoḥ tu kriyā yogāt viniyojakam

original: kuta iti cet /
analyzed: kutas iti ced

original: śṛṇu /
analyzed: śṛṇu

original: yajeta svargakāma ity atra 'khyātāṁśena 'rthi bhāvanā 'bhidhīyate /
analyzed: yajeta svarga kāmaḥ iti atra khyāta āśena rthi bhāvanā abhidhīyate

original: bhāvayed iti /
analyzed: bhāvayet iti

original: sā cā 'ṁśatrayam apekṣate /
analyzed: sā ca ā śatrayam apekṣate

original: kiṁ bhāvayet / kena bhāvayet / kathaṁ bhāvayed iti /
analyzed: ki bhāvayet kena bhāvayet katha bhāvayet iti

original: tatra bhāvyākāṁkṣāyāṁ ṣaṣṭhādyanyāyena svargo bhāvyatayā 'nveti / svargaṁ bhāvayed iti /
analyzed: tatra svargaḥ bhāvya tayā nveti svarga bhāvayet iti

original: karaṇākāṁkṣāyāṁ samānapadopātto yāgo bhāvārthādhikaraṇanyāyena karaṇatayā 'nveti / yāgena svargaṁ bhāvayed iti /
analyzed: samāna pada upāttaḥ yāgaḥ bhāva artha adhikaraṇa nyāyena karaṇa tayā nveti yāgena svarga bhāvayet iti

original: tataḥ katham iti kathaṁbhāvākāṁkṣāyāṁ yat saṁnidhau paṭhitam aśrūyamāṇaphalakaṁ ca kriyājātaṁ tad evo 'pakāryākāṁkṣaye 'tikartavyatātvena 'nvayam anubhavituṁ yogyam / kriyāyā eva loke kathaṁbhāvākāṁkṣāyām anvayādarśanāt /
analyzed: tatas katham iti katha bhāvākākṣāyāḥ yat sanidhau paṭhitam ca kriyā jāta tat anubhavitu yogyam kriyāyāḥ eva loke anvaya adarśanāt

original: na hi kuṭhāreṇa chindhyāt katham ity āśāṁkṣāyāṁ hasta iti kevalam uccāryamāṇo 'pi hasto 'nvayaṁ prāpnoti /
analyzed: na hi kuṭhāreṇa chindhyāt katham iti āśā ākṣāyāḥ haste iti kevalam uccāryamāṇaḥ pi hastaḥ prāpnoti

original: kiṁ tarhi hasteno 'dyamya nipātye 'ty uccāryamāṇe udyamanipātane eva /
analyzed: ki tarhi hastena u dyamya nipātye ti uccāryamāṇe udyama nipātane eva

original: hasto 'pi taddvāreṇai 'vā 'nvayaṁ prāpnotī 'ti sarvajanīnam etat /
analyzed: hastaḥ pi tad dvāreṇa e vā nu aya prāpnoti iti sarvajanīnam etat

original: kiṁ ca kathaṁbhāvākāṁkṣā nāma karaṇagataprakārākāṁkṣā; thamoḥ prakāravācatvāt /
analyzed: ki ca nāma karaṇa gata prakārākākṣā thamoḥ prakāra vāca tvāt

original: sāmānyasya bhedako viśeṣaḥ prakāraḥ /
analyzed: sāmānyasya bhedakaḥ viśeṣaḥ prakāraḥ

original: sāmānyaṁ ca kriyārūpam evā 'khyāteno 'cyate /
analyzed: sāmānya ca kriyā rūpam evā khyātena u cyate

original: yajeta svargakāma ity asya hy ayam arthaḥ /
analyzed: yajeta svarga kāmaḥ iti asya hi ayam arthaḥ

original: yāgena tathā kartavyaṁ yathā svargo bhavati 'ti /
analyzed: yāgena tathā yathā svargaḥ

original: kriyāsāmānyasya ca viśeṣaḥ kriyai 'va bhavati /
analyzed: kriyā sāmānyasya ca viśeṣaḥ bhavati

original: na hi brāhmaṇaviśeṣaḥ parivrājakādir abrāhmaṇo bhavati /
analyzed: na hi brāhmaṇa viśeṣaḥ parivrājaka ādiḥ abrāhmaṇaḥ bhavati

original: evaṁ ca karaṇagatakriyāviśeṣākāṁkṣāparanāmadheyakathaṁbhāvākāṁkṣāyāṁ kriyai 'vā 'nveti 'ti yuktam /
analyzed: eva ca kriyai vā nveti ti yuktam

original: sa ca karaṇagataḥ kriyāviśeṣo 'nvādhānādibrāhmaṇatarpaṇāntakriyārūpa eve 'ti yuktaṁ tasya prakaraṇena grahaṇam /
analyzed: sa ca karaṇa gataḥ kriyā viśeṣaḥ nu ādhāna ādi brāhmaṇa tarpaṇa anta kriyā rūpaḥ eva iti tasya prakaraṇena grahaṇam

original: tasya ca karaṇagatatvaṁ tadupakārakatvaṁ eva / tena vinā yāgenā 'pūrvājanāt /
analyzed: tasya ca karaṇa gata tva tad upakāraka tve eva tena vinā yāgena pūrva ajanāt

original: na hy udyamanipātanavyatirekeṇa kuṭhāreṇa dvaidhībhāvo jāyate /
analyzed: na hi udyama nipātana vyatirekeṇa kuṭhāreṇa dvaidhībhāvaḥ jāyate

original: tat siddhaṁ kathaṁbhāvākāṁkṣāyāṁ kriyai 'vā 'nveti 'ti /
analyzed: tat kriyai vā nveti ti

original: ata eva dravyadevatayoḥ yāgasaṁpādanadvārā 'nvayaḥ sāṁpradāyikair uktaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva dravya devatayoḥ yāga sapādana dvārā nvayaḥ sāpradāyikaiḥ uktaḥ

original: vṛkṣau ca kathaṁbhāvākāṁkṣāyām upakārasaṁpādanam atidiśyata ity uktam /yadi ca kathaṁbhāvākāṅkṣāyāṁ siddhaṁ vastv anvayayogyaṁ syāt / tadā saṁpādanaparyantaṁ dhāvanaṁ granthakṛtām anarthakaṁ syāt / atas ca kriyāyā eva 'tikartavyatātvam /
analyzed: vṛkṣau ca upakāra sapādanam atidiśyate iti uktam yadi ca vastu anvaya yogya syāt tadā sapādana paryanta dhāvana granthakṛtām anarthaka syāt atas ca kriyāyāḥ eva tikartavya tā tvam

original: kathaṁbhāvākāṅkṣāgṛhītasya 'tikartavyatātvāt / itisabdasya ca prakāravācyatvāt /
analyzed: katha bhāva ākāṅkṣā gṛhītasya ti kartavya tā tvāt iti sabdasya ca prakāra vācya tvāt

original: kartavyasye 'tiprakāra itikartavyatā /
analyzed: kartavyasya iti prakāraḥ iti kartavya tā

original: prakāraś ca sāmānyasya bhedako viśeṣa ity uktam /
analyzed: prakāraḥ ca sāmānyasya bhedakaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti uktam

original: kartavyasya ca viśeṣaḥ kartavya eva bhavati 'ti na siddhasya vastuna itikartavyatātvam / kiṁ tu kriyāyā eva /
analyzed: kartavyasya ca viśeṣaḥ kartavyaḥ eva bhavati na siddhasya vastunaḥ itikartavya tā tvam ki tu kriyāyāḥ eva

original: siddhasya tu dravyādeḥ kevalam aṅgatvam /
analyzed: siddhasya tu dravya ādeḥ kevalam aṅga tvam

original: tad api śrutyādinā na tu prakaraṇāt /
analyzed: tat api śruti ādinā na tu prakaraṇāt

original: yathā 'huḥ /
analyzed: yathā huḥ

original: nā 'vāntarakriyāyogād ṛte vākyopakalpitāt guṇadravye kathaṁbhāvair gṛhṇanti prakṛtīḥ kriyāḥ /
analyzed: nā vā antara kriyā yogāt ṛte vākya upakalpitāt guṇa dravye katha bhāvaiḥ gṛhṇanti prakṛtīḥ kriyāḥ

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: ata eva barhir devasadanaṁ dāmi 'tyādimantrāṇāṁ liṅgād aṅgatvam / na tu prakaraṇād ity uktam arthavādādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣasamāptau rāṇake /
analyzed: atas eva barhiḥ deva sadana dāmi tyādi mantrāṇā liṅgāt aṅga tvam na tu prakaraṇāt iti uktam arthavāda adhikaraṇa pūrvapakṣa samāptau

original: kvacid dravyasye 'tikartavyatātvābhidhānam aṅgatvābhiprāyaṁ draṣṭavyam; bahugranthasyarasād uktayukteś ce 'ti /
analyzed: kvacid dravyasya iti kartavyatā tva abhidhānam aṅga tva abhiprāya draṣṭavyam bahu granthasya rasāt ukta yukteḥ ca iti

original: tat siddhaṁ prakaraṇaṁ kriyāyā eva viniyojakam iti /
analyzed: tat siddha prakaraṇa kriyāyāḥ eva viniyojakam iti

original: tac ca prakaraṇaṁ dvividham /
analyzed: tat ca dvividham

original: mahāprakaraṇam avāntaraprakaraṇaṁ ce 'ti /
analyzed: mahā prakaraṇam ca iti

original: tatra phalabhāvanāyāḥ prakaraṇaṁ mahāprakaraṇam /
analyzed: tatra phala bhāvanāyāḥ prakaraṇa mahā prakaraṇam

original: tac ca prayājādīnāṁ grāhakam /
analyzed: tat ca prayāja ādīnām grāhakam

original: tac ca prakṛtāv eva /
analyzed: tat ca prakṛtau eva

original: yatra samagrāṅgopadeśaḥ sā prakṛtiḥ / yathā darśapūrṇamāsādiḥ /
analyzed: yatra samagra aṅga upadeśaḥ sā prakṛtiḥ yathā darśa pūrṇamāsa ādiḥ

original: tatra co 'bhayākāṅkṣārūpaṁ prakaraṇaṁ saṁbhavati / ākāṅkṣānuparamāt /
analyzed: tatra ca u bhaya ākāṅkṣā rūpa prakaraṇa sabhavati ākāṅkṣā anuparamāt

original: vikṛtau tu na prakaraṇaṁ saṁbhavati /
analyzed: vikṛtau tu na prakaraṇa sabhavati

original: yatra na samagrāṅgopadeśaḥ sā vikṛtiḥ / yathā sauryādiḥ /
analyzed: yatra na samagra aṅga upadeśaḥ sā vikṛtiḥ yathā sauryādiḥ

original: tatra ca yāny apūrvāṇy aṅgāni paṭhyanta upahomādīni / teṣāṁ na prakaraṇaṁ viniyojakam /
analyzed: tatra ca yāni apūrvāṇi aṅgāni paṭhyante upahoma ādīni teṣām na prakaraṇa viniyojakam

original: tatra yady api teṣāṁ kiṁ bhāvayed ity astyākāṅkṣā / tathā 'pi pradhānasya na kathambhāvākāṅkṣā 'sti / prākṛtair evāṅgair nirākāṅkṣatvāt /
analyzed: tatra yadi api ki bhāvayet iti asti ākāṅkṣā tathā pi pradhānasya na kathambhāva ākāṅkṣā sti prākṛtaiḥ eva aṅgaiḥ nirākāṅkṣa tvāt

original: na ca prākṛtānām aṅgānām atra 'paṭhitatvena 'pratyakṣatvād vaikṛtānāṃ tu paṭhitatvena pratyakṣatvāt tair evā 'kāṅkṣopaśama iti vācyam; teṣām api paṭhitatve 'py akḷptopakāratvena jhaṭity ākāṅkṣopaśamane 'sāmarthyāt / prākṛtānāṃ tu kḷptopakāratvena tacchamane sāmarthyāt /
analyzed: na ca prākṛtānām aṅgānām atra paṭhita tvena pratyakṣa tvāt vaikṛtānām tu paṭhita tvena pratyakṣa tvāt taiḥ eva ā kāṅkṣā upaśamaḥ iti vācyam teṣām api paṭhita tve pi akḷpta upakāra tvena jhaṭiti ākāṅkṣā upaśamane sāmarthyāt prākṛtānām tu kḷpta upakāra tvena tad śamane sāmarthyāt

original: na cā 'tra teṣām upasthāpakābhāvaḥ / upamitilakṣaṇapramāṇena teṣām upasthitatvāt /
analyzed: na ca tra teṣām upasthāpaka abhāvaḥ upamiti lakṣaṇa pramāṇena teṣām upasthita tvāt

original: sauryavākye hi dṛṣṭa auṣadhadravyatvena 'kadaivatyatvena sādṛśyena 'gneyavākyam upamīyate / gavayedarśanād gor upamānavat /
analyzed: saurya vākye hi dṛṣṭe auṣadha dravya tvena ka daivatya tvena sādṛśyena gneya vākyam upamīyate gavaye darśanāt goḥ upamāna vat

original: tasmiṃś co 'pamite tena tadartho jñayate / sa tryaṃśā bhāvanā /
analyzed: tasmin ca u pamite tena tad arthaḥ jñayate sa tri aṃśā bhāvanā

original: tatra sauryavākye bhāvanāyā bhāvyakaraṇayoḥ sattvād itikartavyatākāṅkṣāyām upakārapṛṣṭhabhāvena 'gneyetikartavyatā 'idīśyate /
analyzed: tatra saurya vākye bhāvanāyāḥ bhāvya karaṇayoḥ sattvāt itikartavya tā ākāṅkṣāyām upakāra pṛṣṭha bhāvena gneya itikartavya tā id īśyate

original: sauryayāgena brahmavarcasaṃ bhāvayed āgneyavad upakṛtye 'ti /
analyzed: saurya yāgena brahmavarcasam bhāvayet āgneya vat upakṛtya iti

original: tathā ca tayai 'vā 'kāṅkṣopaśamān na vikṛteḥ prakaraṇam asti /
analyzed: tathā ca tayai vā kāṅkṣā upaśamāt na vikṛteḥ prakaraṇam asti

original: anyatarākāṅkṣārūpasthānād eva cā 'pūrvāṅgagrahaṇam /
analyzed: anyatara ākāṅkṣā rūpa sthānāt eva ca ā pūrva aṅga grahaṇam

original: na ca prākṛtāṅgagrahaṇam eva vikṛtau prakaraṇāt kiṃ na syād iti vācyam; teṣām api prakṛtyupakārakatayā 'kāṅkṣopaśamāt /
analyzed: na ca prākṛta aṅga grahaṇam eva vikṛtau prakaraṇāt kim na syāt iti vācyam teṣām api prakṛti upakāraka tayā kāṅkṣā upaśamāt

original: nanu prākṛtānām aṅgānām ākāṅkṣābhāve teṣāṃ vikṛtau saṃbandhaḥ kevalaṃ sthānāt syāt; apūrvāṇāṃ tv ākāṅkṣāsattvād vikṛter apy ākāṅkṣāvattvāt teṣāṃ tatsaṃbandhaḥ prakaraṇāt syāt / prakaraṇaṃ ca sthānāj jhaṭiti viniyojakam ity apūrvāṇām eva prathamaṃ saṃbandhaḥ syāt / na prākṛtānām iti /
analyzed: nanu prākṛtānām aṅgānām ākāṅkṣā abhāve teṣām vikṛtau saṃbandhaḥ kevalam sthānāt syāt apūrvāṇām tu ākāṅkṣā sattvāt vikṛteḥ api ākāṅkṣāvat tvāt teṣām tad saṃbandhaḥ prakaraṇāt syāt prakaraṇam ca sthānāt jhaṭiti viniyojakam iti apūrvāṇām eva prathamam saṃbandhaḥ syāt na prākṛtānām iti

original: atro 'cyate /
analyzed: atra u cyate

original: satyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ jhaṭiti viniyojakam /
tathā 'pi pramāṇabalābalāt prameyabalābalasya jyāyastvād uktavidhayo 'pasthitānāṃ prākṛtānām eva saṃbandho yuktaḥ syāt kḷptopakāratvāt / na vaikṛtānāṃ kalpyopakāratvāt /
analyzed: tathā pi pramāṇa balābalāt prameya balābalasya jyāyaḥ tvāt ukta vidhayā upasthitānām prākṛtānām eva saṃbandhaḥ yuktaḥ syāt kḷpta upakāra tvāt na vaikṛtānām kalpya upakāra tvāt

original: vikṛteś co 'pakārakapadārthākāṅkṣā na padārthāntarāṇāṃ iti yuktaḥ prathamaṃ prākṛtāṅgasaṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: vikṛteḥ ca u pakāraka padārtha ākāṅkṣā na padārtha antarāṇām iti yuktaḥ prathamam prākṛta aṅga saṃbandhaḥ

original: tataś ca na vikṛtau prakaraṇaṃ viniyojakam /
analyzed: tatas ca na vikṛtau prakaraṇam viniyojakam

original: yat tu vikṛtau prākṛtāṅgānuvādena vidhīyate / yathā / audumbaro yūpo bhavati 'ti yūpānuvādena 'dumbaratvam,tat prakaraṇād gṛhyate /
analyzed: yat tu vikṛtau prākṛta aṅga anuvādena vidhīyate yathā audumbaraḥ yūpaḥ bhavati yūpa anuvādena dumbara tvam tat prakaraṇāt gṛhyate

original: nanu na tat prakaraṇād gṛhyate 'kriyātvāt / kriyāyā eva prakaraṇagrāhyatvād iti cet / satyam /
analyzed: nanu na tat prakaraṇāt gṛhyate kriyā tvāt kriyāyāḥ eva prakaraṇa grāhya tvāt iti ced satyam

original: tathā 'pi tu tāvad vidhīyamānatvena 'dumbaratvasya 'sty eva 'kāṅkṣā / kiṁ bhāvayed iti /
analyzed: tathā tu tāvat vidhīyamāna tvena dumbara tvasya sti eva kāṅkṣā ki bhāvayet iti

original: na ca yūpamātravidena tasya vidhīyamānatvād yūpasya cā 'dṛṣṭanipattvāt tenai 'vau 'dumbaratvasya nairākāṅkṣyam / āhavanīyene 'vā 'dhānasye 'ti vācyam; yūpasya kevalādṛṣṭarūpatvābhāvāt /
analyzed: na ca tasya vidhīyamāna tvāt yūpasya ca dumbara tvasya nairākāṅkṣyam vā dumbara tvasya nairākāṅkṣyam vā vācyam yūpasya kevala adṛṣṭa rūpa tva abhāvāt

original: tasya hi tadrūpatve khādiratvadikaṁ kevalādṛṣṭārthaṁ syāt /
analyzed: tasya hi tad rūpa tve kevala adṛṣṭa artha syāt

original: na ca tat saṁbhavati /
analyzed: na ca tat sabhavati

original: tathā sati khadirābhāve pratinidhitvena kadaropādānaṁ na syāt / adṛṣṭārthasya pratinidhyabhāvāt; na hi khadirajanyam adṛṣṭaṁ kadareṇa kriyata ity atra pramāṇam asti /
analyzed: tathā sati khadira abhāve pratinidhi tvena kadara upādāna na syāt adṛṣṭa arthasya pratinidhi abhāvāt na hi khadira janyam adṛṣṭa kadareṇa kriyate iti atra pramāṇam asti

original: ata eva nā 'dṛṣṭārthānāṁ pratinidhiḥ /
analyzed: atas eva nā dṛṣṭa arthānā pratinidhiḥ

original: tad uktam /
analyzed: tat uktam

original: na hyāgamāśabdakriyam anyārthātvaṁ ity adṛṣṭārthatvāt / pratinidhitvena co 'pādānaṁ kadarāder uktaṁ grantheṣu /
analyzed: na hi āgama a śabda kriyam iti adṛṣṭa artha tvāt pratinidhi tvena ukta grantheṣu

original: tasmān na yūpasya kevalādṛṣṭarūpatvam / api tu dṛṣṭādṛṣṭasaṁskāragaṇo yūpa iti sāmpradāyikāḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt na yūpasya kevala adṛṣṭa rūpa tvam api tu dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa saskāra gaṇaḥ yūpaḥ iti sāmpradāyikāḥ

original: evaṁ cau 'dumbaratvasya na yūpamātreṇa nairākāṅkṣyam / dṛṣṭasaṁskārasya prakārāntareṇā 'pi saṁbhavāt /
analyzed: eva ca u dumbara tvasya na yūpa mātreṇa nairākāṅkṣyam dṛṣṭa saskārasya prakāra antareṇa a pi sabhavāt

original: ataś cā 'sty audumbaratvasya 'kāṅkṣā /
analyzed: atas ca asti audumbara tvasya kāṅkṣā

original: vikṛter apy asti kathaṁbhāvākāṅkṣā /
analyzed: vikṛteḥ api asti katha bhāva ākāṅkṣā

original: sā ca tadā śāmyati yado 'pakāras tatpṛṣṭhabhāvena ca padārthā anuviyanti tāvad iti 'vetsamātrānyāyena śāmyati /
analyzed: sā ca tadā śāmyati yadā u pakāraḥ tad pṛṣṭha bhāvena ca padārthāḥ anuviyanti tāvat iti vetsa mātrā nyāyena śāmyati

original: ataś ca yatho 'nyatrābhāvānāyāhi karaṇākāṅkṣā dadhnah karaṇatvena 'nvaye jāte siddhasya karaṇatvānupapattyā homasya 'śrayatvena 'nvayaṁ yāvad anuvartate / na tu dadhnānvayamātreṇa nivartate / āśrayatvena ca gṛhyamāṇo homaḥ karaṇākāṅkṣayai 'va gṛhyata ity ucyate / na tv āśrayākāṅkṣā nāma caturthy asti; evaṁ vikṛteḥ kathaṁbhāvākāṅkṣā no 'pakārānvayamātreṇa nivartate / upakārapṛṣṭhabhāvena yāvat padārthānvayam anuvartate /
analyzed: atas ca yathā u karaṇa ākāṅkṣā dadhnah karaṇa tvena nvaye jāte siddhasya karaṇa tva anupapattyā homasya śraya tvena yāvat anuvartate na tu dadhnā anvaya mātreṇa nivartate āśraya tvena ca gṛhyamāṇaḥ homaḥ karaṇa ākāṅkṣayai gṛhyate iti ucyate na tu āśraya ākāṅkṣā nāma caturthī asti eva vikṛteḥ kathabhāva ākāṅkṣā na u pakāra anvaya mātreṇa nivartate upakāra pṛṣṭha bhāvena yāvat padārtha anvayam anuvartate

original: ataś co 'pakārapṛṣṭhabhāvena gṛhyamāṇāḥ padārthāḥ kathaṁbhāvākāṅkṣayai 'va gṛhyante /
analyzed: atas u pakāra pṛṣṭha bhāvena gṛhyamāṇāḥ padārthāḥ katha bhāva ākāṅkṣayai gṛhyante

original: tatra prākṛtāh padārthāḥ kathaṁbhāvākāṅkṣayā gṛhyamāṇā api na prakaraṇagrāhyāḥ / prakṛtyupakārakatayā teṣām ākāṅkṣābhāvāt /
analyzed: tatra prākṛtāḥ padārthāḥ katha bhāva ākāṅkṣayā gṛhyamāṇāḥ api na prakaraṇa grāhyāḥ prakṛti upakāraka tayā teṣām ākāṅkṣā bhāvāt

original: audumbaratvādayas tv anyamupakārakatayā sākāṅkṣāḥ paśuniyojanayūpapṛṣṭhabhāvena yāvat khādiratvaṁ āyāti tāvad vidhīyante; iti yuktaṁ teṣāṁ prakaraṇād grahaṇam ubhayākāṅkṣāsattvāt /
analyzed: audumbara tva ādayaḥ tu anyam upakāraka tayā sākāṅkṣāḥ paśu niyojana yūpa pṛṣṭha bhāvena yāvat khādira tve āyāti tāvat vidhīyante iti yukta teṣām prakaraṇāt grahaṇam ubhaya ākāṅkṣā sattvāt

original: yadi hi yūpapṛṣṭhabhāvena khādiratvaṁvihitaṁ syāt tato vikṛter ākāṅkṣābhāvād audumbaratvaṁ na prakaraṇagrāhyaṁ syāt /
analyzed: yadi hi yūpa pṛṣṭha bhāvena khādira tva vihita syāt tatas vikṛteḥ ākāṅkṣā bhāvāt audumbara tva na prakaraṇa grāhya syāt

original: na cai 'tad asti / codakasya khādiratvaviṣayatvāt /
analyzed: na ca e tat asti ca udakasya khādira tva viṣaya tvāt

original: nanu yadi yāvat khādiratvam āyāti tāvad evau 'dumbaratvaṁ vidhīyate / tadā tena khādiratvabādho 'prāptabādhaḥ syāt / tārtīyabādhavat /
analyzed: nanu yadi yāvat khādira tvam āyāti tāvat vidhīyate tadā tena khādira tva bādhaḥ prāpta bādhaḥ syāt tārtīya bādha vat

original: tathā hi bādho dvividhaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi bādhaḥ dvividhaḥ

original: aprāptabādhaḥ prāptabādhaś ce 'ti /
analyzed: a prāpta bādhaḥ prāpta bādhaḥ ca iti

original: tatra tārtīyo bādho 'prāptabādhaḥ /
analyzed: tatra tārtīyaḥ bādho prāpta bādhaḥ

original: tatra hi yāvad durbalena viniyogaḥ kartum ārabhyate / tāvad eva prabalapramāṇena viniyogaḥ kriyata iti tadbodhitene 'tarabādho 'prāptabādhaḥ / durbalapramāṇasya 'pravṛttatvāt /
analyzed: tatra hi yāvat durbalena viniyogaḥ kartum ārabhyate tāvat eva prabala pramāṇena viniyogaḥ kriyate iti prāpta bādhaḥ durbala pramāṇasya pravṛtta tvāt

original: prākṛtasya tv aṅgasya vikṛtau codakaprāptasya pratyāmnānād arthālopāt pratiṣedhaś ca yo bādhaḥ sa prāptabādhaḥ /
analyzed: prākṛtasya tu aṅgasya vikṛtau ca udaka prāptasya pratyāmnānāt artha ālopāt pratiṣedhaḥ ca yaḥ bādhaḥ sa prāpta bādhaḥ

original: yathā prākṛtānāṁ kuśānāṁ pratiṣiddhāsāmnānāt / yathā vā 'vaghtasya kṛṣṇaleṣu vaituṣyarūpaprayojanāpāt / yathā vā pitṛyajñau hotṛvaraṇasya na hotāraṁ vṛṇīta iti pratiṣedhāt /
analyzed: yathā prākṛtānā kuśānā pratiṣiddha a sāmnānāt  yathā vā vaghtasya kṛṣṇaleṣu vaituṣya rūpa prayojana āpāt  / yathā vā pitṛ yajñau hotṛ varaṇasya na hotāra vṛṇīte iti pratiṣedhāt

original: audumbaratvena ca khādiratvabādhaḥ prāptabādha eva vaktavyaḥ śarakuśanyāyena /
analyzed: audumbara tvena ca khādira tva bādhaḥ prāpta bādhaḥ eva vaktavyaḥ śara kuśa nyāyena

original: codakasya ca khādiratvāviṣayatve prāptyabhāvāt tadanupapattiḥ syād iti /
analyzed: codakasya ca khādira tva aviṣaya tve prāpti abhāvāt tad anupapattiḥ syāt iti

original: ucyate /
analyzed: ucyate

original: tārtīyapramāṇaviniyuktene 'tarasya bādhanaṁ tāvad aprāptabādhanam /
analyzed: tārtīya pramāṇa viniyuktena i tarasya tāvat a prāpta bādhanam

original: prakaraṇaṁ ca tārtīyam /
analyzed: prakaraṇa ca tārtīyam

original: tena tadviniyuktaudumbaratvene 'tarasya bādhanam aprāptabādha eva /
analyzed: tena tad viniyukta audumbara tvena itarasya bādhanam aprāpta bādhaḥ eva

original: na hi vaikṛtena prākṛtabādhaḥ prāptabādha eve 'ti kuladharmah /
analyzed: na hi vaikṛtena prākṛta bādhaḥ prāpta bādhaḥ eva iti kula dharmaḥ

original: vastutas tu prāptabādha evā 'yam /
analyzed: vastutas tu prāpta bādhaḥ evā yam

original: na ca khādiratvasyacodakāviṣayatvena prāptyabhāvāt kathaṁ tadbādhaḥ prāptabādhaḥ / tadviṣayatve vā tenai 'va nairākāṅkṣyān nau 'dumbaratve prakaraṇaṁ viniyojakaṁ syād iti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca tad bādhaḥ prāpta bādhaḥ tad viṣaya tve vā tad viṣaya tve vā nairākāṅkṣyāt nau dumbara tve prakaraṇa viniyojaka syāt iti vācyam

original: na hi prāptabādhasthale codakena padārthāḥ prāpyante; tathā sati śāstraprāptatvena bādho na syāt /
analyzed: na hi prāpta bādha sthale codakena padārthāḥ prāpyante tathā sati śāstra prāpta tvena bādhaḥ na syāt

original: kiṁ tarhi tān eva padārthān vastutaḥ prāpayati ye vikṛtau na bādhyante /
analyzed: ki tarhi tān eva padārthān vastutas prāpayati ye vikṛtau na bādhyante

original: te ca padārthāḥ prakṛtivacabdena prāpyanta iti bhavati puruṣasya bhrāntiḥ /
analyzed: te ca padārthāḥ prāpyante iti bhavati puruṣasya bhrāntiḥ

original: yathā prakṛtau kṛtaṁ tathā vikṛtau kartavyam iti sarve padārthāḥ prākṛtāḥ kartavyā iti /
analyzed: yathā prakṛtau kṛta tathā vikṛtau kartavyam iti sarve padārthāḥ prākṛtāḥ kartavyāḥ iti

original: ataś ca bhrāntiprāptāḥ khādiratvādayaḥ śāstrapratipannair audumbaratvādibhir bādhyanta iti bhavati tadbādhaḥprāptabādhāḥ /
analyzed: atas ca bhrānti prāptāḥ khādira tva ādayaḥ śāstra pratipannaiḥ audumbara tva ādibhiḥ bādhyante iti bhavati tad bādhaḥ prāpta bādhāḥ

original: na ca bhrāntipratipannena vaidhy ākāṅkṣā nivartayituṁ śakyate /
analyzed: na ca bhrānti pratipannena ākāṅkṣā nivartayitu śakyate

original: tasmād yuktam uktam ubhayākāṅkṣāsamupapannasamutthāyād vikṛtau prākṛtānuvādena vidhīyamānānām audumbararvādinām prakaraṇaṁ viniyojakam iti /
analyzed: tasmāt yuktam uktam ubhaya ākāṅkṣā samupapanna samutthāyāt vikṛtau prākṛta anuvādena vidhīyamānānām audumbararvādinām prakaraṇa viniyojakam iti

original: evaṁ pṛṣadājyena 'nuyājān yajati 'ti prākṛtānuyājānuvādena vidhīyamānaṁ pṛṣadājyam api prakaraṇād vikṛtyaṅgam iti kecid ācāryāḥ /
analyzed: eva pṛṣadājyena nuyājān yajati prākṛta anuyāja anuvādena vidhīyamāna pṛṣadājyam api prakaraṇāt vikṛti aṅgam iti kecid ācāryāḥ

original: asmattātacaraṇās tv evam āhuḥ /
analyzed: asmad tāta caraṇāḥ tu evam āhuḥ

original: pṛṣadājyaṁ hy anuyājānuvādena vidhīyate /
analyzed: pṛṣadājya hi anuyāja anuvādena vidhīyate

original: tatsvarūpe cā 'narthakyaprāptau tair na vikṛtyapūrvaṁ lakṣayituṁ yuktaṁ viprakarṣāt / kiṁ tu dīkṣaṇīyāvānniyamanāyena svāpūrvam eva lakṣayituṁ yuktaṁ saṁnikarṣāt /
analyzed: tad svarūpe ca ā narthakya prāptau taiḥ na vikṛtyapūrva lakṣayitu yukta viprakarṣāt ki tu sva apūrvam eva lakṣayitu yukta sa nikarṣāt

original: ata evo 'tpāvanādīnāṁ prokṣaṇādyapūrvaprayuktānāṁ uktaṁ nāvarame /
analyzed: atas eva u tpāvana ādīnām prokṣaṇa ādya pūrva prayuktānām ukta na avarame

original: ataś ca vidhīyamānasya pṛṣadājyasya vākyapratipannena 'nuyājapūrveṇai 'va kāirakāṅkṣyān na prakaraṇād vikṛtyapūrvārthatvam iti /
analyzed: atas ca vidhīyamānasya pṛṣadājyasya vākya pratipannena nuyāja pūrveṇa na prakaraṇāt vikṛtya pūrva artha tvam iti

original: vayaṁ tv aṅgīkṛtya 'pi vikṛtyarthatvaṁ brūmaḥ /
analyzed: tu aṅgīkṛtya brūmaḥ

original: bhavatu vā vikṛtyarthatvaṁ pṛṣadājyasya /
analyzed: bhavatu vā pṛṣadājyasya

original: tathā 'pi na prakaraṇaṁ viniyojakaṁ bhavati /
analyzed: tathā pi na prakaraṇa viniyojaka bhavati

original: yūpapṛṣṭhabhāvena hi yāvat khādiratvaṁ āyāti / tāvad audumbaratvavidhānād ubhayākāṅkṣāsaṁbhavād yuktaḥ prakaraṇaviniyogaḥ /
analyzed: yūpa pṛṣṭha bhāvena hi yāvat khādira tve āyāti tāvat audumbara tva vidhānāt ubhaya ākāṅkṣā sabhavāt yuktaḥ prakaraṇa viniyogaḥ

original: evaṁ yāvad anuyājapṛṣṭhabhāvena 'jyam āyāti tāvad eva yadi pṛṣadājyaṁ vidhīyate / tado 'bhayākāṅkṣāsaṁbhavāt prakaraṇaviniyogo bhavet /
analyzed: eva yāvat anuyāja pṛṣṭha bhāvena jyam āyāti tāvat eva yadi vidhīyate vidhīyate

original: na tv etad asti /
analyzed: na tu etat asti

original: na hi pṛṣadājyaṁ nāma dravyāntaraṁ kiṁcid asti yad ājyasthānāpannaṁ vidhīyeta / audumbaratvam iva khādiratvastḥānāpannam; pṛṣacchabdasya pṛṣatmanir ityādau citratāvācitvenā dṛṣṭatvāt / pṛṣadājyaśabdasya citrājyavācitvāt /
analyzed: na hi pṛṣadājya nāma dravya antara kicid asti yat ājya sthāna āpanna vidhīyeta audumbara tvam iva pṛṣadājya śabdasya ityādau citra tā vāci tvena ā dṛṣṭa tvāt pṛṣadājya śabdasya citra ājya vāci tvāt

original: ata eva nigameṣv ājyapān ity eva vaktavyaṁ na tu pṛṣadājyapān ity uktam /
analyzed: atas eva nigameṣu ājya pān iti eva na tu pṛṣadājya pān iti uktam

original: na ca yāvat prākṛtam ājyam āyāti tāvad eva citrājyavidhānāt prakaraṇaviniyogaḥ saṁbhavati 'ti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca yāvat prākṛtam ājyam āyāti tāvat eva citra ājya vidhānāt prakaraṇa viniyogaḥ vācyam

original: na hi pṛṣadājyaśabdena citrāguṇaviśiṣṭam ājyaṁ vidhīyate; viśiṣṭe vidhāne gauravāpatteḥ /
analyzed: na hi pṛṣadājya śabdena citrā guṇa viśiṣṭam ājya vidhīyate viśiṣṭe vidhāne gaurava āpatteḥ

original: kiṁ tu prākṛtājyānuvadena citratāguṇamātraṁ vidhīyate / lohitoṣṇīṣā ṛtvijah pracaranti 'tivat /
analyzed: tu prākṛta ājya anuvadena vidhīyate  lohita uṣṇīṣāḥ ṛtvijah pracaranti tivat

original: tad uktaṁ daśamacaturthacaraṇānte /
analyzed: tat daśama caturtha caraṇa ante

original: na vā guṇaśāstratvād iti /
analyzed: na vā guṇa śāstra tvāt iti

original: prākṛtasyai 'vā 'sya citrātāguṇamātravidhānaṁ iti ca śāstradhīpikā /
analyzed: prākṛtasyai vā sya citrātā guṇa mātra vidhāne iti ca śāstra dhīpikā

original: evaṁ ca vikṛtau prākṛtena 'jena kḷptopakāraiś cā 'nuyājair nairākāṅkṣye paścād vidhīyamānasya citratāguṇasyo 'pahomādyapūrvāṅgavan na prakaraṇaṁ viniyojakaṁ saṁbhavati /
analyzed: eva ca vikṛtau prākṛtena jena kḷpta upakāraiḥ ca anuyājaiḥ nairākāṅkṣye paścāt vidhīyamānasya citra tā guṇasya u pahoma ādya pūrva aṅga vat na

original: yadi hi prākṛtasya kasyacid guṇasya sthāne citratā guṇo vidhīyeta / tadā sa guṇo yāvad āyāti tāvad vikṛter nairākāṅkṣyābhāvāc citratāguṇasya ca tāvad eva vidhānād ubhayākāṅkṣāsaṁbhavāt prakaraṇaviniyogo bhavet /
analyzed: yadi hi prākṛtasya kasyacid guṇasya sthāne citra tā guṇaḥ vidhīyeta tadā sa guṇaḥ yāvat āyāti tāvat vikṛteḥ nairākāṅkṣya abhāvāt citra tā guṇasya ca tāvat eva vidhānāt ubhaya ākāṅkṣā sabhavāt prakaraṇa viniyogaḥ bhavet

original: na ca tādṛśaḥ prākṛto guṇo 'sti āyaṇḍakarmatvādikaṁ ca citrāguṇāt prāg eva vidhānāt / tasya tatsthānāpannatvābhāvāt /
analyzed: na ca tādṛśaḥ prākṛtaḥ guṇaḥ sti ca citrā guṇāt prāk eva vidhānāt tasya tad sthāna āpanna tva abhāvāt

original: na cā 'jyapṛṣṭhabhāvena yāvat prākṛtaṁ nirguṇatvam āyāti / tāvad evā 'sya vidhānāt prakaraṇasaṁbhava iti vācyam;
analyzed: na ca ā jyapṛṣṭha bhāvena yāvat prākṛta nirguṇa tvam āyāti tāvat eva sya vidhānāt prakaraṇa sabhavaḥ iti vācyam

original: nirguṇatvasyā 'vihitatvena pāṇikaṇḍūyanavad anaṅgatvād vikṛtes tadākāṅkṣābhāvāt /
analyzed: nirguṇa tvasya a vihita tvena pāṇi kaṇḍūyana vat anaṅga tvāt vikṛteḥ tad ākāṅkṣā bhāvāt

original: tathā hi jyotiṣṭome dakṣiṇādānasamaye vihitakṛṣṇaviṣāṇatyāgasya dvirātrādiṣu codakaprāptasya prathame 'hny ananuṣṭhānam / uttare 'hni dakṣiṇādānapūrvakālinaiḥ padārthaiḥ kṛṣṇaviṣāṇakaṇḍūyanasya śāstravihitatvenā 'pekṣitatvāt /
analyzed: tathā hi jyotiṣṭome dakṣiṇā dāna samaye vihita kṛṣṇaviṣāṇa tyāgasya dvi rātra ādiṣu ca udaka prāptasya prathame hni ananuṣṭhānam uttare hni dakṣiṇā dāna pūrva kālinaiḥ padārthaiḥ kṛṣṇaviṣāṇa kaṇḍūyanasya śāstra vihita tvena a pekṣita tvāt

original: jyotiṣṭome ca dakṣiṇādānottarakālaṁ pāṇikaṇḍūyanaṁ dṛṣṭam api dvirātrādiṣu prathame 'hny anusthīyamānair dakṣiṇādānottarakālinaiḥ padārthair nā 'pekṣyate / tasya prākṛtāv arthasiddhatvena 'śāstryatvād iti /
analyzed: jyotiṣṭome ca dakṣiṇā dāna uttara kāla dṛṣṭam api dvirātra ādiṣu prathame hni anusthīyamānaiḥ dakṣiṇā dāna uttara kālinaiḥ padārthaiḥ na a pekṣyate tasya prākṛtau artha siddha tvena śāstrya tvāt iti

original: evaṁ nirguṇatvasyā 'vihitatvena vikṛtes tadapekṣā nā 'sti 'ti /
analyzed: eva nirguṇa tvasya vihita tvena vikṛteḥ tad apekṣā

original: tasmād ubhayākāṅkṣāyā asaṁbhavāt pṛṣadājyasya na prakaraṇaviniyogaḥ saṁbhavati 'ty alam ativistarena /
analyzed: tasmāt ubhaya ākāṅkṣāyāḥ asabhavāt pṛṣadājyasya na prakaraṇa viniyogaḥ sabhavati alam ati vistarena

original: tat siddhaṁ mahāprakaraṇaṁ prakṛtāv eva viniyojakam /
analyzed: tat siddha mahāprakaraṇa prakṛtau eva viniyojakam

original: vikṛtau tu yat prākṛtadṛṣṭārthāṅgānuvādena vidhīyate / tasya viniyojakam / na tu kevalaṁ vidhīyamānasyā 'pūrvāṅgasye 'ti /
analyzed: vikṛtau tu yat prākṛta dṛṣṭa artha aṅga anuvādena vidhīyate tasya viniyojakam

original: yat tu vikṛtāv api prākṛtadharmānuvādena vidhīyamānayoḥ dharmayoḥ antarāle 'pūrvam apy aṅgaṁ kevalaṁ paṭhyate / tad api prakaraṇena viniyujyate /yady api vikṛteḥ kathaṃbhāvākāṅkṣā prākṛtair evāṅgaiḥ śāmyati / tathā 'pi yatra prākṛtāṅgānuvādena dharmavidhānaṃ tatra tadvidhānaṃ yāvad bhavati tāvat kathaṃbhāvākāṅkṣā na nivartate / ato vikṛter ākāṅkṣāvattvād antaṅgale vihitasya 'py apūrvāṅgasya bhāvyakāṅkṣāsattvād yuktaṃ tasya prakṛtāṅgād vikṛtyarthatvam /
analyzed: yat tu vikṛtau api prākṛta dharma anuvādena vidhīyamānayoḥ dharmayoḥ antarāle pūrvam api aṅga paṭhyate tat api prakaraṇena viniyujyate yadi api vikṛteḥ kathaṃbhāva ākāṅkṣā prākṛtaiḥ eva aṅgaiḥ śāmyati tathā yatra prākṛta aṅga anuvādena dharma vidhānam tatra tad vidhānam yāvat bhavati tāvat kathaṃbhāva ākāṅkṣā na nivartate atas vikṛteḥ ākāṅkṣāvat tvāt antaṅgale vihitasya api apūrva aṅgasya bhāvi akāṅkṣā sattvāt yuktam

original: yathā 'mahomegṣu te hi prākṛtāṅgānuvādena vidhīyamānayor dharmayorantarāle vidhīyanta ity uktaṃ tantraratnādāv ity āstāṃ tāvat /
analyzed: yathā mahā umegṣu te hi prākṛta aṅga anuvādena vidhīyamānayoḥ dharmayoḥ antarāle vidhīyante iti uktam tantraratna ādau iti āstām tāvat

original: phalabhāvanāyā antarāle yad aṅgabhāvanāyāḥ prakaraṇaṃ tad aṅgāntarakaraṇam tac ca 'bhikramaṇādīnāṃ prayājādiṣu viniyojakam /
analyzed: phala bhāvanāyāḥ antarāle yat aṅga bhāvanāyāḥ prakaraṇam tat aṅga antara karaṇam tat ca bhikramaṇa ādīnām prayāja ādiṣu viniyojakam

original: tac ca saṃtānenena jñāyate / tadabhāve 'viśeṣāt sarveṣāṃ phalabhāvanākathaṃbhāvena grahaṇāt /
analyzed: tat ca jñāyate tad abhāve viśeṣāt sarveṣām phala bhāvanā kathaṃbhāvena grahaṇāt

original: saṃdaṃśo nāmai 'kāṅgānuvādena vidhīyamānayor aṅgayor antarāle vihitatvam; yathā 'bhikramaṇam /
analyzed: saṃdaṃśaḥ nāmai ka aṅga anuvādena vidhīyamānayoḥ aṅgayoḥ antarāle vihita tvam yathā bhikramaṇam

original: tad dhi samānayata upabhṛta ityādinā prayājānuvādena kiṃcid aṅgaṃ vidhāya vidhīyate /
analyzed: tat hi samānayataḥ upabhṛtaḥ ityādinā prayāja anuvādena kiṃcid aṅgam vidhāya vidhīyate

original: paścād api prayājānuvādena / yo vai prayājānāṃ mithunaṃ veda ityādinā kiṃcid aṅgaṃ vidhīyate /
analyzed: paścāt api prayāja anuvādena yaḥ vai prayājānām mithunam veda ityādinā kiṃcid aṅgam vidhīyate

original: ataḥ prayājāṅgamadhye paṭhitam abhikramaṇaṃ tadaṅgaṃ bhavati / tatkathaṃbhāvākāṅkṣāyā aśānteḥ /
analyzed: atas prayāja aṅga madhye paṭhitam abhikramaṇam tat aṅgam bhavati tad kathaṃbhāva ākāṅkṣāyāḥ aśānteḥ

original: yathā 'huḥ /
analyzed: yathā huḥ

original: paraprakaraṇasthānām aṅge śrutyādibhis tribhiḥ jñāte punaś ca tair eva saṃtānena tad iṣyate /
analyzed: para prakaraṇa sthānām aṅge śruti ādibhiḥ tribhiḥ jñāte punar ca taiḥ eva saṃtānena tat iṣyate

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: na cāṅgabhāvanāyāḥ kathaṃbhāvākāṅkṣābhāvāt kathaṃ prayājabhāvanākathaṃbhāvena 'bhikramaṇaṃ gṛhyata iti vācyam; bhāvanāsāmyena sarvatra kathaṃbhāvākāṅkṣāyāḥ sattvāt /
analyzed: na ca aṅga bhāvanāyāḥ kathaṃbhāva ākāṅkṣā bhāvāt katham prayāja bhāvanā kathaṃbhāvena bhikramaṇam gṛhyate iti vācyam bhāvanā sāmyena sarvatra kathaṃbhāva ākāṅkṣāyāḥ sattvāt

original: prayājair apūrvaṃ kṛtvā yāgopakāraṃ bhāvayed ity ukte yo nāma na jānāti prayājair apūrvaṃ kartuṃ tasyā 'sty eva kathaṃbhāvākāṅkṣā /
analyzed: prayājaiḥ apūrvam kṛtvā yāga upakāram bhāvayet iti ukte yaḥ nāma na jānāti prayājaiḥ apūrvam kartum tasyāḥ sti eva kathaṃbhāva ākāṅkṣā

original: katham ebhir apūrvaṃ kartavyam iti /
analyzed: katham ebhiḥ apūrvam kartavyam iti

original: sā ca saṃdaṃśapatitair vācanikaiḥ smārtaiś ca 'camanādibhiḥ śāmyati /
analyzed: sā ca saṃdaṃśa patitaiḥ vācanikaiḥ smārtaiḥ ca camana ādibhiḥ śāmyati

original: tadabhāve ca svarūpaniṣpādanena darvihomanyāyena nivartate /
analyzed: tad abhāve ca sva rūpa niṣpādanena darvi homa nyāyena nivartate

original: darvihomeṣu hi svarūpaniṣpādanātiriktas tathāvyāpāro na śrūyate / nā 'py atideśena tatprāptiḥ; yāgjiyānāṁ dharmāṇāṁ tāvan nā 'tideśo yāgatvena homatvena vailakṣaṇyāt; nā 'pi homiyānām / kasya homasya dharmaḥ kasmin home pratyarthaṁ jñāyate 'nupramāṇābhāvāt /
analyzed: darvi homeṣu hi sva rūpa niṣpādana atiriktaḥ tathā vyāpāraḥ na śrūyate na a pi atideśena tad prāptiḥ dharmāṇā tāvat na atideśaḥ yāga tvena homa tvena vailakṣaṇyāt na a pi homiyānām kasya homasya dharmaḥ kasmin home jñāyate nu pramāṇa abhāvāt

original: ato dharmapraptyabhāvād darvihomaih iṣṭaṁ bhāvayet katham ity utpannā 'py ākāṅkṣā svarūpaniṣpādanenai 'va śāmyati /
analyzed: atas dharma prapti abhāvāt darvi homaiḥ bhāvayet katham iti utpannā pi ākāṅkṣā sva rūpa niṣpādanena śāmyati

original: evaṁ yeṣv aṅgeṣu saṁdaṁśādyabhāvas tatro 'tpannā 'py ākāṅkṣā tenai 'va nivartate; na tu sarvathā tadabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: eva yeṣu aṅgeṣu sa daśā ādi abhāvaḥ tatra u tpannā ākāṅkṣā nivartate na tu sarvathā tad abhāvaḥ

original: tasmād yuktam uktam abhikramaṇaṁ prayajāṅgam iti /
analyzed: tasmāt yuktam uktam abhikramaṇa prayaja aṅgam iti

original: tac ce 'dam avāntaraprakaraṇaṁ mahāprakaraṇād balīyaḥ; saṁdaṁśapatitānāṁ dharmāṇāṁ kaimarthyākāṅkṣāyāṁ pradhānapūrvāt prayājādyapūrvasya jhaṭity upasthiter iti /
analyzed: tat ced avāntara prakaraṇa mahā prakaraṇāt balīyaḥ sa daśa patitānā dharmāṇā kaimarthya ākāṅkṣāyā pradhāna pūrvāt prayāja ādya pūrvasya jhaṭiti upasthiteḥ iti

original: prakṛtam anusarāmaḥ /
analyzed: prakṛtam anusarāmaḥ

original: tat siddham ubhayavidhasya prakaraṇasya viniyojaktvam /
analyzed: tat siddham ubhayavidhasya prakaraṇasya viniyojak tvam

original: tad idaṁ sthānādipramāṇād balavat /
analyzed: tat sthāna ādi pramāṇāt balavat

original: yatra hi sthānād aṅgatvam / tatrā 'nyatarasya prakārāntareṇa nirākāṅkṣatvam /
analyzed: yatra hi sthānāt aṅga tvam tatra a nyatarasya prakāra antareṇa nirākāṅkṣa tvam

original: na ca sākāṅkṣaṁ nirākāṅkṣeṇa saṁbaddhuṁ yogyaṁ vinā 'kāṅkṣotthāpanena /
analyzed: na ca sākāṅkṣa nirākāṅkṣeṇa vinā kāṅkṣā utthāpanena

original: ataś cā 'nyatarākāṅkṣayā yāvad ubhayākāṅkṣarūpaprakaraṇakalpanadvārā vākyādi kalpayitum ārabhyate / jhaṭiti tāvat prakaraṇena vākyādikaṁ kalpayitvā viniyogaḥ kriyate iti sthānāt prakaraṇasya balīyastvam /
analyzed: atas ca a nyatara ākāṅkṣayā yāvat ubhaya ākāṅkṣa rūpa prakaraṇa kalpana dvārā vākya ādi kalpayitum ārabhyate jhaṭiti tāvat prakaraṇena kalpayitvā viniyogaḥ kriyate iti sthānāt prakaraṇasya balīyaḥ tvam

original: ata eva videvanādayo dharmiṇo abhiṣecanīyasannidau paṭhitā api nā 'bhiṣecanīyasyā 'ṅgam; teṣāṁ tadaṅgatvaṁ bhavet sthānād bhavet / na tu prakaraṇāt / abhiṣecanīyasyā 'vyaktacodanācoditatvena jyotiṣṭomavikāratvāt prākṛtair eva dharmair nirākāṅkṣatvāt /
analyzed: atas eva videvana ādayaḥ dharmiṇaḥ abhiṣecanīya sannidau paṭhitāḥ api na a bhiṣecanīyasya ṅgam teṣām tad aṅga tva bhavet sthānāt bhavet na tu prakaraṇāt abhiṣecanīyasyāḥ vyakta codanā codita tvena jyotiṣṭoma vikāra tvāt prākṛtaiḥ eva dharmaiḥ nirākāṅkṣa tvāt

original: kiṁ tu prakaraṇād rājasūyāṅgam /
analyzed: kim tu prakaraṇāt rājasūya aṅgam

original: nanu rājā rājasūyena svārājyakāmo yajeta 'ty atra rājasūyaśabdas tāvan nāmadheyatvād ākhyātaparatantro yatrā 'khyātaṁ tatrai 'va pravartate /
analyzed: nanu rājā rājasūyena svārājya kāmaḥ yajeta atra rājasūya śabdaḥ tāvat nāmadheya tvāt ākhyāta paratantraḥ yatra ā khyāta tatra e pravartate

original: na ca darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṁ svargakāmo yajeta ty atra yathā darśapūrṇamāsapadaṁ nāmadheyam api nā 'khyātaparatantram—tatra hi yajete 'ty ākhyātam aviśeṣāt sarvān eva prakṛtān agneyadīn prayājādīṁś cā 'bhidhātuṁ samarthaṁ darśapūrṇamāsapadaṁ tv agneyadīn eva vadati na sarvān / ataś ca na tad ākhyātaparatantram—tathā rājasūyapadam api kiṁ na syād iti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ yajeta ti atra yathā darśa pūrṇamāsa pada nāmadheyam api na ā khyāta paratantram tatra hi yajeta iti ākhyātam aviśeṣāt sarvān eva prakṛtān agneya dīn prayāja ādīḥ ca abhidhātu samartha darśa pūrṇamāsa pada tu agneya dīn eva vadati na sarvān atas ca na tat ākhyāta paratantram tathā rājasūya padam api kim na syāt iti vācyam

original: prasiddhena hi padena 'prasiddhaṁ nirṇīyate /
analyzed: prasiddhena hi padena nirṇīyate

original: yathā 'huḥ /padam ajñātasaṃdigdhaṃ prasiddhair aprthakśruti nirṇīyate nirūḍhaṃ tu na svārthād apanīyate /
analyzed: yathā huḥ padam ajñāta saṃdigdham prasiddhaiḥ aprthakśruti nirṇīyate nirūḍham tu na svārthāt apanīyate

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: darśapūrṇamāsapadaṃ ca kālanimittatvāt /
analyzed: darśa pūrṇamāsa padam ca kāla nimitta tvāt

original: tadvyogaś ca 'gneyādiṣu 'tpattivākyair avagataḥ /
analyzed: tad vyogaḥ ca gneya ādiṣu tpatti vākyaiḥ avagataḥ

original: atas tadvācitvena darśapūrṇamāsapadaṃ prasiddham /
analyzed: atas tad vāci tvena darśa pūrṇamāsa padam prasiddham

original: na ca 'gneyādīnāṃ bahutvād dvivacānāntatvam asyā 'nupapanam iti vācyam;
analyzed: na ca gneya ādīnām bahu tvāt dvivacā na anta tvam asyāḥ anupapanam iti vācyam

original: vidvadvākyadvayasiddhasamudāyadvayābhiprāyeṇa tadupapatte /
analyzed: vidvat vākya dvaya siddha samudāya dvaya abhiprāyeṇa tad upapatte

original: evaṃ ca darśapūrṇamāsapadasya 'gneyādivācitve nirṇīte yajete 'ty ākhyātam api tān eva vadati /
analyzed: evam ca darśa pūrṇamāsa padasya gneya ādi vāci tve nirṇīte yajeta iti ākhyātam api tān eva vadati

original: na hi taduktau svārthatyāgo bhavati /
analyzed: na hi tad uktau sva artha tyāgaḥ bhavati

original: rājasūyapadaṃ tv anirṇītārtham / atas tad ākhyātaparatantram eva /
analyzed: rājasūya padam tu a nirṇīta artham atas tat ākhyāta paratantram eva

original: tac ca 'vīṣṣāt sarveṣv iṣṭipaśusomeṣu vidyate;
analyzed: tat ca vīṣṣāt sarveṣu iṣṭi paśu someṣu vidyate

original: tatparatantratvād rājasūyapadam api tān eva vadati /
analyzed: tad paratantra tvāt rājasūya padam api tān eva vadati

original: na ca rājasūyaśabdasya rājā sūyate yatra 'ti vyutpattyā somābhiṣavanimittatvāt / tasya ca somam abhiṣuṇoti 'ti vākyena somayāge 'vagatatvāt / tadvācivam eva ne 'ṣṭipaśuvācivam iti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca rājasūya śabdasya rājā sūyate yatra ti vyutpattyā soma abhiṣava nimitta tvāt tasya ca somam abhiṣuṇoti ti vākyena soma yāge vagata tvāt tad vācivam eva na iṣṭi paśu vācivam iti vācyam

original: na hy abhiṣecanīyādisomayāgeṣv abhiṣavaḥ pratyakṣeṇa vākyena codito 'sti / tadvākyasya jyotiṣṭome sattvāt /
analyzed: na hi abhiṣecanīya ādi soma yāgeṣu abhiṣavaḥ pratyakṣeṇa vākyena coditaḥ sti tad vākyasya jyotiṣṭome sattvāt

original: atideśāt tatsambandho 'vagata iti cen na; atideśasya phalasambandoharakālinatvena rājasūyena svārājyakāmo yajeta 'ty etadvākyārthāvagatatvottarakālinatvāt; anena hi vākyena phalasambandhe bodhite paścāt kathaṃbhāvākāṅkṣāyām atideśakalpanāt /
analyzed: atideśāt tad sambandhaḥ vagataḥ iti ced na atideśasya rājasūyena svārājya kāmaḥ yajeta etad vākya artha avagata tva uttara kālina tvāt anena hi vākyena phala sambandhe bodhite paścāt kathaṃbhāva ākāṅkṣāyām atideśa kalpanāt

original: atas tataḥ prāg evai 'tadvākyārtho varaṇīyaḥ; tadā cā 'bhiṣavasya 'navagatatvād rājasūyapadam aprasiddhārtham eva /
analyzed: atas tatas prāk evai tad vākya arthaḥ varaṇīyaḥ tadā ca ā bhiṣavasya nava gata tvāt rājasūya padam aprasiddha artham eva

original: ata eva rājasūyapadam avyutpannam aśvakarmaśabdavad ity uktaṃ sāmpradāyikaiḥ /
analyzed: atas eva rājasūya padam avyutpannam aśva karma śabda vat iti uktam sāmpradāyikaiḥ

original: evaṃ cā 'prasiddhārthatvena 'khyātaparatantratvād rājasūyapadene 'ṣṭipaśusomayāgā ucyante /
analyzed: evam ca ā prasiddha artha tvena khyāta paratantra tvāt rājasūya padena iṣṭi paśu soma yāgāḥ ucyante

original: te ca tais taiḥ prakṛtair dharmair nirākāṅkṣā iti na prakaraṇaṃ videvanādīnāṃ rājasūye viniyojakam / ubhayākāṅkṣāyā abhāvāt /
analyzed: te ca taiḥ taiḥ prakṛtaiḥ dharmaiḥ nirākāṅkṣāḥ iti na prakaraṇam videvanā ādīnām rājasūye viniyojakam ubhaya ākāṅkṣāyāḥ abhāvāt

original: na ca prātiṣvikarupaṇ nairākāṅkṣye 'pi na rājasūyatvena rūpeṇa nairākāṅkṣyam iti vācyam; ākāṅkṣādvaye pramāṇābhāvāt /
analyzed: na ca nairākāṅkṣye na rājasūya tvena rūpeṇa nairākāṅkṣyam iti vācyam ākāṅkṣā dvaye pramāṇa abhāvāt

original: kiṃ ca prātiṣvikarūpair yā kathaṃbhāvākāṅkṣā sā 'pi phalasambandottarakālam /
analyzed: kim ca prātiṣvika rūpaiḥ yā kathaṃbhāva ākāṅkṣā sā pi phala sambanda uttara kālam

original: sa ca rājasūyatvena na tu prātisvikarūpaiḥ /
analyzed: sa ca rājasūya tvena na tu prātisvika rūpaiḥ

original: rājasūyatvena ca phalasaṃbandha utpannāyāḥ kathaṃbhāvākāṅkṣāyā videvanādibhiḥ śānter atideśakalpanam eva na syāt /
analyzed: rājasūya tvena ca phala saṃbandhe utpannāyāḥ kathaṃbhāva ākāṅkṣāyāḥ videvana ādibhiḥ śānteḥ atideśa kalpanam eva na syāt

original: yadi hi sāmānyarūpeṇa prātisvikārūpeṇa ca phalasaṃbandhavidhāyi vākyadvayaṃ bhavet / tadā yujyeta 'py ākāṅkṣādvayānusāreṇa videvanādīnāṃ ātideśikānāṃ cā 'ṅgānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: yadi hi sāmānya rūpeṇa prātisvika arūpeṇa ca phala saṃbandha vidhāyi vākya dvayam bhavet tadā yujyeta ākāṅkṣā dvaya anusāreṇa videvanā ādīnām ātideśikānām ca ṅgānām saṃbandhaḥ

original: na tu tad asti /
analyzed: na tu tat asti

original: tasmāt prākṛtair dharmair nairākāṅkṣyān na videvanādīnāṃ prakaraṇaṃ viniyojakam iti cet—
analyzed: tasmāt prākṛtaiḥ dharmaiḥ nairākāṅkṣyāt na videvanā ādīnām prakaraṇam viniyojakam iti ced

original: satyam /
analyzed: satyam

original: ata eva sāṃpradāyikair videvanādīnāṃ saṃdarśo darśitaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva sāṃpradāyikaiḥ videvana ādīnām saṃdarśaḥ darśitaḥ

original: rājasūyatvapuraskāreṇa ye dharmā vidhīyante / rājasūyāya hy enā utpunāti 'ty evamādayas tanmadhye videvanādayaḥ paṭhyante /
analyzed: rājasūya tva puraskāreṇa ye dharmāḥ vidhīyante rājasūyāya hi enāḥ utpunāti evamādayaḥ tad madhye videvana ādayaḥ paṭhyante

original: atas te sarve rājasūyāṅgam / prayājānuyājadena vidhīyamānadharmmamadhye paṭhitaprayājāṅgābhikramaṇavat /
analyzed: atas te sarve rājasūya aṅgam prayāja anuyāja dena vidhīyamāna dharmma madhye paṭhita prayāja aṅga abhikramaṇa vat

original: tasmād yuktam uktaṃ videvanādīnāṃ prakaraṇād rājasūyāṅgatvam iti /
analyzed: tasmāt yuktam uktam videvana ādīnām prakaraṇāt rājasūya aṅga tvam iti

original: tat siddhaṃ prakaraṇasya sthānād balīyastvam iti /
analyzed: tat siddham prakaraṇasya sthānāt balīyaḥ tvam iti

original: deśasāmānyaṃ sthānam /
analyzed: deśa sāmānyam sthānam

original: tac ca dvividham /
analyzed: tat ca dvividham

original: pāṭhasādeśyaṃ anuṣṭhānasādeśyaṃ ce 'ti /
analyzed: pāṭha sādeśyam anuṣṭhāna sādeśyam ca iti

original: yathā 'huḥ /
analyzed: yathā huḥ

original: tatra kramo dvidhai 've 'ṣṭo deśasāmānyalakṣaṇaḥ pāṭhānuṣṭhānasādeśyād viniyogasya kāraṇam /
analyzed: tatra kramaḥ deśa sāmānya lakṣaṇaḥ pāṭha anuṣṭhāna sādeśyāt viniyogasya kāraṇam

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: sthānaṃ kramaś ca 'ty anarthāntaram /
analyzed: sthānam kramaḥ ca ti anartha antaram

original: pāṭhasādeśyam advividham /
analyzed: pāṭha sādeśyam a dvividham

original: yathāsaṃkhyapāṭhaḥ / saṃnidhipāṭhaś ce 'ti /
analyzed: yathāsaṃkhya pāṭhaḥ saṃnidhi pāṭhaḥ ca iti

original: tatrā 'ndrāgnaṃ ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet / vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet ity evaṃ kramavihitaṣv indrāgni rocanā diva ityādīnāṃ yājyānuvākyāmantrāṇāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ prathamasya prathamaṃ dvitīyasya dvitīyam ity evaṃ yo viniyogaḥ sa yathāsaṃkhyapāṭhāt; prathamapaṭhitamantrasya hi kaimarthyākāṅkṣāyāṃ prathamato vihitaṃ karmai 'va prathamam upatiṣṭhate samānadeśatvāt /yāni tu vaikṛtāny aṅgāni prākṛtāṅgānanuvādena vihitāni saṃdaṃśapatitāni teṣāṃ vikṛtyarthatvaṃ saṃnidhipāṭhāt /
analyzed: tatra andrāgnam ekādaśa kapālam nirvapet vaiśvānaram dvādaśa kapālam nirvapet iti evam krama vihita indra agni rocanā divaḥ ityādīnām yājyā anuvākyā mantrāṇām yathāsaṃkhyam prathamasya prathamam dvitīyasya dvitīyam iti evam yaḥ viniyogaḥ sa yathāsaṃkhya pāṭhāt prathama paṭhita mantrasya hi kaimarthya ākāṅkṣāyām prathamatas vihitam karma prathamam upatiṣṭhate samāna deśa tvāt yāni tu vaikṛtāni aṅgāni prākṛta aṅga ananuvādena vidhāya vidh

original: teṣāṃ hi kaimarthyākāṅkṣāyāṃ phalavadvikṛtyapūrvam hi eva bhāvyatvena saṃbadhyate / upasthitatvāt /
analyzed: teṣām hi kaimarthya ākāṅkṣāyām phalavat vikṛtya pūrvam hi eva bhāvya tvena saṃbadhyate upasthita tvāt

original: ata eva teṣāṃ na viśvajinnyāyāvatāraḥ; svatantraphalārthatve vikṛtisaṃnidhipāṭhānarthakyyapatteś ca /
analyzed: atas eva teṣām na viśvajit nyāya avatāraḥ svatantra phala arthatve vikṛti saṃnidhi pāṭha ānarthakyya patteḥ ca

original: paśudharmāṇām agniṣomīyārthatvam anuṣṭhānasādeśyāt /
analyzed: paśu dharmāṇām agniṣomīya artha tvam anuṣṭhāna sādeśyāt

original: aupavasathye 'hny agniṣomīyaḥ paśur anuṣṭhīyate / tasminn eva dine te dharmāḥ paṭhyante /
analyzed: aupavasathye hni agniṣomīyaḥ paśuḥ anuṣṭhīyate tasmin eva dine te dharmāḥ paṭhyante

original: atas teṣāṃ kaimarthyākāṅkṣāyām anuṣṭheyatveno 'pasthitaṃ paśvapūrvam eva bhāvyatvena saṃbadhyate /
analyzed: atas teṣām kaimarthya ākāṅkṣāyām anuṣṭheya tvena u pasthitam paśu apūrvam eva bhāvya tvena saṃbadhyate

original: ato yuktam anuṣṭhānasādeśyāt tadarthatvaṃ teṣām /
analyzed: atas yuktam anuṣṭhāna sādeśyāt tad artha tvam teṣām

original: na ca pāṭhasādeśyād eva tat kiṃ na syād iti vācyam; agniṣomīyasya paśoḥ krayasaṃnidhau pāṭhāt /
analyzed: na ca pāṭha sādeśyāt eva tat kim na syāt iti vācyam agniṣomīyasya paśoḥ kraya saṃnidhau pāṭhāt

original: na ca krayasaṃnidhau tasya pāṭhe tadanuṣṭhānam api tatra syād iti vācyam; sa eṣa dvidaivatyaḥ paśur aupavasathye 'hany ālabdhavya iti vacanāt tadanupapatteḥ /
analyzed: na ca kraya saṃnidhau tasya pāṭhe tad anuṣṭhānam api tatra syāt iti vācyam saḥ eṣa dvi daivatyaḥ paśuḥ aupavasathye hani ālabdhavyaḥ iti vacanāt tad anupapatteḥ

original: na ca sthānāt prakaraṇasya balīyastvena paśudharmāṇāṃ jyotiṣṭomārthatvam eva kiṃ na syād iti vācyam; tasya somayāgatvena paśudharmāgrahaṇe 'yogyatvāt /
analyzed: na ca sthānāt prakaraṇasya balīyaḥ tvena paśu dharmāṇām jyotiṣṭoma artha tvam eva kim na syāt iti vācyam tasya soma yāga tvena paśu dharma agrahaṇe yogya tvāt

original: ata ānarthakyyapratīhatānāṃ vipārītaṃ balābalam iti nyāyāt sthānāt paśuyāgārthatvam eva dharmāṇāṃ yuktam /
analyzed: atas ānarthakyya pratīhatānām vipārītam balābalam iti nyāyāt sthānāt paśu yāga artha tvam eva dharmāṇām yuktam

original: na ca teṣāṃ tadarthatvaṃ prakaraṇād eva kiṃ na syād iti vācyam; agniṣomīyakathaṃbhāvākāṅkṣāyāḥ kḷptopakāraiḥ prākṛtadharmair evo 'paśāntatvāt /
analyzed: na ca teṣām tad artha tvam prakaraṇāt eva kim na syāt iti vācyam agniṣomīya kathaṃbhāva ākāṅkṣāyāḥ kḷpta upakāraiḥ prākṛta dharmaiḥ evā upaśānta tvāt

original: sa hi sāmnāyyayāgaprakṛtikaḥ / ubhayoḥ paśuprabhavadravyatvasāmānyāt /
analyzed: sa hi sāmnāyya yāga prakṛtikaḥ ubhayoḥ paśu prabhava dravya tva sāmānyāt

original: tad uktam /
analyzed: tat uktam

original: sāmnāyyaṃ vā tatprabhavattvād iti /
analyzed: sāmnāyyam vā tad prabhavat tvāt iti

original: sāmnāyyaṃ dadhipayasī /
analyzed: sāmnāyyam dadhi payasī

original: tatra paśuyāgaḥ pāyoyāgaprakṛtikaḥ sākṣāt paśuprabhavatvāt /
analyzed: tatra paśu yāgaḥ pāyaḥ yāga prakṛtikaḥ sākṣāt paśu prabhava tvāt

original: ataś codakaprāptais taddharmair nirākāṅkṣatvān na paśuyāge dharmāṇāṃ prakaraṇaṃ viniyojakaṃ kiṃ tu sthānam eva /
analyzed: atas ca udaka prāptaiḥ tad dharmaiḥ nirākāṅkṣa tvāt na paśu yāge dharmāṇām prakaraṇam viniyojakam kim tu sthānam eva

original: tad evaṃ nirūpitaḥ saṃbandhaḥ sthānaviniyogaḥ /
analyzed: tat evam nirūpitaḥ saṃbandhaḥ sthāna viniyogaḥ

original: tac ca samākhyātaḥ prabalam /
analyzed: tat ca samākhyātaḥ prabalam

original: sthānaviniyoge hi padārthayoḥ deśasāmānyalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ pratyakṣaḥ /samākhyāviniyoge tu saṃbandho na pratyakṣaḥ / padārthayoḥ bhinnadeśatvāt /
analyzed: sthāna viniyoge hi padārthayoḥ deśa sāmānya lakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ pratyakṣaḥ samākhyā viniyoge tu saṃbandhaḥ na pratyakṣaḥ padārthayoḥ bhinna deśa tvāt

original: na ca sā saṃbandhavācikā; yaugikānāṃ śabdānāṃ dravyavācakatvena saṃbandhāvācakatvāt /
analyzed: na ca sā saṃbandha vācikā yaugikānām śabdānām dravya vācaka tvena saṃbandha a vācaka tvāt

original: tathā hi /
analyzed: tathā hi

original: samākhyā saṃbandhasamānavācikā syāt / tadviśeṣavācikā vā nā 'dyaḥ / taduktau prayojanābhāvāt / sarvayaugikasabdānāṃ paryāyatāpatteś ca /
analyzed: samākhyā saṃbandha samāna vācikā syāt tad viśeṣa vācikā vā nā dyaḥ tad uktau prayojana abhāvāt sarva yaugika sabdānām paryāya tā āpatteḥ ca

original: dvitīye 'vaśyaṃ saṃbandhinau vācyau / tadantareṇa saṃbandhe viśeṣābhāvāt / tatpratipattiṃ antareṇa tadapratipatteś ca /
analyzed: dvitīye vaśyam saṃbandhinau vācyau tad antareṇa saṃbandhe viśeṣa abhāvāt tad pratipattim antareṇa tad apratipatteḥ ca

original: ataś ca 'vaśyaṃ saṃbandhivācakatvaṃ samākhyāyā vaktavyam /
analyzed: atas ca vaśyam saṃbandhi vācaka tvam samākhyāyāḥ vaktavyam

original: tathā ca na saṃbandhavācakatvaṃ saṃbandhipratipattyai 'va vākyārthapratipatinyāyena tatpratipattisaṃbhave tatra śaktikalpane gauravāt /
analyzed: tathā ca na saṃbandha vācaka tvam saṃbandhi pratipattyai vākya artha pratipati nyāyena tad pratipatti saṃbhave tatra śakti kalpane gauravāt

original: yathā 'huḥ /
analyzed: yathā huḥ

original: sarvatra yaugikaiḥ śabdair dravyam evā 'bhidhīyate na hi saṃbandhavācitvaṃ saṃbhavaty atigauravāt /
analyzed: sarvatra yaugikaiḥ śabdaiḥ dravyam eva abhidhīyate na hi saṃbandha vāci tvam saṃbhavati ati gauravāt

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: tathā /
analyzed: tathā

original: pākaṃ tu pacir evā 'ha kartāraṃ pratyayo 'py akaḥ pākayuktaḥ punaḥ kartā vācyo nai 'kasya kasyacit /
analyzed: pākam tu paciḥ evā ha kartāram pratyayaḥ pi akaḥ pāka yuktaḥ punar kartā vācyaḥ kasya kasyacid

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: tathā ca samākhyā na saṃbandhavācikā /
analyzed: tathā ca samākhyā na saṃbandha vācikā

original: hotṛcamasā ityādikā tu vaidikī samākhyā niṣādasthapatisabdavan na ṣaṣṭhyarthasaṃbandhavācikā; nā 'pi vākyavat tadbodhikā / tasyāḥ padatvena 'pramāṇatvāt /
analyzed: hotṛ camasāḥ ityādikā tu vaidikī samākhyā niṣāda sthapati sabda vat na ṣaṣṭhī artha saṃbandha vācikā na a pi vākya vat tad bodhikā tasyāḥ pada tvena pramāṇa tvāt

original: pauroḍāśikam ityādisamākhyās tv atidubalāḥ; laukikatvena pauruṣapratyayāpekṣatvāt / kāṇḍagocaratvena tattatpadārthāgocaratvāc ca /
analyzed: pauroḍāśikam ityādi samākhyāḥ tu ati dubalāḥ laukika tvena pauruṣa pratyaya apekṣa tvāt kāṇḍa gocara tvena tad tad padārtha agocara tvāt ca

original: kāṇḍavācakatvam api na kāṇḍatvena kiṃ tu pauroḍāśikatvādinai 'va /
analyzed: kāṇḍa vācaka tvam api na kāṇḍa tvena kim tu

original: na hy ekahāyanīśabdo dravyavācako 'pi gotvena tad vadati / kiṃ tarhy ekahāyanītvenai 'va /
analyzed: na hi eka hāyanī śabdaḥ dravya vācakaḥ go tvena tat vadati kim tarhi

original: sthānaviniyoge tu padārthayoḥ viśeṣapuraskāreṇai 'va saṃbandhaḥ pratyakṣapramāṇapratipaṇṇaḥ /
analyzed: sthāna viniyoge tu padārthayoḥ viśeṣa puraskāreṇa saṃbandhaḥ pratyakṣa pramāṇa pratipaṇṇaḥ

original: ataś ca samākhyām upalabhya nūnaṃ anayoḥ padārthayoḥ saṃbandho 'sti 'ti yāvat kalpyate / tāvat pratyakṣapratipannena saṃbandhena parasparam ākāṅkṣā / tadabhāve ca saṃbandhānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: atas ca samākhyām upalabhya nūnam anayoḥ padārthayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ asti yāvat kalpyate tāvat pratyakṣa pratipannena saṃbandhena parasparam ākāṅkṣā tad abhāve ca saṃbandha anupapatteḥ

original: kalpitasaṃbandhena ca yāvad itaratrākāṅkṣādikalpanā tāvad anyatrākāṅkṣayā vākyādikalpanayā viniyogaḥ kriyata iti siddhaṁ sthānasya samākhyātaḥ prābalyam /
analyzed: kalpita saṃbandhena ca yāvat itaratra ākāṅkṣā ādi kalpanā tāvat anyatra ākāṅkṣayā vākya ādi kalpanayā viniyogaḥ kriyate iti siddha sthānasya samākhyātaḥ prābalyam

original: ata eva śundhanamantreḥ sāmāyyapātrānāṁ pāthasādeśyān na tu paurodāśikāsamākhyayā puroḍāśapātrāṇām iti /
analyzed: atas eva śundhana mantreḥ sāmāyya pātrāṇām pāthasādeśyāt na tu paurodāśikā samākhyayā puroḍāśa pātrāṇām iti

original: samākhyā yaugikaḥ śabdaḥ /
analyzed: samākhyā yaugikaḥ śabdaḥ

original: sā ca dvividhā / vaidikī laukikī ce 'ti /
analyzed: sā ca dvividhā vaidikī laukikī ca iti

original: tatra hotuś camasabhakṣaṇāṅgatvaṁ hotṛcamasa iti vaidikiyā samākhyayā /
analyzed: tatra hotuḥ camasa bhakṣaṇa aṅga tva hotṛ camasaḥ iti vaidikiyā samākhyayā

original: adhvaryos tattatpadārthāṅgatvaṁ laukikyā 'dhvaryavam iti samākhyaye 'ti saṁkṣepaḥ /
analyzed: adhvaryoḥ laukikyāḥ ādhvaryavam iti samākhyaye sakṣepaḥ

original: tad evaṁ nirūpitāni saṁkṣepataḥ śrutyādīni ṣaṭ pramāṇāni /
analyzed: tat eva nirūpitāni sakṣepataḥ śruti ādīni ṣaḍ pramāṇāni

original: etatsahakṛtena viniyogavidhinā samidādibhir upakṛtya darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṁ yajete 'ty evaṁrūpeṇa yāni viniyujyante tāny aṅgāni /
analyzed: etad sahakṛtena viniyoga vidhinā samidh ādibhiḥ upakṛtya darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta iti eva rūpeṇa yāni viniyujyante tāni aṅgāni

original: tāni dvividhāni / siddharūpāṇi kriyārūpāṇi ce 'ti /
analyzed: tāni dvividhāni siddha rūpāṇi kriyā rūpāṇi ca iti

original: tatra siddharūpāṇi jātidravyasaṁkhyādīni /
analyzed: tatra siddha rūpāṇi jāti dravya sakhī ādīni

original: tāni ca dṛṣṭārthāny eva /
analyzed: tāni ca dṛṣṭa arthāni eva

original: kriyārūpāṇi ca dvividhāni /
analyzed: kriyā rūpāṇi ca dvividhāni

original: guṇakarmāṇi pradhānakarmāṇi ce 'ti /
analyzed: guṇa karmāṇi pradhāna karmāṇi ca ti

original: etāny eva saṁnipatyopakārakāṇy ārādupakārakāṇī 'ti co 'cyante /
analyzed: etāni eva sanipatya upakārakāṇi ārāt upakārakāṇi ti ca u cyante

original: tatra karmāṅgadravyādyuddeśena vidhīyamānaṁ karma saṁnipatyopakārakam; yathā 'vaghātaprokṣaṇādi /
analyzed: tatra karma aṅga dravya ādi uddeśena vidhīyamāna karma sanipatya upakārakam yathā vaghāta prokṣaṇa ādi

original: tac ca dṛṣṭārtham adṛṣṭārthaṁ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthaṁ ca /
analyzed: tat ca dṛṣṭa artham adṛṣṭa artha dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa artha ca

original: dṛṣṭārtham avaghātādi; adṛṣṭārthaṁ prokṣaṇādi; dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthaṁ paśupuroḍāśayāgādi /
analyzed: dṛṣṭa artham avaghāta ādi adṛṣṭa artha prokṣaṇa ādi dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa artha paśupuroḍāśa yāga ādi

original: tad dhi dravyatyāgadeśena 'dṛṣṭaṁ devatoddeśena ca devatāsmaraṇaṁ dṛṣṭaṁ karoti /
analyzed: tat hi dravya tyāga deśena dṛṣṭa devatā uddeśena ca devatā smaraṇa dṛṣṭa karoti

original: idam eva cā 'śraya karma 'ty ucyate /
analyzed: idam eva ca ā śraya karma ti ucyate

original: tac ca saṁnipatyopakārakaṁ dvividham /
analyzed: tat ca dvividham

original: upayokṣyamāṇārtham upayuktārthaṁ ce 'ti /
analyzed: upayokṣyamāṇa artham upayukta artha ca iti

original: tatrā 'vaghātaprokṣaṇādy upayokṣyamāṇārtham / vrīhīṇāṁ yāga upayokṣyamāṇatvāt /
analyzed: tatra ā vaghāta prokṣaṇa ādi upayokṣyamāṇa artham vrīhīṇām yāgaḥ upayokṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: pratipattikarmā 'ḍābhakṣaṇādy upayuktapuroḍāśādisaṁskārakam /
analyzed: pratipatti karmā ḍā bhakṣaṇa ādi upayukta puroḍāśa ādi saskārakam

original: upayuktasyā 'kīrṇakaratānivarttakaṁ karma pratipattikarmā /upayuktasaṃskārārthaṃ co 'payokṣyamāṇasaṃskārārthād durbalam; upayuktāpekṣayo 'payokṣyamāṇe 'tyādarāt /
analyzed: karma pratipatti karmā upayukta saṃskāra artham upayukta apekṣayā upayokṣyamāṇe

original: ata eva prāyaṇīyasya udayanīyam anuprayogapatti 'tv atra niṣkāsasya prakṛtatvam / na tu tasya tadararthatvam / niṣkāsasyo 'payuktatvād ity uktam ekadeśe /
analyzed: atas eva prāyaṇīyasya udayanīyam tu atra niṣkāsasya prakṛta tvam na tu tasya niṣkāsasya u payukta tvāt iti uktam ekadeśe

original: tac ca saṃnipatyopakārakam ārādupakārakād balīyaḥ /
analyzed: tat ca saṃnipatya upakārakam ārāt upakārakāt balīyaḥ

original: nanv avaghatādi bhavatu balīyaḥ / tasya dṛṣṭārthatvāt / ārādupakārakasya cā 'dṛṣṭārthatvāt / dṛṣṭe sambhavaty adṛṣṭasyā 'nyāyyatvāt /
analyzed: nanu avagha tā ādi bhavatu balīyaḥ tasya dṛṣṭārtha tvāt ārāt upakārakasya ca ā dṛṣṭārtha tvāt dṛṣṭe sambhavati adṛṣṭasya nyāyya tvāt

original: prokṣaṇādi saṃnipatyopakārakaṃ tu kathaṃ balīyaḥ / ubhayor adṛṣṭārthatvāviśeṣāt /
analyzed: prokṣaṇa ādi saṃnipatya upakārakam tu katham balīyaḥ ubhayoḥ adṛṣṭa artha tva aviśeṣāt

original: kiṃ cā 'rādupakārakaṃ sākṣāt pradhānaṅgaṃ tasyā 'nyodeśena 'vidhānāt /
analyzed: kim sākṣāt pradhān aṅgam tasyāḥ vidhānāt

original: saṃnipatyopakārakaṃ tv aṅgāṅgatvam / karmāṅgavrīhyādyuddeśena vidhānāt /
analyzed: saṃnipatya upakārakam tu aṅga aṅga tvam karma aṅga vrīhi ādi uddeśena vidhānāt

original: aṅgāṅgāpekṣayā ca sākṣādaṅgaṃ balīyaḥ / aṅgagupavirodhe ca tādarthyād iti nyāyāt /
analyzed: aṅga aṅga apekṣayā ca sākṣāt aṅgam balīyaḥ ca tādarthyāt iti nyāyāt

original: ata eva ya iṣṭvā paśunā somena yajeta so 'māvāsyāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ vā yajeta 'ty aviśeṣavidhāne 'pi parvāṇugrahaḥ somayāgasyai 'va kriyate na tu dīkṣaṇīyādeḥ /
analyzed: atas eva yaḥ iṣṭvā paśunā somena yajeta saḥ māvāsyāyām paurṇamāsyām vā yajeta a viśeṣa vidhāne pi parva aṇugrahaḥ kriyate na tu dīkṣaṇīya ādeḥ

original: ataḥ kathaṃ saṃnipatyopakārakasya balīyastvam /
analyzed: atas katham saṃnipatya upakārakasya balīyaḥ tvam

original: ucyate /
analyzed: ucyate

original: saty apy adṛṣṭārthatvāviśeṣe saṃnipatyopakārakam ārādupakārakād balīyaḥ /
analyzed: sati api adṛṣṭa artha tva aviśeṣe saṃnipatya upakārakam ārāt upakārakāt balīyaḥ

original: saṃnipatyopakārake hi karmany upakāryopakārakayor vrīhiprokṣaṇayoḥ saṃnidhiḥ vākyaikaḥ / upakāramātraṃ tu kalpyam /
analyzed: saṃnipatya upakārake hi karmani upakārya upakārakayoḥ vrīhi prokṣaṇayoḥ saṃnidhiḥ vākya ekaḥ upakāra mātram tu kalpyam

original: ārādupakārabandhusthale tu darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ prayājānuyājayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpya upakāro 'pi /
analyzed: ārāt upakāra bandhu sthale tu darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ prayāja anuyājayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpyaḥ

original: kiṃ ca /
analyzed: kim ca

original: ārādupakārakasthale hi prakaraṇaṃ viniyojakam / itaratra tu vrīhiṃ prokṣatī 'ti vākyam eva vrīhipadena 'pūrvasādhanalakṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā kratau viniyojakam iti balīyastvam /
analyzed: ārāt upakāraka sthale hi prakaraṇam viniyojakam itaratra tu vrīhim prokṣati iti vākyam eva vrīhi padena pūrva sādhana lakṣaṇam kṛtvā kratau viniyojakam iti balīyaḥ tvam

original: yad uktam /
analyzed: yat uktam

original: aṅgaguṇavirodhe ca tādarthyād iti nyāyena durbalatvaṃ iti / tad asat /
analyzed: aṅga guṇa virodhe ca tādarthyāt iti nyāyena durbala tvam iti tat asat

original: na hi vrīhyādyuddeśena vidhīyamānāṁ prokṣaṇādi tadarthaṁ bhavati / tatsvarūpa ānarthākyāt / kiṁ tu tatsaṁskāradvārā kratvartham eva / saṁnipatyopakārakāṇām apatyaparyayaprayuktatvasyaca yakṣyamāṇatvāt /
analyzed: na hi vrīhi ādi uddeśena vidhīyamānā prokṣaṇa ādi tad artha bhavati tad svarūpe ānarthākyāt  ki tu tad saskāra dvārā kratu artham eva sanipatya upakārakāṇām apatya paryaya prayukta tvasya ca yakṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: ata ubhayavidham apy aṅgajātaṁ kratvartham eve 'ti nā 'ṅgaguṇavirodhanīyāvatāraḥ /
analyzed: atas ubhayavidham api aṅga jāta kratu artham eva iti na aṅga guṇa virodhanīya avatāraḥ

original: dīkṣaṇīyādeḥ parvānugrahas tu dīkṣaṇīyādyartha eva / tasya tadapūrvaprayuktatvāt /
analyzed: dīkṣaṇīya ādeḥ parva anugrahaḥ tu dīkṣaṇīya ādi arthaḥ eva tasya tad apūrva prayukta tvāt

original: ato yuktaṁ sākṣātpradhānāṅgena pradhānaparvānugraheṇa sa bādhyata iti /
analyzed: atas yukta sākṣāt pradhāna aṅgena pradhāna parva anugraheṇa sa bādhyate iti

original: tat siddhaṁ saṁnipatyopakārakasya 'rāḍupakārakād balīyastvam /
analyzed: tat siddha sanipatya upakārakasya rāj upakārakāt balīyaḥ tvam

original: ata eva sthāṇau sthāṇvāhutiṁ juhoti 'ti vihitā sthāṇvāhutir yūpavrascananasthāṇudvārā yūpasaṁskārārthā / devadattadhārītāyāḥ srajaḥ śucideśanidhānam iva devadattasaṁskārārthaṁ; na tu sthāṇvāhutir āsīdupakārike 'ty uktaṁ daśame /
analyzed: atas eva sthāṇau sthāṇu āhuti juhoti ti vihitā sthāṇu āhutiḥ yūpa vrascanana sthāṇu dvārā yūpa saskāra arthā devadatta dhārītāyāḥ srajaḥ śuci deśa nidhānam iva devadatta saskāra artha na tu sthāṇu āhutiḥ āsīt upakārikā ti ukta daśame

original: dravyādy anuddisya kevalaṁ vidhīyamānaṁ karmā 'rāḍupakārakam /
analyzed: dravya ādi an uddisya vidhīyamāna karmā

original: yathā prayajādi /
analyzed: yathā prayaja ādi

original: tad evaṁ nirūpitaṁ dvividham apy aṅgajātam /
analyzed: tat dvividham api aṅga jātam

original: tac ca na yāgādiṣvarūpaprayuktam / svarūpa ānarthakyāt / tadantareṇa 'pi tatsiddheḥ; kiṁ tv apūrvaprayuktam eva /
analyzed: tat ca na yāga ādi svarūpa prayuktam svarūpe ānarthakyāt tad antareṇa tad siddheḥ ki tu apūrva prayuktam eva

original: na hi tadantareṇa pūrvaṁ bhavatī 'ty atra kiṁcit pramāṇam asti / tasyā 'dṛṣṭatvāt /
analyzed: na hi tad antareṇa pūrva bhavati iti atra kicid pramāṇam asti tasyāḥ dṛṣṭa tvāt

original: na cai 'vaṁ prādhānyād adṛṣṭatvāc ca phalaprayuktam eva kiṁ na syād iti vācyam; phalābhāvanāyāṁ yāgasyai 'va karaṇatvād aṅgānāṁ ca karaṇānugrahakatvāt / tadarthatve buddhe / tatra cā 'narthakyaprasaktau tena svāpūrvam evo 'pasthāpyate saṁnikarṣāt / dīkṣaṇīyādiśabdena 'va tadapūrvam; na tu phalam upasthāpyate viprakarṣāt /
analyzed: na prādhānyāt adṛṣṭa tvāt ca phala prayuktam eva ki na syāt iti vācyam phala abhāvanāyāḥ karaṇa tvāt aṅgānā ca karaṇa anugrahaka tvāt tad artha tve buddhe tatra ca ā narthakya prasaktau tena sva apūrvam eva u pasthāpyate sanikarṣāt dīkṣaṇīya ādi śabdena tat apūrvam na tu phalam upasthāpyate viprakarṣāt

original: ato na tatprayuktatvam aṅgānām /
analyzed: atas na tad prayukta tvam aṅgānām

original: ata evā 'gamma suvaḥ suvar agamme 'ti mantro vikṛtāv ūhitavya ity uktaṁ navame phaladavatayoś ce 'ty atra /
analyzed: atas eva gamma suvar suvar agamma iti mantraḥ vikṛtau ūhitavyaḥ iti ukta navame phala davatayoḥ ca iti atra

original: phalaprayuktatve tu sauryadivikṛtiṣu svargārūpaphalābhāvān mantro na pravarteta / natarāṁ co 'hitavyaḥ syād iti /
analyzed: phala prayukta tve tu saurya divikṛtiṣu mantraḥ na pravarteta natarā caḥ hitavyaḥ syāt iti

original: tat siddham aṅgānām anyaprayuktatvānupapatteḥ apūrvaprayuktatvam /
analyzed: tat siddham aṅgānām anya prayukta tva anupapatteḥ apūrva prayukta tvam

original: tatrā 'pi saṁnipatyopakārakāṇāṁ dravyadavatādiṣamskāradvārā yāgasvarūpa upayogād utpattyapūrvārthatvam /
analyzed: tatra api sa nipatya upakārakāṇā dravya dava tā ādi samskāra dvārā yāga svarūpe upayogāt utpatti apūrva artha tvam

original: ata evau 'ṣadhadharmāvaghātādīnām ājye na pravṛttiḥ / teṣām upayogoprayuktātvāt / ājyasya ca tadarthātvābhāvād ity uktaṃ tṛtīye /
analyzed: atas ājye na pravṛttiḥ teṣām ājye na pravṛttiḥ teṣām ājyasya ca tad artha ātva abhāvāt iti uktam tṛtīye

original: ārādupakārakāṇāṃ tu svarūpe 'nupayogāt paramāpūrvārthatvam /
analyzed: ārāt upakārakāṇām tu svarūpe n upayogāt parama apūrva artha tvam

original: tatro 'tpattyapūrvasya yāgasvarūpānuṣṭhānānantaram evo 'tpadyamānatvāt saṃnipatyopakārakāṇāṃ pūrvāṅgānāṃ tadutpattāv upayogaḥ / uttarāṅgānāṃ tu teṣāṃ tatsthitāv upayogaḥ /
analyzed: tatra u tpatti apūrvasya yāga svarūpa anuṣṭhāna anantaram eva u tpadyamāna tvāt saṃnipatya upakārakāṇām pūrva aṅgānām tad utpattau upayogaḥ uttara aṅgānām tu teṣām tad sthitau upayogaḥ

original: paramāpūrvasya tu sāṅgaprayogānuṣṭhānānantaram evo 'tpadyamānatvāt sarveṣām ārādupakārakāṇāṃ tadutpattau / prayogabahirbhūtasya tu tatsthitāv upayogaḥ /
analyzed: parama apūrvasya tu sa aṅga prayoga anuṣṭhāna anantaram eva u tpadyamāna tvāt sarveṣām ārāt upakārakāṇām tad utpattau prayoga bahis bhūtasya tu tad sthitau upayogaḥ

original: yathā bṛhaspatisavasya niṣpeyena 'stvā bṛhaspatisavena yajeta' 'ti vājapeyottarakālam aṅgatvena vihitasya vājapeyāpūrvasthitāv upayogaḥ; tasya prāg evo 'tpannatvād ity uktaṃ caturthe /
analyzed: yathā bṛhaspatisavasya niṣpeyena stvā bṛhaspatisavena yajeta vājapeya uttara kālam aṅga tvena vihitasya vājapeya apūrva sthitau upayogaḥ tasya prāk eva u tpanna tvāt iti uktam caturthe

original: tat siddhaṃ sarvathā 'ṅgānām apūrvārthatvam /
analyzed: tat siddham sarvathā ṅgānām apūrva artha tvam

original: prakṛtam anusarāmaḥ /
analyzed: prakṛtam anusarāmaḥ

original: tad evaṃ nirūpitaḥ saṃkṣepato viniyogavidhiḥ /
analyzed: tat evam nirūpitaḥ saṃkṣepataḥ viniyoga vidhiḥ

original: prayogaprāśubhāvabodhako vidhiḥ prayogavidhiḥ /
sa cā 'ṅgavākyaikavākyatām āpannaḥ pradhānavidhir eva /
analyzed: sa ca a ṅga vākya ekavākya tām āpannaḥ pradhāna vidhiḥ eva

original: sa hi sāṅgaṃ pradhānam anuṣṭhāpayan vilambe pramāṇābhāvād avilambaḥaparaparyāyaṃ prayogaprāśubhāvaṃ vidhatte /
analyzed: sa hi sa aṅgam pradhānam anuṣṭhāpayan vilambe pramāṇa abhāvāt avilambaḥ apara paryāyam prayoga prāśu bhāvam vidhatte

original: na ca vilambavad avilambe 'pi pramāṇābhāva iti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca vilamba vat avilambe pi pramāṇa abhāvaḥ iti vācyam

original: vilambe hy aṅgapradhānavidhyekavākyatāvagatatatsāhityānupapattiḥ prasajyate /
analyzed: vilambe hi aṅga pradhāna vidhi eka vākya tā avagata tad sāhitya anupapattiḥ prasajyate

original: na hi vilambena kriyamāṇayoḥ padārthayoḥ sahakṛtam iti sāhityaṃ vyavaharanti /
analyzed: na hi vilambena kriyamāṇayoḥ padārthayoḥ sahakṛtam iti sāhityam vyavaharanti

original: na cai 'vaṃ sāhityānupapattyā samānakālatvam eva syān na tv avilambaḥ / avyavadhānena pūrvottarakāle kriyamāṇapadārthayoravilambena kṛtam iti vyavahārād iti vācyam; anekapadārthānām ekasmin kāle 'nusthānānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: na sāhitya anupapattyā samāna kāla tvam eva syāt na tu avilambaḥ avyavadhānena pūrva uttara kāle kriyamāṇa padārthayoḥ avilambena kṛtam iti vyavahārāt iti vācyam aneka padārthānām ekasmin kāle nu sthāna anupapatteḥ

original: na ca tāvatkartrsampadanena 'nuṣṭhānaṃ kiṃ na syād iti vācyam; tasyai 'tasya yājñakratoś catvāra ṛtvijo 'tyādinā kartṝṇāṃ niyatatvāt /
analyzed: na ca tāvat kartṛ sampad anena nuṣṭhānam kim na syāt iti vācyam tasyai tasya yājñakratoḥ catvāraḥ ṛtvijaḥ tyādinā kartṝṇām niyata tvāt

original: tasmād aṅgavākyaikavākyatām āpannaḥ pradhānavidhir ekavākyatāvagatatatsāhityaṃ vidadhad uktavidhayai 'kakālānusthānānupapatter avilambam vidhatta iti siddham prayogaprāśubhāvabodhakovidhih prayogavidhir iti /
analyzed: tasmāt aṅga vākya ekavākya tām āpannaḥ pradhāna vidhiḥ eka vākya tā avagata tad sāhityam vidadhat ukta vidhayai ka kāla anusthāna anupapatteḥ avilambam vidhatte iti siddham prayoga prāśu bhāva bodhakaḥ vidhiḥ prayoga vidhiḥ iti

original: sa cā 'vilambo niyate krama āśrīyamāne bhavati; anyathā hi kim etadanantaram etat kartavyam etadanantaram ve 'ti prayogavikṣepāpatteh /
analyzed: sa ca ā vilambaḥ niyate krame āśrīyamāne bhavati anyathā hi kim etad anantaram etat kartavyam etad anantaram vā iti prayoga vikṣepa āpattā ih

original: atah prayogavidhir eva svavidheyaprayogaprāśubhāvasiddhyartham niyatam kramam api padārthaviśeṣaṇatayā vidhatte /
analyzed: atas prayoga vidhiḥ eva sva vidheya prayoga prāśu bhāva siddhi artham niyatam kramam api padārtha viśeṣaṇa tayā vidhatte

original: tatra kramo nāma vītativisesah paurvāparyarūpo vā /
analyzed: tatra kramaḥ nāma paurvāparya rūpaḥ vā

original: tatra ca ṣaṭ pramāṇāni /
analyzed: tatra ca ṣaḍ pramāṇāni

original: śrutyarthāpatthanasthānamukhyapravṛttyākhyāni /
analyzed: śruti artha āpatthana sthāna mukhya pravṛtti ākhyāni

original: tatra kramaparam vacanam śrutih /
analyzed: tatra kramaparam vacanam śrutiḥ

original: tac ca dvividham /
analyzed: tat ca dvividham

original: kevalakramaparam tadviśiṣṭapadārthaparam ce 'ti /
analyzed: kevala krama param tad viśiṣṭa padārtha param ca ti

original: tatra vedam kṛtvā vedim karoti 'ti kevalakramaparam / vedikaraṇāder vacanāntareṇa vihitatvāt /
analyzed: tatra vedam kṛtvā vedim karoti ti kevala krama param vedi karaṇa ādeḥ vacana antareṇa vihita tvāt

original: vaṣaṭkartuh prathamabhakṣa iti tu kramaviśiṣṭapadārthaparam; ekaprasaratābhaṅgabhayena bhakṣānuvādena kramamātrasya vidhātum aśakyatvāt /
analyzed: vaṣaṭkartuḥ prathama bhakṣaḥ iti tu krama viśiṣṭa padārtha param eka prasara tā bhaṅga bhayena bhakṣa anuvādena krama mātrasya vidhātum aśakya tvāt

original: atha se 'yam śrutir itarapramāṇāpekṣayā balavati; teṣām vacanakalpanadvārā kramapramāṇatvāt /
analyzed: atha se yam śrutiḥ itara pramāṇa apekṣayā balavati teṣām vacana kalpana dvārā krama pramāṇa tvāt

original: ata evā 'śvinasya pāṭhakramāt tṛtīyasthāne grahaṇaprasaktāv āśvino daśamo gṛhyata iti vacanād daśamasthāne grahaṇam ity uktam /
analyzed: atas eva ā śvinasya pāṭha kramāt tṛtīya sthāne grahaṇa prasaktau āśvinaḥ daśamaḥ gṛhyate iti vacanāt daśama sthāne grahaṇam iti uktam

original: yatra tu prayojanavaśena nirṇayah sa ārthah kramah; yathā 'gnihotrahomayavāgūpākayoh /
analyzed: yatra tu prayojana vaśena nirṇayah saḥ ārthah kramah yathā gnihotra homa yavāgū pākayoḥ

original: atra hi yavāgvā homārthatvena tatpākah prayojanavaśena pūrvam anuṣṭhīyate /
analyzed: atra hi yavāgvāḥ homa artha tvena tad pākaḥ prayojana vaśena pūrvam anuṣṭhīyate

original: sa cā 'yam pāṭhakramād balavān /
analyzed: sa ca ā yam pāṭha kramāt balavān

original: yathāpāṭham hy anuṣṭhāne klptaprayojanabādho 'dṛṣṭārthatvam ca syāt /
analyzed: yathāpāṭham hi anuṣṭhāne klpta prayojana bādhaḥ dṛṣṭārtha tvam ca syāt

original: na hi homānantaraṣyāpannasya kimcid dṛṣṭam prayojanam asti /padārthabodhakaväkyānām yah kramah sa pāthakramah /
analyzed: na hi kimcid dṛṣṭam prayojanam asti padārtha bodha kavkyānām yah kramah sa pāthakramaḥ

original: tasmāc ca padārthānām krama āśriyate /
analyzed: tasmāt ca padārthānām kramaḥ āśriyate

original: yena hi kramena väkyäni pathitäni tenai 'va kramena 'dhitäny arthapratyayam janayanti; yathārthapratyayam ca padārthānām anusthānāt /
analyzed: yena hi kramena pathitni tenai va kramena dhitni artha pratyayam janayanti yathārtha pratyayam ca padārthānām anusthānāt

original: sa ca pātho dvividhah /
analyzed: sa ca pāthaḥ dvividhah

original: mantrapātho brāhmanapāthaś ce 'ti /
analyzed: mantra pāthaḥ brāhmana pāthaḥ ca iti

original: tatrā 'gneyāgniṣomīyayos tattadyājyānuvākyākramād yah krama āśriyate sa mantrapāthah /
analyzed: tatra ā gneya agniṣomīyayoḥ tad tad yājyā anuvākyā kramāt yaḥ kramaḥ āśriyate sa mantra pāthaḥ

original: sa cā 'yam mantrapātho brāhmanapāthād balavān / anusthāne brāhmanavākyapekṣayā mantravākyasyā 'ntarangatvāt /
analyzed: sa ca ā yam mantra pāthaḥ brāhmana pāthāt balavān anusthāne brāhmana vākya apekṣayā mantra vākyasya a ntar anga tvāt

original: brāhmanavākyam hi prayogād bahir eve 'dam evaṁ kartavyam ity evam avabodhya kṛtārtham iti na punah prayogakāle vyāpriyate /
analyzed: brāhmana vākyam hi prayogāt bahis eva idam eva kartavyam iti evam avabodhya kṛtārtham iti na punar prayoga kāle vyāpriyate

original: mantrah punar ananyaprayojanāh prayogasamavetārthasmārakā iti vakṣyāmah /
analyzed: mantrah punar ananya prayojanāh prayoga samaveta artha smārakāḥ iti vakṣyāmah

original: tenā 'nuṣthānakramasya smaraṇakramādhinatvāt tatkramasya ca mantrakramādhinatvād antarango mantrapātha itarasmād iti balavān /
analyzed: tena anuṣthāna kramasya smaraṇa krama adhina tvāt tad kramasya ca mantra krama adhina tvāt antarangaḥ mantra pāthaḥ itarasmāt iti balavān

original: ata evā 'gneyāgniṣomīyayor brāhmanapāthād ādāv agniṣomīyānuṣthānam paścād āgneyānuṣthānam ity evam krama badhitvā mantrapāthād ādāv āgneyānuṣthānam paścād agniṣomīyasye 'ty eva krama ity uktam /
analyzed: atas eva ā āgneya agniṣomīyayoḥ brāhmana pāthāt ādau agniṣomīya anuṣthānam paścāt āgneya anuṣthānam iti evam badhitvā mantra pāthāt ādau āgneya anuṣthānam paścāt agniṣomīyasya iti eva kramaḥ iti uktam

original: prayājānām samidho yajati / tanūnapātam yajati 'ty evam vidhāyakavākyakramād yah kramah sa brāhmanapāthakramah /
analyzed: prayājānām samidhaḥ yajati tanūnapātam yajati ti evam vidhāyaka vākya kramāt yah kramah sa brāhmanapāthakramaḥ

original: atra ca yady api brāhmanavākyāny artham vidhāya kṛtārthāni / tathā 'pi prayājānām smārakāntarasyā 'bhāvāt tāny eva smārakatvena svīkriyante /
analyzed: atra ca yadi api brāhmana vākyāni artham vidhāya kṛtārthāni tathā pi prayājānām smāraka antarasya ā bhāvāt tāni eva smāraka tvena svīkriyante

original: tathā ca yena kramena tāny adhitāni tenai 'va krameṇa 'rthasmaraṇam janayanti 'ti yuktam tenai 'va krameṇa teṣām anuṣthānam iti /
