analyzed: tathā ca yena kramena tāni adhitāni tenai va krameṇa rtha smaraṇam janayanti yuktam tenai va krameṇa teṣām anuṣthānam iti

original: tat siddham prayājānām brāhmaṇapāthakramāt krama iti /
analyzed: tat siddham prayājānām brāhmaṇapāthakramāt kramaḥ iti

original: nanu prayājeṣu prayogasamavetārthasmārakatvam vidhāyakatvena kṛtārthānām brāhmaṇavākyānām kim iti svīkriyate / prayogasamavetārthasmārakāṇām yājyāmantrāṇām āgneyādiṣv ivā 'trā 'pi sattvāt /
analyzed: nanu prayājeṣu prayoga samaveta artha smāraka tvam vidhāyaka tvena kṛtārthānām brāhmaṇa vākyānām kim iti svīkriyate prayoga samaveta artha smārakāṇām yājyā mantrāṇām āgneya ādiṣu sattvāt

original: na ca teṣām devatāsmārakatvāt karmasmārakatvena brāhmaṇavākyam svīkriyata iti vācyam; āgneyādiṣvapi karmasmārakatvena tatsvīkārāpatteḥ /
analyzed: na ca teṣām devatā smāraka tvāt karma smāraka tvena brāhmaṇa vākyam svīkriyate iti vācyam āgneya ādiṣu api karma smāraka tvena tad svīkāra āpatteḥ

original: na ce 'stāpattiḥ /
analyzed: na ce sta āpattiḥ

original: tathā sati brāhmaṇapāṭhān mantrapāṭhasya balīyastvaṁ na syāt /
analyzed: tathā sati brāhmaṇa pāṭhāt mantra pāṭhasya balīyaḥ tva na syāt

original: tadbalīyastve hi mantrāṇāṁ prayogasamavetārthasmārakatvam itarasya tadasmārakatvaṁ hetuḥ /
analyzed: tad balīyaḥ tve hi mantrāṇā prayoga samaveta artha smāraka tvam itarasya tad asmāraka tva hetuḥ

original: yadi ca karmasmārakatvaṁ brāhmaṇavākyasya svīkrīyate / tadā pradhānasmārakatvena brāhmaṇavākyasyā 'ntaraṅgatvād aṅgabhūtadevatāsmārakatvena ca mantrāṇāṁ bahiraṅgatvān mantrapāṭhād brāhmaṇapāṭhasyai 'va balīyastvaṁ syāt /
analyzed: yadi ca karma smāraka tva brāhmaṇa vākyasya svīkrīyate tadā pradhāna smāraka tvena brāhmaṇa vākyasya ntaraṅga tvāt aṅga bhūta devatā smāraka tvena ca mantrāṇā bahiraṅga tvāt mantra pāṭhāt brāhmaṇa pāṭhasyai va balīyaḥ tva syāt

original: tathā ca mantratas tu virodhe syād iti pāñcamikādhikaraṇavirodhaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca mantrataḥ tu virodhe syāt iti pāñcamika adhikaraṇa virodhaḥ

original: tatra hi brāhmaṇapāṭhān mantrapāṭhasya balīyastvād ādāv āgneyānuṣṭhānaṁ paścād agniṣomīyasye 'ty uktam /
analyzed: tatra hi brāhmaṇa pāṭhāt mantra pāṭhasya balīyaḥ tvāt ādau paścāt agniṣomīyasya iti uktam

original: athā 'gneyādisu yājyāmantrā eva devatāprakāśanadvārā karmaprakāśakās tyajyamānadravyoddeśyatvarupatayā devatātvasye 'ti cet tulyaṁ prayājeṣu /
analyzed: atha āgneya ādisu yājyā mantrāḥ eva devatā prakāśana dvārā karma prakāśakāḥ tyajyamāna dravya uddeśya tva rupa tayā devatā tvasya iti ced prayājeṣu

original: tatrā 'pi hi yājyāmantrā devatāprakāśakāḥ; prayājeṣu devatāyā mantravarnīkatvāt /
analyzed: tatra a pi hi yājyā mantrāḥ devatā prakāśakāḥ prayājeṣu devatāyāḥ

original: tathā ca prayājeṣu yājyāmantrāṇāṁ devatāprakāśanadvārā karmaprakāśakatvāt tatkramo mantrapāṭhād eva syān na tu brāhmaṇapāṭhakramāt /
analyzed: tathā ca prayājeṣu yājyā mantrāṇā devatā prakāśana dvārā karma prakāśaka tvāt tad kramaḥ mantra pāṭhāt eva syāt na tu brāhmaṇa pāṭha kramāt

original: na ca mantrapāṭhasya 'nyādṛśatvāt prayājakramo brāhmaṇapāṭhakramād eve 'ti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca mantra pāṭhasya nyādṛśa tvāt prayāja kramaḥ brāhmaṇa pāṭha kramāt eva iti vācyam

original: anyādṛśatve tasyai 'va kramasya 'nuṣṭhānaṁ syāt / mantrakramasya balīyastvāt /
analyzed: anyādṛśa tve tasyai va kramasya syāt mantra kramasya balīyaḥ tvāt

original: abhiyāsādhikaraṇe ca vārtikakṛtā kramaviniyu ktai 'vantaṅgakamantravarne 'tyādinā prayājeṣu yājyāmantrāṇāṁ kramaviniyoga uktaḥ /
analyzed: abhiyāsa adhikaraṇe ca vārtika kṛtā ityādinā prayājeṣu yājyā mantrāṇā krama viniyogaḥ uktaḥ

original: navame tantraratne samidhaḥ samidho 'gna ājyasya vyanty ityādibhiḥ kramaprakaraṇaprāptair mantrair devatā guṇatvena samarpyanta ity uktam /
analyzed: navame tantraratne samidhaḥ samidhaḥ gne ājyasya vyanti ityādibhiḥ krama prakaraṇa prāptaiḥ mantraiḥ devatāḥ guṇa tvena samarpyante iti uktam

original: mantrāṇām anyādṛśakramatve tadanupapattiḥ syāt /
analyzed: mantrāṇām anyādṛśa krama tve tad anupapattiḥ syāt

original: tat kathaṁ prayājeṣu brāhmaṇapāṭhakramāt krama iti cet,—
analyzed: tat katha prayājeṣu brāhmaṇa pāṭha kramāt kramaḥ iti ced

original: ucyate /
analyzed: ucyate

original: satyam etat /
analyzed: satyam etat

original: tathā 'pi yatrā 'rthasmārakā mantrā na santy eva / yathā tūṣṇīṁ vihiteṣu karmasu / teṣāṁkramo brāhmaṇapāṭhakramāt / tatra teṣām eva prayogasamavetārthasmārakatvāt /
analyzed: tathā pi yatrā rtha smārakāḥ mantrāḥ na santi eva yathā tūṣṇī vihiteṣu karmasu teṣām kramaḥ brāhmaṇa pāṭha kramāt tatra teṣām eva prayoga samaveta artha smāraka tvāt

original: prayājodāharaṇaṃ tu kṛtvācintayā / tatra brāhmaṇavākyānām eva prayogasamavetārthasmārakatvābhāvāt /
analyzed: prayāja udāharaṇam tu kṛtvā acintayā tatra brāhmaṇa vākyānām eva prayoga samaveta artha smāraka tva abhāvāt

original: yathā 'hur arthavādacaraṇe vārtikakārāḥ /
analyzed: yathā huḥ arthavāda caraṇe vārtikakārāḥ

original: prayājādiṣvṛkyṛny arthaṃ samarpya caritārthāni svarupasaṃsparśe saty api prayojyatāṃ na pratipadyanta' iti /
analyzed: prayāja ādiṣu ṛkyṛni artham samarpya caritārthāni svar upa saṃsparśe sati api prayojya tām na pratipadyante iti

original: tasmāt samantrakakarmāṇāṃ mantrapāṭhakramāt kramaḥ; amantrakakarmāṇāṃ kramas tu brāhmaṇapāṭhakramād eve 'ti dik /
analyzed: tasmāt sa mantraka karmāṇām mantra pāṭha kramāt kramaḥ amantraka karmāṇām kramaḥ tu brāhmaṇa pāṭha kramāt eva iti diś

original: prakṛtau nānādeśasthānāṃ padārthānāṃ vikṛtau vacanād ekasmin deśe'nuṣṭhāne kartavye yasya deśe'nuṣṭhīyante tasya prathamamam anuṣṭhānaṃ itarayoś ca paścāt / ayaṃ yaḥ kramaḥ sthānakramaḥ /
analyzed: prakṛtau nānā deśa sthānām padārthānām vikṛtau vacanāt ekasmin deśa inuṣṭhāne kartavye yasya deśa inuṣṭhīyante tasya prathamamam anuṣṭhānam itarayoḥ ca paścāt ayam yaḥ kramaḥ sthāna kramaḥ

original: sthānaṃ nāmo 'pasthitiḥ /
analyzed: sthānam nāma u pasthitiḥ

original: yasya hi deśe 'nuṣṭhīyate tatpūrvatane padārthe kṛte sa eva prathamam upasthito bhavati 'ti yuktaṃ tasya prathamam anuṣṭhānam /
analyzed: yasya hi deśe nuṣṭhīyate tat pūrvatane padārthe kṛte saḥ eva prathamam upasthitaḥ bhavati yuktam tasya prathamam anuṣṭhānam

original: ata eva sādyaskre 'gniṣomīyasavanīyānubandhyānāṃ savanīyadeśe sahānuṣṭhāne kartavya ādau savanīyapaśor anuṣṭhānam / tasmin deśa āśvinagrahaṇānantaraṃ savanīyasyai 'va prathamam upasthiteḥ / itarayos tu paścāt /
analyzed: atas eva sādyaskre gniṣomīya savanīya anubandhyānām savanīya deśe saha anuṣṭhāne kartavye ādau savanīya paśoḥ anuṣṭhānam tasmin deśe āśvina grahaṇa anantaram savanīyasyai prathamam upasthiteḥ itarayoḥ tu paścāt

original: tathā hi / jyotiṣṭome trayaḥ paśuyāgā agniṣomīyaḥ savanīya ānubandhyaś ce 'ti /
analyzed: tathā hi jyotiṣṭome trayaḥ paśuyāgāḥ agniṣomīyaḥ savanīyaḥ ānubandhyaḥ ca iti

original: te ca bhinnadeśāḥ /
analyzed: te ca bhinna deśāḥ

original: agniṣomīya aupavasathye 'hni / savanīyaḥ sutyākāle / ānubandhyas tv ante /
analyzed: agniṣomīyaḥ aupavasathye hni savanīyaḥ sutyā kāle ānubandhyaḥ tu ante

original: sādyaskro nāma somayāgaviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: sādyaskraḥ nāma soma yāga viśeṣaḥ

original: sa cā 'vyaktatvāj jyotiṣṭomavikāraḥ /
analyzed: sa ca ā vyakta tvāt jyotiṣṭoma vikāraḥ

original: atas te trayo 'pi paśuyāgāḥ sādyaskre 'odakaprāptāḥ /
analyzed: atas te trayaḥ pi paśu yāgāḥ sādyaskre ā udaka prāptāḥ

original: teṣāṃ ca tatra sāhityaṃ śrutam / saha paśūn ālabheta 'ti /
analyzed: teṣām ca tatra sāhityam śrutam saha paśūn ālabheta

original: tac ca sāhityaṃ savanīyadeśe tasya pradhānapratyāsatteḥ sthānātikramasāmyāc ca /
analyzed: tat ca sāhityam savanīya deśe tasya pradhāna pratyāsatteḥ sthāna atikrama sāmyāt ca

original: savanīyadeśe hy anuṣṭhāne kriyamāṇe 'gniṣomīyānubandhyayoḥ svasvasthanātikramamātraṃ bhavati; agniṣomīyadeśe hy anuṣṭhāne kriyamāṇe savanīyasya svasthānātikramamātram / ānubandhyasya tu svasthānātikramaḥ savanīyasthānātikramaś ca syāt /
analyzed: savanīya deśe hi anuṣṭhāne kriyamāṇe gniṣomīya anubandhyayoḥ sva sva sthana atikrama mātram bhavati agniṣomīya deśe hi anuṣṭhāne kriyamāṇe savanīyasya sva sthāna atikrama mātram ānubandhyasya tu sva sthāna atikramaḥ savanīya sthāna atikramaḥ ca syāt

original: evam ānubandhyadeśe 'gniṣomīyasya draṣṭavyaḥ /tathā ca savanīyadeśe sarveṣāṃ anuṣṭhāne kartavye savanīyasya prathamam anuṣṭhānam /
analyzed: evam ānubandhya deśe gniṣomīyasya draṣṭavyaḥ tathā ca savanīya deśe sarveṣām anuṣṭhāne kartavye savanīyasya prathamam anuṣṭhānam

original: āśvinagrahaṇānantaraṃ hi savanīyadeśaḥ / prakṛtāv āśvinaṃ grahaṃ gṛhītvā tṛtīyā yūpaṃ parivīyā 'gneyaṃ savanīyaṃ paśum upākaroti /
analyzed: āśvina grahaṇa anantaram hi savanīya deśaḥ prakṛtau āśvinam graham gṛhītvā tṛtīyā yūpam parivīya ā gneyam savanīyam paśum upākaroti

original: 'ty āśvinagrahaṇānantaraṃ tasya vihitatvāt /
analyzed: ti āśvina grahaṇa anantaram tasya vihita tvāt

original: tathā ca sādyaskre 'py āśvinagrahaṇe kṛte savanīya evo 'pasthito bhavati 'ti yuktaṃ tasya sthānāt prathamam anuṣṭhānam itarayoś ca paścād ity uktam /
analyzed: tathā ca sādyaskre pi āśvina grahaṇe kṛte savanīyaḥ eva u pasthitaḥ bhavati yuktam tasya sthānāt prathamam anuṣṭhānam itarayoḥ ca paścāt iti uktam

original: pradhānakrameṇa yo 'ṅgānāṃ krama āśrīyate sa mukhyakramaḥ /
analyzed: pradhāna krameṇa yaḥ ṅgānām kramaḥ āśrīyate sa mukhya kramaḥ

original: yena hi krameṇa pradhānāni kriyante tenai 'va cet krameṇa teṣām aṅgāny anuṣṭhīyante / tadā sarveṣām aṅgānāṃ svaiḥ pradhānais tulyaṃ vyavadhānaṃ bhavati; vyutkrameṇa tv anuṣṭhāne keṣāṃcid aṅgānāṃ svaiḥ pradhānair atyantam avyavadhānam anyeṣām atyantaṃ vyavadhānaṃ syāt /
analyzed: yena hi krameṇa pradhānāni kriyante tenai ced krameṇa teṣām aṅgāni anuṣṭhīyante tadā sarveṣām aṅgānām svaiḥ pradhānaiḥ tulyam vyavadhānam bhavati vyutkrameṇa tu anuṣṭhāne keṣāṃcid aṅgānām svaiḥ pradhānaiḥ atyantam a vyavadhānam anyeṣām atyantam vyavadhānam syāt

original: tac cā 'yuktam vyākhyāsaṃkocāsamaṅgatamukhyārthabādhāpatteḥ /
analyzed: tat ca yuktam vyākhyā saṃkoca asamaṅga ta mukhya artha bādhā āpatteḥ

original: ataḥ pradhānakramo 'py aṅgakramo hetuh /
analyzed: atas pradhāna kramaḥ pi aṅga kramaḥ hetuḥ

original: ata eva prayājaseṣeṇa 'dāv āgneyahaviṣo 'bhighāraṇaṃ paścād aindrasyā dadhnaḥ / āgneyayāgaindrayāgayoḥ paurvāparyāt /
analyzed: atas eva prayāja seṣeṇa dau āgneya haviṣaḥ bhighāraṇam paścāt aindrasyāḥ dadhnaḥ āgneya yāga aindra yāgayoḥ paurvāparyāt

original: atra hi dvayor abhighāraṇayoḥ svena svena pradhānena tulyam ekāntaritavyavadhānaṃ bhavati; āgneyahavīrabhighāraṇāgneyayāgayor aindrayāgahavīrabhighāraṇena vyavadhānāt / aindrayāgahavīrabhighāraṇaindrayāgayoś cā 'gneyayāgena vyavadhānāt /
analyzed: atra hi dvayoḥ abhighāraṇayoḥ svena svena pradhānena tulyam eka antarita vyavadhānam bhavati āgneya havīḥ abhighāraṇa āgneya yāgayoḥ aindra yāga havīḥ abhighāraṇena vyavadhānāt aindra yāga havīḥ abhighāraṇa aindra yāgayoḥ ca ā āgneya yāgena vyavadhānāt

original: ataś cā 'dāv āgneyahavīrabhighāraṇaṃ tata aindrasyā havīṣas tata āgneyayāgas tataś cai 'ndro yāga ity evaṃkramo mukhyakramāt siddho bhavati /
analyzed: atas ca ā dau āgneya havīḥ abhighāraṇam tatas aindrasyāḥ havīṣaḥ tatas āgneya yāgaḥ tatas ca indraḥ yāgaḥ iti evaṃkramaḥ mukhya kramāt siddhaḥ bhavati

original: yadi tv adāv aindrahaviṣo 'bhighāraṇaṃ tata āgneyasya kriyate / tadā yājyānuvākyākramavaśād ādāv āgneyasyā 'nuṣṭhānād āgneyayāgatadaṅgahaviṟabhighāraṇayor atyantam avyavadhānam aindrayāgatadaṅgahavirabhighāraṇayor atyantaṃ vyavadhānaṃ syāt /
analyzed: yadi tu adau aindra haviṣaḥ bhighāraṇam tatas āgneyasya kriyate tadā yājyā anuvākyā krama vaśāt ādau āgneyasya anuṣṭhānāt āgneya yāga tad aṅga haviṣ abhighāraṇayoḥ atyantam avyavadhānam aindra yāga tad aṅga haviḥ abhighāraṇayoḥ atyantam vyavadhānam syāt

original: tac ca na yuktam /ato yuktaḥ prayājaseṣeṇa 'bhighāraṇasya mukhyakramāt krama iti /
analyzed: tat ca na yuktam atas yuktaḥ prayāja seṣeṇa bhighāraṇasya mukhya kramāt kramaḥ iti

original: sa cā 'sau mukhyakramaḥ pāṭhakramād durbalaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca ā sau mukhya kramaḥ pāṭha kramāt durbalaḥ

original: mukhyakramo hi pramāṇāntarasāpekṣapradhānakramapratipattisāpekṣatayā vilambitapratipattitaḥ / pāṭhakramas tu nirapekṣasvādhyāyapāṭhakramamātrasāpekṣatayā na tathe 'ti balavān /
analyzed: mukhya kramaḥ hi pramāṇa antara sāpekṣa pradhāna krama pratipatti sāpekṣa tayā vilambita pratipattitaḥ pāṭha kramaḥ tu nirapekṣa svādhyāya pāṭha krama mātra sāpekṣa tayā na tathā balavān

original: ata evā 'gneyopāṁśuyājāgniṣomīyāṇāṁ krameṇa 'nuṣṭhīyamānānām apy upāṁśuyājājyanirvapo mukhyakramān na pūrvam anuṣṭhīyate / tasya durbalatvāt / pāṭhakramāt tu paścād anuṣṭhīyate / tasya prabalatvād iti /
analyzed: atas eva āgneya upāśuyāja agniṣomīyāṇā krameṇa nuṣṭhīyamānānām api upāśuyāja ājya nirvapaḥ mukhya kramāt na pūrvam anuṣṭhīyate tasya durbala tvāt pāṭha kramāt tu paścāt anuṣṭhīyate tasya prabala tvāt iti

original: sa cā 'yam mukhyakramaḥ pravṛttikramād balavān /
analyzed: sa ca ā yam mukhya kramaḥ pravṛtti kramāt balavān

original: pravṛttikrame hy āśrīyamāṇe bahūnām aṅgānāṁ pradhānaviprakarṣo bhavati / asmiṁs tv āśrīyamāṇe saṁnikarṣaḥ /
analyzed: pravṛtti krame hi āśrīyamāṇe bahūnām aṅgānām pradhāna viprakarṣaḥ bhavati asmin tu āśrīyamāṇe sa nikarṣaḥ

original: tad yathā /
analyzed: tat yathā

original: darśapūrṇamāsayor ādāv āgneyānuṣṭhānaṁ tataḥ sāṁnāyyasya /
analyzed: darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ ādau tatas sānāyyasya

original: taddharmāś ca kecit pūrvam anuṣṭhīyante /
analyzed: tad dharmāḥ ca kecid pūrvam anuṣṭhīyante

original: tatra yadi pravṛttikramam āśritya taddharmāḥ sarve pūrvam anuṣṭhīyeraṁs tata āgneyadharmās tata āgneyānuṣṭhānaṁ tataḥ sāṁnāyyānuṣṭhānaṁ tadā taddharmāṇāṁ svapradhānena saha dvābhyām āgneyadharmatadanuṣṭhānābhyāṁ viprakarṣaḥ syāt /
analyzed: tatra yadi pravṛtti kramam āśritya tad dharmāḥ sarve pūrvam anuṣṭhīyeraḥ tatas āgneya dharmāḥ tatas āgneya anuṣṭhāna tatas sānāyya anuṣṭhāna tadā tad dharmāṇā sva pradhānena saha dvābhyām āgneya dharma tad anuṣṭhānābhyāḥ viprakarṣaḥ syāt

original: yadā tu sāṁnāyyadharmāṇāṁ keṣāṁcit pūrvam anuṣṭhāne 'py anye sarve mukhyakramam āśrityā 'gneyaadharmanānuṣṭhānānantaram anuṣṭhīyante / tadā sarveṣām āgneyadharmasāṁnāyyadharmāṇām ekaikena vijātīyena vyavadhānaṁ bhavati / āgneyadharmāṇāṁ svapradhānena saha sāṁnāyyadharmair vyavadhānāt sāṁnāyyadharmāṇāṁ ca svapradhānena sahā 'gneyānuṣṭhānena vyavadhānād iti na viprakarṣaḥ /
analyzed: yadā tu sānāyya dharmāṇā keṣācid pūrvam anuṣṭhāne anuṣṭhīyante tadā sarveṣām āgneya dharma sānāyya dharmāṇām ekaikena vijātīyena vyavadhāna bhavati āgneya dharmāṇā sva pradhānena saha sānāyya dharmaiḥ vyavadhānāt sānāyya dharmāṇā ca sva pradhānena saha ā gneya anuṣṭhānena vyavadhānāt iti na viprakarṣaḥ

original: tasmān mukhyakramaḥ pravṛttikramād balavān /
analyzed: tasmāt mukhya kramaḥ pravṛtti kramāt balavān

original: sahaprayujyamāneṣu pradhāneṣu saṁnipātināṁ aṅgānām āvṛttyānuṣṭhāne kartavye dvitīyādipadārthānāṁ prathamānuṣṭhitapadārthakramād yaḥ kramaḥ sa pravṛttikramaḥ /yathā prājāpatyāṅgeṣu /
analyzed: saha prayujyamāneṣu pradhāneṣu sanipātinā aṅgānām āvṛttyā anuṣṭhāne kartavye dvitīya ādi padārthānām prathama anuṣṭhita padārtha kramāt yaḥ kramaḥ sa pravṛtti kramaḥ yathā prājāpatya aṅgeṣu

original: prājāpatyā hi vaiśvadevīṁ kṛtvā prājāpatyaiś caranti 'tivākyena tṛtīyānirdeśāt setikartavyatākā vākālavena yānitih /
analyzed: prājāpatyāḥ hi vaiśvadevī kṛtvā prājāpatyaiḥ caranti ti vākyena tṛtīyā nirdeśāt sa itikartavya tākā vā a kālavena

original: ataś ca teṣāṁ tadadhikānāṁ co 'pākaraṇaniyojanaprābhṛtīnāṁ sāhityaṁ saṁpādanīyam /
analyzed: atas ca teṣām tad adhikānām ca upākaraṇa niyojana prābhṛtīnām sāhitya sapādanīyam

original: tatra prājāpatyānāṁ saṁpratipannadevatākatvena 'kasmin kāle 'nuṣṭhānād upapadyate sāhityam /
analyzed: tatra prājāpatyānā sa pratipanna devatāka tvena kasmin kāle nuṣṭhānāt upapadyate sāhityam

original: tadaṅgānāṁ ca 'kasmin kāle 'nuṣṭhānam aśakyam /
analyzed: tad aṅgānām ca kasmin kāle nuṣṭhānam aśakyam

original: na hy anekeṣāṁ paśūnāṁ upākaraṇam ekasmin kāle kartuṁ śakyam /
analyzed: na hi anekeṣā paśūnām upākaraṇam ekasmin kāle kartu śakyam

original: atas teṣāṁ sāhityam avyavadhānena 'nuṣṭhānāt saṁpādyam / ekasyo 'pākaraṇaṁ kṛtvā 'parasyo 'pākaraṇam iti /
analyzed: atas teṣām sāhityam avyavadhānena nuṣṭhānāt sapādyam ekasya upākaraṇa kṛtvā parasya upākaraṇam iti

original: atah prājāpatyeṣu ekaṁ padārthaṁ sarvatrā 'nuṣṭhāya dvitīyah padārtho 'nuṣṭheyah /
analyzed: atas prājāpatyeṣu eka padārtha sarvatra anuṣṭhāya dvitīyah padārthaḥ nuṣṭheyah

original: tatra prathamapadārthānuṣṭhānaṁ kasmāccit paśor ārabhya kartavyam /
analyzed: tatra kasmāccid paśoḥ ārabhya kartavyam

original: dvitīyas tu padārtho yena krameṇa prathamo 'nuṣṭhitah / tenai 'va krameṇa 'nuṣṭheyah / prayogavidhyavagatasya mitho 'ṅgasāhityasyo 'papattaye /
analyzed: dvitīyaḥ tu padārthaḥ yena krameṇa prathamaḥ nuṣṭhitaḥ tena e va krameṇa nuṣṭheyah prayoga vidhi avagatasya mithas ṅga sāhityasya u papattaye

original: prayogavidhinā hi daikṣe tadaṅgānāṁ upākaraṇaniyojanādīnāṁ mithah sāhityam ānantaryāparaparyāyaṁ vihitam /
analyzed: prayoga vidhinā hi daikṣe tad aṅgānā upākaraṇa niyojana ādīnā mithah sāhityam ānantarya apara paryāya vihitam

original: tac ca sāhityaṁ savanīyapaśau codakena prāptam / tasya prāṇidravyakatvena daikṣavikṛtitvāt /
analyzed: tat ca savanīya paśau ca udakena prāptam tasya prāṇi dravyaka tvena daikṣa vikṛti tvāt

original: savanīyāc ca 'kādaśineṣu prāptam sutyākālalāmāṇyāt; tebhyaś ca prājāpatyeṣu prāptam tanuvyākalatvanyāyāt /
analyzed: savanīyāt ca kādaśineṣu prāptam sutyā kāla lāmāṇyāt tebhyaḥ ca prājāpatyeṣu prāptam tanu vyākala tva nyāyāt

original: prājāpatyeṣu ca pratipaśu yāgabhedāc codakā bhidyante /
analyzed: prājāpatyeṣu ca pratipaśu yāga bhedāt ca udakāḥ bhidyante

original: ataś codakāt tattatpaśvaṅgabhūtānāṁ upākaraṇaniyojanādīnāṁ sāhityam ānantaryāparaparyāyaṁ prāptam /
analyzed: atas ca udakāt tad tad paśu aṅga bhūtānā upākaraṇa niyojana ādīnā sāhityam ānantarya apara paryāya prāptam

original: ata ekasya paśor upākaraṇānanantaram eva niyojanaṁ codakabalāt kartavyatvena prāptam /
analyzed: atas ekasya paśoḥ upākaraṇa an anantaram eva codaka balāt kartavya tvena prāptam

original: tat tu na kriyate / pratyakṣavacanāvagatasarvapaśvaṅgasāhityānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: tat tu na kriyate pratyakṣa vacana avagata sarva paśu aṅga sāhitya anupapatteḥ

original: ata ekasmin paśāv upākaraṇe kṛte tadanantaram eva kartavyatvena prāptam api niyojanaṁ na kriyate /
analyzed: atas ekasmin paśau upākaraṇe kṛte tad anantaram eva kartavya tvena prāptam api na kriyate

original: pratyakṣavacanabalāt tu paśvantareṣu ṣoḍaśasu 'pākaraṇam eva kriyate /
analyzed: pratyakṣa vacana balāt tu paśu antareṣu ṣoḍaśasu pākaraṇam eva kriyate

original: kṛte tu teṣū 'pākaraṇe prathamapaśor niyojanasya tadīyopākaraṇena vyavadhāne pramāṇābhāvāt prathamapaśāv eva niyojanaṁ kāryam /
analyzed: kṛte tu upākaraṇe prathama paśoḥ niyojanasya tadīya upākaraṇena vyavadhāne pramāṇa abhāvāt prathama paśau eva kāryam

original: ataś ca yena krameṇo 'pākaraṇaṁ kṛtaṁ tenai 'va krameṇa niyojanaṁ kāryam /
analyzed: atas ca yena krameṇa u pākaraṇa kṛta tena e va krameṇa niyojana kāryam

original: evaṁ ca tattatpaśūpākaraṇānāṁ svasvaniyojanais tulyaṁ ṣoḍaśakṣaṇair vyavadhānaṁ bhavati /
analyzed: eva ca tad tad paśu upākaraṇānām sva sva niyojanaiḥ tulya ṣoḍaśa kṣaṇaiḥ vyavadhāna bhavati

original: anyathā keṣāṁcid atyantavyavadhānaṁ keṣāṁcic ca 'vyavadhānaṁ syāt /
analyzed: anyathā keṣācid atyanta vyavadhāna keṣācid ca vyavadhāna syāt

original: tac ca na yuktam /
analyzed: tat ca na yuktam

original: tasmād yena krameṇa prathamapadārtho 'nuṣṭhitas tenai 'va dvitīyo'nuṣṭheyaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt yena krameṇa prathama padārthaḥ anuṣṭhitaḥ dvitīyaḥ nuṣṭheyaḥ

original: tat siddhaṁ prathamānuṣṭhitapadārthakramād yo dvitīyapadārthakramaḥ sa pravṛttikrama iti /
analyzed: tat siddha prathama anuṣṭhita padārtha kramāt yaḥ dvitīya padārtha kramaḥ sa pravṛtti kramaḥ iti

original: tad evaṁ nirūpitaḥ saṁkṣepataḥ ṣaḍvidhakramanirūpaṇena prayogavidhivyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: tat eva nirūpitaḥ sakṣepataḥ ṣaḍvidha krama nirūpaṇena prayoga vidhi vyāpāraḥ

original: phalasvāmyabodhako vidhir adhikāravidhiḥ /
phalasvāmyaṁ ca karmajanyaphalabhoktṛtvam /
analyzed: ca karma janya phala bhoktṛ tvam

original: sa ca yajeta svargakāma ity evaṁrūpaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca yajeta svarga kāmaḥ iti evarūpaḥ

original: anena hi svargam uddiśya yāgaṁ vidadhatā svargakāmasya yāgajanyaphalabhoktṛtvaṁ pratipādyate /
analyzed: anena hi svargam uddiśya yāga vidadhatā svarga kāmasya yāga janya phala bhoktṛ tva pratipādyate

original: yasyā 'hitāgner agniṁ gṛhān dahet so 'gnaye kṣāmavate 'ṣṭakapālaṁ nirvapedityādibhis tu gṛhadāhādau nimitte karma vidadhadbhir nimittavataḥ karmajanyapakṣayarūpaphalasvāmyaṁ pratipādyate /
analyzed: yasyāḥ hitāgneḥ agni gṛhān dahet saḥ gnaye kṣāmavate ṣṭa kapāla nirvapet ityādibhiḥ tu gṛha dāha ādau nimitte karma vidadhadbhiḥ nimittavataḥ karma janya pakṣaya rūpa phala svāmya pratipādyate

original: tac ca phalasvāmyaṁ tasyai 'va yo 'dhikāriviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: tat ca tasyai yaḥ dhikāri viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭaḥ

original: adhikāriviśeṣaṇaṁ ca tad eva yat puruṣaviśeṣaṇatvena śrutam /
analyzed: ca tat eva yat puruṣa viśeṣaṇa tvena śrutam

original: ata eva rājā rājasūyena svārājyakāmo yajetetyānena svārājyam uddiśya rājasūyaṁ vidadhatā 'pi na svārājyakāmamātrasya tatphalabhoktṛtvaṁ pratipādyate / kiṁ tu rājñaḥ satas tatkāmasya /
analyzed: atas eva rājā rājasūyena svārājya kāmaḥ yajeta iti ānena svārājyam uddiśya rājasūya vidadhatā na svārājya kāma mātrasya tad phala bhoktṛ tva pratipādyate ki tu rājñaḥ sataḥ tad kāmasya

original: kiṁcit tu puruṣaviśeṣaṇatvenā 'śrutam apy adhikāriviśeṣaṇaṁ bhavati; yathā 'dhyayanavidhisiddhā vidyā / agnisādhyeṣu ca karmasv ādhānasiddhāgnimatttā / sāmarthyaṁ ca /
analyzed: kicid tu śrutam api adhikāri viśeṣaṇa bhavati yathā dhyayana vidhi siddhā vidyā agni sādhyeṣu ca karmasu ādhāna siddha agnimat tā sāmarthya ca

original: eteṣāṁ puruṣaviśeṣaṇatvenā 'śravaṇe 'py adhikāriviśeṣaṇatvam asty eva; uttarakratuvidhinām jñānakṣepaśakter abhāvenā 'dhyayanavidhisiddhajñānavantaṁ praty eva pravṛtteḥ / agnisādhyakarmānāṁ cā 'gnyapekṣatvena tadvidhinām ādhānasiddhāgnimantaṁ praty eva pravṛtteḥ /
analyzed: eteṣām śravaṇe pi adhikāri viśeṣaṇa tvam asti eva uttara kratu vidhinām jñāna kṣepa śakteḥ abhāvena ā dhyayana vidhi siddha jñānavanta prati eva pravṛtteḥ agni sādhya karmānām ca agni apekṣa tvena tad vidhinām ādhāna siddha agnimanta prati eva pravṛtteḥ

original: ata eva ca śūdrasya na yāgādāv adhikāraḥ; tasyā 'dhyayanavidhisiddhajñānābhāvāt / ādhānasiddhāgnyabhāvāc ca /
analyzed: atas eva ca śūdrasya na yāga ādau adhikāraḥ tasyāḥ dhyayana vidhi siddha jñāna abhāvāt ādhāna siddha agni abhāvāt ca

original: adhyayanasyo 'panītādhikāratvād upanayanasya cā 'ṣṭavarṣaṁ brāhmaṇam upanayītetyādinā traivarnīkādhikāratvāt; ādhāyady api ca varṣāsu rathakāro 'gnim ādadhīte 'ty anena rathakārasya saudharmavāṇāparaparyāyasyā 'dhānaṁ vihitam / yogād rūḍher balīyastvāt / tathā 'pi nā 'syo 'ttarakarmasv adhikāraḥ / adhyayanavidhisiddhajñānābhāvāt /
analyzed: adhyayanasya u panīta adhikāra tvāt upanayanasya ca a ṣṭa varṣa brāhmaṇam upanayīta ityādinā traivarnīka adhikāra tvāt api ca varṣāsu rathakāraḥ gnim ādadhīte ti anena rathakārasya vihitam yogāt rūḍheḥ balīyaḥ tvāt tathā pi na sya uttara karmasu adhikāraḥ adhyayana vidhi siddha jñāna abhāvāt

original: na ca tadabhāva ādhāne 'pi katham adhikāras tadanuṣṭhānasya tatsādhyatvād iti vācyam; tasyā 'dhyayanavidhisiddhajñānābhāve 'pi varṣāsu rathakāro 'gnim ādadhīte 'ty anenai 'va vidhinā 'dhānamātroupayikajñānākṣepaṇāt; anyathā 'tasyai 'va vidher anupapatteh /
analyzed: na ca tad abhāve ādhāne pi katham adhikāraḥ tad anuṣṭhānasya tad sādhya tvāt iti vācyam tasyāḥ dhyayana vidhi siddha jñāna abhāve varṣāsu rathakāraḥ gnim ādadhīte varṣāsu rathakāraḥ gnim ādadhīte vidhinā dhāna mātra uupayika jñāna ākṣepaṇāt anyathā vidheḥ anupapatteḥ

original: ataś ca rathakārasya 'dhānamātre 'dhikāre 'pi no 'ttarakarmasv adhikāro vidyābhāvāt /
analyzed: atas ca rathakārasya dhāna mātre dhikāre pi na u ttara karmasu adhikāraḥ vidyā bhāvāt

original: evaṁ ca tadādhānaṁ nā 'gnisaṁskārārtham / saṁskṛtānām agnīnām uttaratro 'payogābhāvāt / kiṁ tu tadādhānaṁ laukikāgniguṇakaṁ viśvajinnyāyena svargaphalaṁ ca svatantram eva pradhānakarma vidhīyate /
analyzed: eva ca tad ādhāna na agni saskāra artham saskṛtānām agnīnām uttaratra upayoga abhāvāt  ki tu tad ādhāna laukika agni guṇaka viśvajit nyāyena svarga phala ca svatantram eva pradhāna karma vidhīyate

original: agnīn iti ca dvitīyā śaktīn juhotī 'tivat tṛtīyārthe 'ti /
analyzed: agnīn iti ca dvitīyā śaktīn juhoti tivat tṛtīyā arthe ti

original: prakṛtam anusarāmaḥ /
analyzed: prakṛtam anusarāmaḥ

original: tat siddhaṁ śūdrasyā 'dhyayanavidhisiddhajñānābhāvād ādhānasiddhāgnyabhāvāc ca no 'ttarakarmasv adhikāra iti /
analyzed: tat siddha śūdrasya adhyayana vidhi siddha jñāna abhāvāt ādhāna siddha agni abhāvāt ca na u ttara karmasu adhikāraḥ iti

original: nany evaṁ striyā adhikāro na syāt / tasyā adhyayanapratiṣedhena tadvidhisiddhajñānābhāvāt /
analyzed: eva striyāḥ adhikāraḥ na syāt tasyāḥ adhyayana pratiṣedhena tad vidhi siddha jñāna abhāvāt

original: na ca nā 'sty eve 'ti vācyam; yajeta svargakāma ityādau svargakāmapadasyo 'ddeśyasamarpakattvena puṁstvasyo 'ddeśyāviśeṣaṇatvād grahaikatvavad avivakṣitatvena striyā adhikārasya sādhitatvād iti cet,—
analyzed: na ca nā sti eva iti vācyam yajeta svarga kāmaḥ ityādau svarga kāma padasya uddeśya samarpaka ttvena pustvasya uddeśya a viśeṣaṇa tvāt graha eka tva vat avivakṣita tvena striyāḥ adhikārasya sādhita tvāt iti ced

original: satyam /
analyzed: satyam

original: adhikāraḥ sādhito na tu svātantryeṇa / na strī svātantryam arhati 'tyādinā tasya niṣiddhatvāt / svātantryeṇa kartṛtve prayogadvayasyā 'pi vaiguṇyāpatteś ca / yajamānaprayoge patnīkartṛkājyāvekṣaṇādilopāt / patnīprayoge ca yajamānakartṛkājyāvekṣaṇādilopāt /
analyzed: adhikāraḥ sādhitaḥ na tu svātantryeṇa na strī svātantryam arhati tyādinā tasya niṣiddha tvāt svātantryeṇa kartṛ tve prayoga dvayasya api vaiguṇya āpatteḥ ca yajamāna prayoge patnī kartṛka ājya avekṣaṇa ādi lopāt patnī prayoge ca yajamāna kartṛka ājya avekṣaṇa ādi lopāt

original: ato dampatyoḥ sahādhikāratvena yajamānavidyayā 'va patnyā api kāryasiddher nā jñānaṁ vinā tasyā adhikāre 'nupapattih; pāṇigrahaṇāt tu sahatvaṁ karmasu tathā puṇyaphaleṣv iti vacanena striyāadhikāranirnayāo ca / niṣādasthapater ivā 'dhyayanavidhisiddhaṅjñānavirahiṇo 'py etayā niṣādasthapatim yājayed iti vacanāt niṣādasthapater / niṣādasthapatiśabde hi niṣādam sthapatiṁ ca 'ti karmadhārayaṇa na tu niṣādānāṁ sthapatiḥ iti ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣaḥ / ṣaṣṭhyarthe lakṣaṇāpatteḥ /
analyzed: atas dampatyoḥ saha adhikāra tvena yajamāna vidyayā patnyāḥ api kārya siddheḥ jñāna vinā tasyāḥ adhikāre pāṇigrahaṇāt tu karmasu tathā puṇya phaleṣu iti vacanena ca niṣāda sthapateḥ etayā niṣāda sthapatim yājayet iti vacanāt niṣāda sthapateḥ niṣāda sthapati śabde hi niṣādam sthapati ca karmadhārayaṇa na tu niṣādānām sthapatiḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī tatpuruṣaḥ ṣaṣṭhī tatpuruṣaḥ na tu niṣādānām sthapatiḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī tatpuru

original: etāvāns tu viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: etāvān tu viśeṣaḥ

original: niṣādasya 'dhyayanavidhisiddhajñānābhāvenai 'tasyai 'va vidhes tatkarmaupayikajñānākṣepakatvam /
analyzed: niṣādasya tasyai vai vidheḥ tad karma aupayika jñāna ākṣepaka tvam

original: patnyās tu tādṛśajñānābhāve 'pi yajamānena sahādhikārāt tasya ca tādṛśajñānavattvāt tenai 'va ca tasyāḥ kāryasiddher no 'ttarakaratuvidhinām jñānākṣepakatvam /
analyzed: patnyāḥ tu tādṛśa jñāna abhāve yajamānena saha adhikārāt tasya ca tādṛśa jñānavat tvāt ca ca tasyāḥ kārya siddheḥ na u ttaraka ratu vidhinām jñāna ākṣepaka tvam

original: ye tu patnimātrakartṛkāḥ padārthā ājyāvekṣaṇādayas te jñānaṁ vinā 'kartṛmuṣṭinā iti tadvidhinām tadākṣepakatvaṁ svīkriyata iti /
analyzed: ye tu patni mātra kartṛkāḥ padārthāḥ ājya avekṣaṇa ādayaḥ te jñāna vinā kartṛ muṣṭinā iti tad vidhinām tad ākṣepaka tva svīkriyate iti

original: tat siddham adhyayanavidhisiddhajñānasyā 'dhārasiddhāgramattatyāś co 'ttarakaraṇasv adhikāriviśeṣaṇatvam iti /
analyzed: tat siddham adhyayana vidhi siddha jñānasya ā dhāra siddha agra mattatyāḥ ca u ttara karaṇasu adhikāri viśeṣaṇa tvam iti

original: evaṁ sāmarthyasyā 'py adhikāriviśeṣaṇatvam; asamarthaṁ prati vidhyapravṛtteḥ / ākhyātānām arthaṁ bruvatāṁ śaktiḥ sahakāriṇi 'ti nyāyāt /
analyzed: eva sāmarthyasya a pi adhikāri viśeṣaṇa tvam asamartha prati vidhi apravṛtteḥ ākhyātānām artha bruvatā śaktiḥ sahakāriṇi ti nyāyāt

original: tac ca sāmarthyaṁ kāmye karmany aṅgapradhānaviṣayam; na tv aṅgāsamarthaḥ pradhānamātrasamarthaś ca kāmye karmany adhikārī; pradhānavidher aṅgavidhyekavākyatāpannasya sāṅgakarmasamarthaṁ praty eva pravṛtteḥ; yathāvidhyogam adhikārāt /
analyzed: tat ca sāmarthya kāmye karmani aṅga pradhāna viṣayam na tu aṅga asamarthaḥ pradhāna mātra samarthaḥ ca kāmye karmani adhikārī pradhāna vidheḥ aṅga vidhi ekavākya tā āpannasya sa aṅga karma samartha prati eva pravṛtteḥ yathā vidhi yogam adhikārāt

original: yadi hi samarthaṁ praty eva pravṛttau kayācic chrutyā virodhaḥ syāt / tadā 'samarthasyā 'py adhikāraḥ syāt /
analyzed: yadi hi samartha prati eva pravṛttau kayācid śrutyā virodhaḥ syāt tadā samarthasya a pi adhikāraḥ syāt

original: na ca virodho 'sti / svargakāmaśruteḥ samarthaṁ praty eva pravṛttau virodhābhāvāt / pratyutā 'samarthaṁ prati pravṛttau pradhānavidher aṅgavākyaikavākyatayā pratipannasya 'ṅgasāhityasya bādhāpatteḥ / nityavacchrūtānām aṅgānāṁ pākṣikatvaprasaṅgāc ca /
analyzed: na ca virodhaḥ u sti svarga kāma śruteḥ samartha prati eva pravṛttau virodha abhāvāt pratyuta samartha prati pravṛttau pradhāna vidheḥ aṅga vākya ekavākyatayā pratipannasya ṅga sāhityasya bādha āpatteḥ nitya vat śrūtānām aṅgānā pākṣika tva prasaṅgāt ca

original: ataḥ sāṅge prayoge samarthasyai 'va kāmye karmany adhikāraḥ /
analyzed: atas sa aṅge prayoge samarthasyai kāmye karmani adhikāraḥ

original: nityakarmāṇāṁ tv aṅgeṣu yathāśaktinyāyaḥ /
analyzed: nityakarmāṇā tu aṅgeṣu yathāśakti nyāyaḥ

original: tāni hi yāvajjīvaśrutyā yāvajjīvaṁ kartavyatvena coditāni /
analyzed: tāni hi yāvajjīva śrutyā yāvajjīva kartavya tvena coditāni

original: na ca yāvajjīvaṁ kemāpi sāṅgaḥ prayogaḥ kartuṁ śakyate /
analyzed: na ca yāvat jīva sa aṅgaḥ prayogaḥ kartu śakyate

original: ato nityakarmasu pradhānamātrasamartho 'dhikārī; aṅgāni tu yāvanti kartuṁ śakyante / tāvanti kāryāṇi 'ty āstāṁ bahūktyā / sūribhiḥ parākrāntatvāt /
analyzed: atas nitya karmasu pradhāna mātra samarthaḥ dhikārī aṅgāni tu yāvanti kartu śakyante tāvanti kāryāṇi bahu uktyā sūribhiḥ parākrānta tvāt

original: tat siddhaṁ phalasvāmyabodhako vidhir adhikāravidhir iti /
analyzed: tat siddha phala svāmya bodhakaḥ vidhiḥ adhikāra vidhiḥ iti

original: tad evaṁ nirūpitaṁ caturvidhabhedanirūpaṇena vidheḥ prayojanavadarthaparyavasānam /
analyzed: tat eva caturvidha bheda nirūpaṇena vidheḥ prayojanavat artha paryavasānam

original: mantrāṇāṁ ca prayogasamavetārthasmārakatayā 'rthavattvam /
analyzed: mantrāṇā ca prayoga samaveta artha smāraka tayā ārthavat tvam

original: na tu taduccāraṇam adṛṣṭārtham / dṛṣṭe sambhavaty adṛṣṭasyā 'nyāyyatvāt /
analyzed: na tu tat uccāraṇam adṛṣṭa artham dṛṣṭe sambhavati adṛṣṭasya a nyāyya tvāt

original: na ca dṛṣṭasya prakārāntareṇā 'pi sambhavān mantrāmnānam anarthakam; mantrair eva smartavyam iti niyamavidhyāśrayaṇāt /
analyzed: na ca dṛṣṭasya prakāra antareṇa sambhavāt mantra āmnānam anarthakam mantraiḥ eva smartavyam iti niyama vidhi āśrayaṇāt

original: sādhanadvayasya pakṣaprāptāv anyatarasya sādhanasyā 'prāptatādaśāyāṁ yo vidhiḥ sa niyamavidhiḥ /
analyzed: sādhana dvayasya pakṣa prāptau anyatarasya sādhanasya prāpta tā daśāyāḥ yaḥ vidhiḥ sa niyama vidhiḥ

original: yathā 'huḥ /
analyzed: yathā huḥ

original: vidhir atyantam aprāpte niyamaḥ pākṣike sati tatra cā 'nyatra ca prāpte parisaṁkhye 'ti gīyate /
analyzed: vidhiḥ atyantam aprāpte niyamaḥ pākṣike sati tatra ca a nyatra ca prāpte parisakhye ti gīyate

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: asyā 'yam arthaḥ /
analyzed: asyāḥ yam arthaḥ

original: yasya yadarthatvam pramāṇāntareṇa 'prāptaṁ tasya tadarthatvena yo vidhiḥ so 'pūrvavidhiḥ; yathā yajeta svargakāma ityādiḥ /
analyzed: yasya yad artha tvam pramāṇa antareṇa tasya tad artha tvena yaḥ vidhiḥ saḥ pūrva vidhiḥ yathā yajeta svarga kāmaḥ ityādiḥ

original: yāgasya hi svargārthatvam pramāṇāntareṇa prāptam iti tv anena 'va vidhine 'ti bhavaty ayam apūrvavidhiḥ /
analyzed: yāgasya hi svarga artha tvam pramāṇa antareṇa prāptam iti tu anena vidhinā iti bhavati ayam apūrva vidhiḥ

original: pakṣe 'prāptasya tu yo vidhiḥ sa niyamavidhiḥ; yathā vrīhīn avahantiṁ 'tyādiḥ /
analyzed: pakṣe prāptasya tu yaḥ vidhiḥ sa niyama vidhiḥ yathā vrīhīn avahanti

original: anena hi vidhinā 'vaghātasya na vaitusyārthatvam bodhyate / anvayavyatirekasiddhatvāt; kiṁ tu niyamaḥ /
analyzed: anena hi vidhinā vaghātasya na bodhyate anvaya vyatireka siddha tvāt ki tu niyamaḥ

original: sa cā 'prāptāṁśapūraṇam; vaitusyasya hi nānopāyasādhyatvād yasyāṁ daśāyām avaghātaṁ parihṛtyo 'pāyāntaraṁ grahītum ārabhate / tasyāṁ daśāyām avaghātasyā 'prāptatvena tadvidhānātmakam aprāptāṁśapūraṇam evā 'nena vidhinā kriyate /
analyzed: sa ca prāpta āśa pūraṇam vaitusyasya hi nānā upāya sādhya tvāt yasyāḥ daśāyām avaghāta parihṛtya u pāya antara grahītum ārabhate tasyāḥ daśāyām avaghātasya prāpta tvena tad vidhāna ātmakam aprāpta āśa pūraṇam evā nena vidhinā kriyate

original: ataś ca niyamavidhāv aprāptāṁśapūraṇātmako niyama eva vākyārthaḥ; pakṣe 'prāptatādaśāyām avaghātavidhānam iti yāvat; na tv apūrvavidhāv ivā 'tyantāprāptatayā vidhānam iti /
analyzed: atas ca niyama vidhau aprāpta āśa pūraṇa ātmakaḥ niyamaḥ eva vākya arthaḥ pakṣe prāpta tā daśāyām avaghāta vidhānam iti yāvat na tu apūrva vidhau iva ā tyanta aprāpta tayā vidhānam iti

original: ubhayasya yugapat prāptāv itaravyāvṛttiparo vidhiḥ parisamkhyāvidhiḥ; yathā pañca pañcanakhā bhakṣyāḥ iti /
analyzed: ubhayasya yugapad prāptau itara vyāvṛtti paraḥ vidhiḥ parisamkhyā vidhiḥ yathā pañca pañcanakhāḥ bhakṣyāḥ iti

original: idam hi vākyam na bhakṣaṇavidhiparam / tasya rāgatah prāptatvāt; nā 'pi niyamaparam / pañcanakhāpañcanakhabhakṣaṇasya yugapatprāpteḥ pakṣe 'prāptyabhāvāt; ata idam pañcātiriktapañcanakhabhakṣaṇanivṛttiparam iti bhavati parisamkhyāvidhiḥ /
analyzed: idam hi vākyam na bhakṣaṇa vidhi param tasya rāgatah prāpta tvāt na a pi niyama param pañcanakha a pañcanakha bhakṣaṇasya yugapad prāpteḥ pakṣe prāpti abhāvāt atas idam pañca atirikta pañcanakha bhakṣaṇa nivṛtti param iti bhavati parisamkhyā vidhiḥ

original: sā ca parisamkhyā dvividhā / śrauti lākṣaṇikī ce 'ti /
analyzed: sā ca parisamkhyā dvividhā śrauti lākṣaṇikī ca ti

original: tatrā 'tra hy evā 'vapanti 'ty atra śrauti parisamkhyā; evakāreṇa pavamānātiriktatotravyāvṛtter abhidhānāt /
analyzed: tatra tra hi evā vapanti ti atra śrauti parisamkhyā evakāreṇa pavamāna atirikta totra vyāvṛtteḥ abhidhānāt

original: pañca pañcanakhā bhakṣyā ity atra tu lākṣaṇikī; itaranivṛttivācakasya padasyā 'bhāvāt /
analyzed: pañca pañcanakhāḥ bhakṣyāḥ iti atra tu lākṣaṇikī itara nivṛtti vācakasya padasya ā bhāvāt

original: ata evai 'ṣā tridoṣagrastā /
analyzed: atas eva eṣā tridoṣa grastā

original: doṣatrayam ca śrutahānir aśrutakalpanā prāptabādhaś ce 'ti;
analyzed: doṣa trayam ca śruta hāniḥ aśruta kalpanā prāpta bādhaḥ ca iti

original: śrutasya pañcanakhabhakṣaṇasya hānād aśrutapañcātirikta pañcanakhabhakṣaṇanivṛttikalpanāt prāptasya ca pañcātiriktapañcanakhabhakṣaṇasya bādhanād iti /
analyzed: śrutasya pañcanakha bhakṣaṇasya hānāt aśruta pañca atirikta pañcanakha bhakṣaṇa nivṛtti kalpanāt prāptasya ca pañca atirikta pañcanakha bhakṣaṇasya bādhanāt iti

original: asmiṃś ca doṣatraye doṣadvayam śabdaniṣṭham / prāptabādhas tu doṣo 'rthaniṣṭha iti dik /
analyzed: asmin ca doṣa traye doṣa dvayam śabda niṣṭham prāpta bādhaḥ tu doṣaḥ rtha niṣṭhaḥ iti diś

original: tat siddhañ mantrair eva smartavyam iti niyamavidhyāśrayaṇān na mantrāṇām amārthakaṃ /
analyzed: tat siddham mantraiḥ eva smartavyam iti niyama vidhi āśrayaṇāt na mantrāṇām

original: ataś ca yuktaṃ mantrāṇāṃ prayogasamavetārthasmārakatayā 'rthavattvaṃ /
analyzed: atas ca yuktam mantrāṇām prayoga samaveta artha smāraka tayā ā rthavat tvam

original: tatra ye mantrā yatra paṭhitās teṣāṃ tatra yady arthaprakāśanaṃ prayojanaṃ saṃbhavati / tadā tatrai 'va viniyogaḥ /
analyzed: tatra ye mantrāḥ yatra paṭhitāḥ teṣām tatra yadi artha prakāśanam prayojanam saṃbhavati tadā viniyogaḥ

original: yeṣāṃ tu na saṃbhavati / teṣāṃ yatra saṃbhavati tatro 'tkarṣaḥ;
analyzed: yeṣām tu na saṃbhavati teṣām yatra saṃbhavati tatra u tkarṣaḥ

original: yathā pūṣānumantranāmantrāṇām ity uktam /
analyzed: yathā pūṣa anumantranā mantrāṇām iti uktam

original: yeṣāṃ kvāpi na saṃbhavati / taduccāraṇasya tv agatyā 'dṛṣṭārthatvam /
analyzed: yeṣām kvāpi na saṃbhavati tad uccāraṇasya tu agatyā dṛṣṭārtha tvam

original: sarvathā 'pi tu teṣāṃ nā 'narthakyam iti /nāmadheyānāṃ vidheyārthaparichedakatayā 'rthavattvam /
analyzed: sarvathā tu teṣām na ā narthakyam iti nāmadheyānām vidheya artha parichedaka tayā ārthavat tvam

original: tathā hi /
analyzed: tathā hi

original: udbhidā yajeta paśukāma ity atro 'dbhicchado yāganāmadheyam /
analyzed: udbhidā yajeta paśu kāmaḥ iti atra u dbhicchadaḥ yāga nāmadheyam

original: tena ca vidheyārthaparichedaḥ kriyate /
analyzed: tena ca vidheya artha parichedaḥ kriyate

original: anena hi vākyena 'prāptatvāt phaloddeśena yāgo vidhīyate /
analyzed: anena hi vākyena prāpta tvāt phala uddeśena yāgaḥ vidhīyate

original: yāgasāmānyasya ca 'vidheyatvād yāgaviśeṣa eva vidhīyate /
analyzed: yāga sāmānyasya ca vidheya tvāt yāga viśeṣaḥ eva vidhīyate

original: tatra ko 'sau viśeṣa ity apekṣāyām udbhicchabdād udbhidrūpo yāga iti jñāyate; udbhidā yāgene 'ti sāmānādhikaraṇyena nāmadheyānvayāt /
analyzed: tatra kaḥ sau viśeṣaḥ iti apekṣāyām udbhid śabdāt udbhid rūpaḥ yāgaḥ iti jñāyate udbhidā yāgena iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena nāmadheya anvayāt

original: tasya ca yajñā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na nīlotpalādiśabdavat /
analyzed: tasya ca sāmānādhikaraṇyam na nīlotpala ādi śabda vat

original: tatra hy utpalaśabdasya 'rthād utpalādanyo nīlaśabdasya vācyārtha iti nīlaguṇaḥ /
analyzed: tatra hi utpala śabdasya rthāt utpalāt anyaḥ nīla śabdasya vācyārthaḥ iti nīla guṇaḥ

original: tatsarvena sāmānādhikaraṇyam /
analyzed: tad sarvena sāmānādhikaraṇyam

original: udbhicchabdasya tu paryāyagatayāgaviśeṣān nā 'nyo vācyo 'rtho 'sti viśeṣavācitvāt tasya /
analyzed: udbhid śabdasya tu paryāya gata yāga viśeṣāt na a nyaḥ vācyaḥ rthaḥ sti viśeṣa vāci tvāt tasya

original: ataś cā 'rthāntaravācitvābhāvena na nāmadheyasya nīlaśabdavat sāmānādhikaraṇyam / kiṃ tarhi vaiśvadevyāmikṣe 'ty atrā 'mikṣāśabdavat /
analyzed: atas ca artha antara vāci tva abhāvena na nāmadheyasya nīla śabda vat sāmānādhikaraṇyam kim tarhi vaiśvadevī āmikṣā iti atra ā mikṣā śabda vat

original: vaiśvadeviśabdasya hi devatātadhitāntatvāt taddhitasya ca sā 'sya devate 'ti sarvanāmārthe smaraṇāt sarvanāmnāṃ co 'pasthitaviśeṣavācitvena viśeṣaparatvam /
analyzed: vaiśvadevi śabdasya hi devatā tad hita anta tvāt taddhitasya ca sā sya devatā ti sarvanāma arthe smaraṇāt sarvanāmnām ca upasthita viśeṣa vāci tvena viśeṣa paratvam

original: tatra ko 'sau vaiśvadeviśabdopātto viśeṣa ity apekṣāyām āmikṣāpadāsāṃnidhyād āmikṣārūpo viśeṣa ity avagamyate /
analyzed: tatra kaḥ sau vaiśvadevi śabda upāttaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti apekṣāyām āmikṣā pada asāṃnidhyāt āmikṣā rūpaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti avagamyate

original: yathā 'huḥ /
analyzed: yathā huḥ

original: āmikṣāṃ devatāyuktāṃ vadaty evai 'ṣa taddhitaḥ āmikṣāpadasāṃnidhyāt tasyai 'va viṣayārpaṇam /
analyzed: āmikṣām devatā yuktām vadati evai sa taddhitaḥ āmikṣā pada sāṃnidhyāt tasyai viṣaya arpaṇam

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: tathā /
analyzed: tathā

original: śrutyai 'vo 'papadasya 'rthaḥ sarvanāmnā 'bhidhīyate tadarthas taddhitenai 'vaṃ trayāṇām ekavācyatā /
analyzed: śrutyai vaḥ pa padasya rthaḥ sarvanāmnā abhidhīyate tad arthaḥ taddhitena vam trayāṇām eka vācya tā

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: tasmād yathā vaiśvadeviśabdopāttaviśeṣasamarpakatvena 'mikṣāpadasya vaiśvadeviśabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyam evaṃ sāmānyasya 'vidheyatvād yājyavagatayāgaviśeṣasamarpakatvena nāmadheyasya yajñā sāmānādhikaraṇyam /
analyzed: tasmāt yathā vaiśvadevi śabda upātta viśeṣa samarpaka tvena mikṣā padasya vaiśvadevi śabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyam evam sāmānyasya vidheya tvāt yāji avagata yāga viśeṣa samarpaka tvena nāmadheyasya yajñā sāmānādhikaraṇyam

original: tat siddhaṃ nāmadheyānāṃ vidheyārthaparichedakatayā 'rthavattvam /
analyzed: tat siddham nāmadheyānām vidheya artha parichedaka tayā ārthavat tvam

original: yathā 'huḥ /
analyzed: yathā huḥ

original: tadadhīnatvād yāgaviśeṣasiddher iti /nāmadheyatvaṃ ca nimittacatuṣṭayāt /
analyzed: tad adhīna tvāt yāga viśeṣa siddheḥ iti nāmadheya tvam ca nimitta catuṣṭayāt

original: matvarthalakṣaṇābhayāt / vākyabhedābhayāt / tatprakṛtyāśāstrāt / tadvyapadeśāc ca /
analyzed: matu artha lakṣaṇa abhayāt vākya bheda abhayāt tad prakṛtyā aśāstrāt tad vyapadeśāt ca

original: tatro 'dbhidā yajeta paśukāma ity atro 'dbhicchabdasya yāganāmadheyatvaṃ matvarthalakṣaṇābhayāt /
analyzed: tatra u dbhidā yajeta paśu kāmaḥ iti atra u dbhid śabdasya yāga nāmadheya tvam matu artha lakṣaṇā bhayāt

original: tathā hi /
analyzed: tathā hi

original: udbhicchabdasya guṇasamarpakatve yāgānuvādena tāvan na guṇavidhānaṃ yujyate / phalapadānarthakyapatteḥ /
analyzed: udbhid śabdasya guṇa samarpaka tve yāga anuvādena tāvat na guṇa vidhānam yujyate phala pada ānarthakya patteḥ

original: na cā 'nena vākyena phalaṃ prati yāgavidhānaṃ saṃnihitasya guṇavidhānaṃ yujyate / vākyabhedāpatteḥ /
analyzed: na ca ā nena vākyena phalam prati yāga vidhānam saṃnihitasya guṇa vidhānam yujyate vākya bheda āpatteḥ

original: nā 'pi guṇaphalasaṃbandhavidhānaṃ saṃbhavati / parapadārthavidhānena viprakṛṣṭārthavidhānāpatteḥ / dhātvarthasya svarūpeṇa 'vidhānāt taduddeśena vā 'nyasya kasyacid avidhānāt dhātor atyantapārārthyāpatteś ca / yājyānarthakyaāpatteś ca /
analyzed: nā pi guṇa phala saṃbandha vidhānam saṃbhavati para padārtha vidhānena viprakṛṣṭa artha vidhāna āpatteḥ dhātvarthasya sva rūpeṇa vidhānāt tad uddeśena vā nyasya kasyacid avidhānāt dhātoḥ atyanta pārārthya āpatteḥ ca yājya ānarthakya āpatteḥ ca

original: na hi tadā 'nena karaṇaṃ samarpyate / guṇasya karaṇatvenā 'nvayāt; nā 'pi phalam / paśor bhāvyatvenā 'nvayāt /
analyzed: na hi tadā nena karaṇam samarpyate guṇasya karaṇa tvena a nvayāt na a pi phalam paśoḥ bhāvya tvena a nvayāt

original: atha guṇaphalasaṃbandhavidhāne yāgasyā 'śrayatvena saṃbandha iti cet / na /
analyzed: atha guṇa phala saṃbandha vidhāne yāgasya ā śraya tvena saṃbandhaḥ iti ced na

original: yajete 'ty atrā 'śrayatvavācakapadābhāvāt /
analyzed: yajeta iti atra ā śraya tva vācaka pada abhāvāt

original: atha siddhānte karaṇatvaṃ ivā 'śrayatvam api lakṣyam iti cet / na /
analyzed: atha siddhānte karaṇa tvam iva ā śraya tvam api lakṣyam iti ced na

original: āśrayatvaapekṣayā karaṇatvasya laghutvena tallakṣaṇāyā eva yuktatvāt /
analyzed: āśraya tva apekṣayā karaṇa tvasya laghu tvena tad lakṣaṇāyāḥ eva yukta tvāt

original: phalāya vidhīyamāno guṇo yatra kārakatāṃ āpadyate sa āśrayaḥ / tattvaṃ cā 'śrayatvam; karaṇatvaṃ ca niṣkṛṣṭā śaktir iti lāghavam /
analyzed: phalāya vidhīyamānaḥ guṇaḥ yatra kāraka tām āpadyate saḥ āśrayaḥ tattvam ca ā śraya tvam karaṇa tvam ca niṣkṛṣṭā śaktiḥ iti lāghavam

original: kiṃ ca guṇaphalasaṃbandhavidhāne karaṇībhūto guṇas tanniṣṭhaṃ vā karaṇatvaṃ phaloddeśena vidheyam /
analyzed: kim ca guṇa phala saṃbandha vidhāne karaṇībhūtaḥ guṇaḥ tad niṣṭham vā karaṇa tvam phala uddeśena vidheyam

original: tatrā 'dye pakṣe karaṇatvasya guṇopasarjanatve na pratītir lakṣaṇāyai 'va vācyā / tasya tṛtīyāpratyayārthatvāt prādhānyeno 'papatteh /
analyzed: tatra ā dye pakṣe karaṇa tvasya guṇa upasarjana tve na pratītiḥ lakṣaṇāyai vācyā tasya tṛtīyā pratyaya artha tvāt

original: yadā 'pi guṇaniṣṭhaṃ karaṇatvaṃ phaloddeśena vidheyaṃ tadā 'pi phalabhāvanāyāṃ karaṇatvenā 'nvayayogyaguṇaniṣṭhakaraṇatvopasthitir lakṣaṇāyai 'va vācyā / tṛtīyābhihitasya karaṇakārakasya kriyānvayayogyasya karaṇatvenā 'nvayāyogyatvāt /
analyzed: yadā pi guṇa niṣṭham karaṇa tvam phala uddeśena vidheyam tadā pi phala bhāvanāyām karaṇa tvena a nvaya yogya guṇa niṣṭha karaṇa tva upasthitiḥ lakṣaṇāyai vācyā tṛtīya abhihitasya karaṇa kārakasya kriyā anvaya yogyasya karaṇa tvena a nvaya ayogya tvāt

original: karaṇaśabdenā 'bhihitaṃ hi karaṇakārakaṃ tattvena 'nvayāyogyaṃ na tṛtīyābhihitam / karaṇaśabdād iva tṛtīyātas tṛtīyotpattiprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: karaṇa śabdena abhihitam hi karaṇa kārakam tattvena nvaya ayogyam na tṛtīyā abhihitam karaṇa śabdāt iva tṛtīyātaḥ tṛtīya utpatti prasaṅgāt

original: ataś ca karaṇatvenā 'nvayayogyaguṇaniṣṭhakaraṇatvopasthitir lakṣaṇāyai 'va vācyā /
analyzed: atas ca karaṇatvena anvaya yogya guṇa niṣṭha karaṇatva upasthitiḥ lakṣaṇāyai vācyā

original: lakṣaṇayā co 'pasthitakaraṇatvasya karaṇībhūtasya vā guṇasya phalabhāvanāyāṃ yatkaraṇatvaṁ tad api lakṣaṇāyai 'va vācyam / śrūyamāṇāyā tṛtīyayā guṇamātrasya yāgaṁ prati karaṇatvābhidhānāt /
analyzed: lakṣaṇayā ca upasthita karaṇa tvasya karaṇībhūtasya vā guṇasya phala bhāvanāyām yat karaṇa tva tat api lakṣaṇāyai vācyam śrūyamāṇāyā tṛtīyayā guṇa mātrasya yāga prati karaṇa tva abhidhānāt

original: ata eva ghaṭabhramaṇe cakurtheti karaṇībhūtāgodohanādeḥ paśvarthatvaṁ samabhivyāhārād ity uktam /
analyzed: atas eva ghaṭa bhramaṇe cakurtha iti karaṇībhūta ā godohana ādeḥ paśu artha tva samabhivyāhārāt iti uktam

original: ataś ca guṇaphalasaṁbandhavidhāne dhātor atyantapārārthyādibahudoṣavatttvād udbhicchabdasya guṇasamarpakatve guṇaviśiṣṭakarmavidhānam eva svīkāryam /
analyzed: atas ca guṇa phala sabandha vidhāne dhātoḥ atyanta pārārthya ādi bahu doṣavattvāt udbhid śabdasya guṇa samarpaka tve guṇa viśiṣṭa karma vidhānam eva svīkāryam

original: tathā sati hi yajinā laghubhūtaṁ karaṇatvamātraṁ lakṣyate / udbhicchabdena ca prakṛtyaṁśena matvarthamātraṁ lakṣyam iti guṇaphalasaṁbandhavidhānāl lāghavaṁ bhavati /
analyzed: tathā sati hi yajinā laghu bhūta karaṇa tva mātra lakṣyate udbhid śabdena ca prakṛti aśena lakṣyam iti guṇa phala sabandha vidhānāt lāghava bhavati

original: dhātor atyantapārārthyādikaṁ tu na bhavaty eva / dhātvartha'syai 'va phaloddeśena lakṣaṇā /
analyzed: tu na bhavati eva

original: ataś co 'dbhicchabdasya guṇasamarpakatve tena matvarthaṁ lakṣayitvā guṇaviśiṣṭakarmavidhānaṁ svīkāryam / udbhidatā yāgena paśuṁ bhāvayed iti /
analyzed: atas ca u dbhid śabdasya guṇa samarpaka tve tena lakṣayitvā guṇa viśiṣṭa karma vidhāna svīkāryam udbhidatā yāgena paśu bhāvayet iti

original: karmanāmadheyatve tū 'dbhicchabdasya na matvarthalakṣaṇā / mukhyayai 'va vṛttyā yajisāmānādhikaraṇyena tasyā 'nvayasaṁbhavāt / udbhidā yāgena paśuṁ bhāvayed iti /
analyzed: karma nāmadheya tve tu udbhid śabdasya na matu artha lakṣaṇā mukhyayai vā vṛttyā yaji sāmānādhikaraṇyena tasyāḥ nvaya sabhavāt udbhidā yāgena paśu bhāvayet iti

original: saṁbhavati ca mukhye 'rthe lakṣaṇā 'śrayituṁ na yuktā /
analyzed: sabhavati ca mukhye rthe lakṣaṇā śrayitu na yuktā

original: saṁnikṛṣṭavidhānaṁ tu samānam eva /
analyzed: tu samānam eva

original: na cai 'vaṁ somene yajete 'ty atrā 'pi somapadasya yāganāmadheyatvāpāto guṇasamarpakatve matvarthalakṣaṇāpatter iti vācyam / somapadasya tatāyāṁ rūḍhatvena yāganāmadheyatvānupapatteḥ agatyā lakṣaṇāśrayaṇāt /
analyzed: na ca i yajeta iti atra api soma padasya yāga nāmadheya tva āpātaḥ guṇa samarpaka tve matu artha lakṣaṇa āpatteḥ iti vācyam soma padasya tatāyāḥ rūḍha tvena yāga nāmadheya tva anupapatteḥ agatyā lakṣaṇa āśrayaṇāt

original: udbhicchabdasya tu nai 'vaṁ vācyo 'rthaḥ kaścit prasiddhaḥ; udbhidyate 'nene 'ti yogasya tu guṇa iva yāge 'pi phalodbbhedanakāriṇy upapatteḥ /
analyzed: udbhid śabdasya tu vācyaḥ arthaḥ kaścid prasiddhaḥ udbhidyate nena iti yogasya tu guṇaḥ iva yāge pi phala udbbhedana kāriṇī upapatteḥ

original: tat siddham udbhicchabdasya matvarthalakṣaṇābhayād yāganāmadheyatvam iti /
analyzed: tat siddham udbhid śabdasya matu artha lakṣaṇā bhayāt yāga nāmadheya tvam iti

original: citrayā yajeta paśukāma ity atra citrāśabdasya vākyabhedābhayāt karmanāmadheyatvam /
analyzed: citrayā yajeta paśu kāmaḥ iti atra citrā śabdasya vākya bheda abhayāt karma nāmadheya tvam

original: tathā hi /
analyzed: tathā hi

original: na tāvad atra guṇaviśiṣṭayāgavidhānaṁ saṁbhavati / dadhi madhu payo ghṛtaṁ dhānā udakaṁ taṇḍulās tat saṁsṛṣṭaṁ prājāpatyam ity anena vihitatvād yāgasya viśiṣṭavidhānānupapatteḥ /tasya ca yāgasya phalasaṃbandhe guṇasaṃbandhe ca vidhīyamāne vākyabhedaḥ /
analyzed: na tāvat atra guṇa viśiṣṭa yāga vidhāna sabhavati dadhi madhu payaḥ ghṛta dhānā udaka taṇḍulāḥ tat sasṛṣṭa prājāpatyam iti anena vihita tvāt yāgasya viśiṣṭa vidhāna anupapatteḥ tasya ca yāgasya phala saṃbandhe guṇa saṃbandhe ca vidhīyamāne vākya bhedaḥ

original: atha citrāśabdāc citratvastritvavoḥ pratipatteh strītvasya ca svabhāvataḥ prāṇidharmatvāt prakṛte dadhyādidravyake karmaṇi niveśāyogān nā 'nena vākyena prakṛte karmaṇi guṇavidhānaṃ kiṃ tu prāṇidravyake karmaṇi /
analyzed: atha citrā śabdāt citra tva stri tvavoḥ pratipattyāḥ iha strī tvasya ca svabhāvataḥ prāṇi dharma tvāt prakṛte dadhi ādi dravyake karmaṇi niveśa ayogāt na ā nena vākyena prakṛte karmaṇi guṇa vidhānam kim tu prāṇi dravyake karmaṇi

original: tatrā 'sya vākyasyā 'nārabhyādhitatvād anārabhyādhitānāṃ ca prakṛtau vā 'dviruktavād iti nyāyena prakṛtigāmitvāt / prāṇidravyakāṇāṃ ca yāgānāṃ daikṣasya ce 'tareṣv' iti nyāyenā 'gniṣomīyaprakṛtikatvāt tadanuvādenā 'nena vākyena guṇo vidhīyate /
analyzed: tatra sya vākyasya ā an ārabhya ādhita tvāt an ārabhya ādhitānām ca prakṛtau vā iti nyāyena prakṛti gāmi tvāt prāṇi dravyakāṇām ca yāgānām daikṣasya iti nyāyena ā agniṣomīya prakṛtika tvāt tad anuvādena ā nena vākyena guṇaḥ vidhīyate

original: daikṣasya ca jyotiṣṭomāṅgatvena svatantraphalatvākāṅkṣāyā abhāvāt paśubandhapadena na phalāntaraparakaṃ / kiṃ tv aṅgutsonmīyapaśvyājanāṅgatayā prāptakāmanānuvādaḥ /
analyzed: daikṣasya ca jyotiṣṭoma aṅga tvena svatantra phalatva ākāṅkṣāyāḥ abhāvāt paśubandha padena na phala antara parakam kim tu aṅgutsa unmīya paśu yājana aṅgatayā prāpta kāmanā anuvādaḥ

original: tathā ca na vākyabhedaḥ iti cet / tathā 'pi daikṣānuvādena citratvastritvavidhāne vākyabhedād viśiṣṭakārakavidhāne 'pi gauravālakṣaṇo vākyabheda eva; kārakasyā 'pi prāptatvena viśiṣṭavidhānānupapatteś ca; kāmapadasyā 'pi svarasataḥ phalaparasya kāmanānuvādatva ānarthākyāpatteś ca /
analyzed: tathā ca na vākya bhedaḥ iti ced tathā pi daikṣa anuvādena citra tva stri tva vidhāne vākya bhedāt viśiṣṭa kāraka vidhāne pi gaurava a lakṣaṇaḥ vākya bhedaḥ eva kārakasya api prāptatvena viśiṣṭa vidhāna anupapatteḥ ca kāma padasya api svarasataḥ phala parasya kāmanā anuvāda tve ānarthākya āpatteḥ ca

original: na ca niyamataḥ paśvarjanakāmanā bhavati / kāmanātaḥ prāg eva kenacid datte paśau tadabhāvāt /
analyzed: na ca niyamataḥ paśu arjana kāmanā bhavati kāmanātaḥ prāk eva kenacid datte paśau tad abhāvāt

original: tathā ca paśukāmapadasya nityavacchravanāt siddhiḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca paśu kāma padasya nitya vat śravanāt siddhiḥ

original: daikṣasyo 'tpattiśiṣṭapuṃstvāvaruddhatvena tatra strītvavidhānānupapatteś ca / āmikṣāyāgānuvādena vājinavidhānavat; kṛṣṇasāraṅgo 'gniṣomīya iti viśeṣavihitena svasaṃnidhipathitena ca kṛṣṇasāraṅgavarṇena 'varuddhe citratvasya 'nārabhyādhitena sāmānyaśāstreṇa vidhānānupapatteś ca / pañcadaśyāvaruddha iva sāptadaśyavidhānam /
analyzed: daikṣasya u tpatti śiṣṭa puṃstva avaruddha tvena tatra strī tva vidhāna anupapatteḥ ca āmikṣā yāga anuvādena vājina vidhāna vat kṛṣṇa sāraṅgaḥ gniṣomīyaḥ iti viśeṣa vihitena sva saṃnidhi pathitena ca kṛṣṇa sāraṅga varṇena varuddhe citra tvasya sāmānya śāstreṇa vidhāna anupapatteḥ ca pañcadaśyā avaruddhe iva sāptadaśya vidhānam

original: atha mā bhūd agniṣomīyapaśvanuvādena citratvastritvavidhānaṃ; sārasvatī meṣī' 'ti vākyavihitayāgāṅgameṣyanuvādena tu guṇavidhānaṃ syāt / citraye 'ti strīkārakānuvādena citratvamatravidhānāt /
analyzed: atha mā bhūt agniṣomīya paśu anuvādena citra tva stri tva vidhānam sārasvatī meṣī ti vākya vihita yāga aṅga meṣī anuvādena tu guṇa vidhānam syāt citraye ti strī kāraka anuvādena citra tva matra vidhānāt

original: na ca prākṛtena kṛṣṇasāraṅgavarṇenanairākāṅkṣyān na citratvavadhānaṁ yuktam iti vācyam; upadiṣṭena citratvena 'tidiṣṭasya varṇāntarasya bādhopapatter iti cet—
analyzed: na ca prākṛtena yuktam iti vācyam upadiṣṭena citra tvena tidiṣṭasya varṇa antarasya bādhā upapatteḥ iti ced

original: na hi citraye 'ty ekena padena strikārakasyo 'ddeśaḥ citratvasya ca vidhānaṁ saṁbhavati; ekaprasaratābhaṅgalakṣaṇavākyabhedāpatteḥ; uddeśyavidheyabhāvasya 'nekapadasādhyatvāt /
analyzed: na hi citraye ti ekena padena sabhavati eka prasara tā bhaṅga lakṣaṇa vākya bheda āpatteḥ uddeśya vidheya bhāvasya neka pada sādhya tvāt

original: ata eva vaṣaṭkartuḥ prathamabhakṣa ity atra viśiṣṭabhakṣavidhir na tu bhakṣānuvādena prāthamyavidhir ity uktaṁ tṛtīye /
analyzed: atas eva vaṣaṭkartuḥ prathama bhakṣaḥ iti atra viśiṣṭa bhakṣa vidhiḥ na tu bhakṣa anuvādena prāthamya vidhiḥ iti ukta tṛtīye

original: meṣyānuvādena citratvavadhāne phalapadānarthākyāpatteś ca; ubhayavadhāne vākyabhedāt / prakṛtasya ca yāgasya phalākāṅkṣāyā anivṛtteḥ /
analyzed: meṣyā anuvādena citra tva avadhāne ca ubhaya avadhāne vākya bhedāt prakṛtasya ca yāgasya phala ākāṅkṣāyāḥ anivṛtteḥ

original: viśvajinyāyena phalakalpane gauravaṁ dadhīmadhvityadṛṣṭāpattivākyenai 'tasya 'dhikāravākyasya pratipannaikavākyatābādhena vākyabhedaprasaṅgāc ca /
analyzed: viśvaji nyāyena phala kalpane tasya dhikāra vākyasya pratipanna eka vākya tā bādhena vākya bheda prasaṅgāt ca

original: citrāśabdasya tu karmanāmadheyatve prakṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalākāṅkṣasya phalasaṁbandhamātrakaraṇān na vākyabhedaḥ; prakṛtāyā iṣṭer anekadravyakatvena citrāśabdasya tatro 'papatteḥ /
analyzed: citrā śabdasya tu karma nāmadheya tve prakṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phala ākāṅkṣasya phala sabandha mātra karaṇāt na vākya bhedaḥ prakṛtāyāḥ iṣṭeḥ aneka dravyaka tvena citrā śabdasya tatra u papatteḥ

original: tat siddhaṁ vākyabhedabhayāc citrāśabdaḥ karmanāmadheyam iti /
analyzed: tat siddha vākya bheda bhayāt citrā śabdaḥ karma nāmadheyam iti

original: agnihotraṁ juhoti 'ty atrā 'gnihotraśabdasya karmanāmadheyatvaṁ tatprakhyāśāstrāt /
analyzed: agnihotra juhoti ti atra agnihotra śabdasya karma nāmadheya tva tad prakhyā śāstrāt

original: tasya guṇasya prakhyāpakasya prāpakasya śāstrasya vidyamānatvena 'gnihotraśabdaḥ karmanāmadheyam iti yāvat /
analyzed: tasya guṇasya prakhyāpakasya prāpakasya śāstrasya vidyamāna tvena gnihotra śabdaḥ karma nāmadheyam iti yāvat

original: tathā hi /
analyzed: tathā hi

original: vidhinā tāvat tad eva vidheyaṁ yat prakārāntareṇa 'prāptam; aprāpte śāstram arthavad iti nyāyāt /
analyzed: vidhinā tāvat tat eva yat prakāra antareṇa prāptam aprāpte śāstram arthavat iti nyāyāt

original: agnihotraśabdasya ca guṇavidhitve yo guṇas tena vidheyaḥ sa śāstrāntareṇa prāptaḥ /
analyzed: agnihotra śabdasya ca guṇa vidhi tve yaḥ guṇaḥ tena vidheyaḥ sa śāstra antareṇa prāptaḥ

original: katham iti cet / śṛṇu /
analyzed: katham iti ced śṛṇu

original: yadi tāvad agnau hotram asminn iti saptamīsamāsam āśritya homādhāratvena 'gnir vidheya ity ucyeta / tadā yad bhavantīye juhoti 'ty anenai 'va prāptatvād vidhyānarthakyam /
analyzed: yadi tāvat agnau hotram asmin iti saptamī samāsam āśritya homa ādhāra tvena gniḥ vidheyaḥ iti ucyeta tadā yat bhavantīye juhoti prāpta tvāt vidhi ānarthakyam

original: athā 'gnaye hotram asminn iti caturthīsamāsam āśritya 'gnirūpadevatā 'nena samarpyata iti cet / na; śāstrāntareṇaprāptatvāt /
analyzed: atha gnaye hotram asmin iti caturthī samāsam āśritya gni rūpa devatā nena samarpyate iti ced na śāstra antareṇa aprāptatvāt

original: kiṁ tac chāstrāntaram iti ced atra kecid yad agnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyaṁ juhoti ti śāstrāntareṇa homānuvādena gniprajāpatyor vidhānaṁ na gnihotrapadaṁ devātāsamarpakaṁ /
analyzed: ki tat śāstra antaram iti ced atra kecid yat agnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyam juhoti śāstra antareṇa homa anuvādena gni prajāpatyoḥ vidhāna na gnihotra pada devātā samarpaka

original: na co bhayavidhāne vākyabhedaḥ /
analyzed: na caḥ u bhaya vidhāne vākya bhedaḥ

original: parasparānirapekṣavidhāne hi vākyabhedaḥ syāt / agnaye juhoti prajāpataye juhoti ti pratyekaṁ vidhivyāpārāt /
analyzed: paraspara anirapekṣa vidhāne hi vākya bhedaḥ syāt agnaye juhoti prajāpataye juhoti ti pratyeka vidhi vyāpārāt

original: caśabdāśravaṇāt tu parasparāsāpekṣasyai va padadvayasyā khyātānvayān na vākyabhedaḥ /
analyzed: caśabda aśravaṇāt tu khyāta anvayāt na vākya bhedaḥ

original: ata evaṁ tvigbhyo dakṣiṇāṁ dadāti ti vākyavihitadakṣiṇānuvādena gauś cā śvaś cā śvataraś ca gardabhaś cā jāś cā vayaś ca vrihayaś ca yavāś ca tilāś ca māṣāś ca tasya dvādaśaśataṁ dakṣiṇā itivākyena gavādināṁ vidhānaṁ dvādaśaśatānāṁ saṁgacchaṁ te / parasparāsāpekṣāṇāṁ gavādinām vidhānena vākyabhedābhāvāt /
analyzed: atas eva tvigbhyaḥ dakṣiṇāḥ dadāti vākya vihita dakṣiṇā anuvādena gauḥ ca śvaḥ ca śvataraḥ ca gardabhaḥ ca jāḥ ca vayaḥ ca vrihayaḥ ca yavāḥ ca tilāḥ ca māṣāḥ ca tasya dvādaśaśata dakṣiṇāḥ iti vākyena go ādinā vidhāna dvādaśa śatānām te  /

original: anyathā dakṣiṇānuvādena naikeṣāṁ gavādinām vidhānam nai va saṁgacchete ti /
analyzed: anyathā dakṣiṇā anuvādena na ekeṣām go ādinām vidhānam na e va sagacchete ti

original: agniprajāpatyoś ca devatayoḥ satoḥ samuccayo na tu samuccitayor devatātvam / pṛthakkārakavibhaktiśravaṇāt; cakārārthasya vibhaktyarthenā nvayāt tasyā prādhānyāt /
analyzed: agni prajāpatyoḥ ca devatayoḥ satoḥ samuccayaḥ na tu samuccitayoḥ devatā tvam pṛthak kāraka vibhakti śravaṇāt cakāra arthasya vibhakti arthena a nvayāt

original: ataś ca nā gniṣomādivad agniprajāpatyor devatātvam iti /
analyzed: atas ca na agniṣoma ādi vat agni prajāpatyoḥ devatā tvam iti

original: anye tv ācāryā āhuḥ /
analyzed: anye tu ācāryāḥ āhuḥ

original: yad agnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyaṁ juhoti tivākyaṁ nā gneḥ prāpakam / homānuvādena prajāpatividhānāt /
analyzed: yat agnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāya juhoti na a gneḥ prāpakam homa anuvādena prajāpati vidhānāt

original: na ca vinigamanāvirahād ubhayavidhānaṁ yuktam iti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca vinigamana avirahāt yuktam iti vācyam

original: vidhiṁ hi tad eva vidhīyate yat prakārāntareṇa prāptam /
analyzed: vidhi hi tat eva vidhīyate yat prakāra antareṇa prāptam

original: tatra yathā tena vākyena sāyaṁkālo na vidhīyate / sāyaṁ juhoti ti vacanāntareṇa prāptatvāt / tathā gnir api na vidhīyate gnir jyotir jyotir agniḥ svāhe tīmantravarṇād eva prāptatvāt /
analyzed: tatra yathā tena vākyena sāya kālaḥ na vidhīyate sāya juhoti ti vacana antareṇa prāpta tvāt tathā gniḥ api na vidhīyate gniḥ jyotiḥ jyotiḥ agniḥ svāhe eva prāpta tvāt

original: mantravarṇasyā pi devatāsamarpakatvam asty eva /
analyzed: mantra varṇasya a pi devatā samarpaka tvam asti eva

original: ata evo pāṁśuyaje viṣṇvādīnāṁ māntravarṇikaṁ devatātvam ity uktam /
analyzed: atas eva u pāśuyaje viṣṇu ādīnām māntravarṇika devatā tvam iti uktam

original: nanv evaṁ prajāpatidevatayā gner bādhaḥ syāt /
analyzed: nanu eva prajāpati devatayā gneḥ bādhaḥ syāt

original: caturthyā hi prajāpater devatātvam avagamyate / agnes tu māntravarṇikam /
analyzed: caturthyā hi prajāpateḥ devatā tvam avagamyate agneḥ tu māntravarṇikam

original: tatra śeṣa sya devatā ti devatātve taddhitasmaraṇavad yady api devatātve caturthīsmaraṇaṁ nā 'sti / saṁpradāne caturthī 'ti saṁpradāne tasyāḥ smaraṇāt / tathā 'pi nyāyamānādivyoddeśyatvaṁ tāvad devatātvam / tac ca saṁpradānasvarūpāntargataṁ / tyajyamānādivyoddeśyatve sati pratigrahītṛtvasya saṁpradānatvāt /
analyzed: tatra śeṣa devatā devatā tve taddhita smaraṇa vat yadi api devatā tve sti sapradāne caturthī sapradānā tasyāḥ smaraṇāt tathā devatā tvam tat ca sapradāna svarūpa antargata tyajyamāna divya uddeśya tve sati pratigrahītṛ tvasya sapradāna tvāt

original: ataś caturthītaḥ saṁpradānaikadesatayā devatātvapratītir asty eva /
analyzed: atas caturthītaḥ sapradāna eka desa tayā devatā tva pratītiḥ asti eva

original: mantravarnāt tu na devatātvaṁ pratīyate / kiṁ tv adhiṣṭhānamātram /
analyzed: tu na devatā tva pratīyate ki tu adhiṣṭhāna mātram

original: ataś ca mantravarnāś caturthīto durbalaḥ /
analyzed: atas ca caturthītaḥ durbalaḥ

original: yathā 'huḥ /
analyzed: yathā huḥ

original: taddhitena caturthyā vā mantravarnena vā punaḥ devatāyā vidhis tatra durbalaṁ tu paraṁ param /
analyzed: taddhitena caturthyā vā vā punar devatāyāḥ vidhiḥ tatra

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: ataś ca prabalapramāṇabodhitaprajāpatidevatayā durbalapramāṇabodhitāgner bādhaḥ syād iti cet—
analyzed: atas ca prabala pramāṇa bodhita prajāpati devatayā durbala pramāṇa bodhita agneḥ bādhaḥ syāt iti ced

original: satyam /
analyzed: satyam

original: syād bādho yadi prajāpataye juhoti 'ti kevalaṁ prajāpatividhānaṁ syāt /
analyzed: syāt bādhaḥ yadi prajāpataye juhoti ti kevala prajāpati vidhāna syāt

original: vidhīyamānas tu prajāpatir mantravarnāprāptam agnim anūdya tatsamuccito homoddeśena vidhīyate; samuccitobhayavidhānāpekṣayā 'nyataḥ prāptam agnim anūdya tatsamuccitaprajāpatimātravidhāne lāghavāt /
analyzed: vidhīyamānaḥ tu prajāpatiḥ a prāptam agnim anūdya tad samuccitaḥ homa uddeśena vidhīyate samuccita ubhaya vidhāna apekṣayā nyatas prāptam agnim anūdya tad samuccita prajāpati mātra vidhāne lāghavāt

original: ataś ca na bādhakatvam / nirapekṣavidhānābhāvāt /
analyzed: atas ca na bādhaka tvam nirapekṣa vidhāna abhāvāt

original: yathā ca tvanmate 'gniprajāpatyor ekahomoddeśena vidhānāt tulyārthatvena vikalpe prasakte prajāpater na pākṣikam agnibādhakatvam / samuccayavidhānāt; evaṁ mantravarnāprāptam agnim anūdya tatsamuccitaprajāpatividhāne 'pi na bādhakatvam iti tulyam /
analyzed: yathā ca tvad mate gni prajāpatyoḥ eka homa uddeśena vidhānāt tulya ārthatvena vikalpe prasakte prajāpateḥ na pākṣikam agni bādhaka tvam samuccaya vidhānāt eva agnim anūdya tad samuccita prajāpati vidhāne pi na bādhaka tvam iti tulyam

original: yat tv agner māntravarnikatve 'gnir jyotir jyotiḥ sūryaḥ svāhā 'ti miśraliṅgamantravarnābalāt sāyaṁhomasyā dvidaivatyatvāpattir iti / tan na; agnisamuccitaprajāpatividhānavat sūryasamuccitasyā 'vidhānāt prabalapramāṇabodhitena prajāpatinā mantravarnāprāptasya sūryasya bādhitatvāt /
analyzed: yat tu agneḥ māntravarnika tve gniḥ jyotiḥ jyotiḥ sūryaḥ svāhā ti miśra liṅga mantravarnā balāt sāya homasyāḥ dvidaivatya tva āpattiḥ iti tat na agni samuccita prajāpati vidhāna vat sūrya samuccitasyāḥ vidhānāt prabala pramāṇa bodhitena prajāpatinā mantravarnā prāptasya sūryasya bādhita tvāt

original: yat tv agner māntravarnikatve prajāpatividher ekenai 'va vākyena siddheḥ / yad agnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyaṁ juhoti 'ti / yat sūryāya ca prajāpataye ca prātar juhoti 'ti / vākyadyavayaṁ vyartham iti / tan na /
analyzed: yat tu agneḥ māntravarnika tve prajāpati vidheḥ ekena vai vākyena siddheḥ yat agnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāya juhoti ti  yat sūryāya ca prajāpataye ca prātar juhoti ti  vyartham iti tat na

original: bhaved vyarthaṁ yadi prajāpatimātravidhānaṁ vivakṣitaṁ syāt / sāyaṁhome 'gnisamuccitaprajāpativiḍhānaṃ /
analyzed: bhavet vyartha yadi syāt sāya home gni samuccita prajāpati viḍhānam

original: prātarhome sūryo jyotir jyotiḥ sūryaḥ svāhe 'ti mantravarṇaprāptasūryasamuccitaprajāpativiḍhānaṃ ca vivakṣitam /
analyzed: prātar home sūryaḥ jyotiḥ jyotiḥ sūryaḥ svāhā iti mantra varṇa prāpta sūrya samuccita prajāpati viḍhānam ca vivakṣitam

original: na cai 'tad ekena vākyena sidhyati /
analyzed: na ca e tat ekena vākyena sidhyati

original: ato 'rthavad vākyadavayam /
analyzed: a taḥ rtha vat vākya da vayam

original: yat tv agner mānttravarṇikatve mantravarṇasyā 'gnir jyotir jyotir agniḥ svāhe 'ti sāyaṃ juhoti tivākyena sāyaṃhome viniyuktatvāt tatprakāśyasyā 'gner api prajāpatisamuccitasya tatrai 'va devatātvāvagater yad agnaye ce 'ti vākye sāyaṃśabdo vyartha iti /
analyzed: yat tu agneḥ mānttravarṇika tve mantra varṇasya agniḥ jyotiḥ jyotiḥ agniḥ svāhā iti sāyam juhoti ti vākyena sāyaṃhome viniyukta tvāt tad prakāśyasya agneḥ api prajāpati samuccitasya devatā tva avagateḥ yat agnaye ca iti vākye sāyam śabdaḥ vyarthaḥ iti

original: evaṃ yat sūryāya ce 'ti vākye prātaḥśabdo vyartha iti /
analyzed: evam yat sūryāya ca iti vākye prātar śabdaḥ vyarthaḥ iti

original: kiṃ ca mantravarṇena jyotiṣṭvaguṇaviśiṣṭasyā 'gneḥ prakāśanād viśiṣṭasyai 'va devatātvāvagatiḥ iti—
analyzed: kim ca mantra varṇena jyotiṣṭva guṇa viśiṣṭasya agneḥ prakāśanāt viśiṣṭasyai devatā tva avagatiḥ iti

original: tad api na / homānuvādena devatādvayavidhāne 'pi mantravarṇayor liṅgād eva prāptisammbhavāt tadvidhānārthakyāt; miśraliṅgamantravidhiparyudastayoḥ pratiprasavārthām vidhāne 'pi tadvidhigatayoḥ sāyaṃprātaḥśabdayor anarthakyam / vidhīyamānayor mantrayor vyavasthayai 'va prāptisammbhavāt tatprakāśyayor devatayoḥ vyavasthitatvāt /
analyzed: tat api na homa anuvādena devatā dvaya vidhāne pi mantra varṇayoḥ liṅgāt eva prāpti sammbhavāt tad vidhāna ārthakyāt miśra liṅga mantra vidhi paryudastayoḥ pratiprasava arthām vidhāne pi tad vidhi gatayoḥ sāyaṃprātar śabdayoḥ anarthakyam vidhīyamānayoḥ mantrayoḥ vyavasthayai va prāpti sammbhavāt tad prakāśyayoḥ devatayoḥ vyavasthita tvāt

original: anuvādatvoktiṣ tū 'bhayatra tulye 'ti /
analyzed: anuvāda tva uktiḥ tu ubhayatra tulye ti

original: mānttravarṇikatve 'py agneḥ kevalasyai 'va devatātvaṃ na guṇaviśiṣṭasya / yad agnaye ce 'tivākye 'gneḥ pūrvāhutir ity atra ca kevalasyai 'vā 'gneḥ saṃkīrtanāt kevalasyai 'va devatātvāvagateḥ /
analyzed: mānttravarṇika tve pi agneḥ kevalasyai devatā tvam na guṇa viśiṣṭasya yat agnaye ca iti vākye gneḥ pūrvā āhutiḥ iti atra ca kevalasyai vā gneḥ saṃkīrtanāt kevalasyai devatā tva avagateḥ

original: yathā hy upāṃśuyāje viṣṇvāder māntravarṇikatve 'pi na guṇaviśiṣṭasya devatātvaṃ viṣṇur upāṃśu yaṣṭavya ity arthavāde kevalasyai 'va saṃkīrtanāt / tadvad iti /
analyzed: yathā hi upāṃśuyāje viṣṇu ādeḥ māntravarṇika tve na guṇa viśiṣṭasya devatā tvam viṣṇuḥ upāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ iti arthavāde kevalasyai saṃkīrtanāt tadvat iti

original: ataś ca mānttravarṇikatve doṣābhāvād devatādvayavidhāne ca gauravāpatter anyataḥ prāptam agnim anūdya tatsamuccitaḥ prajāpatir evā 'tra vidhīyate; homānuvādeno 'bhayavidhāne vākyabhedaprasaṅgāc ca /
analyzed: atas ca mānttravarṇika tve doṣa abhāvāt devatā dvaya vidhāne ca gaurava āpatteḥ anyatas prāptam agnim anūdya tad samuccitaḥ prajāpatiḥ eva tra vidhīyate homa anuvādena u bhaya vidhāne vākya bheda prasaṅgāt ca

original: na ca cakārasyānarthakyaṃ na vākyabheda iti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca cakārasya ānarthakyam na vākya bhedaḥ iti vācyam

original: cakārārtho hi samuccayaḥ /
analyzed: cakāra arthaḥ hi samuccayaḥ

original: taṃ ca samuccayaṃ yadi cakāraḥ prādhānyena brūyāt / tadā pradhānasyā 'nekaviśeṣaṇasaṃgrāhakatvād āruṇyādiviśiṣṭakrayavidhāna iva kārakadvayasamuccayavidhāne vākyabhedo na bhavet /
analyzed: tam ca samuccayam yadi cakāraḥ prādhānyena brūyāt tadā pradhānasya a neka viśeṣaṇa saṃgrāhaka tvāt āruṇi ādi viśiṣṭa kraya vidhāne iva kāraka dvaya samuccaya vidhāne vākya bhedaḥ na bhavet

original: na ca cakāraḥ samuccayaṃ prādhānyena brūte / paropasarjanatvena 'vā 'bhidhānāt /
analyzed: na ca cakāraḥ samuccayam prādhānyena brūte para upasarjana tvena vā abhidhānāt

original: ata eva daśame bhāṣyakāraiś cakārasya samuccayaśabdād vailakṣaṇyaṁ pratipāditam /
analyzed: atas eva daśame bhāṣyakāraiḥ cakārasya samuccaya śabdāt pratipāditam

original: samuccayaśabdo hi taṁ prādhānyena brūte / na cakāraḥ /
analyzed: samuccaya śabdaḥ hi ta prādhānyena brūte na cakāraḥ

original: yadi hi prādhānyena brūyāt tadā kārakadvayam samuccayaḥ kriyāguṇaiḥ saṁbadhyeta; samuccayaḥ śobhanaḥ / samuccayo draṣṭavya itivat / ca śobhanaś ca draṣṭavya iti prayogaḥ syāt; samuccayaśabdavac cakārāsya prādhānyena samuccayavācitve dhavakhadirāyoḥ samuccaya itivad dhavakhadirāyoś ce 'ty api prayogaḥ syād iti /
analyzed: yadi hi prādhānyena brūyāt tadā kāraka dvayam samuccayaḥ kriyā guṇaiḥ sabadhyeta samuccayaḥ śobhanaḥ samuccayaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ itivat ca śobhanaḥ ca draṣṭavyaḥ iti prayogaḥ syāt samuccaya śabda vat cakāra asya prādhānyena samuccaya vāci tve dhava khadira ayoḥ samuccayaḥ itivat dhava khadira ayoḥ ca iti api prayogaḥ syāt iti

original: ataś cakāraḥ samuccayaṁ prādhānyena na brūte / yena pradhānasyai 'kasya vidhānān na vākyabhedo bhavet /
analyzed: atas cakāraḥ samuccaya prādhānyena na brūte yena pradhānasyai kasya vidhānāt na vākya bhedaḥ bhavet

original: kiṁ tu kārakadvayopasarjanatvena 'va sa taṁ brūte /
analyzed: tu kāraka dvaya upasarjana tvena sa ta brūte

original: samucitāv agniprajāpatī iti pradhānadvayavidhāne ca vākyabhedaḥ syād eva; yathā carhoḍakeśena sāmānargakadvayavidhāne /
analyzed: samucitau agni prajāpatī iti pradhāna dvaya vidhāne ca vākya bhedaḥ syāt eva yathā carhoḍa keśena sāma anargaka dvaya vidhāne

original: yady api cakāraḥ samuccayaṁ prādhānyena brūyāt / tathā 'pi tasya kārakadvayaṁ prati prādhānyam anupapannam / vibhaktyabhihitasya kārakadvayasya kriyopasarjanatvena samuccayopasarjanatvābhāvāt /
analyzed: yadi api cakāraḥ samuccaya prādhānyena brūyāt tathā tasya kāraka dvaya prati prādhānyam anupapannam vibhakti abhihitasya kāraka dvayasya kriyā upasarjana tvena samuccaya upasarjana tva abhāvāt

original: kṛdantādiśabdair upasthitaṁ hi kārakaṁ kriyāto 'nyena saṁbadhyate; kārakasamuccayaḥ karaṇasamuccaya iti /
analyzed: kṛt anta ādi śabdaiḥ hi kāraka kriyātaḥ sabadhyate kāraka samuccayaḥ karaṇa samuccayaḥ iti

original: vibhaktyabhihitaṁ tu kriyayai 'va / kārakāṇāṁ tayai 'vā 'nvayāt /
analyzed: vibhakti abhihita tu kriyayai va kārakāṇā tayai vā

original: ataś cakāreṇo 'cyamānaḥ sa kārakopasarjanatvena 'vo 'cyate /
analyzed: atas cakāreṇa u cyamānaḥ sa kāraka upasarjana tvena vā u cyate

original: kārakadvayaṁ ca pradhānam /
analyzed: ca pradhānam

original: ekoddēśena ca pradhānadvayavidhāne vākyabheda eva /
analyzed: eka uddēśena ca pradhāna dvaya vidhāne vākya bhedaḥ eva

original: yathā 'huḥ /
analyzed: yathā huḥ

original: anekapadasaṁbaddhaṁ yady ekam api kārakam tathā 'pi tad anāvṛttaiḥ pratyayair na vidhīyate /
analyzed: yadi ekam api kārakam tathā tat anāvṛttaiḥ pratyayaiḥ na vidhīyate

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: yac ca yathā dakṣiṇānuvādena gavādīnām anekeṣāṁ vidhāne na vākyabhedas tathā kārakadvayavidhāne 'pi 'ti / tan na /
analyzed: yat ca yathā dakṣiṇā anuvādena go ādīnām vidhāne na vākya bhedaḥ tathā kāraka dvaya vidhāne tat na

original: na hi gauś cā 'śvaś ce 'ty asmin vākye dakṣiṇānuvādena gavādayo vidhīyante / uktarītyā vākyabhedāpatteḥ /
analyzed: na hi gauḥ ca ā śvas ca iti asmin vākye dakṣiṇā anuvādena go ādayaḥ vidhīyante ukta rītyā vākya bheda āpatteḥ

original: cakāreṇa kathaṁcit parihāre 'pi gavādīnām anekeṣāṁ dvādaśaśatasaṁkhyāyāś ca vidhāne vākyabheda eva /
analyzed: cakāreṇa kathacid parihāre go ādīnām dvādaśa śata sakhyāyāḥ ca vidhāne vākya bhedaḥ eva

original: ādhvaryavaśākhāyāṁ gauś ce 'tyādes tasya dvādaśaśataṁ hyandasya sahasratattvena cā 'syai 'kavākyatvam ity uktaṁ daśame /
analyzed: ādhvaryava śākhāyāḥ gauḥ ca ityādeḥ tasya sahasra tattvena ca kavākya tvam iti ukta daśame

original: ato 'nena vākyeno 'bhayaviśiṣṭā dakṣiṇai 'va vidhīyate /
analyzed: atas nena vākyena u bhaya viśiṣṭā dakṣiṇā vidhīyate

original: viśiṣṭavidhānāc ca na vākyabhedaḥ /
analyzed: viśiṣṭa vidhānāt ca na vākya bhedaḥ

original: ata eva pārthasārathimiśrair daśame tatra tatra so 'bhayaviśiṣṭā vidhīyata iti / anekagavādyātmika kā dakṣiṇā vidhīyata iti co 'ktam /na cai 'vam rtvigbhyo dakṣiṇāṁ dadāti 'ty asyā 'narthakyam / tasyā 'nuvādatvāt / rtviksaṁbandhaparatvād vā /
analyzed: atas eva pārthasārathi miśraiḥ daśame tatra tatra saḥ bhaya viśiṣṭā vidhīyate iti kā dakṣiṇā vidhīyate iti na ca e vam rtvigbhyaḥ dakṣiṇāḥ dadāti ti asya ānarthakyam tasyāḥ nuvāda tvāt rtvij sabandha paratvāt vā

original: dakṣiṇāśabdasmārathatvād dhy rtvijāṁ camasādhvaryūṇāṁ ca tatsaṁbandhah syāt /
analyzed: dakṣiṇā śabda smāratha tvāt hi rtvijā camasādhvaryūṇā ca tad sabandhaḥ syāt

original: etadvākyaśattve ca na bhavati / rtviksabdasya brahmādigatatulyajananimittvatvena camasādhvaryūṇāṁ rtviktvābhāvasya rtīya uktavāt /
analyzed: ca na bhavati rtvij sabdasya brahma ādi gata tulya jana nimit tva tvena camasādhvaryūṇā rtvij tva abhāvasya

original: ataś ca gauś cā 'śvaś ce 'ty asmin vākye viśiṣṭavidhānān na vākyabhedaḥ /
analyzed: atas ca gauḥ ca ā śvas ca iti asmin vākye viśiṣṭa vidhānāt na vākya bhedaḥ

original: yad agnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyaṁ juhoti 'ti tu na viśiṣṭavidhānam / homasya 'gnihotraṁ juhoti 'ty anena prāptatvāt /
analyzed: yat agnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāya juhoti ti tu na viśiṣṭa vidhānam homasya gnihotra juhoti ti anena prāpta tvāt

original: ataś ca homānuvādena samuccitobhayavidhāne vākyabhedād gauravāpatteś ca nā 'nena vākyena devatādvayaṁ vidhīyate / kiṁ tu mantravyaprāptam agnim anūdya tatsanuccitaḥ prajāpatir homoddeśena vidhīyate /
analyzed: atas ca homa anuvādena samuccita ubhaya vidhāne vākya bhedāt gaurava āpatteḥ ca nā nena vākyena vidhīyate ki tu mantra vyaprāptam agnim anūdya tad sanuccitaḥ prajāpatiḥ homa uddeśena vidhīyate

original: ataś ca ne 'dam agneḥ prāpakaṁ kiṁ tu mantravarṇa eva /
analyzed: atas ca na tu mantra varṇaḥ eva

original: ataś ca tena 'gneḥ prāptatvān nā 'gnihotrapadaṁ devatāsamarpakaṁ kiṁ tarhi nāmadheyam eva /
analyzed: atas ca tena gneḥ prāpta tvāt ki tarhi nāmadheyam eva

original: tat siddham etat tatprakhyaśāstrād agnihotraśabdasya karmanāmadheyatvam iti /
analyzed: tat siddham etat tad prakhya śāstrāt agnihotra śabdasya karma nāmadheya tvam iti

original: evaṁ prayājeṣu samidhādidevatānāṁ samidhaḥ samidho 'gna ājyasya vyantu ityādimantravarṇebhyaḥ prāptatvāt samidho yajati 'tyādiṣu samidhādiśabdās tatprakhyaśāstrāt karmanāmadheyāni /
analyzed: eva prayājeṣu samidh ādi devatānā samidhaḥ samidhaḥ gne ājyasya vyantu ityādi mantra varṇebhyaḥ prāpta tvāt samidhaḥ yajati samidh ādi śabdāḥ tad prakhya śāstrāt karma nāmadheyāni

original: yathā 'huḥ /
analyzed: yathā huḥ

original: vidhitsitagunāprāpi śāstram anyad yatas tv iha tasmāt tatprāpaṇaṁ vyartham iti nāmatvam iṣyate /
analyzed: śāstram anyat yatas tu iha tasmāt vyartham iti nāma tvam iṣyate

original: iti dik /
analyzed: iti diś

original: śyenenā 'bhicaran yajeta 'ty atra śyenaśabdasya karmanāmadheyatvaṁ tadvyapadeśāt / tena vyapadeśa upamānaṁ tadanyathānupapattyā 'ti yāvat /
analyzed: śyenena a bhicaran yajeta ti atra śyena śabdasya karma nāmadheya tva tad vyapadeśāt tena vyapadeśaḥ upamāna tad anyathā anupapattyā ti yāvat

original: tathā hi / yad vidheyaṁ tasya stutir bhavati /
analyzed: tathā hi yat tasya stutiḥ bhavati

original: tad yady atra śyeno vidheyaḥ syāt / tadā 'rthavādais tasyai 'va stutih karyā /
analyzed: tat yadi atra śyenaḥ vidheyaḥ syāt tadā arthavādaiḥ tasyai vaḥ stutiḥ karyā

original: na ca yathā vai śyeno nipatya 'datte / evam ayaṁ dviṣantaṁ bhrātṛvyaṁ nipatyā 'datta ity upamaṁ 'rthavādena śyenaḥ stotuṁ śakyaḥ /
analyzed: na ca yathā vai śyenaḥ nipatya datte evam datte iti upama arthavādena śyenaḥ stotu śakyaḥ

original: śyenopamānena 'rthāntarastuteh kriyamāṇatvāt /
analyzed: śyena upamānena rtha antara stutā iha kriyamāṇa tvāt

original: na ca śyenopamānena sa eva stotuṁ śakyate / upamānopameyabhāvasya bhinnanimithatvāt /
analyzed: na ca śyena upamānena saḥ eva stotu śakyate upamāna upameya bhāvasya bhinna nimitha tvāt

original: yadā tu śyenasaṁjñako yāgo vidhīyate / tadā 'rthavādena śyenopamānena tasya stutiḥ kartuṁ śakyata iti śyenaśabdasya tadvyapadeśād yāganāmadheyatvam /
analyzed: yadā tu śyena sajñakaḥ yāgaḥ vidhīyate tadā rthavādena śyena upamānena tasya stutiḥ kartu śakyate iti śyena śabdasya tad vyapadeśāt yāga nāmadheya tvam

original: tat siddhaṁ nimittacatuṣṭayān nāmadheyatvam /
analyzed: tat siddha nimitta catuṣṭayāt nāmadheya tvam

original: utpattiśiṣṭaguṇabalīyastvam api pañcamaṁ kecin nāmadheyatve nimittam āhuḥ; vaiśvadevena yajete 'ty atra vaiśvadevaśabdasya karmanāmadheyatvam utpattiśiṣṭaguṇabalīyastvāt / uktatvannamadheyatvācaturaṇāmatuṣṭayāsaṁbhavāt /
analyzed: utpatti śiṣṭa guṇa balīyaḥ tvam api kecid nāmadheya tve nimittam āhuḥ vaiśvadevena yajeta iti atra vaiśvadeva śabdasya karma nāmadheya tvam utpatti śiṣṭa guṇa balīyaḥ tvāt

original: tathā hi /
analyzed: tathā hi

original: na tāvan matvarthalakṣaṇābhāyān nāmadheyatvaṁ yuktam iti vaktuṁ śakyam / vaiśvadevene 'ti taddhitenai 'va matvarthasya yāgasyo 'ktatvāt /
analyzed: na tāvat matu artha lakṣaṇa ābhāyāt nāmadheya tva yuktam iti vaktu śakyam vaiśvadevena iti taddhitena e va matu arthasya yāgasya u kta tvāt

original: sā 'sya devate 'ty asminn arthe hi taddhitasmaraṇam /
analyzed: sā sya devatā ti asmin arthe hi taddhita smaraṇam

original: tatrā 'syaśabdasya taddhitāntargatasya yady api sūktahaviṣor iti smṛteḥ sūkte haviṣi vā mukhyatvam avagatam / tathā 'pi sarvannāmnaṁ upasthitavācitvāt sūktahaviṣoś cā 'trā 'nupasthitatvād yajete 'ty upasthitaṁ yāgam evā 'syaśabdo 'bhidhatta iti na yāge matvarthalakṣaṇā /
analyzed: tatra sya śabdasya taddhita antargatasya yadi api sūkta haviṣoḥ iti smṛteḥ sūkte haviṣi vā mukhya tvam avagatam tathā sarvannāmnaḥ upasthita vāci tvāt sūkta haviṣoḥ ca a tra anupasthita tvāt yajeta iti upasthita yāgam eva sya śabdaḥ abhidhatte iti na yāge matu artha lakṣaṇā

original: vaiśvadevaikadevatāvidhānāc ca na vākyabhedaḥ /
analyzed: vaiśvadeva eka devatā vidhānāt ca na vākya bhedaḥ

original: nā 'pi tatprakhyaśāstrān nāmatvam /
analyzed: na pi tad prakhya śāstrāt nāma tvam

original: yatra hi vidhisito guṇo 'nyataḥ prāptaḥ / tatra tatprakhyaśāstrān nāmadheyatvam / yathā 'gnihotraśabde /
analyzed: yatra hi vidhi sitaḥ guṇaḥ nyatas prāptaḥ tatra tad prakhya śāstrāt nāmadheya tvam yathā gnihotra śabde

original: atra cā 'gneyādayo 'ṣṭau yāgāḥ prakṛtāḥ /
analyzed: atra ca āgneya ādayaḥ ṣṭau yāgāḥ prakṛtāḥ

original: tatrā'mikṣāyāge yady api viśvedevāḥ prāptā vaiśvadevī āmikṣā 'ti / tathā 'pi saptasu teṣāṁ aprāptatvād vaiśvadevena yajete'ty anena tatra tadvidhāne na tatprakhyāśāstram anyad yena tadvyāśān nāmatvam syāt /
analyzed: tatra āmikṣā yāge yadi api viśvedevāḥ prāptāḥ vaiśvadevī āmikṣā ti tathā saptasu teṣām a prāpta tvāt vaiśvadevena yajeta iti anena tatra tad vidhāne na tad prakhyā śāstram anyat yena tad vyāśāt nāma tvam syāt

original: na ca 'mikṣāyāgasyai 'vai 'tan nāme 'ti vācyam; vaiśvadevena yajete 'ti vākyavaiyarthyāpatteḥ /
analyzed: na ca mikṣā yāga asyai vai tat nāma iti vācyam vaiśvadevena yajeta iti vākya vaiyarthya āpatteḥ

original: vaiśvadevaśabdasyā 'mikṣāyāgamātrānāmatve sa eva yāgo 'nenā 'nūdyeta /
analyzed: vaiśvadeva śabdasya ā mikṣāyāga mātrā nāma tve saḥ eva yāgaḥ nena a nūdyeta

original: na ca tadanuvādenā 'sti kiṃcit kṛtyam; prācīnapravaṇe vaiśvadevena yajete 'ti vidhīyamānasya prācīnapravaṇadeśasya vinā 'py etad vākyam āmikṣāyāga eva sambandhopapatteḥ / viśvadevasambandḥāt tasya /
analyzed: na ca tad anuvādena asti kiṃcid kṛtyam prācīna pravaṇe vaiśvadevena yajeta iti vidhīyamānasya prācīna pravaṇa deśasya vinā pi etat vākyam āmikṣā yāge eva sambandha upapatteḥ viśvadeva sambandḥāt tasya

original: āgneyādyaśeṣaprakṛtayāgānāmatve tu na vaiśvadevena yajete 'ti vākyānarthakyam /
analyzed: āgneya ādi aśeṣa prakṛta yāgānām atve tu na vaiśvadevena yajeta iti vākya ānarthakyam

original: tadā hy anenā 'ṣṭau yāgā anūdyante /
analyzed: tadā hi anena ṣṭau yāgāḥ anūdyante

original: anuvādena cai 'kapratītyārūḍhatvāt samudītānām aṣṭānām api vaiśvadevaśabdo nāmadheyaṃ sidhyati /
analyzed: anuvādena ca e ka pratītya ārūḍha tvāt samudītānām aṣṭānām api vaiśvadeva śabdaḥ nāmadheyam sidhyati

original: evaṃ ca prācīnapravaṇe vaiśvadevena yajete 'ty atra vaiśvadevaśabdenā 'ṣṭau yāgān anūdya prācīnapravaṇavidhānaṃ tatra siddhaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: evam ca prācīna pravaṇe vaiśvadevena yajeta iti atra vaiśvadeva śabdena a ṣṭau yāgān anūdya prācīna pravaṇa vidhānam tatra siddham bhavati

original: tadvākyasya 'sattve 'nena vākyenā 'mikṣāyāga eva prācīnapravaṇadeśasambandhaḥ syāt /
analyzed: tad vākyasya sattve nena vākyena ā mikṣā yāgaḥ eva prācīna pravaṇa deśa sambandhaḥ syāt

original: ataś cā 'ṣṭasu yāgeṣu prācīnapravaṇadeśasambandha evai 'tadvākyaprayojanam /
analyzed: atas ca ṣṭasu yāgeṣu prācīna pravaṇa deśa sambandhaḥ eva e tad vākya prayojanam
