original: evaṃ ca vaiśvadevaśabdo 'ṣṭānāṃ nāmadheyam /
analyzed: evam ca vaiśvadeva śabdaḥ ṣṭānām nāmadheyam

original: na ca tatra tatprakyāśāstraṃ nimittaṃ saṃbhavati / saptasu viśvedevāprāpteḥ ato na vaiśvadevaśabdasya tatprakyāśāstrān nāmadheyatvam iti /
analyzed: na ca tatra tat prakyā śāstram nimittam saṃbhavati saptasu viśvedeva aprāpteḥ atas na vaiśvadeva śabdasya tad prakyā śāstrāt nāmadheya tvam iti

original: nā 'pi tadvyapadeśāt / tādṛśasya vyapadeśasyā 'nupalambhāt /
analyzed: na a pi tad vyapadeśāt tādṛśasya vyapadeśasya a nupalambhāt

original: ataś ca vaiśvadevaśabdasya nāmadheyatva uktaprakāracatuṣṭayasyā 'nimittatvād utpattiśiṣṭaguṇabalyastvam eva nimittam /
analyzed: atas ca vaiśvadeva śabdasya nāmadheya tve ukta prakāra catuṣṭayasya nimitta tvāt eva nimittam

original: tathā hi /
analyzed: tathā hi

original: vaiśvadevena yajete 'ty atra na tāvad aprakṛtakarmānuvādena devatāvidhānaṃ saṃbhavati / teṣām atrā 'nupasthiteḥ /
analyzed: vaiśvadevena yajeta iti atra na tāvat aprakṛta karma anuvādena devatā vidhānam saṃbhavati teṣām atra anupasthiteḥ

original: nā 'pi devatāviśiṣṭakarmāntaravidhānaṃ saṃbhavati / gauravāpatteḥ; aṣṭau haviṃṣi 'ty ananyagatikaliṅgavirodhāt /
analyzed: na a pi devatā viśiṣṭa karma antara vidhānam saṃbhavati gaurava āpatteḥ aṣṭau haviṃṣi ti ananyagatika liṅga virodhāt

original: ato 'nena prakṛtakarmānuvādena devatā vidhīyanta iti vaktavyam /
analyzed: atas nena prakṛta karma anuvādena devatāḥ vidhīyante iti vaktavyam

original: tatrā 'mikṣāyāge viśvedevaprāpteḥ saptasu yāgeṣv anena vākyena viśvedevā vidhīyanta iti vaktavyam /
analyzed: tatra ā mikṣā yāge viśvedeva prāpteḥ saptasu yāgeṣu anena vākyena viśvedevāḥ vidhīyante iti vaktavyam

original: na ca tat saṃbhavati / teṣām utpattiśiṣṭāgnyādyavarodhāt /
analyzed: na ca tat saṃbhavati teṣām utpatti śiṣṭa agni ādi avarodhāt

original: ākāṅkṣayā hisambandho bhavati /
analyzed: ākāṅkṣayā hi sambandhaḥ bhavati

original: āgneyādyāgānāṃ hi devatākāṅkṣo 'tpattiśiṣṭair agneyādibhir eva nivṛtte 'ti na tatra viśvadevavidhānaṃ yuktam /
analyzed: āgneya ādi āgānām hi devatā ākāṅkṣā utpatti śiṣṭaiḥ agneya ādibhiḥ eva nivṛtte na tatra viśvadeva vidhānam yuktam

original: ataś co 'tpattiśiṣṭaguṇabālīyastvād vaiśvadevaśabdasya karmānāmadheyatvam iti /
analyzed: atas ca u tpatti śiṣṭa guṇa bālīyaḥ tvāt vaiśvadeva śabdasya karma a nāmadheya tvam iti

original: yathā 'huḥ /
analyzed: yathā huḥ

original: guṇāntarāvaruddhatvān nā 'vakāśyo guṇo 'paraḥ vikalpo 'pi na vaiṣamyāt tasmān nāmai 'va yujyate /
analyzed: guṇa antara avaruddha tvāt na avakāśyaḥ guṇaḥ paraḥ vikalpaḥ pi na vaiṣamyāt tasmāt yujyate

original: anye tv ācāryā ahuḥ /
analyzed: anye tu ācāryāḥ ahuḥ

original: yaḥ śabdo yatra karmaṇi yadguṇasambandhaṃ bodhayati / sa cet sambandhaḥ śāstrāntarapratipannaḥ / tadā tasya śabdasya tannāmadheyatvaṃ tatprakhyaśāstrāt /
analyzed: yaḥ śabdaḥ yatra karmaṇi yad guṇa sambandham bodhayati sa ced sambandhaḥ śāstra antara pratipannaḥ tadā tasya śabdasya tad nāmadheya tvam tad prakhya śāstrāt

original: tac ca śāstrāntaraṃ vidhir vā 'rthavādo ve 'ty atrā 'nādaraḥ /
analyzed: tat ca śāstra antaram vidhiḥ vā rthavādaḥ vā iti atrā na ādaraḥ

original: tatrā 'gnihotraśabde 'gnisambandhābodhakaṃ śāstrāntaraṃ vidhir eva /
analyzed: tatra a gnihotra śabde gni sambandha ābodhakam śāstra antaram vidhiḥ eva

original: vaiśvadevaśabdaś ca viśvedevasambandhaṃ karmaṇi bodhayati /
analyzed: vaiśvadeva śabdaḥ ca viśvedeva sambandham karmaṇi bodhayati

original: viśvedevasambandhaś cā 'ṣṭasu yāgeṣu yad viśvedevāḥ samayajanta tad vaiśvadevasya vaiśvadevatvaṃ ity arthavādāvagataḥ /
analyzed: viśvedeva sambandhaḥ ca ṣṭasu yāgeṣu yat viśvedevāḥ samayajanta tat vaiśvadevasya vaiśvadeva tvam iti arthavāda avagataḥ

original: na ca vidhir eva tatprakhyaśāstraṃ nā 'rthavāda ity atra kiṃcit pramāṇam asti /
analyzed: na ca vidhiḥ eva tad prakhya śāstram na arthavādaḥ iti atra kiṃcid pramāṇam asti

original: ata eva jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta 'ty atra jyotiṣṭomaśabda etāni vāva tāni jyotīṃṣi ya etasya stomāḥ / ity arthavādāvagataṃ jyotiḥsambandhaṃ nimittīkṛtya svargakāme prayartamānas tatprakhyaśāstrān nāmadheyaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: atas eva jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta ti atra jyotiṣṭoma śabdaḥ etāni vāva tāni jyotīṃṣi ye etasya stomāḥ iti arthavāda avagatam jyotiḥ sambandham nimittīkṛtya svarga kāme prayartamānaḥ tad prakhya śāstrāt nāmadheyam bhavati

original: evaṃ prakṛte 'pi draṣṭavyam / paṅcamaprakārakalpane pramāṇābhāvāt /
analyzed: evam prakṛte pi draṣṭavyam paṅcama prakāra kalpane pramāṇa abhāvāt

original: ata eva vaiśvadevādhikaraṇe vārtikakārair evam upasaṃhṛtam /
analyzed: atas eva vaiśvadeva adhikaraṇe vārtika kāraiḥ evam upasaṃhṛtam

original: tatprakhyatayai 'va sarveṣāṃ nāmadheyatvam iti /
analyzed: tad prakhya tayai vai sarveṣām nāmadheya tvam iti

original: yac co 'tpattiśiṣṭaguṇabālīyastvam uktaṃ tadguṇavidhyasambhave yuktyabhyuccayamātram /
analyzed: yat u tpatti śiṣṭa guṇa bālīyaḥ tvam uktam tad guṇa vidhi asambhave yukti abhyuccaya mātram

original: tat siddhaṃ tatprakhyaśāstrād vaiśvadevaśabdasya karmanāmadheyatvam iti /
analyzed: tat siddham tad prakhya śāstrāt vaiśvadeva śabdasya karma nāmadheya tvam iti

original: nanu paśusomādhikaraṇe aindravāyavam gṛhṇāti 'tyādau na yajikalpanam somena yajete 'ti pratyakṣayajiśruterity uktam /
analyzed: nanu paśu soma adhikaraṇe aindra vāyavam gṛhṇāti tyādau na yaji kalpanam somena yajeta iti pratyakṣa yaji śruteḥ iti uktam

original: tena nyāyena vaiśvadevv āmikṣe 'ty atrā 'pi yajikalpanā mā 'stu / vaiśvadevena yajete 'ty atra pratyakṣayajiśruteḥ /
analyzed: tena nyāyena vaiśvadevu āmikṣe ti atra a pi yaji kalpanā mā stu vaiśvadevena yajeta iti atra pratyakṣa yaji śruteḥ

original: evaṁ cā tasmai 'va vākyena devatāviśiṣṭakarmavidhānam astu /
analyzed: eva ca tasmai va vākyena devatā viśiṣṭa karma vidhānam astu

original: tasya ca dravyākāṅkṣāyāṁ vaiśvadevv āmikṣe 'ti dravyavidhānam astu /
analyzed: tasya ca dravya ākāṅkṣāyāḥ vaiśvadeve āmikṣe ti dravya vidhānam astu

original: evaṁ ca na vākyadvayasyā 'py anuvādatvam; nā 'py aṣṭau haviṁṣi 'ty ananyagatikatāliṅgavirodho bhaved iti cet—
analyzed: eva ca na vākya dvayasya a pi anuvāda tvam na a pi aṣṭau haviṣi bhavet iti ced

original: mai 'vam /
analyzed: mai vam

original: vaiśvadevv āmikṣe 'ty atra yājyakalpana āmikṣā kimanuvādena vidhiyata iti vaktavyam /
analyzed: vaiśvadevī āmikṣā iti atra yājya kalpane āmikṣā kim anuvādena vidhiyate iti vaktavyam

original: viśvadevānuvādena dravyavidhāne dravyasya devatāṅgatvam eva syāt / na yāgāṅgatvam /
analyzed: viśvadeva anuvādena dravya vidhāne dravyasya devatā aṅga tvam eva syāt na yāga aṅga tvam

original: kiṁ ca vaiśvadeviśabdo devatātaddhitatvād āmikṣāṁ tattvyenāha brūtād ity uktam /
analyzed: ki ca vaiśvadevi śabdaḥ devatā taddhita tvāt āmikṣā tattvyena āha brūtāt iti uktam

original: tatra viśvadevānuvādena dravyavidhānaṁ vaiśvadeviśabdena 'va kartavyam / padāśruteḥ; yathā bhāvanāyāṁ karaṇasamarpaṇaṁ dhātunaI 'va kriyate padāśruteḥ / na tū 'papadeṇe 'ty uktaṁ bhāvārthādhikaraṇe / tadvat /
analyzed: tatra viśvadeva anuvādena dravya vidhāna vaiśvadevi śabdena kartavyam pada āśruteḥ yathā bhāvanāyā karaṇa samarpaṇa dhātunā va kriyate pada āśruteḥ na bhāva artha adhikaraṇe tadvat

original: tatra ca vaṣaṭkartuḥ prathamabhakṣa itivad ekaprasaratāvirodhaḥ /
analyzed: tatra ca vaṣaṭkartuḥ prathama bhakṣaḥ iti vat eka prasara tā virodhaḥ

original: ato yāgānuvādena 'pi dravyavidhānārthaṁ vaiśvadevv āmikṣe 'ty atra yajikalpanaṁ tāvad avaśyaṁ kartavyam /
analyzed: atas yāga anuvādena dravya vidhāna artha vaiśvadeve āmikṣe ti atra yaji kalpana tāvat avaśya kartavyam

original: ataś ca paśusomādhikaraṇanyāyavaiṣamyam / aindravāyavaṁ gṛhṇāti 'ty atra devatāviśiṣṭagrahaṇavidhānena yajyakalpanāt; yajikalpane ca vaiśvadevv āmikṣe 'ty atrai 'va dravyadevatāviśiṣṭakarmavidhānaṁ yuktaṁ nūpadyavyāśravaṇāt /
analyzed: atas ca paśu soma adhikaraṇa nyāya vaiṣamyam gṛhṇāti ti atra devatā viśiṣṭa grahaṇa vidhānena yajya kalpanāt yaji kalpane ca vaiśvadeva āmikṣe ti dravya devatā viśiṣṭa karma vidhāna yukta

original: evaṁ cā 'gneyo 'ṣṭākapālaḥ saumyaś carur ityādivākyair vaiśvadevv āmikṣe 'tivākyasya prāyapātho rakṣito bhavati /
analyzed: eva ca ā āgneyaḥ ṣṭākapālaḥ saumyaḥ caruḥ ityādi vākyaiḥ vaiśvadevu āmikṣe tivākyasya prāya pāthaḥ rakṣitaḥ bhavati

original: anyathā hi teṣu sarveṣu dravyadevatāsaṁbandhakalpitayāgavidhānam atra ca dravyamātravidhānam iti vairūpyaṁ prasajyeta /
analyzed: anyathā hi teṣu sarveṣu dravya devatā sabandha kalpita yāga vidhānam atra ca dravya mātra vidhānam iti vairūpya prasajyeta

original: kiṁ ca vaiśvadevena yajete 'ty atra vaiśvadevaśabdasya devatāsamarpakatve yad viśvedevāḥ samayajanta tad vaiśvadevasya vaiśvadevatvam ity etasyā 'rthavādasya 'tyantam eva nirālambanatvaṁ syāt /
analyzed: ki ca vaiśvadevena yajeta iti atra vaiśvadeva śabdasya devatā samarpaka tve yat viśvedevāḥ samayajanta tat vaiśvadevasya vaiśvadeva tvam iti etasyāḥ rtha vādasya tyantam eva syāt

original: etadarthavādād dhi vaiśvadevaśabdoviśvadevakartṛkatvena karmaṇi pravṛtta iti jñāyate / na devatāsamarpakatvena /
analyzed: etad arthavādāt hi vaiśvadeva śabdaḥ viśvadeva kartṛka tvena karmaṇi pravṛttaḥ iti jñāyate na devatā samarpaka tvena

original: kiṁ ca vaiśvadevena yajete 'ty asya yāgavidhitva āmikṣāyā no 'tpattiśiṣṭatvam /
analyzed: kim ca vaiśvadevena yajeta iti asya yāga vidhi tve āmikṣāyāḥ na u tpatti śiṣṭa tvam

original: tathā ca tayā na vājināṁ bādhituṁ śakyata ity ubhayor apy āmikṣāvājināyor yāgāṅgatvaṁ syāt /
analyzed: tathā ca tayā na vājinā bādhitu śakyate iti ubhayoḥ api āmikṣā vājināyoḥ yāga aṅga tva syāt

original: tathā ca vikalpaḥ; sa ca 'ṣṭadoṣa iti /
analyzed: tathā ca vikalpaḥ sa ca ṣṭa doṣaḥ iti

original: tasmād vaiśvadevy āmikṣe 'ty atrai 'va yāgavidhānam / itarasya tv anuvādatvam /
analyzed: tasmāt vaiśvadevī āmikṣā iti atrai vai yāga vidhānam itarasya tu anuvāda tvam

original: anuvādatve ca yathā nā 'narthakyaṁ tatho 'ktam ity āstāṁ tāvat /
analyzed: anuvāda tve ca yathā tathā u ktam iti āstā tāvat

original: tat siddhaṁ vaiśvadevaśabdasya karmanāmadheyatvam /
analyzed: tat siddha vaiśvadeva śabdasya karma nāmadheya tvam

original: tad evaṁ nirūpitaṁ matvarthalakṣaṇādiprakāracatuṣṭayanirūpaṇena nāmadheyasya vidheyārthaparichedakatvenā 'rthavattvam /
analyzed: tat eva matu artha lakṣaṇa ādi prakāra catuṣṭaya nirūpaṇena nāmadheyasya vidheya artha parichedaka tvena ā rthavat tvam

original: anarthetukarmaṇaḥ sakāśāt puruṣasya nivṛttikaratvena niṣedhānāṁ puruṣārthānubandhitvam /
analyzed: anartha itu karmaṇaḥ sakāśāt puruṣasya nivṛtti kara tvena puruṣa artha anubandhi tvam

original: tathā hi /
analyzed: tathā hi

original: yathā vidhayaḥ pravartanaṁ abhidadhataḥ svapravartakatvanirvāhārthaṁ vidheyasya yāgādeḥ śreyaḥsādhanatvaṁ ākṣipantaḥ puruṣaṁ tatra pravartayanti / evaṁ na kalañjaṁ bhakṣayeta ityādayo niṣedhā api nivartanaṁ abhidadhataḥ svanivarttakatvanirvāhārthaṁ niṣedhyasya kalañjabhakṣaṇāder anarthahetutvam ākṣipantaḥ puruṣaṁ tato nivartayanti /
analyzed: yathā vidhayaḥ abhidadhataḥ sva pravartaka tva nirvāha artha vidheyasya yāga ādeḥ śreyaḥ sādhana tve ākṣipantaḥ puruṣa tatra pravartayanti eva na kalañja bhakṣayeta ityādayaḥ niṣedhāḥ api nivartana abhidadhataḥ sva nivartaka tva nirvāha artha niṣedhyasya kalañja bhakṣaṇa ādeḥ anartha hetu tvam ākṣipantaḥ puruṣa tatas nivartayanti

original: nanu kathaṁ niṣedhānāṁ nivartanāpratipādakatvam /
analyzed: nanu katha

original: yāvatā na bhakṣayen na hantavya ity evamādāv avyavadhānena nañarthasya 'bhāvasya dhātvarthenā 'nvaye dhātvartha varjana kartavyatai 'va sarvatra vākyārthaḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: yāvatā na bhakṣayet na hantavyaḥ iti evamādau avyavadhānena nañ arthasya bhāvasya dhātvarthena a nvaye sarvatra vākya arthaḥ pratīyate

original: tataś ca yathā yajete 'tyādau yāgakartavyatā vākyārthaḥ / evaṁ niṣedheṣu tattaddhātvarthāvarjanakartavyatā vākyārtho na nivartane 'ti
analyzed: tatas ca yathā yajeta ityādau yāga kartavya tā vākya arthaḥ eva niṣedheṣu tad tad dhātvartha avarjana kartavya tā vākya arthaḥ na nivartane ti

original: mai 'vam; avyavadhāne 'pi dhātvaṁrthasya pratyayārtho pasarjanatveno 'pasthitasya nañarthenā 'nvayāyogāt /
analyzed: a vyavadhāne pi dhātvarthasya pratyaya artha upasarjana tvena upasthitasya nañ arthena anvaya ayogāt

original: na hy anyopasarjanam anyenā 'nveti / mā bhūd rājapuruṣam ānaye 'ty atra rājña ānayanānvayitvam /
analyzed: na hi anya upasarjanam anyena a nveti mā bhūt rāja puruṣam ānaye ti atra rājñaḥ ānayana anvayi tvam

original: tataś cā 'vyavadhāne 'pi nañarthasya na dhātvarthenā 'nvayaḥ / āruṇyasye 'vai 'kahāyanyā;nā 'pi kalañjādipadārthair anvayaḥ; teṣām api kārakopasar janatayo 'pasthitatvena bhinnapadasya naño 'rthenā 'nvayāyogāt / ekāhvānyā ivā 'runyena /
analyzed: tatas ca vyavadhāne pi nañ arthasya na dhātvarthena anvayaḥ vai kalañja ādi padārthaiḥ anvayaḥ teṣām api kalañja ādi padārthaiḥ anvayaḥ teṣām api bhinna padasya nañaḥ rthena anvaya ayogāt

original: ataś ca 'nyenā 'nvayāyogān nañarthaḥ pratyayārthena saṃbadhyate / tasya prādhānyāt / kriyābhāvanaye 'vā 'ruṇyā dīni /
analyzed: atas ca nyena nvaya ayogāt nañ arthaḥ pratyaya arthena saṃbadhyate tasya prādhānyāt kriyā bhāvanaye vā

original: tatrā 'pi nā 'khyātāṃśavācyayā 'rthabhāvanayā / tasyā api liṅtvāṃśavācyapravartanopasar janatveno 'pasthitatvāt /
analyzed: tatra pi nā khyāta aṃśa vācyayā rtha bhāvanayā tasyāḥ api liṅ tva aṃśa vācya pravartana upasaḥ jana tvena u pasthita tvāt

original: ato liṅ tvāṃśena nañ saṃbadhyate / tasya sarvāpekṣayā prādhānyāt /
analyzed: atas liṅ tva aṃśena nam saṃbadhyate tasya sarva apekṣayā prādhānyāt

original: nañaś cai 'ṣa svabhāvo yat svasaṃbandhipratipakṣabo dhakatvam /
analyzed: nañaḥ ca e ṣa svabhāvaḥ yat sva saṃbandhi pratipakṣa bo dhaka tvam

original: nā 'sti 'ty atra hy asti 'ti sattyaśabdena saṃbadhya māno nañ sattvapratipakṣam asattvaṃ gamayati /
analyzed: na asti ti atra hi asti ti sattya śabdena saṃbadhya mānaḥ sattva pratipakṣam asattvam gamayati

original: tad iha liṅarthas tāvat pravartanā /
analyzed: tat iha liṅ arthaḥ tāvat pravartanā

original: atas tena saṃbadhyamāno nañ pravartanāpratipakṣāṃ nivartanāṃ gamayati; yathivākyaśravaṇe 'yaṃ māṃ pravartayati 'ti pravartanāpratitivan niṣedhavākya śravaṇe 'yaṃ māṃ nivartayati 'ti nivṛttyanukülavyāpārarūpani vartanāyāḥ pratīteḥ /
analyzed: atas tena saṃbadhyamānaḥ nam pravartanā pratipakṣām nivartanām gamayati yathi vākya śravaṇe yam mām pravartayati ti niṣedha vākya śravaṇe yam mām nivartayati ti vartanāyāḥ pratīteḥ

original: ataś ca sarvatra niṣedheṣu nivartanai 'va vākyārthaḥ /
analyzed: atas ca sarvatra niṣedheṣu vākya arthaḥ

original: evaṃ ca vidhiniṣedhayor bhinnārthatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: evam ca vidhi niṣedhayoḥ bhinna artha tvam siddham bhavati

original: hananādivarjanakartavyatāvākyārthapakṣe tu kartavyatāyā evo 'bhayatra pratipādyatvāt tayor ekārthatvaṃ syāt /
analyzed: hanana ādi varjana kartavyatā vākya artha pakṣe tu kartavyatāyāḥ pratipādya tvāt tayoḥ ekārtha tvam syāt

original: tac ca na yuktam /
analyzed: tat ca na yuktam

original: yathāḥ 'huḥ /
analyzed: yathāḥ huḥ

original: antaraṃ yādṛśaṃ loke brahmahatyāśvamedhayoḥ dṛśyate tādṛg eve 'daṃ vidhānapratiṣedhayoḥ /
analyzed: antaram yādṛśam loke brahmahatyā aśvamedhayoḥ dṛśyate tādṛś vidhāna pratiṣedhayoḥ

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: tathā /
analyzed: tathā

original: phalabuddhiprameyādhikāribodhakatābhedataḥ pañcadhātyantabhinnatvād bhedo vidhiniṣedhayoḥ /
analyzed: phala buddhi prameya adhikāri bodhaka tā bhedataḥ pañcadhā atyanta bhinna tvāt bhedaḥ vidhi niṣedhayoḥ

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: yanmate iṣṭasādhanatvaṃ liṅarthas tanmate 'pi liṅ saṃsṛṣṭo nañ iṣṭasādhanatvapratipakṣam aniṣṭasādhanatvam gamayati /
analyzed: yad mate iṣṭa sādhana tvam liṅ arthaḥ tad mate pi liṅ saṃsṛṣṭaḥ naṃ iṣṭa sādhana tva pratipakṣam aniṣṭa sādhana tvam gamayati

original: sarvathā 'pi tu nañaḥ prādhānyāt pratyayenā 'nvayaḥ /
analyzed: sarvathā tu nañaḥ prādhānyāt pratyayena a nvayaḥ

original: yadā tu tadanvaye kiṃcid bādhakaṃ tadā 'gatyā dhāt varthenā 'nvayaḥ /
analyzed: yadā tu tad anvaye kiṃcid bādhakam tadā gatyā dhāt v arthena a nvayaḥ

original: tac ca bādhakaṃ dvividham /
analyzed: tat ca bādhakam dvividham

original: tasya vratamity upakramo vikalpaprasaktis ca /
analyzed: tasya vratam iti upakramaḥ vikalpa prasaktiḥ ca

original: tena ca bādhakadvayena karmatvena vākyesu paryudāsāśrayaṇaṁ bhavati /
analyzed: tena ca bādhaka dvayena karma tvena vākyesu paryudāsa āśrayaṇa bhavati

original: tadabhāve nisedha eva /
analyzed: tad abhāve nisedhaḥ eva

original: paryudāsaḥ sa vijñeyo yatro 'ttarapadena nañ / iti / pratisedhaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ kriyayā saha yatra nañ,
analyzed: paryudāsaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ iti pratisedhaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ kriyayā saha yatra nañ

original: iti ca tayor laksaṇam /
analyzed: iti ca tayoḥ laksaṇam

original: tatra ne 'kseto 'dyantam ādityam ityādau paryudāsāśrayaṇaṁ tasya vratam ity upakramāt /
analyzed: tatra tasya vratam iti upakramāt

original: tathā hi /
analyzed: tathā hi

original: vrataśabdena kartavyo 'rtha ucyate /
analyzed: vrata śabdena kartavyaḥ rthaḥ ucyate

original: ataś ca snātakasya kartavyārthānāṁ vaktavyatveno 'pakramāt kiṁ tat kartavyam ity apeksāyām agre ne 'kseto 'dyantam ityādau kartavya evā 'rtho vaktavyaḥ / ākāṅksitābhidhānāt /
analyzed: atas ca snātakasya kartavya arthānām vaktavya tvena u pakramāt ki tat kartavyam iti apeksāyām agre ityādau kartavyaḥ eva arthaḥ vaktavyaḥ ākāṅksita abhidhānāt

original: arthāntaroktau ca pūrvavākyasya sākāṅksatvena 'prāmāṇyaṁ syāt /
analyzed: artha antara uktau ca pūrva vākyasya sākāṅksa tvena syāt

original: na hi kartavyārthasya vaktavyatveno 'pakrame 'gre ca tadanabhidhāne pūrvavākyasya nirākāṅksatvaṁ saṁbhavati /
analyzed: na hi kartavya arthasya vaktavya tvena u pakrame gre ca tad anabhidhāne pūrva vākyasya sabhavati

original: na ca sākāṅksasya prāmāṇyam / gaur aśvaḥ purusa ityādāv api tatprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: na ca sākāṅksasya prāmāṇyam gauḥ aśvaḥ purusaḥ ityādau api tad prasaṅgāt

original: kiṁ ca ne 'ksete 'ty asyo 'pakramena pratiyamānai 'ksetrā ca na syād arthāntarokteh /
analyzed: ki ca ti asya u pakramena pratiyamānaiḥ ca na syāt artha antara uktā ih

original: ataś cā 'sminn vākye kaścit kartavya evā 'rtho vaktavyaḥ /
analyzed: atas ca a smin vākye kaścid kartavyaḥ eva a rthaḥ vaktavyaḥ

original: taduktsau ca na nañaḥ pratyayena saṁbandho ghaṭate / tatsaṁbandhe kartavyārthokter anupapatteh /
analyzed: ca na nañaḥ pratyayena sabandhaḥ ghaṭate tad sabandhe kartavya artha ukteḥ anupapattyāḥ ih

original: pratyayāc cā 'vatārito nañ dhātunā saṁbadhyate /
analyzed: pratyayāt ca a vatāritaḥ nam dhātunā sabadhyate

original: tatsaṁbandhe ca na nañaḥ pratisedhakatvam / vidhāyakasaṁbandhenai 'va tasya pratisedhakatvāt; pratisedhakatvesya vidhāyakapratipaksatvāt /
analyzed: tad sabandhe ca na nañaḥ pratisedhaka tvam vidhāyaka sabandhena va tasya pratisedhaka tvāt vidhāyaka pratipakṣa tvāt

original: nāmadhātuyoge tu na nañaḥ pratisedhakatvam / tayor avidhāyakatvāt /
analyzed: nāma dhātu yoge tu na nañaḥ pratisedhaka tvam tayoḥ avidhāyaka tvāt

original: yathā 'huh /
analyzed: yathā huh

original: nāmadhātvarthayogi tu nai 'va nañ pratisedhakaḥ yadaty abrāhmaṇādharmāv anvamātravirodhinau /
analyzed: nāma dhātu artha yogi tu pratisedhakaḥ a brāhmaṇa a dharmau

original: ataś ca ne 'ksete 'ty atra naño dhātuyogān nañiksatibhyām iksaṇavirodhi kaścanā 'rthaḥ pratipādyate /nanu tadanyatadviruddhatadbhāveṣu nañ iti saty api smaraṇe nañaḥ svasaṃsṛṣṭābhāva eva śaktiḥ / lāghavāt; na tu tadanyatadviruddhayoḥ / tayor abhāvaghaṭitatvena gauravāt / anekārthatvasya ca 'nyāyyatvāt /
analyzed: atas ca ne iti atra nañaḥ dhātu yogāt nañ iksatibhyām ik saṇa virodhi arthaḥ pratipādyate nanu tad anya tad viruddha tad bhāveṣu naṃ iti sati api smaraṇe nañaḥ sva saṃsṛṣṭa abhāvaḥ eva śaktiḥ lāghavāt na tu tad anya tad viruddhayoḥ tayoḥ abhāva ghaṭita tvena gauravāt aneka artha tvasya ca nyāyya tvāt

original: ato naño dhātuyoge dhātvarthābhāvabodhakatvam eva / na tu tadviruddhārthabodhakatvam iti cet—
analyzed: atas nañaḥ dhātu yoge dhātvartha abhāva bodhaka tvam eva na tu tad viruddha artha bodhaka tvam iti ced

original: satyam /
analyzed: satyam

original: naño 'bhāva eva śaktiḥ /
analyzed: nañaḥ bhāvaḥ eva śaktiḥ

original: smaraṇaṃ tu pratītyabhiprāyam / na śaktyabhiprāyam /
analyzed: smaraṇam tu prati iti abhiprāyam na śakti abhiprāyam

original: nāmadhātvarthayogi 'ty api pratītyabhiprāyam /
analyzed: nāma dhātvartha yogi ti api prati iti abhiprāyam

original: tathā 'pi ne 'kṣete 'ty atra pratyayasya nañā 'saṃbandhāt tena tāvat kaścid artho vidheyaḥ /
analyzed: tathā pi ne kṣete ti atra pratyayasya nañā saṃbandhāt tena tāvat kaścid arthaḥ vidheyaḥ

original: tatraś ca na tāvad dhātvartho vidhātuṃ śakyate / nañā tadabhāvabodhanāt /
analyzed: tatras ca na tāvat dhātvarthaḥ vidhātum śakyate nañā tad abhāva bodhanāt

original: nā 'pi tadabhāvo vidhātuṃ śakyate / abhāvasya 'vidheyatvāt /
analyzed: na a pi tad abhāvaḥ vidhātum śakyate abhāvasya vidheya tvāt

original: ataś ca nañīkṣatibhyāṃ vidhānayogyaḥ kaścana 'kṣaṇavirodhy artho lakṣaṇayā pratipādyate /
analyzed: atas ca nañī kṣatibhyām vidhāna yogyaḥ kaścana kṣaṇa virodhī arthaḥ lakṣaṇayā pratipādyate

original: sa ce 'kṣaṇavirodhi lakṣyamāṇaḥ padārtho nekṣe / ity anīkṣaṇasaṃkalpaḥ / tasye 'kṣaṇavirodhitvāt; saty api padārthāntarasye 'kṣaṇavirodhitve sarvakriyāvināśhūtatvena saṃkalpasyai 'va lakṣaṇāt /
analyzed: sa ced kṣaṇa virodhi lakṣyamāṇaḥ padārthaḥ na īkṣe iti an īkṣaṇa saṃkalpaḥ kṣaṇa virodhi tvāt sati api padārtha antara sye kṣaṇa virodhi tve sarva kriyā vinā śhūta tvena lakṣaṇāt

original: sa eva ne 'kṣete 'ty atra kartavyatayā vidhīyate; anīkṣaṇasaṃkalpena bhāvyayed iti /
analyzed: saḥ eva ne kṣete ti atra kartavya tayā vidhīyate an īkṣaṇa saṃkalpena iti

original: bhāvyakāṅkṣāyāṃ cai 'tavātā hai 'tasā viyukto bhavati 'ti vākyaśeṣavagataḥ pāpakṣayo bhāvyatayā saṃbadhyate /
analyzed: bhāvya kāṅkṣāyām viyuktaḥ bhavati ti vākya śeṣa vagataḥ pāpa kṣayaḥ bhāvya tayā saṃbadhyate

original: evaṃ cā 'tra pāpakṣayārthasaṃkalpasya kartavyatayā vidhānāt tasya vratam ity anenai 'kavākyatā siddhā bhavati /
analyzed: evam ca ā tra pāpa kṣaya artha saṃkalpasya kartavya tayā vidhānāt tasya vratam iti anena e kavākya tā siddhā bhavati

original: tat siddhaṃ ne 'kṣete 'ty atra tasya vratam ity upakramāt paryudāsāśrayaṇam iti /
analyzed: tat siddham na i ti atra tasya vratam iti upakramāt paryudāsa āśrayaṇam iti

original: nā 'nuyājeṣu yeyajāmahaṃ karoti 'ty atra vikalpaprasaktyā tadāśrayaṇam /
analyzed: na anuyājeṣu yeyajāmaham karoti ti atra vikalpa prasaktyā tad āśrayaṇam

original: tathā hi /
analyzed: tathā hi

original: yady atra pradhānasaṃbandhālobhān nañaḥ pratyayasaṃbandhaḥ svikriyate / tathā saty anena vākyena 'nuyājeṣu yeyajāmahaḥ pratiṣidhyata iti vaktavyam / anuyājeṣu yeyajāmahaṃ na kuryād iti /
analyzed: yadi atra pradhāna saṃbandha alobhāt nañaḥ pratyaya saṃbandhaḥ svikriyate tathā sati anena vākyena nuyājeṣu yeyajāmahaḥ pratiṣidhyate iti vaktavyam anuyājeṣu yeyajāmaham na kuryāt iti

original: na ca tatra tasya pratiṣedhaḥ prāptiṃ vinā saṃbhavati / prāptisāpekṣatvāt pratiṣedhasya /ata eva na 'ntarikṣe na divi 'ty asya na pratiṣedhakatvam / antarikṣe cayanāprāpteḥ /
analyzed: na ca tatra tasya pratiṣedhaḥ prāptim vinā saṃbhavati prāpti sāpekṣa tvāt pratiṣedhasya atas eva na ntarikṣe na divi ti asya na pratiṣedhaka tvam antarikṣe cayana aprāpteḥ

original: ata eva brāhmaṇo na hantavya ity asya niyayadhanahanananivartakatvam upapadyate /
analyzed: atas eva brāhmaṇaḥ na hantavyaḥ iti asya niyaya dhana hanana nivartaka tvam upapadyate

original: sarvo hi puruṣaḥ kadācid dhananādau pravartate / kadācic ca rāgādyabhāve na pravartate /
analyzed: sarvaḥ hi puruṣaḥ kadācid dhanana ādau pravartate kadācid ca rāga ādi abhāve na pravartate

original: tatra yadi niṣedhasya prāptiśapeḳṣatvaṁ na syāt / tadā rāgādi tirodhāya hananādāv apravṛttaṁ praty eva śāstraprāmāṇyopapatau rāgādinā hananādau pravṛttena puṁsā na tato nivartitavyam /
analyzed: tatra yadi niṣedhasya na syāt tadā rāga ādi tirodhāya hanana ādau apravṛtta prati eva śāstra prāmāṇya upapatau rāga ādinā hanana ādau pravṛttena pusā na tatas nivartitavyam

original: prāptiśāpekṣatve tu svayam apravṛttaṁ prati prasaktyabhāvena niṣedhaśāstrāpravṛtte rāgādinā pravṛttaṁ praty eva bhrāntinimittarāgabādhena niṣedhaśāstrapravṛtter yuktā pravṛtasya tato nivṛttiḥ /
analyzed: prāpti śā apekṣa tve tu svayam apravṛtta prati prasakti abhāvena niṣedha śāstra apravṛtteḥ rāga ādinā pravṛtta prati eva bhrānti nimitta rāga bādhena niṣedha śāstra pravṛtteḥ yuktā pravṛtasya tatas nivṛttiḥ

original: ataś ca brāhmaṇo na hantavya ity asya niṣedhasya nivṛttiniyamabodhakatvam / vrīhin avahaniyād ity asye 'va 'vaghātaniyamabodhakatvam /
analyzed: atas ca brāhmaṇaḥ na hantavyaḥ iti asya niṣedhasya nivṛtti niyama bodhaka tvam vrīhin iti vaghāta niyama bodhaka tvam

original: yathā khalu vrīhīn avahanīyād iti śāstraṁ vaituṣyārtham avaghāte svataḥ pravṛttaṁ puruṣaṁ prati na pravartate vaiyarthyāt / kiṁ tu dālanādau pravṛttaṁ prati; evaṁ na hanyād iti śāstraṁ hananāt svayaṁ nivṛttaṁ puruṣaṁ prati na pravartate vaiyarthyāt / kiṁ tu hanane pravṛttaṁ puruṣaṁ prati kartavyatvena prasakatasya pratiṣedhāt / yat kartavyaṁ tan ne 'ti /
analyzed: yathā khalu vrīhīn avahanīyāt iti śāstra vaituṣya artham avaghāte svatas pravṛtta puruṣa prati na pravartate vaiyarthyāt ki tu dālana ādau pravṛtta prati eva na hanyāt iti śāstra hananāt svaya nivṛtta puruṣa prati na pravartate vaiyarthyāt ki tu hanane pravṛtta puruṣa prati kartavya tvena prasakatasya pratiṣedhāt yat kartavya tat na iti

original: ataś ca prāptiśāpekṣatvāt pratiṣedhānām anuyājeṣu yeyajāmahapratiṣedhe tasya tatra prāptir vaktavyā /
analyzed: atas ca prāpti śā apekṣa tvāt pratiṣedhānām anuyājeṣu yeyajāmaha pratiṣedhe tasya tatra prāptiḥ vaktavyā

original: sā ca na tāvad dhananādāv iva rāgataḥ saṁbhavati /
analyzed: sā ca na tāvat dhanana ādau iva rāgataḥ sabhavati

original: ato yajatiṣu yeyajāmahaṁ karoti 'ti śāstrāt sā vaktavyā /
analyzed: atas yajatiṣu yeyajāmaha karoti śāstrāt sā vaktavyā

original: śāstraprāptasya ca pratiṣedhe vikalpaḥ syāc chāstreṇa bhrāntinimittarāgasye 'va śāstrāntarasya 'tyantabādhāyogāt /
analyzed: śāstra prāptasya ca pratiṣedhe vikalpaḥ syāt śāstreṇa śāstra antarasya tyanta bādhā yogāt

original: na ca padaśāstreṇa 'havanīyaśāstrasye 'va nā 'nuyājeṣv iti viśeṣaśāstreṇa yajatiṣu yeyajāmahaṁ karoti 'ti sāmānyaśāstrasya bādhaḥ syād iti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca pada śāstreṇa havanīya śāstrasya i va na anuyājeṣu iti viśeṣa śāstreṇa yajatiṣu yeyajāmaha karoti sāmānya śāstrasya bādhaḥ syāt iti vācyam

original: śāstrayor hi tatra bādhyabādhakabhāvo yatra parasparānirapekṣatā na hi padaśāstrasya svārthāvidhānārtham āhavanīyaśāstrāpekṣā 'sti /
analyzed: śāstrayoḥ hi tatra bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ yatra paraspara a nirapekṣa tā na hi pada śāstrasya sva artha avidhāna artham āhavanīya śāstra apekṣā sti

original: niṣedhaśāstrasya tu prasaṅgārthaṁ yajatiṣu yeyajāmahaṁ karoti 'ti vidher asty apekṣā /
analyzed: niṣedha śāstrasya tu yajatiṣu yeyajāmaha karoti vidheḥ asti apekṣā

original: evaṁ ca niṣedhaśāstrasya viśeṣaviṣayatvena prābalyavad vidhiśāstrasyā 'py upajīvyatvena prābalyam astī 'ti na niṣedhena vidher atyantabādho yukta iti vihitapratiṣiddhatvād vikalpaḥ syāt /
analyzed: eva ca niṣedha śāstrasya viśeṣa viṣaya tvena prābalya vat vidhi śāstrasya api upajīvya tvena prābalyam asti iti na niṣedhena vidheḥ atyanta bādhaḥ yuktaḥ iti vihita pratiṣiddha tvāt vikalpaḥ syāt

original: sa ca na yuktaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca na yuktaḥ

original: vikalpe hi pakṣe śāstrasyā 'prāmāṇyaṁ bhavati /
analyzed: vikalpe hi pakṣe śāstrasyā prāmāṇya bhavati

original: na hy anuyājeṣu yeyajāmahakaraṇe nā 'nuyājeṣv ity asya prāmāṇyaṁ saṁbhavati / vrīhyanuṣṭhānasamaya iva yavaśāstrasya /
analyzed: na hi anuyājeṣu yeyajāmaha karaṇe na anuyājeṣu iti asya prāmāṇya sabhavati vrīhi anuṣṭhāna samaye iva yava śāstrasya

original: dvirādṛṣṭakalpanā ca syāt /
analyzed: dvis ādṛṣṭa kalpanā ca syāt

original: vidher hy evaṁ jñāyate / yad anuyājeṣu yeyajāmahakaraṇe kaścano 'pakāro bhavati 'ti /
analyzed: vidheḥ hi eva jñāyate yat anuyājeṣu yeyajāmaha karaṇe kaścana u pakāraḥ bhavati

original: niṣedhāc ca tadakaraṇād iti jñāyate / anṛtavadanākaraṇād iva darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ /
analyzed: niṣedhāt ca tad akaraṇāt iti jñāyate anṛta vadana akaraṇāt iva darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ

original: sa co 'pakāro 'dṛṣṭarūpa iti dvirādṛṣṭakalpanāprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca u pakāraḥ dṛṣṭa rūpaḥ iti dvis ādṛṣṭa kalpanā prasaṅgaḥ

original: ataś ca vikalpo na yuktaḥ /
analyzed: atas ca vikalpaḥ na yuktaḥ

original: pratiṣedhāśrayaṇe ca tadāpatter na tadāśrayaṇam /
analyzed: pratiṣedha āśrayaṇe ca tad āpatteḥ na tad āśrayaṇam

original: kiṁ tu naño 'nuyājaśabdena saṁbandham āśritya paryudāsa āśrīyate / nañanuyājaśabdābhyām anuyājavyatiriktalaḳṣaṇāt /
analyzed: ki tu nañaḥ nuyāja śabdena sabandham āśritya paryudāsaḥ āśrīyate nañ anuyāja śabdābhyām anuyāja vyatirikta laṣaṇāt

original: anuyājavyatirikteu yeyajāmahaṁ karoti 'ti /
analyzed: anuyāja vyatiriktā yeyajāmaha karoti ti

original: atra ca vākye yeyajāmahaḥ kartavyatayā na vidhīyate / yajatiṣu yeyajāmahaṁ karoti 'ty anenai 'va vihitatvāt /
analyzed: atra ca vākye yeyajāmahaḥ kartavya tayā na vidhīyate yajatiṣu yeyajāmaha karoti vihita tvāt

original: kiṁ tu sāmānyaśāstravihitayeyajāmahānuvādena tasyā 'nuyājavyatiriktaviṣayatā vidhīyate /
analyzed: ki tu sāmānya śāstra vihita yeyajāmaha anuvādena tasyāḥ nuyāja vyatirikta viṣaya tā vidhīyate

original: yad yajatiṣu yeyajāmahaṁ karoti tad anuyājavyatiriktev iti /
analyzed: yat yajatiṣu yeyajāmaha karoti tat anuyāja vyatiriktā iva iti

original: evaṁ ca sāmānyaśāstrasya viśeṣāpekṣiṇo nā 'nuyājeṣv ity anenā 'nuyājavyatiriktaviṣayasamarpaṇād anuyājavyatirikteṣu yeyajāmahaḥ kartavyatayā prāptaḥ /
analyzed: eva ca sāmānya śāstrasya viśeṣa apekṣiṇaḥ na anuyājeṣu iti anena anuyāja vyatirikta viṣaya samarpaṇāt anuyāja vyatirikteṣu yeyajāmahaḥ kartavya tayā prāptaḥ

original: anuyājeṣu tu sa na kartavyatayā prāpto na vā pratiṣiddha iti na vikalpaḥ /
analyzed: anuyājeṣu tu sa na kartavya tayā prāptaḥ na vā pratiṣiddhaḥ iti na vikalpaḥ

original: lakṣaṇayā cā 'nuyājavyatiriktaviṣayasamarpaṇān nā 'nuyājeṣv iti vākyasya nā 'prāmāṇyam / ataś ca paryudāsāśrayaṇe na kiṁcid bādhakam /
analyzed: lakṣaṇayā ca anuyāja vyatirikta viṣaya samarpaṇāt na anuyājeṣu iti vākyasya na ā prāmāṇyam atas ca paryudāsa āśrayaṇe na kicid bādhakam

original: tat siddhaṁ nā 'nuyājeṣv iti vākye vikalpābhavāt paryudāsāśrayaṇam iti /
analyzed: tat na anuyājeṣu iti vākye vikalpa abhavāt paryudāsa āśrayaṇam iti

original: nanu paryudāsāśrayaṇe yajatiṣu yeyajāmahaṁ karoti 'ti śāstreṇa yāgasāmānye prāptasya yeyajāmahasya nā 'nuyājeṣvity anenā 'nuyājavyatirikteṣu saṁkocanāt paryudāsasyo 'pasaṁhārād abhedaḥ syāt /
analyzed: nanu paryudāsa āśrayaṇe yajatiṣu yeyajāmaha karoti śāstreṇa yāga sāmānye prāptasya yeyajāmahasya na anuyājeṣu iti anena anuyāja vyatirikteṣu sa kocanāt paryudāsasya u pasahārāt abhedaḥ syāt

original: upasaṁhāre hi sāmānye prāptasya viśeṣe saṁkoco bhavati / yathā puroḍāśaṁ caturdhā karoti 'ti puroḍāśasāmānye prāptaṁ caturdhākaraṇam āgneyaṁ caturdhā karoti 'ty āgneye saṁkocyata iti cet,—
analyzed: upasahāre hi sāmānye prāptasya viśeṣe sa kocaḥ bhavati yathā puroḍāśa caturdhā karoti puroḍāśa sāmānye prāpta caturdhākaraṇam āgneya caturdhā karoti āgneye sakā ucyate iti ced

original: na / tanmātrasamkocārthatvād upasaṁhārasya / tadanyamātrasamkocārthatvāt paryudāsasya 'ti kecit /
analyzed: na tad mātra samkoca artha tvāt upasahārasya tad anya mātra samkoca artha tvāt paryudāsasya kecid

original: anye tū 'pasaṁhāro nāma sāmānyataḥ prāptasya viśeṣe saṁkocanarūpo vyāpāraviśeṣo vidheḥ /
analyzed: anye tu pasahāraḥ nāma sāmānyatas prāptasya viśeṣe sa kocana rūpaḥ vyāpāra viśeṣaḥ vidheḥ

original: paryudāsas tu / paryudāsaḥ sa vijñeyo yatro 'ttarapadena nañ / ity abhiyuktoktyā pratyayātirikteṇa dhātunā vā nāmnā vā nañaḥ sambandhaḥ /
analyzed: paryudāsaḥ tu paryudāsaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ iti abhiyukta uktyā pratyaya atirikteṇa dhātunā vā nāmnā vā nañaḥ sambandhaḥ

original: ataś ca 'nayos tāvat svarūpataḥ spaṣṭa eva bhedaḥ /
analyzed: atas ca nayoḥ tāvat svarūpataḥ spaṣṭaḥ eva bhedaḥ

original: evaṁ saty apy abheda āśaṅkyeta yadi yatra paryudāsas tatrā 'vaśyam upasaṁhāraḥ syāt /
analyzed: eva sati api abhedaḥ āśaṅkyeta yadi yatra paryudāsaḥ tatra vaśyam upasahāraḥ syāt

original: na cai 'tad asti / ne 'kṣeto 'dyatām ityādau saty api tasmiṇṇ upasaṁhārābhāvāt /
analyzed: na ca e tat asti ityādau sati api upasahāra abhāvāt

original: na hi tatrā 'gneyacaturdhākaraṇam iva sāmānye prāptaṁ kiṁcid viśeṣe saṁkocyate; pāpakṣayoddeśena 'nikṣaṇasaṁkalpamātravidhānāt /
analyzed: na hi tatra āgneya caturdhākaraṇam iva sāmānye kicid viśeṣe pāpa kṣaya uddeśena nikṣaṇa sakalpa mātra vidhānāt

original: prakṛtodāharaṇe tu yajisāmānye prāptasya yeyajāmahasya 'nuyājvyatirikteṣu saṁkocanād yadi vidher upasaṁhāravidhitvaṁ sambhavati / nai 'tāvatā kiṁcid virudhyate /
analyzed: prakṛta udāharaṇe tu yaji sāmānye prāptasya yeyajāmahasya nuyāj vyatirikteṣu sa kocanāt yadi vidheḥ upasahāra vidhi tva sambhavati tāvatā kicid virudhyate

original: vidhyabhāve hi kathaṁ vidhikāryam upasaṁhāraḥ paryudāsena kriyata iti bhavati virodhaḥ /
analyzed: vidhi abhāve hi vidhi kāryam upasahāraḥ paryudāsena kriyate iti bhavati virodhaḥ

original: na cā 'tra vidhir na 'sti / naño 'nuyājapadasambamdhena vidher vidhāyakatvasyā 'vyāghātāt /
analyzed: na ca tra vidhiḥ na sti nañaḥ nuyāja pada sambamdhena vidheḥ vidhāyaka tvasya vyāghātāt

original: atra hi paryudāso 'nuyājāvyatiriktaviṣayasamarpaka āgneyapadayatî upasaṁhārakas tu vidhir eva /
analyzed: atra hi paryudāsaḥ nuyāja a vyatirikta viṣaya samarpakaḥ upasahārakaḥ tu vidhiḥ eva

original: na cā 'tra tanmātrasamkocābhāvān no 'pasaṁhāra iti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca tra tad mātra samkoca abhāvāt na u pasahāraḥ iti vācyam

original: tanmātrasamkoca iti ko 'rthaḥ /
analyzed: tanmātra samkocaḥ iti kaḥ rthaḥ

original: āgneyamātre saṁkoco vā / sāmānyaprāptasya viśeṣamātre saṁkoco vā /
analyzed: āgneya mātre sakocaḥ vā sāmānya prāptasya viśeṣa mātre sakocaḥ vā

original: ādye 'nārabhyādhitasāptadaśyasya mitraviṇdādiprākaraṇasthena vākyeno 'pasaṁhāro na syād āgneye saṁkocābhāvāt /
analyzed: ādye mitraviṇda ādi prākaraṇa sthena vākyena u pasahāraḥ na syāt āgneye sa koca abhāvāt

original: dvitīye caturdhākaraṇasya puroḍāśamātre prāptasyā 'gneye saṁkocavadanuyājānanuyājasādhāraṇyena prāptasyā 'nanuyājeṣu saṁkocād upasaṁhāraḥ syād eva /
analyzed: dvitīye caturdhākaraṇasya puroḍāśa mātre prāptasya ā gneye sakoca vat anuyāja an anuyāja sādhāraṇyena prāptasyāḥ na anuyājeṣu sakocāt upasahāraḥ syāt eva

original: etāvāṁs tu viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: etāvān tu viśeṣaḥ

original: āgneyādivākyeṣv āgneyādayo viśeṣāḥ svapadopasthāpitāḥ /
analyzed: āgneya ādi vākyeṣu āgneya ādayaḥ viśeṣāḥ sva pada upasthāpitāḥ

original: prakṛte tu paryudāsena tasyo 'pasthitir iti /
analyzed: prakṛte tu paryudāsena tasya u pasthitiḥ iti

original: upasaṁhāraṇyāyas tv aviśiṣṭa eva /
analyzed: upasahāraṇyāyaḥ tu a viśiṣṭaḥ eva

original: yac ca tadanyamātrasaṁkocanārthatvāt paryudāsasye 'ti / tan na; ne 'kṣete 'ty atra saty api paryudāse saṁkocābhāvāt /
analyzed: yat ca tad anya mātra sa kocana artha tvāt paryudāsasya iti tat na atra sati api paryudāse sa koca abhāvāt

original: na hy atra sāmānye prāptaṁ tadanyamātre saṁkocyate / saṁkalpamātravidhānād ity uktam /
analyzed: na hi atra sāmānye tad anya mātre sakā ucyate sa kalpa mātra vidhānāt iti uktam

original: ity āstāṁ tāvat /
analyzed: iti āstā tāvat

original: tat siddhaṁ nā 'nuyājeṣv ity atra vikalpaprasaktyā paryudāsāśrayaṇam iti /
analyzed: tat na anuyājeṣu iti atra vikalpa prasaktyā paryudāsa āśrayaṇam iti

original: yatra tu sa āśrayituṁ na śakyate / tatra tatprasakṭāv api niṣedha evā 'śrīyate /
analyzed: yatra tu saḥ āśrayitu na śakyate tatra tad prasakṭau api niṣedhaḥ evā śrīyate

original: yathā nā 'tirātre ṣoḍaśinaṁ gṛhṇāti 'ty atra /
analyzed: yathā na atirātre ṣoḍaśina gṛhṇāti ti atra

original: atra hy atirātre ṣoḍaśinaṁ gṛhṇāti 'ti śāstrapāptam atirātre ṣoḍaśigrahaṇaṁ pratiṣidhyata iti vihitapratiṣiddhatvād vikalpaprasakṭāv api paryudāso nā 'śriyate 'śakyatvāt /
analyzed: atra hi atirātre ṣoḍaśina gṛhṇāti śāstra pāptam atirātre ṣoḍaśi grahaṇa pratiṣidhyate iti vihita pratiṣiddha tvāt vikalpa prasakṭau api paryudāsaḥ na ā śriyate śakya tvāt

original: yady atra nañaḥ ṣoḍaśipadena saṁbandhaḥ svīkrīyeta / tadā 'tirātre ṣoḍaśīvyatiriktaṁ gṛhṇāti 'ti vākyārthaḥ syāt /
analyzed: yadi atra nañaḥ ṣoḍaśi padena sabandhaḥ svīkrīyeta tadā tirātre ṣoḍaśī vyatirikta gṛhṇāti vākya arthaḥ syāt

original: tatra cā 'tirātre ṣoḍaśinaṁ gṛhṇāti 'ti pratyakṣavidhivirodhaḥ /
analyzed: tatra ca a tirātre ṣoḍaśinaḥ gṛhṇāti pratyakṣa vidhi virodhaḥ

original: ata evā 'tirātrapadena nā nañaḥ saṁbandho 'tirātre ṣoḍaśinaṁ gṛhṇāti 'ti pratyakṣavidhivirodhat /
analyzed: atas eva tirātra padena nā nañaḥ gṛhṇāti pratyakṣa vidhi virodhat

original: ataś cā 'tra paryudāsasyā 'nupapatter niṣedha evā 'śrīyate / vikalpo 'pi svīkrīyate 'anuyājavat /
analyzed: atas ca ā tra paryudāsasya a nupapatteḥ niṣedhaḥ evā śrīyate  vikalpaḥ pi svīkrīyate anuyāja vat

original: ataś cai 'tat siddham /
analyzed: atas ca e tat siddham

original: yatra tasya vratam ityādyupakramo vikalpaprasaktiś ca nā 'sti tatra pratiṣedhaḥ / yathā na kalañjaṁ bhakṣayed iti /
analyzed: yatra tasya vratam ityādi upakramaḥ vikalpa prasaktiḥ ca na asti tatra pratiṣedhaḥ yathā na kalañja bhakṣayet iti

original: yatra vā vikalpaprasakṭāv api paryudāsa āśrayituṁ na śakyate tatra pratiṣedhaḥ / yathā nā 'tirātre ṣoḍaśinaṁ gṛhṇāti 'ti /
analyzed: yatra vā vikalpa prasakṭau api paryudāsaḥ āśrayitu na śakyate tatra pratiṣedhaḥ yathā na atirātre ṣoḍaśinaḥ gṛhṇāti

original: etāvāṁs tu viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: etāvān tu viśeṣaḥ

original: yatra vikalpāpādakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ / tatra pratiṣidhyamānasya nā 'narthahetutvam / ubhayor api vidhipratiṣedhayoḥ kratvarthatvāt /
analyzed: yatra vikalpa āpādakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ tatra pratiṣidhyamānasya na a nartha hetu tvam ubhayoḥ api vidhi pratiṣedhayoḥ kratu artha tvāt

original: yatra tu na vikalpaḥ prasajyate prāptiś ca rāgataḥ pratiṣedhaś ca puruṣārthas tatra niṣidhyamānasyā 'narthahetutvam / yathā kalañjabhakṣaṇasya /
analyzed: yatra tu na vikalpaḥ prasajyate prāptiḥ ca rāgataḥ pratiṣedhaḥ ca puruṣa arthaḥ tatra niṣidhyamānasya a nartha hetu tvam yathā kalañja bhakṣaṇasya

original: dīkṣito na dadāti na juhoti 'tyādiṣu tu dānahomādīnāṁ śāstrapāptāv api puruṣārthatvena prāptatvāt kratvarthavena ca pratiṣedhāt tulyārthatvābhāvena vikalpāprasakṭāv api nateṣām anarthahetutvam / rāgaprāptyabhāvāt /
analyzed: dīkṣitaḥ na dadāti na juhoti tyādiṣu tu dāna homa ādīnām śāstra pāptau api puruṣa artha tvena prāpta tvāt kratu arthavena ca pratiṣedhāt tulya ārtha tva abhāvena vikalpa aprasakṭau api na teṣām anartha hetu tvam rāga prāpti abhāvāt

original: rāgataḥ prāptasyā 'pi kratvartatvena pratiṣedhe tadanuṣṭhānāt krator vaiguṇyaṁ nā 'narthotpattiḥ / yathā svastryupagamanādipratisedhe /
analyzed: rāgataḥ prāptasya a pi kratu arta tvena pratiṣedhe tad anuṣṭhānāt kratoḥ vaiguṇya nā nartha utpattiḥ yathā sva strī upagamana ādi pratisedhe

original: rāgataḥ prāptasya puruṣārthatvena pratiṣedhe niṣidhyamānasyā 'narthahetutvam iti dik /
analyzed: rāgataḥ prāptasya puruṣa artha tvena pratiṣedhe niṣidhyamānasyāḥ nartha hetu tvam iti diś

original: tat siddhaṁ niṣedhānāṁ puruṣārthānubandhitvam /
analyzed: tat siddha puruṣa artha anubandhi tvam

original: evaṁ sarvasyā 'pi vedasya puruṣārthānubandhitvam /
analyzed: eva sarvasya pi vedasya puruṣa artha anubandhi tvam

original: prakṛtam anusarāmaḥ /
analyzed: prakṛtam anusarāmaḥ

original: tad evaṁ yathā vidhyādīnām adhyayanāvidhyupāttānāṁ nā 'narthakyam / evam arthavādānām api tadupāttatvenā 'narthakyānupapatteḥ svārthapratipādane ca prayojanābhāvāl lakṣaṇayā prayojanavadarthaparvasānāṁ vaktavyam /
analyzed: tat eva yathā vidhi ādīnām na ānarthakyam evam arthavādānām api tad upātta tvena ā narthakya anupapatteḥ svārtha pratipādane ca prayojana abhāvāt lakṣaṇayā vaktavyam

original: te cā 'rthavādā dvividhāḥ / vidhiśeṣā niṣedhaśeṣāś ca /
analyzed: te ca arthavādāḥ dvividhāḥ vidhi śeṣāḥ niṣedha śeṣāḥ ca

original: tatra vāyavyaṁ śvetam ālabheta 'tyādividhiśeṣāṇāṁ vāyur vai kṣepiṣṭhā devate 'tyādīnām arthavādānāṁ vidheyārthasāvakaṭayā 'rthavatttvam /
analyzed: tatra vāyavya śvetam ālabheta tya ādi vidhi śeṣāṇām vāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhā devate tyādīnām arthavādānām vidheya artha sa avakaṭayā rthavat ttvam

original: barhiṣi rajataṁ na deyam ityādiniṣedhaśeṣāṇāṁ so 'rodīd ityādīnām arthavādānāṁ tu niṣedhyanindakaṭaye 'ti /
analyzed: barhiṣi rajata na deyam ityādi niṣedha śeṣāṇā saḥ rodīt ityādīnām arthavādānā tu niṣedhya nindaka ṭaye

original: ataś ca lakṣaṇayā prāśāstyam arthavādair bodhyate /
analyzed: atas ca lakṣaṇayā prāśāstyam arthavādaiḥ bodhyate

original: tac ca prāśastyajñānaṁ śabdabhāvanāyām itikartavyatātvena saṁbadhyate /
analyzed: tat ca prāśastya jñāna śabda bhāvanāyām itikartavya tā tvena sabadhyate

original: paramaprakṛtam /
analyzed: parama prakṛtam

original: tat siddhaṁ vakṣyamānārthabhāvanābhāvyikā liṅādijñānakaraṇikā prāśastyajñānetikartavyatākā śābdī bhāvanā liṅtvāṁśeno 'cyata iti /
analyzed: tat vakṣyamāna artha bhāvanā bhāvyikā liṅ ādi jñāna karaṇikā prāśastya jñāna iti kartavya tākā śābdī bhāvanā u cyate iti

original: nanu ke 'yaṁ śābdī bhāvanā /
analyzed: nanu ke ya śābdī bhāvanā

original: ucyate /
analyzed: ucyate

original: puruṣapravṛttyanukūlaṁ vyāpāraviśeṣaḥ /
sa eva vidhyarthaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva vidhi arthaḥ

original: liṅādiśvaiyaṁ māṁ pravartayati 'ti niyamena pratīteḥ /
analyzed: mā pravartayati ti niyamena pratīteḥ

original: yat tv iṣṭasādhanatvam vidhyartha iti tan na /
analyzed: yat tu iṣṭa sādhana tvam vidhi arthaḥ iti tat na

original: tathā sati 'ṣṭasādhanam iti śabdasya vidhiśabdaḥ paryāyaḥ syāt /
analyzed: tathā sati ṣṭa sādhanam iti śabdasya vidhi śabdaḥ paryāyaḥ syāt

original: na ca paryāyatvaṁ yujyate; saṁdhyopāsanaṁ ta iṣṭasādhanaṁ tasmāt tat tvaṁkurv iti sahaprayogāt / paryāyāṇāṁ ca sahaprayogābhāvāt /
analyzed: na ca paryāya tva yujyate sadhyā upāsana te iṣṭa sādhana tasmāt tat tvakuru iti sahaprayogāt paryāyāṇā ca sahaprayoga abhāvāt

original: ataś ca vyāpāraviśeṣa eva vidhyarthaḥ /
analyzed: atas ca vyāpāra viśeṣaḥ eva vidhi arthaḥ

original: sa ca loke puruṣaniṣṭho bhāvanāyāviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca loke puruṣa niṣṭhaḥ bhāvanāyā viśeṣaḥ

original: vede tu puruṣābhāve śabdaniṣṭha eva preraṇāparaparyāya ity uktam /
analyzed: vede tu puruṣa abhāve śabda niṣṭhaḥ eva preraṇā apara paryāyaḥ iti uktam

original: nanu loke śabdaniṣṭhe preraṇāparaparyāye vyāpāre śabdaprayogābhāvena śaktigrāhābhāvāt kathaṁ tasya vidhiśabdāt pratipattir iti cet / satyam etat /
analyzed: nanu loke śabda niṣṭhe preraṇā para paryāye vyāpāre śabda prayoga abhāvena śakti grāha abhāvāt tasya vidhi śabdāt pratipattiḥ iti ced satyam etat

original: tathā 'pi bālas tāvat stanyadānādau svakṛtarodanādijanitamātṛpravṛtteḥ svābhiprāyarūpapravartanājñānajanyatvāvadhāraṇāt savidhikaprayojakavākyaśravaṇasamanantarabhāvinīṁ prayojyavṛddhapravṛttim upalabhya tatkāraṇatvena tasya pravartanājñānam anumimīte /
analyzed: tathā bālaḥ tāvat stanya dāna ādau sva kṛta rodana ādi janita mātṛ pravṛtteḥ sva abhiprāya rūpa pravartanā jñāna janya tva avadhāraṇāt savidhika prayojaka vākya śravaṇa samanantara bhāvinī prayojya vṛddha pravṛttim upalabhya tad kāraṇa tvena tasya pravartanā jñānam anumimīte

original: yady api bhojanādau svapravṛtteḥ samihitasādhanatājñānapūrvakatvaṁ vadhāranāt prayojyavṛddhapravṛtter api tatpūrvakatvaṁ dhyavasānaṁ yuktam / tathā 'py anyapreritapravṛttau pravartanājñānajanyatvasyo 'ktamātṛpravṛttau darśanena prayojyavṛddhapravṛtter apy anyapreritapravṛttitvāt tatkāraṇatvena pravartanājñānasyai 'vā 'dhyavasānam /
analyzed: yadi api bhojana ādau sva pravṛtteḥ vadhāranāt prayojya vṛddha pravṛtteḥ api tad pūrvaka tva yuktam tathā pi anya prerita pravṛttau pravartanā jñāna janya tvasya u kta mātṛ pravṛttau darśanena prayojya vṛddha pravṛtteḥ api anya prerita pravṛtti tvāt tad kāraṇa tvena pravartanā jñāna vā dhyavasānam

original: tac ca pravartanājñānam anvayavyatirekābhyāṁ prayojakavākyajanyam ity avadhārayati /
analyzed: tat ca pravartanā jñānam anvaya vyatirekābhyā prayojaka vākya janyam iti avadhārayati

original: tatra cā 'vāpodvāpābhyāṁ pravartanāyāṁ vidhiśaktiṁ vyavasthāpayati /
analyzed: tatra ca ā vāpa udvāpābhyā pravartanāyāḥ vidhi śakti vyavasthāpayati

original: pravṛttyanukülo vyāpāraḥ pravartanā /
sa ca vyāpāraḥ praiṣādirūpo vividha iti pratyekaṁ vyabhicāritvād vidhiśabdavācyatvānupapatteḥ pravartanāsāmānyam eva vidhiśabdavācyam iti kalpayati /
analyzed: sa ca vyāpāraḥ praiṣa ādi rūpaḥ vividhaḥ iti pratyeka vyabhicāri tvāt vidhi śabda vācya tva anupapatteḥ pravartanā sāmānyam eva vidhi śabda vācyam iti kalpayati

original: evaṁ ca vidhiśravaṇe praiṣādirūpasya vaktṛābhiprāyasya pravartanātvena 'va rūpeṇa pratītir na viśeṣarūpeṇa / tathai 'va śaktigrāhāt /
analyzed: eva ca vidhi śravaṇe praiṣa ādi rūpasya vaktṛ a abhiprāyasya pravartanā tvena rūpeṇa pratītiḥ na viśeṣa rūpeṇa śakti grāhāt

original: viśeṣarūpeṇa tu pratītir lakṣaṇayai 'va /
analyzed: viśeṣa rūpeṇa tu pratītiḥ lakṣaṇayai

original: evaṁ ca vaidikalinādisravaṇe 'pi pravartanāsāmānyam eva pratīyate /
analyzed: eva ca vaidika lina ādi sravaṇe pi pravartanā sāmānyam eva pratīyate

original: tatra ko 'sau vyāpāra ity apekṣāyāṁ praiṣādirūpasya vaktṛābhiprāyasyā 'puruṣeye vede 'nupapatteḥ śabdaniṣṭha eva preraṇāparaparyāyaḥ kaścid vyāpāra iti kalpyate /
analyzed: tatra kaḥ sau vyāpāraḥ iti apekṣāyā praiṣa ādi rūpasya vaktṛ abhiprāyasya puruṣeye vede nupapatteḥ śabda niṣṭhaḥ eva preraṇā para paryāyaḥ kaścid vyāpāraḥ iti kalpyate

original: ataś ca śabdaniṣṭha eva preraṇāparaparyāyo vyāpāraḥ śābdī bhāvanā /
analyzed: atas ca śabda niṣṭhaḥ eva preraṇā apara paryāyaḥ vyāpāraḥ śābdī bhāvanā

original: sai 'va ca pravartanātvena rūpeṇa vidhyartha iti /
analyzed: sā e ca pravartanā tvena rūpeṇa vidhi arthaḥ iti

original: ayam eva cā 'rthaḥ—
analyzed: ayam eva ca a rthaḥ

original: abhidhābhāvanām āhur anyām eva līnādayaḥ,iti vārtikasya /
analyzed: abhidhā bhāvanām āhuḥ anyām eva līna ādayaḥ iti vārtikasya

original: abhidhīyate 'nene 'ti vyutpattyā 'bhidhāśabdena vidhiśabda ucyate /
analyzed: abhidhīyate nena iti vyutpattyā bhidhā śabdena vidhi śabdaḥ ucyate

original: tadvyāpārātmikā bhāvanā līnādivācye 'ti lekād ācāryāḥ āhuḥ /
analyzed: tad vyāpāra ātmikā bhāvanā līna ādi vācyā ti lekāt ācāryāḥ āhuḥ

original: anye tv āhuḥ /
analyzed: anye tu āhuḥ

original: satyaṁ pravartanāsāmānyaṁ vidhyarthaḥ / tathai 'va śaktigraḥāt /
analyzed: satya pravartanā sāmānya vidhi arthaḥ

original: pravṛttyanukülo vyāpāraḥ pravartanā /
apauruṣeye ca vede praiṣāder asaṁbhavāt kaścit puruṣapravṛttyanukülo vyāpāraviśeṣaḥ kalpanīyaḥ; vidhiśabdābhidheyapravartanāsāmānyasya viśeṣam antareṇa 'paryavasānāt /
analyzed: apauruṣeye ca vede praiṣa ādeḥ asabhavāt kaścid puruṣa pravṛtti anuklaḥ vyāpāra viśeṣaḥ kalpanīyaḥ vidhi śabda abhidheya pravartanā sāmānyasya viśeṣam antareṇa paryavasānāt

original: tatra ko 'sau vyāpāraviśeṣa ity apekṣāyāṁ dhātvarthagatam saṁhitasādhanatvam eva 'ti kalpyate / tasyā 'pi pravṛttyanukülatvāt /
analyzed: tatra kaḥ sau vyāpāra viśeṣaḥ iti apekṣāyāḥ dhātvartha gatam sahita sādhanatvam eva kalpyate tasyāḥ

original: sarvo hi saṁhitasādhanatvāṁ jñātvā pravartate /
analyzed: sarvaḥ hi sahita sādhana tvā jñātvā pravartate

original: anyaprerīto 'pīṣe yadi 'stasādhanatvāṁ na jānāti tadā nai 'va pravartate /
analyzed: pīṣe yadi na jānāti tadā pravartate

original: svatantraprereṇāvāde 'pi tadākṣiptasaṁhitasādhanatvājñānaṁ svīkriyata eva; anyathā vidheḥ pravartakatvānupapetteḥ /
analyzed: svīkriyate eva anyathā vidheḥ pravartaka tva anupapetteḥ

original: ataś ca 'vaśyakatvāt saṁhitasādhanatai 'va pravartanātvena rūpeṇa vidhyarthaḥ /
analyzed: atas ca vaśyaka tvāt pravartanā tvena rūpeṇa vidhi arthaḥ

original: evaṁ ca vidhiśabdasyā 'nyaniṣṭhavyāpārabodhakatvaṁ lokasiddhaṁ siddhaṁ bhavati /
analyzed: eva ca vidhi śabdasya loka siddha siddha bhavati

original: kiṁ ca śabda eko vyāpāraḥ spandādyatiriktaḥ kalpanīyaḥ /
analyzed: ki ca śabdaḥ ekaḥ vyāpāraḥ spanda ādi atiriktaḥ kalpanīyaḥ

original: tasya ca svapravṛttau parādhīnapravṛttau vā kāraṇatvena kḷptasya pravartanātvenā rūpeṇa jñātasya pravṛttyanukülatvaṁ śakṭasya ca paraniṣṭhavyāpārajñāpakatvena kḷptasya svaniṣṭhavyāpārabodhakatvaṁ vidheś ca pravartakatvanirvāhārthaṁ dhātvarthasya saṁhitasādhanatvam iti kalpanād varam āvaśyakasyai 'va saṁhitasādhanatvssya svapravṛttihetutvena kḷptasya pravartanātvena rūpeṇa vidhyarthatvakalpanaṁ lāghavāt / anyaniṣṭhatvāc ca /
analyzed: tasya ca sva pravṛttau para adhīna pravṛttau vā kāraṇa tvena kḷptasya pravartanā tvena rūpeṇa jñātasya śakṭasya ca para niṣṭha vyāpāra jñāpaka tvena kḷptasya sva niṣṭha vyāpāra bodhaka tva vidheḥ ca pravartaka tva nirvāha artha dhātvarthasya sahita sādhana tvam iti kalpanāt varam lāghavāt anya niṣṭha tvāt ca

original: na ca vidheḥ pravartakatvanirvāhārthaṁ saṁhitasādhanatvakalpanāt prereṇānābhidhāne ca vidheḥ pravartakatvābhāvād dhātvarthasya ca saṁhitasādhanatvakalpakam eva nā 'sti 'ti vācyam; pravartanābhidhānenai 'va tanmate 'pi vidheḥ pravartakatvād vidhyabhihitasya ca pravartanāsāmānyasya viśeṣam antareṇa 'paryavasānāt saṁhitasādhanatvāvakṣepakatvāt /
analyzed: na ca vidheḥ pravartaka tva nirvāha artha sahita sādhanatva kalpanāt ca vidheḥ pravartaka tva abhāvāt dhātvarthasya ca sahita sādhanatva kalpakam eva vācyam vidheḥ pravartaka tvāt vidhi abhihitasya ca pravartanā sāmānyasya viśeṣam antareṇa paryavasānāt sahita sādhanatva avakṣepaka tvāt

original: na ce 'ṣṭasādhanatvssya vidhyarthatve saṁdhyopāsanaṁ ta iṣṭasādhanaṁ tat tvaṁ kurv iti sahaprayogānupapatir iti vācyam; iṣṭasādhanatvssya viśeṣarūpeṇa vidhinā 'nabhidhānāt,pravartanātvena rūpeṇa 'bhidhānāt /
analyzed: na ced iṣṭa sādhana tvasya vidhi artha tve sadhyā upāsana te iṣṭa sādhana tat tva kuru iti sahaprayoga anupapatiḥ iti vācyam iṣṭa sādhana tvasya viśeṣa rūpeṇa vidhinā na abhidhānāt pravartanā tvena rūpeṇa bhidhānāt

original: sāmānyaśabdasya ca viśeṣaśabdena dṛṣṭaḥ sahaprayogaḥ pāñcālarājo drupada ityādau /
analyzed: sāmānya śabdasya ca viśeṣa śabdena dṛṣṭaḥ sahaprayogaḥ pāñcāla rājaḥ drupadaḥ ityādau

original: tasmāt saṁhitasādhanatai 'va pravartanātvena rūpeṇa vidhyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt pravartanā tvena rūpeṇa vidhi arthaḥ

original: sai 'va ca tena rūpeṇa śabdena 'vā 'bhidhīyate iti śābdī bhāvanā /
analyzed: sā e va ca tena rūpeṇa śabdena vā bhidhīyate iti śābdī bhāvanā

original: uktavārtikasyā 'py ayam evā 'bhiprāyaḥ /
analyzed: ukta vārtikasya a pi ayam eva abhiprāyaḥ

original: abhidhīyate sā 'bhidhā saṁhitasādhanatā / sai 'va pravartanātvenā 'bhihitā puruṣapravṛttiṁ bhāvayatī 'ti bhāvanā tāṁ līnādaya āhur iti /
analyzed: abhidhīyate sā bhidhā sahita sādhanatā  sā e va pravartanā tvena a bhihitā puruṣa pravṛtti bhāvayati iti bhāvanā tāḥ līna ādayaḥ āhuḥ iti

original: yathā 'huḥ /
analyzed: yathā huḥ

original: puṁsāṁ ne 'ṣṭābhyupāyatvāt kriyāsv anyaḥ pravartakaḥ pravṛttihetuṁ dharmaṁ ca pravadanti pravartanām /
analyzed: kriyāsu anyaḥ pravartakaḥ pravṛtti hetu dharma ca pravadanti pravartanām

original: tat siddhaṁ yajete 'ty atra liṅtvāṁśena śābdī bhāvano 'cyata iti /
analyzed: tat siddha yajeta iti atra liṅ tva āśena śābdī bhāvanā ucyate iti

original: ākhyātatvāṁśenā 'rthi bhāvano 'cyate /
analyzed: ākhyāta tva āśena rthi cyate

original: nanu ke 'yam ārthī bhāvanā /
analyzed: nanu ke yam ārthī bhāvanā

original: kartṛvyāpāra iti cen na; yāgāder api tadvyāpāratvena bhāvanātvāpatteḥ /
analyzed: kartṛ vyāpāraḥ iti ced na yāga ādeḥ api tad vyāpāra tvena bhāvanā tva āpatteḥ

original: na ce 'ṣṭāpattiḥ; tasya prakṛtyarthatvena pratyayārthatvābhāvād iti cet—
analyzed: na ced iṣṭa āpattiḥ tasya prakṛti artha tvena pratyaya artha tva abhāvāt iti ced

original: atrā 'huḥ /
analyzed: atra huḥ

original: satyaṁ na yāgo bhāvanā kiṁ tu svargecchājanito yāgaviṣayo yaḥ prayatnaḥ sa bhāvanā /
analyzed: na yāgaḥ bhāvanā ki tu svarga icchā janitaḥ yāga viṣayaḥ yaḥ prayatnaḥ sa bhāvanā

original: sa eva cā 'khyātāṁśeno 'cyate; yajete 'ty ākhyātaśravaṇe yāgena yatete 'ti pratīter jāyamānatvāt /
analyzed: saḥ eva ca ā khyāta āśena u cyate yajeta iti ākhyāta śravaṇe yāgena yateta iti pratīteḥ jāyamāna tvāt

original: yaś ca prayatnapūrvakaṁ gamanādi karoti tasmin gamanādau gamanādi karotī ti karotiprayogadarśanāt /
analyzed: yaḥ ca gamana ādi karoti tasmin gamana ādau gamana ādi karoti iti karoti prayoga darśanāt

original: yāgādinā spandane tu nā 'yaṁ karotī kiṁ tu vātādinā 'sya spando jāyata iti prayogāt karotyarthas tāvat prayatnaḥ /
analyzed: yāga ādinā spandane tu tu vāta ādinā spandaḥ jāyate iti prayogāt karoti arthaḥ tāvat prayatnaḥ

original: karotisāmānādhikaraṇyaṁ cā 'khyāte dṛśyate /
analyzed: karoti sāmānādhikaraṇya ca ā khyāte dṛśyate

original: yajeta yāgena kuryāt / pacati pākaṁ karoti / gacchati gamanaṁ karoti 'ti /
analyzed: yajeta yāgena kuryāt pacati pāka karoti gacchati gamana karoti ti

original: ataś ca karotisāmānādhikaraṇyāt prayatnasya 'khyātavācyatvam /
analyzed: atas ca karoti sāmānādhikaraṇyāt prayatnasya khyāta vācya tvam

original: na ca ratho gacchatī 'ti prayogānupapattiḥ / rathe yatnābhāvād iti vācyam; voḍhṛaśvagataṁ prayatnaṁ ratha āropya prayogopapatteḥ /
analyzed: na ca rathaḥ gacchati iti prayoga anupapattiḥ rathe yatna abhāvāt iti vācyam voḍhṛ aśva gata rathe āropya prayoga upapatteḥ

original: yanmate 'py anyotpādanānukūlaṁ vyāpārasāmānyaṁ bhāvanā / tanmate 'pi rathe gamanānukūlavyāpārānupalabdhe ratho gacchati 'ti prayogasyau 'pacārikatvam eva 'ti /
analyzed: yad mate pi anya utpādana anukūla vyāpāra sāmānya bhāvanā tad mate pi rathe gamana anukūla vyāpāra anupalabdhe rathaḥ gacchati eva

original: ataś ca prayatna evā 'rthi bhāvanā /
analyzed: atas ca prayatnaḥ eva ā rthi bhāvanā

original: yathā 'huh /
analyzed: yathā huh

original: prayatnaprayojiktā 'rthabhāvanā tu na śakyate vaktum ākhyātavācye 'ha prastute 'ty uparamyate /
analyzed: prayatna prayojiktā rtha bhāvanā tu na śakyate vaktum ākhyāta vācye ha prastute ti uparamyate

original: anye tv āhuh /
analyzed: anye tu āhuh

original: bhavitṛ bhāvanānukūlo bhāvakavyāpāras tāvad bhāvanā /
analyzed: bhavitṛ bhāvanā anukūlaḥ bhāvaka vyāpāraḥ tāvat bhāvanā

original: yasmin vyāpāre kṛte karaṇaṁ phalotpādanāya samarthaṁ bhavati tādṛśo vyāpāra iti yāvat /
analyzed: yasmin vyāpāre kṛte karaṇa phala utpādanāya samartha bhavati tādṛśaḥ vyāpāraḥ iti yāvat

original: sa eva cā 'khyātārthah /
analyzed: saḥ eva ca khyāta arthaḥ

original: kuṭhāreṇa chinatti 'ty ākhyātaśravaṇe hi bhavaty etādṛśī matih /
analyzed: kuṭhāreṇa chinatti ākhyāta śravaṇe hi bhavati etādṛśī matiḥ

original: kuṭhāreṇa tathā vyāpriyeta yasmin vyāpāre kṛte kuṭhāreṇa chedanaṁ bhavati 'ti /
analyzed: kuṭhāreṇa tathā vyāpriyeta yasmin vyāpāre kṛte kuṭhāreṇa chedana bhavati

original: evaṁ yajeta svargakāma ity asyā 'yam arthah /
analyzed: eva yajeta svarga kāmaḥ iti asyāḥ yam arthah

original: yāgena tathā vyāpriyeta yasmin vyāpāre kṛte yāgāt svargo bhavati 'ti /
analyzed: yāgena tathā vyāpriyeta yasmin vyāpāre kṛte yāgāt svargaḥ bhavati

original: sa ca vyāpārah kvacid udyamananipatanādih / kvacic cā 'gnyanvadhānādibrahmaṇatarpaṇāntah / kathambhāvakāṅkṣāyāṁ viśeṣaṇibhena paścād avagamyate /
analyzed: sa ca vyāpāraḥ kvacid udyamana nipatana ādih  kvacid ca a gni anvadhāna ādi brahmaṇa tarpaṇa antah kathambhāva kāṅkṣāyāḥ viśeṣa ṇibhena paścāt avagamyate

original: anyotpādānukūlatvena sāmānyatas tv ākhyātād eva /
analyzed: anya utpāda anukūla tvena sāmānyatas tu ākhyātāt eva

original: ratho grāmaṁ gacchati 'ty atrā 'py ākhyātena grāmaprāptyanukūlo vyāpāra eva pratīyate; rathas tathā gamanena vyāpriyate yasmin vyāpāre kṛte gamanād grāmaprāptir bhavati 'ti pratīteh /
analyzed: rathaḥ grāma gacchati ti atrā pi ākhyātena grāma prāpti anukūlaḥ vyāpāraḥ eva pratīyate rathaḥ tathā gamanena vyāpriyate yasmin vyāpāre kṛte gamanāt grāma prāptiḥ bhavati pratītā ih

original: na tv atra gamanamatram ākhyātārthah / tasya dhātuno 'ktatvāt /
analyzed: na tu atra gamana matram ākhyāta arthaḥ tasya

original: tatra ko 'sau vyāpāra ity apekṣāyāṁ pūrvoktaviśyantadeśavibhājanasamyojana iti paścād avagamyate /
analyzed: tatra kaḥ sau vyāpāraḥ iti apekṣāyā iti paścāt avagamyate

original: pūrveṇa pradeśena vibhajyo 'ttareṇa saṁyojya ratho grāmaṁ gacchati 'ti prayogāt / udyamya nipātya kuṭhāreṇa chinatti 'tivat /
analyzed: pūrveṇa pradeśena vibhajya u ttareṇa sayojya rathaḥ grāma gacchati ti prayogāt udyamya nipātya kuṭhāreṇa chinatti tivat

original: evaṁ devadattah prayatata ity atrā 'pi devadattas tathā vyāpriyate yathā prayatno bhavati 'ti prayatnānukūlo vyāpāra evā 'khyātārtho na tu prayatnah; tasya dhātuno 'ktatvāt /
analyzed: eva devadattaḥ prayatate iti atra a pi devadattaḥ tathā vyāpriyate yathā prayatnaḥ bhavati prayatna anukūlaḥ vyāpāraḥ eva khyāta arthaḥ na tu prayatnaḥ tasya dhātunā u kta tvāt

original: vyāpāraviśeṣāpekṣāyāṁ ce 'cchādih paścād avagamyate / udyamananipatānavat /
analyzed: vyāpāra viśeṣa apekṣāyā ced chā ādiḥ paścāt avagamyate udyamana nipatāna vat

original: tathā ca sarvatrānugatatvād anyotpādānukūlavyāpārasāmānyam evā 'khyātārthah / na tu prayatnamātram; ratho gacchati devadattah prayatata ityādiṣu tadabhāvāt /
analyzed: tathā ca sarvatra anugata tvāt anya utpāda anukūla vyāpāra sāmānyam eva khyātārthaḥ  / na tu prayatna mātram rathaḥ gacchati devadattaḥ prayatate ityādiṣu tad abhāvāt

original: na cā 'trau 'pacārikatvaṁ vaktuṁ yuktam / mukhye saṁbhavati tasya 'nyāyyatvāt /
analyzed: na cā trau pacārikatva vaktu yuktam mukhye sabhavati tasya nyāyya tvāt

original: karotyartho 'py anyotpādānukūlo vyāpāra eva na prayatnamātram / karoteś cetanācetanakartṛkākhyātasāmānādhikaraṇyād iti /
analyzed: karoti arthaḥ api anya utpāda anukūlaḥ vyāpāraḥ eva na prayatna mātram karoteḥ cetana acetana kartṛka ākhyāta sāmānādhikaraṇyāt iti

original: tat siddham anyotpādānukūlo vyāpāra ārthī bhāvane 'ti /sai 'va ca 'khyātāṁśeno 'cyate / bhāvayed iti /
analyzed: tat siddham anya utpāda anukūlaḥ vyāpāraḥ ārthī bhāvane ca khyāta āśena u cyate bhāvayet iti

original: tasyāś ca bhāvyakāṅkṣāyāṁ svargādir bhāvyatvena saṁbadhyate /
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca bhāvya kāṅkṣāyā svarga ādiḥ bhāvya tvena sabadhyate

original: karaṇakāṅkṣāyāṁ yāgādiḥ karaṇatvena saṁbadhyate; pravādādaya itikartavyatātvena /
analyzed: karaṇa kāṅkṣāyāḥ yāga ādiḥ karaṇa tvena sabadhyate pravāda ādayaḥ itikartavya tā tvena

original: evaṁ ca yajete 'tyādinā svargādyuddeśena yāgāder vidhānāt siddhaṁ yāgāder dharmatvaṁ prayojanam uddiśya vedena vihitatvād iti /
analyzed: eva ca yajeta ityādinā svarga ādi uddeśena yāga ādeḥ vidhānāt uddiśya vedena vihita tvāt iti

original: so 'yaṁ dharmo yaduddeśena vihitas taduddeśena kriyamāṇas taddhetuḥ /
analyzed: saḥ ya dharmaḥ yad uddeśena vihitaḥ tad uddeśena kriyamāṇaḥ tad hetuḥ

original: śrigovindārpaṇabuddhyā kriyamāṇas tu niḥśreyasahetuḥ /
analyzed: śri govinda arpaṇa buddhyā kriyamāṇaḥ tu niḥśreyasa hetuḥ

original: na ca tadarpanabuddhyā 'nuṣṭhāne pramāṇābhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na ca tad arpana buddhyā anuṣṭhāne pramāṇa abhāvaḥ

original: yat karoṣi yad aśnāsi yaj juhoṣi dadāsi yat
analyzed: yat karoṣi yat aśnāsi yat juhoṣi dadāsi yat

original: yat tapasyasi kaunteya tat kuruṣva madarpanaṁ /
analyzed: yat tapasyasi kaunteya tat kuruṣva mad arpana

original: iti smṛteḥ / asyāś cā 'ṣṭakādismṛtivat prāmāṇyād ity anyatra vistaraḥ /
analyzed: iti smṛteḥ asyāḥ ca ā ṣṭakā ādi smṛti vat prāmāṇyāt iti anyatra vistaraḥ

original: kvā 'haṁ mandamatiḥ kve 'yaṁ prakriyā bhāṭṭasammatā
analyzed: kvā ha manda matiḥ prakriyā bhāṭṭa sammatā

original: tasmād bhakter vilāso 'yaṁ govindagurupādayoḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt bhakteḥ vilāsaḥ govinda guru pādayoḥ

original: grantharūpo madiyo 'yaṁ vāgvyāpāraḥ suśobhanaḥ
analyzed: grantha rūpaḥ vāc vyāpāraḥ su śobhanaḥ

original: anena priyatāṁ devo govindo bhaktavatsalaḥ /
analyzed: anena priya tā devaḥ govindaḥ bhakta vatsalaḥ

original: iti śrimadanantadevasūnunā 'padevena kṛtaṁ mimāṁsānyāyaprakāśasaṁjñakaṁ mimāṁsāprakaraṇaṁ samāptam /
analyzed: iti śrimat ananta deva sūnunā padevena kṛta mimāsā nyāya prakāśa sajñaka mimāsā prakaraṇa samāptam
